//=================
// CDI New Monsters
//=================

ACTOR MonsterEventCyberFeast : GoreNest
{
Scale 1.35
Radius 2
Height 2
Scale 1.35
RenderStyle Add
-SOLID
-USESPECIAL
+NOCLIP
+NOBLOOD
var int user_timer;
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 1
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Monster Event Activated",0,0,0,0)
  Waiting:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_timer >= 360,"Done")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_timer",user_timer+1)
	G5TE A 2 A_SpawnItemEx("MonsterPortalMarker",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
	Loop
  Done:
    TNT1 A 5 A_Die
	Goto Death
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InvasionGateLightning",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 1
	Stop
}
}

ACTOR SideEvent : MonsterEventCyberFeast
{
Scale 0.85
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 1
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Side Event Activated",0,0,0,0)
  Waiting:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_timer >= 360,"Done")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_timer",user_timer+1)
    G5TE A 2 A_SpawnItemEx("MonsterPortalMarker",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
	Loop
}
}

Actor DemonicAssault : MonsterEventCyberFeast
{
Radius 80
Height 138
Tag "\c[s0]Demonic Assault\c-"
+SOLID
-NOCLIP
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Demonic Assault Ambient",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("RedStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultRedSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("RedStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultRedSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultRedSkull",0,0,192)
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(10,35*6,0,256,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("RedStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultRedSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("RedStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultRedSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("RedStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultRedSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("RedStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultRedSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("RedStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultRedSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("RedStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SOLID,FALSE)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Demonic Assault Activated",0,0,0,0)
  Waiting:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_timer >= 25,"Done")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_timer",user_timer+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultRedSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultRedSkullRemain",0,0,192)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("RedStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	Loop
  Done:
    TNT1 A 1 A_Die
	Goto Death
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellishAvatarLightning")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RedBossExplosionEffect")
	TNT1 A 1 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	Stop
}
}

Actor DarkDemonicAssault : DemonicAssault
{
Tag "\c[l2]Dark Demonic Assault\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Demonic Assault Ambient",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultGreenSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultGreenSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultGreenSkull",0,0,192)
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(10,35*6,0,256,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultGreenSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultGreenSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultGreenSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultGreenSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultGreenSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SOLID,FALSE)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Demonic Assault Activated",0,0,0,0)
  Waiting:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_timer >= 25,"Done")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_timer",user_timer+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultGreenSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultGreenSkullRemain",0,0,192)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InvasionGateLightning")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenBossExplosionEffect")
	TNT1 A 1 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	Stop
}
}

Actor DarkDemonicAssault_1 : DarkDemonicAssault {}

Actor PhaseDemonicAssault : DemonicAssault
{
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Demonic Assault\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Demonic Assault Ambient",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultPurpleSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultPurpleSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultPurpleSkull",0,0,192)
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(10,35*6,0,256,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultPurpleSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultPurpleSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultPurpleSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultPurpleSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultPurpleSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SOLID,FALSE)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Demonic Assault Activated",0,0,0,0)
  Waiting:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_timer >= 25,"Done")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_timer",user_timer+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultPurpleSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultPurpleSkullRemain",0,0,192)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleLightning")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleBossExplosionEffect")
	TNT1 A 1 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	Stop
}
}

Actor LegendaryDemonicAssault : DemonicAssault
{
Tag "\c[z3]Legendary Demonic Assault\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Demonic Assault Ambient",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("YellowStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultYellowSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("YellowStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultYellowSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultYellowSkull",0,0,192)
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(10,35*6,0,256,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("YellowStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultYellowSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("YellowStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultYellowSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("YellowStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultYellowSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("YellowStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultYellowSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("YellowStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultYellowSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("YellowStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SOLID,FALSE)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Demonic Assault Activated",0,0,0,0)
  Waiting:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_timer >= 25,"Done")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_timer",user_timer+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultYellowSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonicAssaultYellowSkullRemain",0,0,192)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("YellowStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("YellowLightning")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("YellowBossExplosionEffect")
	TNT1 A 1 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	Stop
}
}

Actor DemonicAssaultRedSkull
{
Radius 2
Height 2
+NOCLIP
+NOINTERACTION
+CLIENTSIDEONLY
+BRIGHT
Alpha 0.15
Renderstyle Add
Scale 3.3
States
{
  Spawn:
	RVSK LLLLLLLL 3 A_FadeIn(0.1)
	RVSK LKJIHGFEDCBA 17 Bright 
	Stop
}
}

Actor DemonicAssaultRedSmokeSpawner
{
+NOINTERACTION
var int user_timer;
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_timer >= 7,"Death")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ArcradimusFire",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 5 A_SetUserVar("user_timer",user_timer+1)
	Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 1
	Stop
}
}

Actor DemonicAssaultGreenSmokeSpawner : DemonicAssaultRedSmokeSpawner
{
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_timer >= 7,"Death")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCyberFlame",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 5 A_SetUserVar("user_timer",user_timer+1)
	Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 1
	Stop
}
}

Actor DemonReinforcement : DemonicAssault
{
Tag "\c[s0]Demon Reinforcement\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("RedStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("RedStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SOLID,FALSE)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Demon Reinforcement Activated",0,0,0,0)
  Waiting:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_timer >= 15,"Done")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_timer",user_timer+1)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("RedStar",random(-160,160),random(-160,160),random(8,84),0,0,0,0,128)
	Loop
  Done:
    TNT1 A 1 A_Die
	Goto Death
  Death:
	TNT1 A 1 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	Stop
}
}

Actor HellBulletPuff : ModdedBulletPuff{DamageType "Hell"}

Actor BabyCaco : Cacodemon
{
	Health 150
	Radius 18
	Height 36
	Mass 200
	Speed 9
	PainChance 176
	SeeSound "BabyCaco/Sight"
	PainSound "BabyCaco/Pain"
	DeathSound "BabyCaco/Death"
	MeleeSound "caco/melee"
	MeleeSound "caco/melee"
	ActiveSound "BabyCaco/Active"
	BloodColor "Blue"
	Species "Hell"
	DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
	DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
	MeleeDamage 3
	Obituary "%o underestimated a Baby Cacodemon."
	HitObituary "%o was nibbled to death by a Baby Cacodemon."
	PainChance "Poe", 255
	MONSTER
	+NOGRAVITY
	+FLOAT
	+DONTHARMSPECIES
	+FASTMELEE
	var int user_rage;
	Tag "\ccBaby Cacodemon\c-"
	States
	{
	Spawn:
		CACB A 10 A_Look
		Loop
	See:
	  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_rage == 1,"See2")
		CACB A 3 A_Chase
		Loop
	See2:
		CACB AA 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(26,"Evade")
        CACB A 2 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyCacoGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
		Loop
	Evade:
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,7)
		TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,14,0,0)
		CACB AAAA 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
		Goto See
		TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)
		CACB AAAA 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
		Goto See2
	Melee:
        CACB AB 5 A_FaceTarget
        CACB C 5 A_MeleeAttack
        Goto See
	Missile:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_rage == 1,"Missile2")
		CACB AB 5 A_FaceTarget
		CACB C 5 Bright A_CustomComboAttack("ABBall",17,random(1,8)*3,"BabyCaco/Melee")
		Goto See
	Missile2:
		CACB AB 2 A_FaceTarget
		CACB C 2 Bright A_CustomComboAttack("ABBall",17,random(1,8)*3,"BabyCaco/Melee")
		CACB AB 2 A_FaceTarget
		CACB C 2 Bright A_CustomComboAttack("ABBall",17,random(1,8)*3,"BabyCaco/Melee")
		Goto See2
	Pain:
		CACB D 3
		CACB D 3 A_Pain
		CACB E 6
		Goto See
	Pain.Poe:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_rage == 1,"See2")
		TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_rage",1)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	    CACB AB 2 A_FaceTarget
		CACB C 2 Bright A_PlaySound("BabyCaco/Sight")
		CACB C 0 HealThing(100)
	    CACB CCCCCCCCCCCCCCCC 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("BabyCacoLineSpawner",0,0,0,0)
		CACB CCCCCCCCCCCCCCCC 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("BabyCacoLineSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	    CACB C 2
	    Goto See
	Death:
		CACB F 4 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyCacoGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
		CACB G 4 A_Scream
		CACB HJ 4
		CACB J 4 A_NoBlocking
		CACB K 4 A_SetUserVar("user_rage",0)
		CACB L -1 A_SetFloorClip
		Stop
	Raise:
		TNT1 A 0
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
		CACB L 3 A_UnSetFloorClip
		CACB KJIHGF 3
		Goto See
	}
}

Actor BabyCacoGhostA
{
RENDERSTYLE Translucent
Alpha 0.75
+NOGRAVITY
+CLIENTSIDEONLY
+DONTSPLASH
+NOINTERACTION
+NOCLIP
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
	CACB A 2 A_FadeOut(0.18)
	Loop
  Toaster:
	TNT1 A 0
	Stop
}
}

Actor Paladin
{
Health 2250
Radius 24
Height 64
Mass 800
Speed 8
PainChance 8
Monster
+FloorClip
+DontHarmSpecies
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+NORADIUSDMG
+MissileMore
+AvoidMelee
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
Obituary "%o played dodgeball with a paladin and lost."
HitObituary "A Paladin blew %o away."
SeeSound "Paladin/Sight"
PainSound "Paladin/Pain"
DeathSound "Paladin/Death"
ActiveSound "Paladin/Active"
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
Scale 1.2
var int user_script;
Tag "\c[m8]Paladin\c-"
States
{
	Spawn:
	   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
       TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	   TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
       TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	   HPAL AB 10 A_Look
       Loop
	See:
	   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
       TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	   TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
       TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
       TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	   TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FRIGHTENED",0)
	   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(128,"SeePanic")
       HPAL AABB 3 A_Chase
	   TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/bruwlk")
	   HPAL CCDD 3 A_Chase
	   TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/bruwlk")
	   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"SeeShield")
	   Goto See+1
	SeeShield:
       HPAL EEFF 4 A_Chase
	   TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/bruwlk")
	   HPAL GGHH 4 A_Chase
	   TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/bruwlk")
	   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(96,"See")
	   Goto SeeShield
	SeePanic:
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FRIGHTENED",1)
		HPAL AABB 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/bruwlk")
		HPAL CCDD 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/bruwlk")
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(128,"SeePanic")
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FRIGHTENED",0)
		Goto See
	Melee:
		TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FRIGHTENED",0)
		HPAL MN 6 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL O 6 A_CustomMeleeAttack(random(1,10)*4,"Paladin/Melee","Paladin/Swing")
		Goto See
	Missile:
		TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FRIGHTENED",0)
		HPAL A 1 A_JumpIfCloser(300,"Grenadier")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Rocket","Railgun","BFG15K")
	Normal:
		TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
		HPAL KK 5 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL L 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PaladinBall",28,0,random(-4,4))
		HPAL K 2 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL L 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PaladinBall",28,0,random(-4,4))
		HPAL K 2 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL L 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PaladinBall",28,0,random(-4,4))
		HPAL K 2 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL L 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PaladinBall",28,0,random(-4,4))
		HPAL K 2 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL L 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PaladinBall",28,0,random(-4,4))
		HPAL K 2 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL L 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PaladinBall",28,0,random(-4,4))
		HPAL K 2 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL L 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PaladinBall",28,0,random(-4,4))
		HPAL K 2 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL L 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PaladinBall",28,0,random(-4,4))
		HPAL K 2 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Rocket")
		Goto See
	Grenadier:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		HPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
		HPAL J 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonGrenade",32,0,Random(4,-4))
		HPAL I 4 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
		HPAL J 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonGrenade",32,0,Random(4,-4))
		HPAL I 4 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
		HPAL J 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonGrenade",32,0,Random(4,-4))
		HPAL I 4 A_FaceTarget
		Goto See
	Rocket:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		HPAL I 12 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",32,0,Random(-2,2))
		HPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",32,0,Random(-2,2))
		HPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",32,0,Random(-2,2))
		HPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",32,0,Random(-2,2))
		HPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",32,0,2)
		HPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Railgun")
		Goto See
	Railgun:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/rgcharge")
		HPAL IIIIIIIIIIIIIII 2 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL J 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("CardinalRail",50,8,Random(4,-4))
		HPAL III 4 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"BFG15K")
		Goto See
	BFG15K:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
		HPAL I 18 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL I 6 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL J 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		HPAL J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",32,0,Random(4,-4))
		HPAL I 4 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL J 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		HPAL J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",32,0,Random(4,-4))
		HPAL I 4 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL J 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		HPAL J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",32,0,Random(4,-4))
		HPAL I 4 A_FaceTarget
		HPAL J 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		HPAL J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",32,0,Random(4,-4))
		HPAL I 20 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
		Goto See
	Pain:
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FRIGHTENED",0)
		HPAL P 3
		HPAL P 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(96,"See")
		TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
		HPAL KKKKKKKKKK 3 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(160,"SeeShield")
		TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		Goto See
	Death:
		HPAL Q 0 A_Scream
		HPAL QQQQQQQQQQQQ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
		TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
		HPAL R 7 A_SpawnItemEx("PaladinShield",0,0,25,6,0,0,60,SXF_SETMASTER|SXF_CLIENTSIDE)
		HPAL S 7
		HPAL T 7 A_NoBlocking
		HPAL UV 7
		HPAL W -1
		Stop
	Raise:
		TNT1 A 0
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
		HPAL W 7 A_KillChildren
		HPAL VUTSRQ 7
		Goto See
	}
}

Actor PaladinBall
{
	Radius 6
	Height 8
	Speed 28
	Damage 5
	Projectile
	RenderStyle Add
	Alpha 0.67
	+SeekerMissile
	+THRUGHOST
	+FORCEXYBILLBOARD
	SeeSound "Paladin/Shoot"
	DeathSound "Paladin/Hit"
	Decal DoomImpScorch
	States
	{
	Spawn:
		HPLB ABCD 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PaladinBallTrail",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
		Loop
	Death:
		HPLB EFHIJ 3 Bright
		Stop
	}
}

Actor PaladinBallTrail : ClientSideEffect
{
	Radius 3
	Height 3
	Scale 1
	Speed 0
	Projectile
	+FORCEXYBILLBOARD
	+CLIENTSIDEONLY
	RenderStyle Add
	Alpha 0.67
	States
	{
		Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0
	    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
		TNT1 A 2
		HPLB KLMNOP 2 Bright
		Stop
	}
}

Actor PaladinShield
{
	Radius 8
	Height 8
	Scale 1.2
	+CLIENTSIDEONLY
	States
	{
	Spawn:
		HPLS ABCDEFGH 3 A_CheckFloor("Ground")
		Loop
	Ground:
		HPLS I 250 A_SetFloorClip
		HPLS I 5 A_FadeOut(0.1)
		Wait
	}
}

ACTOR UpdatedLegendaryRocket : LegendaryRocket
{
Speed 42
Damage 32
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(4,6),Random(-2,2))
	LROC A 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(4,6),Random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(4,6),Random(-2,2))	
	LROC B 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(4,6),Random(-2,2))
	Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Explode
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BlueExplosionKaboom",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueRocketExplosionFlare",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueRocketExplosionShockWave",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueParticleSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128) 
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryDebris",0,0,0,random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,8),0,128)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("BlueRocketEx")
    Stop
}
}

ACTOR UpdatedLegendaryHomingRocket : LegendaryHomingRocket
{
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Homing")
  Normal:
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    LCKM A 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    Loop	
  Homing:
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    LCKM A 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    LCKM A 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    LCKM A 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    LCKM A 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    LCKM A 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
	Goto StartSeek
  StartSeek:
	TNT1 A 0 A_BishopMissileWeave
	TNT1 A 0 A_Tracer2
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    LCKM A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_BishopMissileWeave
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    LCKM A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_BishopMissileWeave
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    LCKM A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_BishopMissileWeave
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    LCKM A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_BishopMissileWeave
	TNT1 A 0 A_Tracer2
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    LCKM A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_BishopMissileWeave
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    LCKM A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_BishopMissileWeave
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    LCKM A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_BishopMissileWeave
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    LCKM A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleBlue",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))		
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/homingrockbeep")
    Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Explode
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BlueExplosionKaboom",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueRocketExplosionFlare",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueRocketExplosionShockWave",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueParticleSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128) 
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryDebris",0,0,0,random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,8),0,128)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("BlueRocketEx")
    Stop
}
}

ACTOR MonsterFusionNuke : EFGFusionNuke
{
Speed 55
Damage 200
DamageType "Hell"
-MTHRUSPECIES
}

Actor DarkPaladin : Paladin
{
Health 3300
Mass 1000
Speed 10
PainChance 5
BloodColor Green
+BOSSDEATH
+FASTMELEE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
Obituary "%o was set to death and scattered by a Dark Paladin."
HitObituary "%o was almost about fighting with a Dark Paladin."
SeeSound "DarkPaladin/Sight" 
PainSound "DarkPaladin/Pain" 
DeathSound "DarkPaladin/Death" 
ActiveSound "DarkPaladin/Active" 
AttackSound "weapons/dtrailf"
Tag "\c[l2]Dark Paladin\c-"
States
{ 
	Spawn: 
	   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
       TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)	
	   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	   TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
       TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	   DPAL AA 10 A_Look 
       Loop 
	See:
	   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
       TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)	
	   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	   TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
       TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
       TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	   TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FRIGHTENED",0)
	   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(128,"SeePanic")
       DPAL AABB 2 A_Chase
	   TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/bruwlk")
	   DPAL CCDD 2 A_Chase
	   TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/bruwlk")
	   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"SeeShield","Boost")
	   Loop
	Boost:
		TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	    TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FRIGHTENED",0)
		DPAL A 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostA",0,0)
		DPAL A 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostA",0,0)
		DPAL B 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostB",0,0)
		DPAL B 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostB",0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
		DPAL C 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostC",0,0)
		DPAL C 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostC",0,0)
		DPAL D 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostD",0,0)
		DPAL D 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostD",0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(50,"See")
		Loop
	SeeShield:
       DPAL EEFF 3 A_Chase
	   TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/bruwlk")
	   DPAL GGHH 3 A_Chase
	   TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/bruwlk")
	   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(96,"See")
	   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"ShieldBoost")
	   Goto SeeShield
	ShieldBoost:
		DPAL E 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostE",0,0)
		DPAL E 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostE",0,0)
		DPAL F 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostF",0,0)
		DPAL F 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostF",0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
		DPAL G 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostG",0,0)
		DPAL G 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostG",0,0)
		DPAL H 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostH",0,0)
		DPAL H 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DPaladinGhostH",0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(50,"See")
		Loop
	SeePanic:
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FRIGHTENED",1)
		DPAL AABB 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/bruwlk")
		DPAL CCDD 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/bruwlk")
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(128,"Boost")
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FRIGHTENED",0)
		Goto See
	Melee:
		TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FRIGHTENED",0)
		DPAL MN 6 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL O 6 A_CustomMeleeAttack(random(1,10)*6,"Paladin/Melee","Paladin/Swing")
		Goto See
	Missile:
		TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FRIGHTENED",0)
		DPAL A 1 A_JumpIfCloser(300,"Grenadier")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Rocket","Railgun","DTR","HomingRockets","ShieldAttack","BFG10K")
	Normal:
		TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
		DPAL KK 5 A_FaceTarget      
		DPAL L 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,random(-4,4))
		DPAL KK 4 A_FaceTarget 
		DPAL L 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,random(-4,4))
		DPAL KK 4 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL L 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,random(-4,4))
		DPAL KK 4 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL L 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,random(-4,4))
		DPAL KK 4 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL L 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,random(-4,4))
		DPAL K 4 A_FaceTarget 
		TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(164,"Rocket","DTR")
		Goto See
	DTR:
		DPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL I 3 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("ZDTRProjectile2",36,20,Random(-5,5),CMF_TRACKOWNER)
		DPAL J 3 Bright A_PlaySound("weapons/demontechfire",CHAN_WEAPON)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(6,"Pause")
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
		Goto DTR+1
	Pause:
		TNT1 A 0
		DPAL I 10
		DPAL I 15 A_PlaySound("weapons/12gsgcock")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Rocket","HomingRockets","Railgun","ShieldAttack")
		Goto See
	ShieldAttack:
		TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
		DPAL KK 5 A_FaceTarget      
		DPAL K 0 A_Custommissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,-4)
		DPAL K 0 A_Custommissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,4)
		DPAL K 8 Bright A_Custommissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,0)
		DPAL LLL 5 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL K 0 A_Custommissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,-4)
		DPAL K 0 A_Custommissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,4)
		DPAL K 8 Bright A_Custommissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,0)
		DPAL LLL 5 A_FaceTarget  
		DPAL K 0 A_Custommissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,-8)
		DPAL K 0 A_Custommissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,8)
		DPAL K 0 A_Custommissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,-4)
		DPAL K 0 A_Custommissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,4)
		DPAL K 8 Bright A_Custommissile("DarkPaladinProjectile",38,0,0)
		DPAL LLL 5 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL K 2 A_FaceTarget		
		TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(164,"Rocket","Railgun","HomingRockets")
		Goto See
	Grenadier:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		DPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
		DPAL J 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkPaladinGrenade",35,20,0,0)	
		DPAL I 4 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
		DPAL J 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkPaladinGrenade",35,20,0,0)	
		DPAL I 4 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
		DPAL J 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkPaladinGrenade",35,20,0,0)	
		DPAL I 4 A_FaceTarget		
		Goto See		
	Rocket:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		DPAL I 12 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",35,20,0,0)	
		DPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",35,20,0,0)	
		DPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",35,20,0,0)	
		DPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",35,20,0,0)	
		DPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",35,20,0,0)	
		DPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget	
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(164,"Railgun")
		Goto See
	HomingRockets:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		DPAL I 12 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonHomer",35,20,0,0)	
		DPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonHomer",35,20,0,0)	
		DPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonHomer",35,20,0,0)	
		DPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonHomer",35,20,0,0)	
		DPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonHomer",35,20,0,0)	
		DPAL I 8 A_FaceTarget	
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(164,"Railgun")
		Goto See
	Railgun:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/rgcharge")
		DPAL II 10 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL I 2 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL I 1
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/dtrailf")
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DemonDTRail",36,20,0)
		DPAL J 7 Bright A_CustomRailgun(random(100,150),20,"00 85 FF",None,0,1,0,"DarkBruiserRailgunPuff",0,0,0,0,35.0,0.0,"DTRailCoreTrail")
		DPAL III 4 A_FaceTarget	
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(164,"BFG10K")
		Goto See	
	BFG10K:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
		DPAL I 18 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL I 6 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		DPAL J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",35,20,Random(4,-4))	
		DPAL I 4 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		DPAL J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",35,20,Random(4,-4))
		DPAL I 4 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		DPAL J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",35,20,Random(4,-4))
		DPAL I 4 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		DPAL J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",35,20,Random(4,-4))		
		DPAL I 4 A_FaceTarget
		DPAL J 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		DPAL J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",35,20,Random(4,-4))	
		DPAL I 20 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
		Goto See
	Pain:
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FRIGHTENED",0)
		DPAL P 3
		DPAL P 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(96,"See")
		TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
		DPAL KKKKKKKKKK 3 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(160,"SeeShield")
		TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
		Goto See
	Death:
		DPAL Q 0 A_Scream
		DPAL QQQQQQQQQQQQ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
		TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
		DPAL R 7 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkPaladinShield",0,0,25,6,0,0,60,SXF_SETMASTER|SXF_CLIENTSIDE)
		DPAL S 7 A_NoBlocking
		DPAL TUV 7
		DPAL W -1
		Stop
	Raise:
		TNT1 A 0
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
		DPAL W 7 A_KillChildren
		DPAL VUTSRQ 7
		Goto See 
	} 
}

ACTOR DarkPaladinGrenade : CydestroyerGrenade
{
FastSpeed 26
DamageType "Hell"
DeathSound "weapons/clrocketexplode"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSound
  SpawnLoop:
    DRND A 1 A_CustomMissile("GrenadeTrail",Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1))     		
    Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128) 
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,0,Random(4,-4),Random(4,-4),Random(4,8),0,128)
    MIS3 B 6 Bright A_Explode
    MIS3 CDEF 4 Bright A_SetTranslucent(0.75,1)
    Stop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(156,138)
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("GreenExplosionKaboom",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGrenadeExplosionFlare",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGrenadeExplosionShockWave",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128) 
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,0,random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,8),0,128)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("GreenRocketEx")
    Stop
}
}

Actor DarkPaladinProjectile
{
Projectile
Speed 38
Damage 15
Scale 0.35
+FORCEXYBILLBOARD
+MTHRUSPECIES
RenderStyle Translucent
Alpha 1
Decal "Scorch"
DamageType "Marine"
SeeSound "devil/scream"
DeathSound "imp/shotx"
DamageType "Hell"
Decal DoomImpScorch
States
{
	Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_BishopMissileWeave
    S4B4 A 1 Bright A_SpawnItem("DemonTechRepeaterProjectileFlare")
    TNT1 A 0 A_BishopMissileWeave
    S4B4 B 1 Bright A_SpawnItem("DemonTechRepeaterProjectileFlare")
    Loop
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom7", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX4", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(6,32)
    BRB2 KLMNOPQRSTUVWX 3 Bright
    Stop
}
}

Actor DarkPaladinShield
{
	Radius 8
	Height 8
	Scale 1.2
	+CLIENTSIDEONLY
	States
	{
	Spawn:
		DDSH ABCDEFGH 3 A_CheckFloor("Ground")
		Loop
	Ground:
		DDSH I 250 A_SetFloorClip
		DDSH I 5 A_FadeOut(0.1)
		Wait
	}
}

		DPAL A 2 A_FadeOut(0.1,1)
		Goto Spawn+1
    Toaster:
		TNT1 A 0
		Stop
	}

  Death:

	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(192,384,0)

	Stop
}

Actor DarkNoble
{
  Health 1800
  Radius 24
  Height 64
  Speed 8
  PainChance 35
  Mass 1000
  MONSTER
  +FLOORCLIP
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  +MISSILEMORE
  +MISSILEEVENMORE
  +FASTMELEE
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  SeeSound "baron/sight"
  ActiveSound "baron/active"
  PainSound "baron/pain"
  DeathSound "baron/death"
  Obituary "%o felt the wrath of the dark noble."
  HitObituary "%o got ripped apart by the dark noble."
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  MeleeDamage 14
  Scale 1.1
  var int user_healing;
  var int user_script;
  Tag "\cmDark Noble\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    DNOB A 4 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    DNOB A 2 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    DNOB A 2 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    DNOB B 2 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    DNOB B 2 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    DNOB C 2 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    DNOB C 2 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    DNOB D 2 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    DNOB D 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Teleport")
    Loop
  Teleport:
    DNOB H 1 A_UnSetShootable
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	DNOB HEEEEEEEEEE 1 A_FadeOut(0.1,0)
	DNOB HEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE 0 A_Wander
	DNOB HEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE 0 A_Wander
    DNOB H 1 A_PlayWeaponSound("boss/teleport")
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	DNOB HEEEEEEEEEE 1 A_FadeIn(0.1)
    DNOB H 1 A_SetShootable
    Goto See
  Missile:
    DNOB E 0 A_Jump(128,"Spread","Seeker","Souls","Souls2","Rictus")
  Normal:
    DNOB EF 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    DNOB G 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleFastBall",32,0,0)
    DNOB RS 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    DNOB T 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleFastBall",32,0,0)
	DNOB E 0 A_Jump(100,"Spread")
	Goto See
  Spread:
    DNOB EF 7 Bright A_FaceTarget
	DNOB G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleBall",32,0,0)
	DNOB G 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleBall",32,0,-4)
	DNOB G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleBall",32,0,4)
	DNOB G 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleBall",32,0,-8)
    DNOB G 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleBall",32,0,8)
    DNOB RS 7 Bright A_FaceTarget
	DNOB T 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleBall",32,0,0)
	DNOB T 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleBall",32,0,-4)
	DNOB T 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleBall",32,0,4)
	DNOB T 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleBall",32,0,-8)
    DNOB T 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleBall",32,0,8)
	DNOB E 0 A_Jump(100,"Seeker")
	Goto See
  Seeker:
    DNOB EF 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    DNOB G 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleSeekBall",32,0,0)
    DNOB RS 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    DNOB T 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleSeekBall",32,0,0)
	DNOB E 0 A_Jump(100,"Souls")
	Goto See
  Souls:
    DNOB P 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    DNOB Q 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleSoul",60,0,-10)
    DNOB Q 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleSoul",60,0,10)
    DNOB Q 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleSoul",60,0,0)
    DNOB P 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    DNOB Q 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleSoul",60,0,-10)
    DNOB Q 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleSoul",60,0,10)
    DNOB Q 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleSoul",60,0,0)
	DNOB E 0 A_Jump(100,"Souls2")
    Goto See
  Souls2:
    DNOB P 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    DNOB Q 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("BombBall",60,0,0)
    DNOB P 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    DNOB Q 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("BombBall",60,0,0)
    DNOB P 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    DNOB Q 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("BombBall",60,0,0)
	DNOB E 0 A_Jump(100,"Rictus")
    Goto See
  Rictus:
    DNOB P 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    DNOB Q 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("RictusMinion",62,0,64,0,0,0,0,SXF_SETMASTER)
    Goto See
  Melee:
    DNOB EF 5 A_FaceTarget
    DNOB G 5 A_ComboAttack
    DNOB RS 5 A_FaceTarget
    DNOB T 5 A_ComboAttack
    Goto See
  Pain:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Healing","Teleport")
    DNOB H 2
    DNOB H 2 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Healing:
    DNOB P 0 A_JumpIf(user_healing >= 3,"Missile")
    DNOB P 0 A_SetUserVar("user_healing",user_healing+1)
	DNOB P 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	DNOB P 0 HealThing(350)
    DNOB P 0 A_PlaySound("baron/sight")
    DNOB PQ 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleSeekBall2",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleSeekBall2",32,180,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleSeekBall2",32,40,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleSeekBall2",32,-40,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleSeekBall2",32,120,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkNobleSeekBall2",32,-120,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	DNOB Q 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	DNOB Q 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	DNOB Q 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	DNOB Q 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	DNOB Q 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	DNOB Q 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	DNOB Q 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	DNOB Q 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	DNOB Q 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	DNOB Q 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	DNOB Q 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DarkNobleSmokeSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	DNOB Q 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	DNOB Q 1 A_UnSetInvulnerable
    Goto See
  Death:
    DNOB I 8 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RictusMinion",62,0,64,0,0,0,0,SXF_SETMASTER)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FamineSoul",72,0,0,2,90)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    DNOB JJ 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    DNOB JK 8
    DNOB L 8 A_Fall
    DNOB MN 8
    DNOB O -1
    Stop
   }
}

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HellionSmokeAttackSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HESK A 1 Bright A_Explode(Random(1,3),62,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HellionSmokeAttackSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(Random(1,3),62,0)
    HESK B 2 Bright A_SeekerMissile(15,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HellionSmokeAttackSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(Random(1,3),62,0)
    HESK C 2 Bright A_SeekerMissile(15,0)
    Loop

	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 1 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
	TNT1 A 1 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(64,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellionSmoke",random(5,-5),random(5,-5),random(5,-5),random(2,-2),random(2,-2),random(2,-2),random(0,360))
    HESK ABC 2 Bright
    Stop
    }
}

{

		MGR2 A 10 A_Look
        Loop
See:
    	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    	MGR2 AAAABBBB 1 A_Chase
    	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    	MGR2 CCCCDDDD 1 A_Chase
	    Loop
Missile:
        MGR2 E 10 A_FaceTarget
		MGR2 F 5 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("nazisg/fire")
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing",-8,0,30,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
        MGR2 G 5 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,3,Random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
        Goto See
Pain:
        MGR2 H 6 A_Pain
        Goto See
Death:
        MGR2 I 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        MGR2 J 5 A_Scream
        MGR2 K 5 A_Fall
    	MGR2 L 5 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
		MGR2 M -1
        Stop
XDeath:
        SSWV N 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        SSWV O 3 A_XScream
        SSWV P 3 A_Fall
        SSWV QRSTU 3
        SSWV V -1
    	Stop
Raise:
	    TNT1 A 0
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
        MGR2 LKJI 5
        Goto See
    	}
}

ACTOR CyberNaziDog : NaziDog1
{
Speed 12
Health 50
PainChance 150
MeleeDamage 12
MaxTargetRange 200
SeeSound "Cyberhund/sight"
DeathSound "Cyberhund/death"
PainSound "Cyberhund/Pain"
Obituary "%o's skin was chewed off by a cyber nazi dog."
Tag "Cyberhund"
Tag "\c[m8]Cyber\c[x2] Nazi\c[d5] Dog\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Wander")
	Goto Sitting
  Sitting:
	DG03 A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  Wander:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	DG03 BBBB 2 A_Wander
	TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	DG03 CCCC 2 A_Wander
	TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	DG03 DDDD 2 A_Wander
	TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	DG03 EEEE 2 A_Wander
	Loop
  See:
	DG03 BBBBCCCCDDDDEEEE 1 A_Chase
	Loop
  Melee:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Cyberhund/bite")
	DG03 FG 4 A_FaceTarget
	DG03 H 5 A_MeleeAttack
	DG03 GF 5 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(200,1)
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Cyberhund/bite")
	DG03 FG 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,20,0,1)
	DG03 G 2 A_Recoil(-22)
	DG03 H 3 A_CustomMissile("PinkyLunge",18,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	DG03 H 6
	DG03 G 2 A_ScaleVelocity(0.2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	DG03 F 1 A_ScaleVelocity(0)
	Goto See
  Pain: 
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	DG03 I 4 A_Pain
	Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	DG03 J 5 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	DG03 K 5 A_Fall
	DG03 L 5 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	DG03 M -1
	Stop
  XDeath:
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	DG03 N 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	DG03 O 3 A_XScream
	DG03 P 3 A_Fall
	DG03 Q -1
	Stop 
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	DG03 MLKJ 5
	Goto See
}
}

    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)

    Loop

    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)

    DRSH AAAABBBB 3 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)

    Loop

    Goto See

  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    GOER A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    GOER AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    GOER CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
    Loop
  Missile:
    GOER E 8 A_FaceTarget
    GOER F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",32,15,random(-2,2))
    GOER E 2
	GOER G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",32,-15,random(-2,2))
	GOER E 2
	GOER F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",32,15,random(-2,2))
	GOER E 2
	GOER G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",32,-15,random(-2,2))
	GOER E 2
	GOER F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",32,15,random(-2,2))
    GOER E 2
	GOER G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",32,-15,random(-2,2))
    GOER E 2
	GOER F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",32,15,random(-2,2))
	GOER E 2
	GOER G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",32,-15,random(-2,2))
	GOER E 2
	GOER F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",32,15,random(-2,2))
    GOER E 2
	GOER G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",32,-15,random(-2,2))
	GOER E 20
    Goto See
  Pain:
    GOER D 3
    GOER D 3 A_Pain
    goto See
  Death:
    GOER H 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    GOER I 5 A_Scream
    GOER J 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	GOER K 0 A_NoBlocking
    GOER K -1 A_BossDeath
    stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    GOER KJIH 5
    Goto See
  }
}

Actor SSRocket2 : SSRocket
{
Speed 32
FastSpeed 48
}

Actor SSGrenadier
{
Health 800
Radius 20
Height 56
Mass 1000
Speed 8
PainChance 100
Scale 1.2
MeleeRange 400
Monster
+FLOORCLIP
+LOOKALLAROUND
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.5
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
SeeSound "monsters/sssee"
DeathSound "monsters/ssdeath"
PainSound "monsters/nazipain"
Obituary "%o was blown up by a Nazi Grenadier."
Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Grenadier\c-"
States
 {
  Spawn:
    WZGR A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    WZGR AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    WZGR CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Melee:
    WZGR E 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
    WZGR F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSGrenadierGrenade",33,16,random(-4,4))
    WZGR E 8
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
	WZGR F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSGrenadierGrenade",33,16,random(-4,4))
    WZGR E 8
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
	WZGR F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSGrenadierGrenade",33,16,random(-4,4))
    WZGR E 8
    Goto See
  Pain:
    WZGR E 3
    WZGR E 3 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    WZGR G 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    WZGR H 3 A_Scream
    WZGR IJKLMNOPQ 3
    WZGR R -1 A_NoBlocking
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    WZGR RQPONMLKJIHG 3
    Goto See
	}
}

{

{
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0

    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom3",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GrenadeExplosionFlare",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GrenadeExplosionShockWave",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128) 
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,0,random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,8),0,128)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("RocketEx")
    Stop
}
}

Actor SSCorporal : SSRocketMan
{
  Health 600
  Obituary "%o was killed by a nazi corporal."
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Corporal\c-"
  Decal BulletChip
  var int user_beacon;
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    NZGR A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZGR AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZGR CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(6,"Beacon")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(500,2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,"Normal")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Shotgun")
  Normal:
    NZGR E 10 A_FaceTarget
    NZGR F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket",32,12,random(-1,1))
    NZGR E 4
	NZGR F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket",32,12,random(-1,1))
    NZGR E 4
	NZGR F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket",32,12,random(-1,1))
    NZGR E 4
	NZGR F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket",32,12,random(-1,1))
    NZGR E 4
	NZGR F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket",32,12,random(-1,1))
    NZGR E 4
    Goto See
  Shotgun:
    NZGR E 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/enforcer/fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/enforcer/add",3)
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",32,0,Random(6,-6),0)
    NZGR G 16 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,6,Random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
	NZGR E 6 A_FaceTarget
	NZGR E 4 A_PlaySound("weapons/enforcer/spin",7,1.5)
	NZGR E 3 A_PlaySound("weapons/enforcer/reload",3)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing",-32,6,32, Random(2,6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	NZGR E 2
    Goto See
  Beacon:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_beacon == 1,"Normal")	 
	NZGR EEEEEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_beacon",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("NaziBeacon",0,0,16,8,0,4,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("NaziDogBeacon",0,0,16,8,0,4,0)
	NZGR E 35
    Goto See
  Pain:
    NZGR A 2
    NZGR A 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    NZGR H 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    NZGR I 5 A_Scream
    NZGR J 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	NZGR KL 5
    NZGR A 0 A_NoBlocking
	NZGR M -1 A_BossDeath
    stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    NZGR LKJIH 5
    Goto See
  }
}

{

  Height 56

  MaxDropOffHeight 32

	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)

Actor SSTechSuit : SSAkimboSoldier
{
  Health 450
  Mass 400
  +NOPAIN
  +NOBLOOD
  AttackSound ""
  Scale 1.0
  Speed 14
  Obituary "%o was killed by a Nazi in a tech suit."

  states
  {
  Spawn:
    NZPA A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    NZPA AABB 4 A_Chase
    NZPA A 0 A_SpawnItem("HitlerSuitStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZPA CCDD 4 A_Chase
    NZPA A 0 A_SpawnItem("HitlerSuitStep",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
  Missile:
	NZPA EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
	NZPA F 0 A_CustomMissile("NaziTechProjectile",32,-12,random(-1,1))
	NZPA F 0 A_CustomMissile("NaziTechProjectile",32,12,random(-1,1))
	NZPA F 0 A_CustomMissile("NaziTechProjectile",22,-12,random(-1,1))
	NZPA F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("NaziTechProjectile",22,-12,random(-1,1))
	NZPA G 4 Bright A_PlaySound("weapons/demontechsteam")
	NZPA E 2 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
    NZPA A 3
    NZPA A 3 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    NZPA H 10 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	NZPA HHHHHHH 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    NZPA J -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    NZPA JH 5
    Goto See
  }

Actor SSTechUnit : SSTechSuit
{
  Health 450
  Obituary "%o was killed by a Nazi tech unit."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[l2] Tech Unit\c-"
  SeeSound "drone/see"
  DeathSound "drone/die"
  ActiveSound "drone/act"
  states
  {
  Spawn:
    BOB3 A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    BOB3 AABB 4 A_Chase
    BOB3 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HitlerSuitStep",0,0,0,0)
    BOB3 CCDD 4 A_Chase
    BOB3 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HitlerSuitStep",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
  Missile:
	BOB3 EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("dtpistol/fire")
	BOB3 F 0 A_CustomMissile("DDTPistolMissileBullet",45,24,random(-2,2))
	BOB3 F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("DDTPistolMissileBullet",45,-24,random(-2,2))
	BOB3 G 4 Bright A_PlaySound("weapons/demontechsteam")
	BOB3 E 2 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
    BOB3 A 3
    BOB3 A 3 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    BOB3 H 10 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	BOB3 IIJJKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    BOB3 L -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    BOB3 KJI 2
    Goto See
  }
}

ACTOR DDTPistolMissileBullet : MDTPistolMissileBullet{DamageType "Hell"}

Actor SSImprovedTechUnit : SSTechUnit
{
  Health 650
  Scale 1.1
  Obituary "%o was killed by a Nazi improved tech unit."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[l2] Improved Tech Unit\c-"
  states
  {
  Spawn:
    BOB2 A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    BOB2 AABB 4 A_Chase
    BOB2 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HitlerSuitStep",0,0,0,0)
    BOB2 CCDD 4 A_Chase
    BOB2 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HitlerSuitStep",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
  Missile:
	BOB2 EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	BOB2 G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("dtpistol/fire")
	BOB2 G 0 A_CustomMissile("DDTPistolMissileBullet",45,25,random(-2,2))
	BOB2 G 0 A_CustomMissile("DDTPistolMissileBullet",45,24,random(-2,2))
	BOB2 G 0 A_CustomMissile("DDTPistolMissileBullet",45,-25,random(-2,2))
	BOB2 G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DDTPistolMissileBullet",45,-24,random(-2,2))
	BOB2 H 2 A_FaceTarget
	BOB2 G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("dtpistol/fire")
	BOB2 G 0 A_CustomMissile("DDTPistolMissileBullet",45,25,random(-2,2))
	BOB2 G 0 A_CustomMissile("DDTPistolMissileBullet",45,24,random(-2,2))
	BOB2 G 0 A_CustomMissile("DDTPistolMissileBullet",45,-25,random(-2,2))
	BOB2 G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DDTPistolMissileBullet",45,-24,random(-2,2))
	BOB2 H 2 A_FaceTarget
	BOB2 E 2 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
    BOB2 A 3
    BOB2 A 3 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    BOB2 H 10 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	BOB2 IIJJKKL 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    BOB2 M -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    BOB2 LKJI 2
    Goto See
  }
}

Actor SSHunter
{
  Health 1100
  Radius 24
  Height 64
  Mass 1000
  Speed 8
  PainChance 80
  Scale 1.2
  Monster
  +FLOORCLIP
  +LOOKALLAROUND
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +MISSILEMORE
  +MISSILEEVENMORE
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.5
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  SeeSound "monsters/sssee"
  DeathSound "monsters/ssdeath"
  PainSound "monsters/nazipain"
  Obituary "%o was shot down by a Nazi Hunter."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Hunter\c-"
  Decal BulletChip
  states
  {
  Spawn:
    THUG A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    THUG AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    THUG CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(200,"Flamer")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Rocket")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Combo")
  Normal:
    THUG E 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    THUG G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)

	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    THUG G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket",36,12,random(-1,1))
    THUG I 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    THUG G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket",36,12,random(-1,1))
    THUG I 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
    Goto See
  Flamer:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("hectebus/flameready")
    THUG E 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/fatsofire")
    TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
    THUG FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,12,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
    Goto See
  Pain:
    THUG J 3
    THUG J 3 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    THUG J 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    THUG K 5 A_Scream
    THUG LM 5
    THUG N -1 A_NoBlocking
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    THUG NMLKJ 5
    Goto See
  }
}

Actor SSSuperSoldier
{
  Scale 1.25
  Health 1100
  Radius 24
  Height 64
  Mass 5000
  Speed 8
  PainChance 20
  Monster
  +FLOORCLIP
  +LOOKALLAROUND
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +MISSILEMORE
  +MISSILEEVENMORE
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  RadiusDamageFactor 0.5
  SeeSound "supersoldier/see"
  PainSound "supersoldier/pain"
  DeathSound "supersoldier/death"
  ActiveSound "supersoldier/idle"
  Obituary "%o was terminated by a super soldier."
  var int user_script;
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Super Soldier\c-"
  Decal BulletChip
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    HANS A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    HANS AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    HANS CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    HANS EE 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HANS F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HANS G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HANS F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HANS G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HANS F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HANS G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HANS F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HANS G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	HANS E 15
    Goto See
  Pain:
    HANS H 2
    HANS H 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    HANS I 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    HANS J 5 A_Scream
    HANS K 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	HANS K 0 A_NoBlocking
    HANS L -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    HANS LKJI 5
    Goto See
  }
}

Actor SSEliteSoldier: SSSuperSoldier
{
  Health 2200
  SeeSound "elitesoldier/see"
  PainSound "elitesoldier/pain"
  DeathSound "elitesoldier/death"
  ActiveSound "elitesoldier/idle"
  Obituary "%o was terminated by an elite soldier."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Elite Soldier\c-"
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TRAN A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    TRAN AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    TRAN CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    TRAN EE 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)

	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)

    TRAN F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
