	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    TRAN G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    TRAN F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    TRAN G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    TRAN F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    TRAN G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TRAN E 15
    Goto See
  Pain:
    TRAN H 2
    TRAN H 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    TRAN I 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    TRAN J 5 A_Scream
    TRAN K 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    TRAN A 0 A_NoBlocking
	TRAN L -1
    stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TRAN LKJI 5
    Goto See
  }
}

Actor SSExplosiveSoldier: SSEliteSoldier
{
  Health 2500
  Obituary "%o was exploded by an explosive soldier."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Explosive Soldier\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    EMSS A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    EMSS AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    EMSS CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/expmgunspinstart")
    EMSS EE 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/expmgunspin","Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 15, 0, 38, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", -15, 0, 38, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    EMSS F 0 A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",42,15,Random(3,-3))
    EMSS F 0 A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",42,-15,Random(3,-3))
	EMSS F 4 Bright A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 15, 0, 38, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", -15, 0, 38, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    EMSS G 0 A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",42,15,Random(3,-3))
    EMSS G 0 A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",42,-15,Random(3,-3))
	EMSS G 4 Bright A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"Pause")
    TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
    Goto Missile+3
  Pause:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/expmgunspinstop")
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
	EMSS E 10
	Goto See
  Pain:
    EMSS H 2 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    EMSS H 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    EMSS I 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	EMSS I 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    EMSS J 5 A_Scream
    EMSS K 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    EMSS A 0 A_NoBlocking
	EMSS L -1
    stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    EMSS LKJI 5
    Goto See
  }
}

Actor SSUberMutant : SSSuperSoldier
{
  Health 1500
  Speed 12
  BloodColor "cf 00 b0"
  DeathSound "mutant/death"
  SeeSound "mutant/sight"
  PainSound "monsters/nazipain"
  AttackSound "doublecger/fire"
  Obituary "%o was chaingun whipped by a Nazi Uber Mutant."
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[j8] Uber Mutant\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    NZUM A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZUM AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZUM CCDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Melee:
  Missile:
	NZUM E 0 A_Jump(16,"ExpMinigun")
  Normal:
    NZUM EE 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",38,0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 0, 0, 38, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    NZUM F 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",38,0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 0, 0, 38, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    NZUM G 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",38,0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 0, 0, 38, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    NZUM H 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"Pause")
    TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
    Goto Normal+2
  ExpMinigun:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/expmgunspinstart")
    NZUM EE 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/expmgunspin","Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 0, 0, 38, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
    NZUM F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",42,0,Random(3,-3))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 0, 0, 38, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
    NZUM G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",42,0,Random(3,-3))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 0, 0, 38, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
    NZUM H 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",42,0,Random(3,-3))
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"Pause")
    TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
    Goto ExpMinigun+3
  Pause:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/expmgunspinstop")
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
	NZUM E 10
	Goto See
  Pain:
    NZUM A 2
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    NZUM A 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    NZUM I 5 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    NZUM J 5 A_Scream
    NZUM K 5 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	NZUM K 0 A_NoBlocking
	NZUM KLM 5
    NZUM N -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    NZUM NMLKJI 3
    Goto See
  }
}

{

Actor SSAssaultMutant : SSUberMutant
{
Health 2250
AttackSound ""
Obituary "%o had no chances against a Nazi Assault Mutant."
Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[j8] Assault Mutant\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    SMT1 A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    SMT1 AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    SMT1 CCDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Melee:
  Shotgun:
    SMT1 EEE 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/qsgfire")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",32,0,Random(6,-6),0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing",32,6,32, Random(2,6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)

	SMT1 M 3 Bright A_CposRefire
	SMT1 E 6 A_Jump(64,"See")
    SMT1 E 1 A_JumpIfCloser(400,1)
    Goto See
    SMT1 E 1 
    Goto Shotgun+2

	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    SMT1 F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    SMT1 G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    SMT1 F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    SMT1 G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    SMT1 F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*6,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    SMT1 G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	SMT1 E 15
    Goto See
  Pain:
    SMT1 A 2
    SMT1 A 2 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(16,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
    SMT1 N 5 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    SMT1 O 5 A_Scream
    SMT1 P 5 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	SMT1 P 0 A_NoBlocking
    SMT1 Q -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    SMT1 NMLKJI 3
    Goto See
  }
}

Actor SSVeteran : SSSuperSoldier
{
  Scale 1.10
  Health 550
  Speed 12
  AttackSound "doublecger/fire"
  Obituary "%o was out smarted by a Nazi Veteran."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Veteran\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    NZVT A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZVT AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZVT CCDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    NZVT E 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    NZVT F 3 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(14.5,0,2,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    NZVT G 3 Bright A_PlaySound("MP40/Fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    NZVT F 3 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(14.5,0,2,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    NZVT G 3 Bright A_PlaySound("MP40/Fire")
	NZVT E 15
    Goto See
  Pain:
    NZVT A 2
    NZVT A 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    NZVT H 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    NZVT I 5 A_Scream
    NZVT J 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	NZVT K 0 A_NoBlocking
    NZVT K -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    NZVT KJIH 5
    Goto See
  }
}

{
  Scale 1.25
  Health 1750
  Radius 24
  Height 64
  Speed 16
  AttackSound ""

  Obituary "%o was not strong enought to survive against a Nazi Elite Veteran."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Elite Veteran\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)

    Loop

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)

    Loop
  Missile:
  AShotgun:

Actor SSShockTrooper
{
  Scale 1.25
  Health 1750
  Radius 24
  Height 64
  Mass 5000
  Speed 8
  PainChance 20
  Monster
  +FLOORCLIP
  +LOOKALLAROUND
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  +NOPAIN
  +MISSILEMORE
  +MISSILEEVENMORE
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  RadiusDamageFactor 0.5
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  SeeSound "supersoldier/see"
  PainSound "supersoldier/pain"
  DeathSound "supersoldier/death"
  ActiveSound "supersoldier/idle"
  Obituary "%o was exploded by a nazi shock trooper."
  AttackSound "plasmaminigun/fire"
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Shock Trooper\c-"
  var int user_script;
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    WAFK A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    WAFK AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    WAFK CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
  	WAFK A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(600,4)
  	WAFK A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(1600,2)
	WAFK A 0 A_Jump(256,"Erasus")
	WAFK A 0 A_Jump(256,"Lazer","Lazer","Erasus")
	WAFK A 0 A_Jump(256,"Lazer","Erasus","Vulcan","Vulcan","Vulcan")
  Lazer:
	WAFK EE 10 A_FaceTarget
	WAFK E 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WAFK F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	WAFK F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",46,-24,random(-2,2))
	WAFK E 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WAFK G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	WAFK G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",46,24,random(-2,2))
	WAFK E 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WAFK F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	WAFK F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",46,-24,random(-2,2))
	WAFK E 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WAFK G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	WAFK G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",46,24,random(-2,2))
	WAFK E 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WAFK F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	WAFK F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",46,-24,random(-2,2))
	WAFK E 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WAFK G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	WAFK G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",46,24,random(-2,2))
	WAFK E 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WAFK F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	WAFK F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",46,-24,random(-2,2))
	WAFK E 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WAFK G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	WAFK G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",46,24,random(-2,2))
	WAFK E 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WAFK F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	WAFK F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",46,-24,random(-2,2))
	WAFK E 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WAFK G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	WAFK G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",46,24,random(-2,2))
	WAFK E 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WAFK F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	WAFK F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",46,-24,random(-2,2))
	WAFK E 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WAFK G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	WAFK G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",46,24,random(-2,2))
	WAFK E 15
	Goto See
  Erasus:
	WAFK EE 10 A_FaceTarget
	WAFK E 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/load")
	WAFK EEEEEEEEEEE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WAFK F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	WAFK F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",46,-24,random(-2,2))
	WAFK EEEEEE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WAFK G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	WAFK G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",46,24,random(-2,2))
	WAFK E 15
	Goto See
  Vulcan:
    WAFK EE 10 A_FaceTarget
    WAFK FGFGFGFGFGFGFGFGFG 4 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,3,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	WAFK E 15
    Goto See
  Death:
    WAFK H 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    WAFK I 5 A_Scream
    WAFK J 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	WAFK K 0 A_NoBlocking
    WAFK K -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    WAFK JIH 5
    Goto See
  }
}

Actor ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff
{
  Radius 6
  Height 6
  +NOBLOCKMAP
  +NOGRAVITY
  +ACTIVATEIMPACT
  +ACTIVATEPCROSS
  +NOTELEPORT
  +PUFFONActorS
  +ALWAYSPUFF
  +EXTREMEDEATH
  scale 0.5
  Renderstyle Add
  Alpha 0.75
  Decal Bulletchip
  DamageType "Hell"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
  	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RedParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom10", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX4", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    RFOG A 3 Bright A_Explode(2,24)
    RFOG BCDEF 3 Bright
    Stop
  }
}

Actor SSTechTrooper : SSShockTrooper
{
  Health 2200
  Obituary "%o was liquidated by a nazi tech trooper."
  AttackSound ""
  BloodColor "Green"
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[l2] Tech Trooper\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    NZOD A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZOD AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZOD CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
	NZOD EE 10 A_FaceTarget
	NZOD A 0 A_Jump(127,"Rockets","Homing")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
	NZOD F 0 A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",41,24,random(-2,2))
	NZOD F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",41,-24,random(-2,2))
	NZOD E 0 A_Jump(8,"Pause","Rockets","Homing")
	NZOD E 2 A_CposRefire
	Goto Missile+3
  Pause:
    NZOD E 15 A_PlaySound("weapons/demontechsteam")
	Goto See
  Rockets:
	NZOD F 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",41,24,random(-5,5))
	NZOD F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",41,-24,random(-5,5))
	NZOD E 8 A_FaceTarget
	NZOD F 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",41,24,random(-5,5))
	NZOD F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",41,-24,random(-5,5))
	NZOD E 8 A_FaceTarget
	NZOD F 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",41,24,random(-5,5))
	NZOD F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",41,-24,random(-5,5))
	NZOD E 8 A_FaceTarget
	NZOD F 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",41,24,random(-5,5))
	NZOD F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",41,-24,random(-5,5))
	NZOD E 8 A_FaceTarget
	NZOD F 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",41,24,random(-5,5))
	NZOD F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",41,-24,random(-5,5))
	NZOD E 8 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"Homing")
	Goto See
  Homing:
	NZOD F 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonHomer",41,24,random(-5,5))
	NZOD F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonHomer",41,-24,random(-5,5))
	NZOD E 8 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(10,40),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BigGreenBloodCloud", random(10,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    NZOD HHIIJJKKLLMMNNOOPP 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom5", random(20,40), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    Stop
  }
}

Actor SSUberSoldier : SSTechTrooper
{
  Health 3500
  Obituary "%o was exterminated by a nazi uber soldier."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Uber Soldier\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    NZPS A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZPS AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZPS CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
  	NZPS A 0 A_Jump(127,"BFG9K","BFG15K")
  BFG9K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfgf")
	NZPS EEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	NZPS FF 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	NZPS F 0  A_CustomMissile("ZBFG9500Ball",41,24,random(-1,1))
	NZPS F 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZBFG9500Ball",41,-24,random(-1,1))
	NZPS FF 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	NZPS EEEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  BFG15K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
    NZPS E 18 Bright A_FaceTarget
	NZPS E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	NZPS F 0  A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",41,24,random(-4,4))
	NZPS F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",41,-24,random(-4,4))
    NZPS E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    NZPS F 0  A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",41,24,random(-4,4))
	NZPS F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",41,-24,random(-4,4))
    NZPS E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    NZPS F 0  A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",41,24,random(-4,4))
	NZPS F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",41,-24,random(-4,4))
	NZPS E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    NZPS F 0  A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",41,24,random(-4,4))
	NZPS F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",41,-24,random(-4,4))
    NZPS E 20 Bright A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
    Goto See
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(10,40),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BigGreenBloodCloud", random(10,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    NZPS GGHHIIJJKKLL 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom5", random(20,40), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    Stop
  }
}

{

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)

    PUTR H 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)

	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket3",67,-28,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    PUTR J 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	PUTR E 15
    Goto See
  Death:
    PUTR K 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	PUTR KKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	PUTR L 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	PUTR L 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	PUTR LLL 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	PUTR M 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	PUTR MMM 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    PUTR N -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    PUTR MLK 5
    Goto See
  }
}

Actor SSEradicator : SSPurgeTrooper
{
  Health 4500
  SeeSound "PanzGrosse/Sight"
  ActiveSound "PanzGrosse/Active"
  DeathSound "PanzGrosse/Death"
  Obituary "nothing was left of %o after facing a Nazi Eradicator."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Eradicator\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    PANZ A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    PANZ AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    PANZ CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(1600,"Rage")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(3200,"Pissed")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(300,"Shotgun")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(500,"Grenades")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(120,"BFG9K","Railgun","Erasus","BFG10K")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(200,"Rockets","Homings","Vulcan","PlasmaCaster")
  Normal:
    PANZ EEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	PANZ G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("ExpSSG/Fire")
    PANZ GGGGG 0 A_CustomMissile("EradicatorExplosiveTracer",45,-25,random(-8,8))
	PANZ GGGGG 0 A_CustomMissile("EradicatorExplosiveTracer",45,25,random(-8,8))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 25, 6, 45, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", -25, 6, 45, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    PANZ GH 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PANZ E 8 A_FaceTarget
	PANZ G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("ExpSSG/Fire")
    PANZ GGGGG 0 A_CustomMissile("EradicatorExplosiveTracer",45,-25,random(-8,8))
	PANZ GGGGG 0 A_CustomMissile("EradicatorExplosiveTracer",45,25,random(-8,8))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 25, 6, 45, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", -25, 6, 45, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    PANZ GH 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PANZ E 8 A_FaceTarget
	PANZ G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("ExpSSG/Fire")
    PANZ GGGGG 0 A_CustomMissile("EradicatorExplosiveTracer",45,-25,random(-8,8))
	PANZ GGGGG 0 A_CustomMissile("EradicatorExplosiveTracer",45,25,random(-8,8))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 25, 6, 45, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", -25, 6, 45, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    PANZ GH 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PANZ E 15 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Rockets","Homings")
    Goto See
  Normal2:
    PANZ EEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	PANZ G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("ExpSSG/Fire")
    PANZ GGGGG 0 A_CustomMissile("EradicatorExplosiveTracer",45,-25,random(-8,8))
	PANZ GGGGG 0 A_CustomMissile("EradicatorExplosiveTracer",45,25,random(-8,8))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 25, 6, 45, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)

	PANZ NNNNN 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaCasterBall",45,25,random(-6,6),0,0)
	PANZ NNNNN 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaCasterBall",45,-25,random(-6,6),0,0)
	PANZ G 0 A_PlaySound("mrl/fire")
	PANZ G 0 A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket",72,-30,0)
    PANZ G 0 A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket",72,30,0)
	PANZ P 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PANZ O 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(40,"Pause2")
	Goto PlasmaCaster+4
  PlasmaCaster3:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("PlasmaCaster/Full")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("PlasmaCaster/Charge",5)
	PANZ EE 6 A_FaceTarget
    PANZ N 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("PlasmaCaster/Shot")
	PANZ NNNNN 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaCasterBall",45,25,random(-6,6),0,0)
	PANZ NNNNN 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaCasterBall",45,-25,random(-6,6),0,0)
	PANZ N 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PANZ O 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PANZ N 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("PlasmaCaster/Shot")
	PANZ NNNNN 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaCasterBall",45,25,random(-6,6),0,0)
	PANZ NNNNN 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaCasterBall",45,-25,random(-6,6),0,0)
	PANZ G 0 A_PlaySound("mrl/fire")
	PANZ G 0 A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",72,-30,0)
    PANZ G 0 A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",72,30,0)
	PANZ P 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PANZ O 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PANZ E 6 A_FaceTarget
    PANZ N 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("PlasmaCaster/Shot")
	PANZ NNNNN 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaCasterBall",45,25,random(-6,6),0,0)
	PANZ NNNNN 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaCasterBall",45,-25,random(-6,6),0,0)

	PANZ G 0 A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",72,-30,0)
    PANZ G 0 A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",72,30,0)
	PANZ P 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PANZ O 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PANZ E 6 A_FaceTarget
    PANZ N 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("PlasmaCaster/Shot")
	PANZ NNNNN 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaCasterBall",45,25,random(-6,6),0,0)
	PANZ NNNNN 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaCasterBall",45,-25,random(-6,6),0,0)
	PANZ N 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PANZ O 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PANZ N 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("PlasmaCaster/Shot")
	PANZ NNNNN 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaCasterBall",45,25,random(-6,6),0,0)
	PANZ NNNNN 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaCasterBall",45,-25,random(-6,6),0,0)
	PANZ G 0 A_PlaySound("mrl/fire")
	PANZ G 0 A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",72,-30,0)
    PANZ G 0 A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",72,30,0)
	PANZ P 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PANZ O 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(40,"Pause2")
	Goto PlasmaCaster+4
  Pause:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/expmgunspinstop")
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
	PANZ E 10
	Goto See
  Pause2:
	PANZ E 10
	Goto See
  Pissed:
	//TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(300,"Shotgun")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(500,"Normal4")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(120,"BFG9K2","Railgun","Erasus2","BFG10K2")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(200,"Normal3","Vulcan","Diggers","PlasmaCaster2")
	Goto Normal2
  Rage:
	//TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(300,"Shotgun")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(500,"Normal4")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(120,"BFG9K2","Railgun2","Erasus2","BFG10K2","BFG10K3")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(200,"Normal3","Vulcan2","PlasmaCaster2","PlasmaCaster3")
	Goto Normal2
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	PANZ III 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	PANZ I 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DiggerExplosion",random(20,80),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	PANZ JJJ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	PUTR M 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	PANZ KKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", Random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))	
    PANZ L -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    PANZ KJI 5
    Goto See
  }
}

ACTOR EradicatorExplosiveTracer : SentientExplosiveTracer
{
-NOTIMEFREEZE
States
{
Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,1,2,3)
    TNT1 A 1
	Goto Fly
    TNT1 A 1 ThrustThingZ(0,random(8,32),0,1)
	Goto Fly
    TNT1 A 1 ThrustThingZ(0,random(-8,-32),0,1)
	Goto Fly
Fly:
    TRAC A 1 Bright
	Loop
Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.75,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientExplosiveEffect")
    MISL B 4 Bright A_Explode(Random(3,6)*3,64)
    MISL CD 3 Bright
    Stop
    }
}

Actor SSCyborgHitler : SSPurgeTrooper
{
  Health 4500
  Obituary "%o was killed by a nazi cyborg hitler."
  SeeSound "CyborgHitler/See"
  DeathSound "CyborgHitler/Death"
  ActiveSound "CyborgHitler/Haha"
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Cyborg Hitler\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    DOLF A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    DOLF AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    DOLF CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(86,"Combo")
  Normal:
    DOLF EEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	DOLF H 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",42,-30,random(-2,2))
    DOLF H 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",42,30,random(-2,2))
    DOLF F 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	DOLF EEE 6 A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
  Combo:
    DOLF EEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)

	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaBall",72,28,random(-2,2))
    DOLF F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaBall",72,-28,random(-2,2))

Actor SSGuardian
{
  Scale 1.25
  Health 2100
  Radius 24
  Height 64
  Mass 5000
  Speed 8
  PainChance 12
  Monster
  +FLOORCLIP
  +LOOKALLAROUND
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +MISSILEMORE
  +MISSILEEVENMORE
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  RadiusDamageFactor 0.5
  SeeSound "supersoldier/see"
  PainSound "supersoldier/pain"
  DeathSound "supersoldier/death"
  ActiveSound "supersoldier/idle"
  Obituary "%o was exploded by a nazi guardian."
  var int user_script;
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[d5] Guardian\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    NZSH A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZSH AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZSH CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(400,"Grenadier")
    NZSH EE 10 A_FaceTarget
	NZSH E 6 A_FaceTarget
    NZSH F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket4",40,15,0)
	NZSH E 0 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(35,"Pause")
    NZSH E 2 A_FaceTarget
	Goto Missile+3
  Pause:
	NZSH E 15
    Goto See
  Grenadier:
	NZSH E 8 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
    NZSH F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonGrenade",40,15,random(-4,4))
    NZSH E 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
    NZSH F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonGrenade",40,15,random(-4,4))
    NZSH E 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
    NZSH F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonGrenade",40,15,random(-4,4))
    NZSH E 8 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
	NZSH H 2
	NZSH H 2 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"See")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	NZSH GGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	Goto See
  Death:
    NZSH I 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    NZSH J 5 A_Scream
    NZSH K 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	NZSH K 0 A_NoBlocking
	NZSH LM 5
    NZSH N -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    NZSH NMLKJI 5
    Goto See
  }
}

Actor SSRocket4 : SSRocket2 {Damage 15}

Actor SSAssaultSoldier : SSSuperSoldier
{
  Health 1400
  Obituary "%o was gunned down by a nazi assault soldier."
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Assault Soldier\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    NZSG A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZSG AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NZSG CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    NZSG EEE 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/qsgfire")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",32,0,Random(6,-6),0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing",32,6,32, Random(2,6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing",-32,6,32, Random(2,6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    NZSG F 8 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(15.4,10.6,32,Random(1,3)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
	NZSG G 3 Bright A_CposRefire
	NZSG E 8 A_Jump(64,"See")
    Goto Missile+2
  Pain:
    NZSG A 2
    NZSG A 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    NZSG H 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    NZSG I 5 A_Scream
    NZSG J 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    TRAN A 0 A_NoBlocking
	NZSG K -1 A_BossDeath
    stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    NZSG KJIH 5
    Goto See
  }
}

Actor SSHitlerClone
{
  Scale 1.75
  Health 9300
  Radius 40
  Height 96
  Mass 500000
  Speed 14
  Monster
  +FLOORCLIP
  +BOSS
  +NOFEAR
  +NOPAIN
  +NORADIUSDMG
  +LOOKALLAROUND
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  +MISSILEMORE
  +MISSILEEVENMORE
  +NOBLOOD
  +NOFEAR
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.75
  DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.3
  DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.25
  DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.25
  DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
  DamageFactor "Pierce", 0.25
  DamageFactor "MarinePierce", 0.25
  DamageFactor "Kaboom", 0.2
  DamageFactor "MarineKaboom", 0.2
  DamageFactor 0.6
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
  SeeSound "CyborgHitler/Haha"
  DeathSound "CyborgHitler/Death"
  Obituary "%o could not stand up against a Hitler Clone's mecha suit."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[w8] Hitler's Clone\c-"
  Decal BulletChip
  var int user_script;
  states
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	HITL A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    HITL AABB 4 A_Chase
    HITL A 0 A_SpawnItem("HitlerSuitStep",0,0,0,0)
    HITL CCDD 4 A_Chase
    HITL A 0 A_SpawnItem("HitlerSuitStep",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(700,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,"ExpMinigun")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"ExpMinigun")
  Normal:
    HITL EE 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*7,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HITL F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HITL G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*7,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HITL F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HITL G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)

	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*7,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HITL F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)

    HITL G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")

    HITL F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")

	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)

	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HITL G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*7,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HITL F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HITL G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*7,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HITL F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    HITL G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	HTL1 E 1 Bright A_CposRefire
    Goto Normal+2
 ExpMinigun:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/expmgunspinstart")
	HITL EE 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/expmgunspin","Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",68,-30,Random(3,-3))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",68,-30,Random(3,-3))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",48,30,Random(3,-3))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",48,-30,Random(3,-3))
	HITL F 3 Bright A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",68,-30,Random(3,-3))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",68,-30,Random(3,-3))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",48,30,Random(3,-3))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",48,-30,Random(3,-3))
	HITL G 3 Bright A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
	HITL A 0 A_Jump(28,"Pause")
	HITL E 1 Bright A_CposRefire
	Goto ExpMinigun+3
  Pause:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/expmgunspinstop")
	HITL E 10
	Goto See
 Death:
	HITL A 7 Bright A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
    HITL HHHHHHH 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    HITL IIIIIII 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    HITL JJJJJJJ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    HITL L 15 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
	HITL TUV 6 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	HITL W 6 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	HITL XY 6 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	HITL Z -1
	Stop
  }
}

Actor TodesRitter
{
  Scale 1.75
  Health 7500
  Radius 40
  Height 96
  Mass 500000
  Speed 10
  Monster
  +FLOORCLIP
  +BOSS
  +NOFEAR
  +NOPAIN
  +NORADIUSDMG
  +LOOKALLAROUND
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  +MISSILEMORE
  +MISSILEEVENMORE
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.75
  DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.3
  DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.25
  DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.25
  DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
  DamageFactor "Pierce", 0.25
  DamageFactor "MarinePierce", 0.25
  DamageFactor "Kaboom", 0.2
  DamageFactor "MarineKaboom", 0.2
  DamageFactor 0.6
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
  SeeSound "todesritter/sight"
  DeathSound "todesritter/death"
  ActiveSound "elitesoldier/idle"
  Obituary "%o knelt before the Todesritter."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[w8] Todes Ritter\c-"
  Decal BulletChip
  var int user_script;
  var int user_beacon;
  states
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	DKGT A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    DKGT AABB 4 A_Chase
    DKGT A 0 A_Hoof
    DKGT CCDD 4 A_Chase
    DKGT A 0 A_Hoof
	Loop
  Missile:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(300,"Grenadier")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Beacon")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Combo","Rocket","Seeker")
  Normal:
    DKGT EE 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*7,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    DKGT H 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    DKGT I 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")

    DKGT I 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*7,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    DKGT H 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    DKGT I 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	DKGT E 15 A_Jump(196,"Normal","Combo")
    Goto See
  Combo:

	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)

	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*7,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    DKGT H 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")

    DKGT K 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",85,-24,random(-1.5,1.5))
    DKGT L 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*7,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    DKGT H 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(48,56),0,Random(12,-12),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    DKGT I 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	DKGT E 15 A_Jump(156,"Normal","Rocket")
    Goto See
  Rocket:
	DKGT E 10 A_FaceTarget
    DKGT F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",85,24,random(-1.5,1.5))
    DKGT E 3 A_CPosRefire
	DKGT G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",85,-24,random(-1.5,1.5))
	DKGT E 3 A_CPosRefire
    DKGT F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",85,24,random(-1.5,1.5))
    DKGT E 3 A_CPosRefire
	DKGT G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",85,-24,random(-1.5,1.5))
	DKGT E 3 A_Jump(86,"Normal","Seeker")
    Goto See
  Seeker:
	DKGT E 10 A_FaceTarget
    DKGT F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",85,24,random(-1.5,1.5))
    DKGT E 3 A_CPosRefire
	DKGT G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",85,-24,random(-1.5,1.5))
	DKGT E 3 A_CPosRefire
    DKGT F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",85,24,random(-1.5,1.5))
    DKGT E 3 A_CPosRefire
	DKGT G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",85,-24,random(-1.5,1.5))
	DKGT E 3 A_Jump(86,"Normal")
    Goto See
  Grenadier:
	DKGT E 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
    DKGT F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonGrenade",85,24,random(-1.5,1.5),CMF_AIMOFFSET,4.328125)
    DKGT E 3 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
	DKGT G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonGrenade",85,-24,random(-1.5,1.5),CMF_AIMOFFSET,4.328125)
	DKGT E 3 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
    DKGT F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonGrenade",85,24,random(-1.5,1.5),CMF_AIMOFFSET,4.328125)
    DKGT E 3 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
	DKGT G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonGrenade",85,-24,random(-1.5,1.5),CMF_AIMOFFSET,4.328125)
	DKGT E 3
    Goto See
  Beacon:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_beacon >= 3,"Normal")	 
	DKGT EEEEEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_beacon",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("NaziBeacon",0,0,48,12,0,6,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("NaziDogBeacon",0,0,48,12,0,6,0)
	DKGT E 35
    Goto See
  Death:
	DKGT M 7 Bright A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    DKGT NNNNN 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    DKGT OOOOO 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    DKGT PPPPP 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    DKGT QQQQQ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	DKGT R 11  A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    DKGT S -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  }
}

Actor SSCommander : TodesRitter
{
  SeeSound "nazicommander/sight"
  DeathSound "nazicommander/death"
  ActiveSound "nazicommander/sight"
  Obituary "%o was defeated by a nazi Commander."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[w8] Commander\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	SSLT A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    SSLT AABB 4 A_Chase
    SSLT A 0 A_Hoof
    SSLT CCDD 4 A_Chase
    SSLT A 0 A_Hoof
	Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Beacon")	
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(88,"Rocket","Seeker")
  Normal:
    SSLT E 4 A_FaceTarget
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket3",94,22,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket3",90,22,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket3",94,26,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket3",90,26,random(-1,1))
    SSLT G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"See")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CposRefire
	Goto Normal
  Rocket:
    SSLT E 4 A_FaceTarget
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderRocket",94,22,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderRocket2",90,22,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderRocket3",94,26,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderRocket4",90,26,random(-1,1))
    SSLT G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SSLT EEE 4 A_FaceTarget
	SSLT E 4 A_FaceTarget
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderRocket",94,22,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderRocket2",90,22,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderRocket3",94,26,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderRocket4",90,26,random(-1,1))
    SSLT G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SSLT EEE 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(88,"Seeker","Normal")
	Goto See
  Seeker:
    SSLT E 4 A_FaceTarget
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderHomRocket",94,22,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderHomRocket2",90,22,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderHomRocket3",94,26,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderHomRocket4",90,26,random(-1,1))
    SSLT G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SSLT EEE 4 A_FaceTarget
	SSLT E 4 A_FaceTarget
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderHomRocket",94,22,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderHomRocket2",90,22,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 0 A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderHomRocket3",94,26,random(-1,1))
	SSLT F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSCommanderHomRocket4",90,26,random(-1,1))
    SSLT G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SSLT EEE 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(88,"Rocket","Normal")
	Goto See
  Beacon:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_beacon >= 3,"Normal")	 
	SSLT EEEEEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_beacon",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("NaziBeacon",0,0,48,12,0,6,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("NaziDogBeacon",0,0,48,12,0,6,0)
	SSLT E 35
    Goto See
  Death:
    SSLT H 7 Bright A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    SSLT IIIII 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
    SSLT JJJJJ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    SSLT KKKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    SSLT LLLLL 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    SSLT MMMMM 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    SSLT NNNNN 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	SSLT MN 7 Bright  A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    SSLT O -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  }
}

Actor SSRocket3 : SSRocket2
{
States
{
Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
	CBRK A 0 A_ChangeVelocity(1,0.5*random(-3,3),0.5*random(-2,2),CVF_RELATIVE)
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    Loop
    }
}

ACTOR SSCommanderRocket : NewRocket
{
SeeSound "mrl/fire"
-MTHRUSPECIES
-THRUSPECIES
DamageType "Hell"
Decal RocketScorch
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(4,6),Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",Random(4,6),Random(-2,2))
    MIS8 A 1 Bright A_Weave(2,2,1.0,1.0)
    Loop
  Fly:
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(4,6),Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",Random(4,6),Random(-2,2))
    MIS8 A 1 Bright A_Weave(2,2,1.0,1.0)
    Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Explode
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom3",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RocketExplosionFlare",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RocketExplosionShockWave",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128) 
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,0,random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,8),0,128)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("RocketEx")
    Stop
}
}

  Spawn:

	Goto Fly
}
}

ACTOR SSCommanderHomRocket : PlayerHomRocket
{
-MTHRUSPECIES
-THRUSPECIES
DamageType "Hell"
States
{
Fly:
Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SeekerMissile(25,35)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0  A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    HMIS A 1 Bright A_Weave(2,2,1.0,1.0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SeekerMissile(25,35)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0  A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))
    HMIS A 1 Bright A_Weave(2,2,1.0,1.0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SeekerMissile(25,35)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",Random(0,2),Random(-2,2))

	TNT1 A 0 A_SeekerMissile(25,35)

Actor SSBaron : TodesRitter
{
  Health 9300
  SeeSound "NaziBaronVonSchmitt/See"
  DeathSound "NaziBaronVonSchmitt/Death"
  ActiveSound "NaziBaronVonSchmitt/Active"
  AttackSound "plasmaminigun/fire"
  Obituary "%o was defeated by the Nazi Baron Von Schmitt."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[w8] Baron Von Schmitt\c-"
  Decal DoomImpScorch
  states
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	VONS A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    VONS AABB 4 A_Chase
    VONS A 0 A_Hoof
    VONS CCDD 4 A_Chase
    VONS A 0 A_Hoof
	Loop
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Beacon")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(147,"Combo1","Combo2","Lazer","Erasus")
  Normal:
    VONS EE 2 A_FaceTarget
    VONS HIHIHIHIHIHI 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	VONS E 15 A_Jump(196,"Normal","Combo1","Combo2","Erasus")
    Goto See
  Combo1:
    VONS EE 2 A_FaceTarget
    VONS HI 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("vulcan/altfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,24,0)
	VONS J 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("vulcan/altfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,-24,0)
	VONS K 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	VONS HI 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("vulcan/altfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,24,0)
	VONS J 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("vulcan/altfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,-24,0)
	VONS K 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	VONS HI 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("vulcan/altfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,24,0)
	VONS J 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("vulcan/altfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,-24,0)
	VONS K 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	VONS HI 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,24,0)
	VONS J 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("vulcan/altfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,-24,0)
	VONS K 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	VONS HI 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("vulcan/altfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,24,0)
	VONS J 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("vulcan/altfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,-24,0)
	VONS K 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	VONS HI 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	VONS E 15 A_Jump(196,"Normal","Lazer","Combo2","Erasus")
    Goto See
  Combo2:
    VONS EE 2 A_FaceTarget
    VONS HIHIHIHIHIHI 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",105,24,0)
	VONS J 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",105,-24,0)
	VONS K 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	VONS HIHIHIHIHIHI 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",105,24,0)
	VONS J 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",105,-24,0)
	VONS K 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	VONS HIHIHIHIHIHI 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",105,24,0)
	VONS J 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",105,-24,0)
	VONS K 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	VONS HIHIHIHIHIHI 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,2,4,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	VONS E 15 A_Jump(196,"Normal","Lazer","Combo1","Erasus")
    Goto See
  Lazer:
	VONS E 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
    VONS F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,24,0)
    VONS E 3 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	VONS G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,-24,0)
	VONS E 3 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
    VONS F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,24,0)
    VONS E 3 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	VONS G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,-24,0)
	VONS E 3 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	VONS G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,-24,0)
	VONS E 3 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
    VONS F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,24,0)
    VONS E 3 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("vulcan/altfire")
	VONS G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",105,-24,0)
	VONS E 3 A_Jump(86,"Normal","Lazer")
    Goto See
  Erasus:
    VONS E 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/load")
	VONS EEEEEEEEE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
    VONS F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",105,24,0)
    VONS EEE 3 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	VONS G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",105,-24,0)
	VONS EEE 3 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
    VONS F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",105,24,0)
    VONS EEE 3 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	VONS G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",105,-24,0)
	VONS EEE 3 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
    VONS F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",105,24,0)
    VONS EEE 3 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	VONS G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",105,-24,0)
	VONS EEE 3 A_CPosRefire
	VONS E 3 A_Jump(86,"Normal","Lazer")
    Goto See
  Beacon:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_beacon >= 3,"Normal")	 
	VONS EEEEEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_beacon",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("NaziBeacon",0,0,48,12,0,6,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("NaziDogBeacon",0,0,48,12,0,6,0)
	VONS E 35
    Goto See
  Death:
    VONS L 6 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
    VONS MN 6 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    VONS O 6 A_NoBlocking
	VONS P 6 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    VONS Q -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  }
}
