Actor SSGeneralAkhanov : TodesRitter
{
  Health 9300
  SeeSound "NaziGeneralAkhanov/See"
  PainSound "elitesoldier/pain"
  DeathSound "elitesoldier/death"
  ActiveSound "elitesoldier/idle"
  Obituary "%o had no chance against the Nazi General Akhanov."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[w8] General Akhanov\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	AKHA A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    AKHA AABB 4 A_Chase
    AKHA A 0 A_Hoof
    AKHA CCDD 4 A_Chase
    AKHA A 0 A_Hoof
	Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Beacon")
  Normal:
	AKHA E 10 A_FaceTarget
    AKHA F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",85,24,random(-1.5,1.5))
    AKHA E 3 A_FaceTarget
	AKHA G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("mrl/fire")
	AKHA G 0 A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket",56,20,random(-1.5,1.5))
	AKHA G 0 A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket",56,-20,random(-1.5,1.5))
	AKHA G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",85,-24,random(-1.5,1.5))
	AKHA E 3 A_FaceTarget
    AKHA F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",85,24,random(-1.5,1.5))
    AKHA E 3 A_FaceTarget
	AKHA G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("mrl/fire")
	AKHA G 0 A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket",56,20,random(-1.5,1.5))
	AKHA G 0 A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket",56,-20,random(-1.5,1.5))
	AKHA G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",85,-24,random(-1.5,1.5))
	AKHA E 3
    Goto See
  Beacon:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_beacon >= 3,"Normal")	 
	AKHA EEEEEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_beacon",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("NaziBeacon",0,0,48,12,0,6,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("NaziDogBeacon",0,0,48,12,0,6,0)
	AKHA E 35
    Goto See
  Death:
    AKHA H 7 Bright A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    AKHA IIIII 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    AKHA JJJJJ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    AKHA KKKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    AKHA L -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  }
}

Actor SSEnforcer : TodesRitter
{
  Health 12000
  +NOBLOOD
  +DONTRIP
  Speed 5
  Scale 1.0
  SeeSound "ssenforcer/see"
  DeathSound "ssenforcer/death"
  ActiveSound "ssenforcer/idle"
  Obituary "%o was found and destroyed by the Nazi Enforcer."
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[w8] Enforcer\c-"
  states
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	EFCR A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    EFCR AAAABBBB 2 A_Chase
    EFCR A 0 A_PlaySound("b2battlebot/step")
    EFCR CCCCDDDD 2 A_Chase
    EFCR A 0 A_PlaySound("b2battlebot/step")
	Loop
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(187,"BFG10K","DTBFG","BFG12K")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Minigun")
  Normal:
    EFCR EEE 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/qsgfire")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",48,0,Random(6,-6),0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing",32,6,48, Random(2,6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing",-32,6,48, Random(2,6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    EFCR F 8 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(15.4,10.6,32,Random(1,4)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
	EFCR E 0 A_CposRefire
	EFCR E 8 A_Jump(64,"Minigun","DTBFG","BFG10K","See")
    Goto Normal
  Minigun:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/mgunspinstart")
	EFCR GHGHGH 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/mgunspin","Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/minigunfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",106,-48,Random(5,-5),0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",-48,6,106,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
    EFCR I 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(6.4,0,3,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
    EFCR H 1 A_CposRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(4,"See","DTBFG","BFG10K","Normal")
    TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
    Goto Minigun+7
  BFG10K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
	EFCR JKL 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	EFCR M 0 A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",90,8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCR M 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",90,-8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCR G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	EFCR M 0 A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",90,8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCR M 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",90,-8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCR G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	EFCR M 0 A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",90,8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCR M 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",90,-8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCR G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	EFCR M 0 A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",90,8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCR M 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",90,-8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCR G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	EFCR M 0 A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",90,8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCR M 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",90,-8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCR G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	EFCR M 0 A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",90,8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCR M 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",90,-8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCR G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	EFCR LKJ 8 Bright A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"DTBFG")
    Goto See
  DTBFG:
	EFCR G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("Cardinal/9k")
	EFCR GGG 10 A_FaceTarget
    EFCR N 16 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkAnniDTBFGBall",80,0,0)
    EFCR G 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"BFG12K")
    Goto See
  BFG12K:
	EFCR GGGGG 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG12000/Fire")
	EFCR GGGGGGG 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DemonBFG12000Ball",80,0,0,0)
	EFCR NNN 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	EFCR GGG 6 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Death:
    EFCR O 4 Bright A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateStrongGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_GiveToTarget("BossCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
    EFCR OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom",random(20,80),random(20,-20),random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
	EFCR O 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SSEnforcerTorso",0,0,80,0,0,0,0,32)
	EFCR O 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SSEnforcerLegs",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    EFCR O 1 A_BossDeath
    Stop

  }
}

    Loop

	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/qsgfire")

    Goto Missile

	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
    EFCL AAAAAAAA 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom",random(20,80),random(20,-20),random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
    EFCL Z -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  }
}

Actor SSEnforcerTorso : SSEnforcerLegs
{
  +FLOAT
  +NOGRAVITY
  +NOICEDEATH
  var int user_script2;
  Speed 8
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[w8] Enforcer's Torso\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script2 == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("EnforcerFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script2",1)
	EFCT A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script2 == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("EnforcerFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script2",1)
    EFCT A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(22,"Evade")
	Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,11)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,20,0,0)
	EFCT AAAAAAAA 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,20,0,0)
	EFCT AAAAAAAA 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(140,"BFG10K")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Minigun")
  Normal:
    EFCT GGG 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/sshotf")
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",70,0,Random(6,-6),0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing",0,6,random(70,75),Random(2,6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    EFCT H 8 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(15.4,10.6,18,Random(1,4)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
	EFCT E 0 A_CposRefire
	EFCT G 8 A_Jump(64,"Minigun","BFG10K","See")
    Goto Normal
  Minigun:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/mgunspinstart")
	EFCT BCBCBC 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/mgunspin","Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/minigunfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",86,-48,Random(5,-5),0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",-48,6,86,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
    EFCT D 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(6.4,0,3,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
    EFCT C 1 A_CposRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(4,"See","BFG10K","Normal")
    TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
    Goto Minigun+7
  BFG10K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
	EFCT EEE 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	EFCT F 0 A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",40,8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCT F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",40,-8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCT E 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	EFCT F 0 A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",40,8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCT F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",40,-8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCT E 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	EFCT F 0 A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",40,8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCT F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",40,-8,Random(4,-4))
	EFCT EEE 8 Bright A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
    Goto See
  Death:
    EFCT I 4 Bright A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
    EFCT IIIIIIII 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom",random(20,80),random(20,-20),random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
    EFCT Z -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  }
}

Actor SSSentryGun
{
Obituary "%o was ventilated by a nazi auto-sentry."
Health 150
Radius 20
Height 56
Mass 100000
Speed 0
Monster
MaxTargetRange 1024
AttackSound "weapons/tpfire"
DeathSound "sentry/die"
Decal "BulletChip"
+FLOORCLIP
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+NOBLOOD
+LOOKALLAROUND
+NOBLOCKMONST
+DROPOFF
+STANDSTILL
-SOLID
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
//DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
RadiusDamageFactor 0.5
Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Sentry Gun\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TORO AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 4 A_Look
    TORO A 0 A_PlaySound("sentry/beep")
    Loop
  See:
    TORO AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_Chase
	TORO AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_Chase
	TORO AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_Chase
	TORO AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_Chase
    TORO A 0 A_PlaySound("sentry/beep")
	TORO A 0 A_ClearTarget
    Loop
  Missile:
    TORO A 0 A_PlaySound("sentry/see")
    TORO A 8 A_FaceTarget
	TORO B 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(38,42),0,Random(3,-3),0)
    TORO B 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",12,6,30,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
    TORO B 15 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(6,6,1,random(8,24),"HellBulletPuff")
	TORO A 8 A_FaceTarget
	TORO A 0 A_Jump(16,"See")
    TORO A 1 A_CPosRefire
    Goto Missile+1
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom3", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,0,Random(4,-4),Random(4,-4),Random(4,8),0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/rocklx")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("RocketEx",0,32)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
    TORO CDE 8 Bright
	TORO F -1
    Stop
  }
}

Actor SSSuperBattleBot
{
  Scale 1.25
  Health 1500
  Radius 24
  Height 64
  Mass 5000
  Speed 8
  PainChance 20
  Monster
  +FLOORCLIP
  +LOOKALLAROUND
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +MISSILEMORE
  +MISSILEEVENMORE
  +NOPAIN
  +NOBLOOD
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  RadiusDamageFactor 0.5
  SeeSound "b2battlebot/see"
  ActiveSound "b2battlebot/idle"
  DeathSound "b2battlebot/death"
  Obituary "%o was terminated by a nazi super battle bot"
  var int user_script;
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[g8] Super Battle Bot\c-"
  Decal BulletChip
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    RHAN A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    RHAN AAAABBBB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    RHAN CCCCDDDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    RHAN EE 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    RHAN F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    RHAN G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    RHAN F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    RHAN G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    RHAN F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    RHAN G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    RHAN F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    RHAN G 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	RHAN E 15
    Goto See
  Death:
    RHAN H 5 A_ScreamAndUnBlock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    RHAN IIIJJJKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    RHAN L -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  }
}

Actor SSUtilityGuy
{
  Scale 1.25
  Health 1850
  Radius 24
  Height 64
  Mass 5000
  Speed 8
  PainChance 20
  Monster
  +FLOORCLIP
  +LOOKALLAROUND
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +MISSILEMORE
  +MISSILEEVENMORE
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  +NOPAIN
  +NOBLOOD
  -SOLID
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  RadiusDamageFactor 0.5
  SeeSound "supersoldier/see"
  PainSound "supersoldier/pain"
  DeathSound "supersoldier/death"
  ActiveSound "supersoldier/idle"
  Obituary "%o was terminated by a super soldier."
  var int user_script;
  var int user_sentry;
  var int user_heavysentry;
  var int user_techunit;
  var int user_improvedtechunit;
  var int user_scoutbot;
  var int user_battlebot;
  var int user_meleebot;
  var int user_superbot;
  var int user_eradicator;
  Tag "\c[x2]Nazi\c[m4] Utility Guy\c-"
  Decal BulletChip
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    IR0N A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	IR0N AABB 4 A_Chase
    IR0N A 0 A_Hoof
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_meleebot >= 3,2)
	IR0N A 0 A_Jump(14,"BuildMeleeBot")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_battlebot >= 4,2)
	IR0N A 0 A_Jump(14,"BuildBattleBot")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_sentry >= 20,2)
	IR0N A 0 A_Jump(64,"BuildSentry")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_heavysentry >= 6,2)
	IR0N A 0 A_Jump(64,"BuildHeavySentry")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_scoutbot >= 8,2)
	IR0N A 0 A_Jump(64,"BuildScoutBot")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_superbot >= 6,2)
	IR0N A 0 A_Jump(14,"BuildSuperBattleBot")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_techunit >= 8,2)
	IR0N A 0 A_Jump(64,"BuildTechUnit")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_improvedtechunit >= 4,2)
	IR0N A 0 A_Jump(32,"BuildImprovedTechUnit")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_eradicator >= 1,2)
	IR0N A 0 A_Jump(14,"BuildEradicator")
    IR0N CCDD 4 A_Chase
    IR0N A 0 A_Hoof
    Loop
  BuildSentry:
    IR0N FGFGFG 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("SSSentryGunMarker",8,0,12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_sentry",user_sentry+1)
    IR0N A 6 A_SpawnItemEx("SSSentryGun",8,0,12,0,0,0,0,32)
	Goto See
  BuildHeavySentry:
    IR0N FGFGFG 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("SSHeavySentryGunMarker",8,0,12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_heavysentry",user_heavysentry+1)
    IR0N A 6 A_SpawnItemEx("SSHeavySentryGun",8,0,12,0,0,0,0,32)
	Goto See
  BuildScoutBot:
    IR0N FGFGFG 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("SSScoutBotMarker",8,0,12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_scoutbot",user_scoutbot+1)
    IR0N A 6 A_SpawnItemEx("SSScoutBot",8,0,12,0,0,0,0,32)
	Goto See
  BuildTechUnit:
    IR0N FGFGFG 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("SSTechUnitMarker",8,0,12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_techunit",user_techunit+1)
    IR0N A 6 A_SpawnItemEx("SSTechUnit",8,0,12,0,0,0,0,32)
	Goto See
  BuildImprovedTechUnit:
    IR0N FGFGFG 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("SSImprovedTechUnitMarker",8,0,12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_improvedtechunit",user_improvedtechunit+1)
    IR0N A 6 A_SpawnItemEx("SSTechUnit",8,0,12,0,0,0,0,32)
	Goto See
  BuildBattleBot:
    IR0N FGFGFG 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("SSBattleBotMarker",8,0,12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_battlebot",user_battlebot+1)
    IR0N A 6 A_SpawnItemEx("SSBattleBot",8,0,12,0,0,0,0,32)
	Goto See
  BuildMeleeBot:
    IR0N FGFGFG 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("SSMeleeBotMarker",8,0,12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_meleebot",user_meleebot+1)
    IR0N A 6 A_SpawnItemEx("SSMeleeBot",8,0,12,0,0,0,0,32)
	Goto See
  BuildSuperBattleBot:
    IR0N FGFGFG 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("SSSuperBattleBotMarker",8,0,12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_superbot",user_superbot+1)
    IR0N A 6 A_SpawnItemEx("SSSuperBattleBot",8,0,12,0,0,0,0,32)
	Goto See
  BuildEradicator:
    IR0N FGFGFG 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("SSEradicatorMarker",8,0,12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_eradicator",user_eradicator+1)
    IR0N A 6 A_SpawnItemEx("SSEradicator",8,0,12,0,0,0,0,32)
	Goto See
  Missile:
    IR0N EE 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",76,15,random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    IR0N H 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",76,-15,random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    IR0N J 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",76,15,random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    IR0N H 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",76,-15,random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    IR0N J 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",76,15,random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    IR0N H 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",76,-15,random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    IR0N J 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",76,15,random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    IR0N H 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SSRocket2",76,-15,random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(36,44),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 10, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*5,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    IR0N J 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("hitler/fire","Weapon")
	IR0N E 15
    Goto See
  Death:
    IR0N K 5
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    IR0N L 0 A_Scream
	IR0N LLLLLLMMMMMM 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	IR0N N 0 A_NoBlocking
    IR0N N -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  }

Actor FleshWizard
{
Health 2000
Radius 20
Height 64
Mass 3000
Speed 2
PainChance 16
Alpha 0.8
SeeSound "wizard/sight"
DeathSound "wizard/death"
ActiveSound "wizard/sight"
MONSTER
+FLOORCLIP
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+NOPAIN
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.5
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
var int user_amount;
Obituary "%o was killed by a flesh wizard."
Tag "\ceFlesh Wizard\c-"
States
{
   Spawn:
	LMWZ E 10 A_Look
	Loop
   See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(10,"Missile")
	LMWZ EEFF 3 A_chase
	Loop
   Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_amount > 9,"Attack")
	LMWZ EEEEEE 8 A_FaceTarget
	LMWZ F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("wizard/tele")
	LMWZ FG 10 A_FaceTarget
    //LMWZ HHHHHHHHHH 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FleshWizardSpawners",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("brain/spit")
	LMWZ HHHHHHHHHH 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FleshWizardSummon",0,0,48,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	LMWZ H 20 A_SetUserVar("user_amount",user_amount+1)
	LMWZ GE 5 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
   Attack:
    LMWZ E 1 A_JumpIfTargetInLos(1)
	Goto See
	LMWZ EFG 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	LMWZ H 0 A_FaceTarget
	LMWZ H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PBall",62,0,0)
	LMWZ H 0 A_FaceTarget
	LMWZ H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PBall",62,0,0)
	LMWZ H 0 A_FaceTarget
	LMWZ H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PBall",62,0,0)
	LMWZ GE 2 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
   Death:
	LMWZ J 6 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	LMWZ K 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	LMWZ K 6 A_NoBlocking
	LMWZ L 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	LMWZ LMNO 6
	LMWZ P -1
	Stop
  }
}

Actor FleshWizardSpawners
{
Radius 22
Height 56
Speed 17
Monster
+NODROPOFF
+THRUSPECIES
-SHOOTABLE
-COUNTKILL
-SOLID
Species "Hell"
MaxDropOffHeight 48
MaxStepHeight 32
var int user_limit;
States
{
   Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetAngle(random(0,359))
	TNT1 A 0 A_Recoil(-40)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,2)
   Moving:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetAngle(random(0,359))
    TNT1 A 0 A_Recoil(random(0,-8))
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_limit >= 60,"Death")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",user_limit+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_limit < 5,2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(22,"Death")
    TNT1 A 1
    Loop
   Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TeleportFog")
    TNT1 A 5 A_SpawnItemEx("FleshWizardMinions",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 1 A_Fall
	Stop
	}
}

Actor FleshWizardMinions
{
+NOSECTOR
+NOGRAVITY
+BOSSDEATH
+SHOOTABLE
+ISMONSTER
+NORADIUSDMG
+NOINTERACTION
+NOBLOCKMAP
HEALTH 0x7FFFFFFF
Radius 0
Height 0
Mass 0x7FFFFFFF
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 1
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"StrongSpawn")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"MediumSpawn")
  WeakSpawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,1,2,3,4,5,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PlasmaGunner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    Stop
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RailGunner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    Stop
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShotgunZombie",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    Stop
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Imp",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    Stop
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RepeaterZombie",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    Stop
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PistolZombie",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    Stop
  MediumSpawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,1,2,3)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VoidImp",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    Stop
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("AssaultShotgunZombie",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    Stop
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("AssaultRifleZombie",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    Stop
  StrongSpawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,1,2,3)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DemonTechZombie",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    Stop
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SuperShotgunZombie",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    Stop
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Devil",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    Stop
    }
}

Actor FleshWizardImp : FleshWizard
{
States
{
   Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_amount > 11,"Attack")
	LMWZ EEEEEE 8 A_FaceTarget
	LMWZ F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("wizard/tele")
	LMWZ FG 10 A_FaceTarget
	//LMWZ HHHHHHHHHHHHHHH 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FleshWizardImpSpawners",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("brain/spit")
	LMWZ HHHHHHHHHHHHHHH 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FleshWizardSummonImp",0,0,48,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	LMWZ H 20 A_SetUserVar("user_amount",user_amount+1)
	LMWZ GE 5 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  }
}

Actor FleshWizardImpSpawners : FleshWizardSpawners

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TeleportFog")
    TNT1 A 5 A_SpawnItemEx("FleshWizardImpMinions",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 1 A_Fall
	Stop
	}
}

    Stop
  MediumSpawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VoidImp",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    Stop
  StrongSpawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Devil",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    Stop
    }
}

Actor Summoner : Archvile
{
Health 2000
GibHealth 90
Obituary "%o had %h life drained by a Summoner."
Scale 1.1
Species "Viles"
DamageFactor "VileFires", 0.0
SeeSound "Summoner/Sight"
ActiveSound "Summoner/Active"
PainSound "Summoner/Pain"
DeathSound "Summoner/Death"
+NOTARGET
+DONTRIP
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
Tag "\c[l0]Summoner\c-"
var int user_minions;
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SummonerCubesToken",1,"Cont")
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SummonerCubesToken",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SummonerCubes",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
  Cont:
    SUMN A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
    SUMN AABBCC 2 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
    SUMN DDEEFF 2 A_VileChase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Rush")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(84,"Summon")
    Loop
  Rush:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN A 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN A 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN B 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN B 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN C 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN C 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN D 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN D 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN E 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN E 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN F 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN F 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN A 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN A 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN B 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN B 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN C 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN C 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN D 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN D 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN E 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN E 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN F 1 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
    SUMN F 1 A_VileChase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(42,"Summon")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(150,"See")
    Loop
  Summon:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_minions >= 6,"See")
	//TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS(1)
	//Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("Summoner/Sight",CHAN_VOICE)
    SUMN G 20 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_minions",user_minions+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("brain/spit")
    //TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SummonerSpawners",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MaledictSummon",0,0,64,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	SUMN HG 10
    Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Summoner/Start")
    SUMN L 12 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_VileTarget("SummonerDrainAttack")
	SUMN K 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Heal1")
	SUMN K 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Heal2")
    SUMN K 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Heal3")
	SUMN K 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Heal4")
	SUMN K 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SUMN K 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SUMN J 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Heal5")
	SUMN J 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Heal6")
	SUMN I 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SUMN I 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Heal7")
	SUMN H 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Heal8")
	SUMN H 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SUMN G 30 Bright A_VileAttack
    Goto See
  Heal1:
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",20)
	Goto Missile+5
  Heal2:
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",20)
	Goto Missile+7
  Heal3:
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",20)
	Goto Missile+9
  Heal4:
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",20)
	Goto Missile+11
  Heal5:
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",20)
	Goto Missile+15
  Heal6:
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",20)
	Goto Missile+17
  Heal7:
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",20)
	Goto Missile+20
  Heal8:
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",20)
	Goto Missile+22
  Pain:
    SUMN M 10 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(164,"FakeOut")
	Goto See
  FakeOut:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFake",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"EvadeRight")
  EvadeLeft:
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(NOPAIN,1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,30,0,0)
    SUMN AABBCCDDEEFF 1 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(NOPAIN,0)
	Goto See
  EvadeRight:
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(NOPAIN,1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,30,0,0)
    SUMN AABBCCDDEEFF 1 A_SpawnItem("SummonerFX",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(NOPAIN,0)
	Goto See
  Heal:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("brain/spit")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,20,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,40,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,60,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,80,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,100,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,120,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,140,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,160,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,180,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,200,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,220,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,240,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,260,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,280,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,300,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,320,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,340,0)
    SUMN HG 24
    Goto See
 Death:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("SummonerCubesToken",1)
    SUMN N 6 A_Scream
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_KillChildren
    SUMN O 5 A_Fall
    SUMN PQ 5
    SUMN R 4
	SUMN S 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    SUMN T -1
    Stop
 XDeath:
    TNT1 A 0
	SUMX A 4 A_TakeInventory("SummonerCubesToken",1)
	SUMX B 3 A_XScream
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	SUMX C 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_KillChildren
	SUMX D 3 A_Fall
	SUMX E 3 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	SUMX FGH 3
	SUMX I -1
	Stop
    }
}

ACTOR SummonerCubesToken : Inventory { Inventory.Amount 1 Inventory.MaxAmount 1 }
ACTOR CubeSpawnedToken : Inventory { Inventory.Amount 1 Inventory.MaxAmount 1 }

ACTOR SummonerCubes
{
Scale 0.38
+NOBLOCKMAP
+NOTELEPORT
+DONTSPLASH
+NOINTERACTION
States
{
Spawn:
	SUMC AAAABBBBCCCCDDDD 1 Bright A_Warp(AAPTR_TARGET,0,0,68,0,WARPF_NOCHECKPOSITION|WARPF_INTERPOLATE)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SummonerCubesToken",1,"Spawn",AAPTR_TARGET)
	SUMC AAAABBBBCCCCDDDD 1 Bright A_Warp(AAPTR_TARGET,0,0,68,0,WARPF_NOCHECKPOSITION|WARPF_INTERPOLATE)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SummonerCubesToken",1,"Spawn",AAPTR_TARGET)
	SUMC AAAABBBBCCCCDDDD 1 Bright A_Warp(AAPTR_TARGET,0,0,68,0,WARPF_NOCHECKPOSITION|WARPF_INTERPOLATE)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SummonerCubesToken",1,"Spawn",AAPTR_TARGET)
	Goto AliveCheck
AliveCheck:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SummonerCubesToken",1,"Spawn",AAPTR_TARGET)
Dead:
	SUMC A 4 A_SetScale(0.28,0.28)
	SUMC B 4 A_SetScale(0.18,0.18)
	SUMC C 4 A_SetScale(0.08,0.08)
	SUMC D 4 A_SetScale(0.04,0.04)
	Goto Null
	}
}

    SUMN ABCDEF 2 A_FadeOut(0.1)
    Stop
    }

    }

ACTOR DrainingTarget
{
Radius 3
Height 3
Speed 0
Damage 0
PROJECTILE
+SEEKERMISSILE
+RIPPER
+NOBOSSRIP
+BLOODLESSIMPACT
States
{
Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 NoDelay A_RearrangePointers(AAPTR_TRACER,AAPTR_DEFAULT,AAPTR_TARGET,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 1 A_CustomMissile("DrainingBall",FRandom(25,50),FRandom(40,-40),0,CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	Stop
	}
}

ACTOR DrainingBall : DrainingTarget
{
Radius 3
Height 3
Speed 15
Scale 0.5
DeathSound "gib/bounce"
Decal BloodSplat07
RenderStyle Translucent
Alpha 0.45
States
{
Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 NoDelay A_RearrangePointers(AAPTR_MASTER,AAPTR_DEFAULT,AAPTR_TARGET,0)
Cont:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SummonerBlood",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeVelocity(FRandom(-1,1),FRandom(-1,1),FRandom(-1,1))
    BLDB A 3 Bright A_SeekerMissile(10,45)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeVelocity(FRandom(-1,1),FRandom(-1,1),FRandom(-1,1))
	BLDB B 3 Bright A_SeekerMissile(10,45)
	Loop
Death:
	BLDB CDE 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("SummonerBlood",0,0,0,0)
	Stop
	}
}

ACTOR SummonerBlood : NewBlood
{
States
{
Spawn:
Spray:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BloodSpray",0,0,0,FRandom(1,-1),FRandom(1,-1),FRandom(1,2),0,129)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("NewFlyingBlood",0,0,0,FRandom(5,-5),FRandom(5,-5),FRandom(3,6),0,129)
	TNT1 A 1 A_Jump(128,"ExtraBlood")
	Stop
ExtraBlood:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SmallFlyingBlood",0,0,0,FRandom(5,-5),FRandom(5,-5),FRandom(3,6),0,129)
	Stop
	}

Actor RepeaterZombie
{
Health 45
Radius 20
Height 56
Speed 8
Mass 100
PainChance 130
MONSTER
+FLOORCLIP
+MISSILEMORE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
Obituary "%o was vapourized by a zombie with a plasma repeater."
SeeSound "grunt/sight"
PainSound "grunt/pain"
DeathSound "grunt/death"
ActiveSound "grunt/active"
Tag "\c[j8]Repeater Zombie\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    RPZM A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    RPZM AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    RPZM CCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    Loop
  Missile:
    RPZM EEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	RPZM F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZombFusionShot",32,5,random(-2,2))
	RPZM E 2 A_FaceTarget
	RPZM F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZombFusionShot",32,5,random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(86,"Pause")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
    Goto Missile+4
  Pause:
	RPZM E 20
	Goto See
  Pain:
    RPZM G 6 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    RPZM H 5
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    RPZM I 5 A_Scream
    RPZM J 5 A_Fall
    RPZM K 5 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    RPZM LM 5
    RPZM N -1
    Stop
  XDeath:
    ZMAY O 3
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    ZMAY P 3 A_XScream
    ZMAY Q 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    ZMAY R 3 A_Fall
    ZMAY STU 3
    ZMAY V -1
    Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    RPZM NMLKJI 5
    Goto See
  }
}

Actor ZombFusionShot : FusionShot{Damage 4 Decal DoomImpScorch}

Actor PistolZombie : RepeaterZombie
{
AttackSound "weapons/tpfire"
Obituary "%o was killed by a zombieman with a pistol."
Tag "\ccPistol Zombie\c-"
Decal BulletChip
States
{
  Spawn:
    P0SS A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	P0SS AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
	P0SS CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
  Missile:
	P0SS EE 6 A_FaceTarget
	P0SS F 4 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack (22.5, 0, 1, random(1,5) * 3, "HellBulletPuff", 0, CBAF_NORANDOM)
	P0SS E 6 A_SpawnItemEx("BulletCasing",30,0,30,Random(2,4),Random(3,6),Random(3,6),0)
	P0SS F 4 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack (22.5, 0, 1, random(1,5) * 3, "HellBulletPuff", 0, CBAF_NORANDOM)
	P0SS E 6 A_SpawnItemEx("BulletCasing",30,0,30,Random(2,4),Random(3,6),Random(3,6),0)
	P0SS F 4 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack (22.5, 0, 1, random(1,5) * 3, "HellBulletPuff", 0, CBAF_NORANDOM)
	P0SS E 6 A_SpawnItemEx("BulletCasing",30,0,30,Random(2,4),Random(3,6),Random(3,6),0)
	Goto See
  Pain:
    P0SS G 6 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
	P0SS H 5
	POSS I 5 A_Scream
	POSS J 5 A_Fall
	POSS K 5 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	POSS L -1
	Stop
  XDeath:
	P0SS M 3
	POSS N 3 A_XScream
	POSS O 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	POSS P 3 A_Fall
	POSS QRST 3
	POSS U -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	POSS KJIH 5
	P0SS H 5
	Goto See
	}
}

Actor PyroZombie : RepeaterZombie
{
Health 125
Obituary "%o was blazed by a Pyroblast Zombieman."
Tag "\c[z4]Pyroblast Zombieman\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    FLMZ A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    FLMZ AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    FLMZ CCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    Loop
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(200,"Flamer")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("hectebus/flameready")
    FLMZ EEE 5 A_FaceTarget
    FLMZ F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("HectebusBall",32,0,random(-1,1))
    FLMZ E 3 A_FaceTarget
	FLMZ F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("HectebusBall",32,0,random(-1,1))
    FLMZ EEE 3 A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
  Flamer:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("hectebus/flameready")
    FLMZ E 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/fatsofire")
    TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
    FLMZ FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",32,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
    Goto See
  Pain:
    FLMZ G 6 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    FLMZ G 3 A_Scream
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    FLMZ H 4 A_Fall
    FLMZ IJK 4
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash")
    FLMZ L -1
    Stop
  XDeath:
    FLMZ G 3 A_XScream
    FLMZ O 3 A_Fall
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    FLMZ PQRSTUV 5
    FLMZ W -1
    Stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    FLMZ LKJIH 4
    Goto See
  }
}

ACTOR Nailgunner : RepeaterZombie
{
Health 300

PainSound "superzombie/pain"
DeathSound "superzombie/death"
ActiveSound "superzombie/active"
Obituary "%o was nailed by a Nailgunner." 
Tag "\c[m8]Nailgunner\c-"
States 
{ 
  Spawn: 
	NLBC A 10 A_Look 
	Loop 
  See: 
    NLBC AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    NLBC CCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    Loop
  Missile:
	NLBC E 10 A_FaceTarget
	NLBC F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("NailgunnerProjectile",32,15,random(-2,2))
    NLBC E 2 A_FaceTarget
	NLBC F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("NailgunnerProjectile",32,15,random(-2,2))
    NLBC E 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"See") 
	TNT1 A 0 A_MonsterRefire(220,"See") 
	Goto Missile+1 
  Pain: 
	NLBC G 3 
	NLBC G 3 A_Pain 
	Goto See 
  XDeath:
  Death:
    NLBC H 6 A_StopSound(7)
    NLBC I 6 A_Scream
    NLBC J 6 A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	NLBC KL 6
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    NLBC M -1
	Stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    NLBC LKJIH 5
    Goto See
}

ACTOR DarkBFGCommando : Nailgunner
{
Health 500
Scale 1.1
RadiusDamageFactor 0.25
Obituary "%o was blasted away by a Dark BFG Commando."
BloodColor Green
Tag "\c[l2]Dark BFG Commando\c-"
States 
{ 
  Spawn: 
	DKCD A 10 A_Look 
	Loop 
  See: 
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(NOPAIN,FALSE)
    DKCD AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    DKCD CCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(38,"Rush")
    Loop
  Rush:
	DKCD A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkBFGCommandoGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	DKCD A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkBFGCommandoGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	DKCD B 1 A_Chase
	DKCD B 0 A_Chase
	DKCD B 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkBFGCommandoGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	DKCD B 1 A_Chase
	DKCD B 0 A_Chase
	DKCD B 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkBFGCommandoGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
	DKCD C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkBFGCommandoGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	DKCD C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkBFGCommandoGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	DKCD D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkBFGCommandoGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	DKCD D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkBFGCommandoGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(50,"See")
	Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(88,"SecondaryFire")
  Normal:
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(NOPAIN,TRUE)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("EradicationBFG/Charge")
	DKCD EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkEradicationBFGProjectile",32,0,Random(-3,3))	
    DKCD FEEEEEE 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"See","See","SecondaryFire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkEradicationBFGProjectile",32,0,Random(-3,3))	
    DKCD FEEEEEE 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"See","See","SecondaryFire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkEradicationBFGProjectile",32,0,Random(-3,3))	
    DKCD FEEEEEEEEEE 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  SecondaryFire:
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(NOPAIN,TRUE)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("obelisk/fire")
	DKCD EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE 1 Bright A_GiveInventory("DarkBFGCommandoAiming",1)
	DKCD EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE 1 Bright A_GiveInventory("DarkBFGCommandoAiming",1)
	DKCD EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE 1 Bright A_GiveInventory("DarkBFGCommandoAiming",1)
	DKCD F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkEradicationBFGFocusProj",32,0,0)	
	DKCD FEEEEE 10 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain: 
	DKCD G 3 
	DKCD G 3 A_Pain 
	Goto See 
  XDeath:
  Death:
    DKCD H 6
    DKCD I 6 A_Scream
    DKCD J 6 A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	DKCD K 6
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    DKCD L -1
	Stop
  XDeath:
    DKCD O 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE,0)
    DKCD P 5 A_XScream
    DKCD Q 5 A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    DKCD RSTUV 5
    DKCD W -1
    Stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    NLBC LKJIH 5
    Goto See
}

ACTOR DarkBFGCommandoGhostA
{

Radius 2
Alpha 0.75
Scale 1.1
RENDERSTYLE Translucent
+NONSHOOTABLE
+NOINTERACTION
+CLIENTSIDEONLY
+NONETID
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
	DKCD A 2 A_FadeOut(0.1,1)
	Loop
  Toaster:
	TNT1 A 0
	Stop
}
}

Actor DarkBFGCommandoGhostC : DarkBFGCommandoGhostA
{
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
	DRHR C 2 A_FadeOut(0.1,1)
	Loop
}
}

Actor DarkBFGCommandoGhostD : DarkBFGCommandoGhostA
{

Actor BeaconCarrierZombie : AssaultShotgunZombie1
{
Health 400
Obituary "%o had chunks blown off by a beacon carrier zombie."
Tag "\crBeacon Carrier Zombie\c-"
var int user_beacon;
States
{
  Spawn:
    EASZ A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See: 
    EASZ AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    EASZ CCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Beacon")	 
  Normal:
    EASZ E 15 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", -8, 7, 30, 4, 0, (0.1)*Random(30, 40), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",Random(28,34),0,Random(6,-6),0)
    EASZ F 4 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,3,Random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
    EASZ E 8 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"See")
	TNT1 A 0 Bright A_CPosRefire
    Goto Normal+1
  Beacon:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_beacon == 1,"Normal")	 
	EASZ EEEEEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_beacon",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ZombieBeacon",0,0,16,8,0,4,0)
	EASZ E 35
    Goto See
  Pain:
    EASZ G 3
    EASZ G 3 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    EASZ H 5
    EASZ I 5 A_Scream
    EASZ J 5 A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    EASZ KLM 5
    EASZ N -1
    Stop
  XDeath:
	EASZ O 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	EASZ P 5 A_XScream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	EASZ Q 5 A_NoBlocking
	EASZ RSTUV 5
	EASZ W -1
	Stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    EASZ KJIH 5
    Goto See
}
}

Actor ZombieCommander : BeaconCarrierZombie
{
Health 1000
Obituary "%o had chunks blown off by a beacon carrier zombie."
  Obituary "%o was dismissed by a Zombie Commander."
SeeSound "ZombieCommander/Sight"
ActiveSound "ZombieCommander/Active"
PainSound "ZombieCommander/Pain"
DeathSound "ZombieCommander/Death"
Tag "\c[m3]Zombie \c[g8]Commander\c-"
Scale 1.15
var int user_script;
States
{
  Spawn:
    ZC0M A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See: 
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    ZC0M AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    ZC0M CCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    Loop
  Strafing:
	ZC0M A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
	ZC0M AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
	ZC0M CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 E 0 A_Jump(45,"BFG9K")
	TNT1 E 0 A_Jump(90,"Rocket","Beacon")
  Normal:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/expmgunspinstart")
	ZC0M EEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/expmgunspin","Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
	ZC0M E 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",Random(34,38),15,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 12, 6, 28, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
	ZC0M F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",Random(34,38),15,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(4,"See","Rocket")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
	Goto Normal+5
  Rocket:
	ZC0M HHH 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	ZC0M I 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",36,15,random(-2,2))
	ZC0M J 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	ZC0M E 0 A_PlaySound("rocket/drumspin")
	ZC0M IHH 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"See","BFG9K")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
	Goto Rocket+4
  BFG9K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfgf")
	ZC0M HHH 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	ZC0M II 5 Bright A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	ZC0M J 10 A_CustomMissile("ZBFG9500Ball",36,15,0)
	ZC0M II 5 Bright A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	ZC0M HHHHH 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	Goto See
  Beacon:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_beacon >= 3,"Rocket")	 
	ZC0M EEEEEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_beacon",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ZombieBeacon",0,0,16,8,0,4,0)
	ZC0M E 35 
    Goto See
  Pain:
    ZC0M G 3
    ZC0M G 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 E 0 A_Jump(110,"Missile")
    Goto See
  XDeath:
  Death:
    ZC0M G 20 A_Scream
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    ZC0M KKKLLLMMM 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    ZC0M N -1
    Stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    ZC0M MLKG 5
    Goto See
}
}

Actor ZombieBeacon
{
Monster
Health 500
Radius 6
Height 28
Mass 9999
+FLOORCLIP
+NORADIUSDMG
+NOTELEPORT
+NOBLOOD
+BRIGHT
+CANTSEEK
+NOTARGET
+NEVERTARGET
-SOLID
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
RadiusDamageFactor 0.05
var int user_script;
var int user_amount;
var int user_max;
var int user_tier1;
var int user_tier2;
var int user_tier3;
var int user_tier4;
var int user_tier5;
Tag "\crZombie Beacon\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    BEAC D 10
	BEAC DDD 35 A_PlaySound("world/alarm1")
    BEAC D 1 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Zombie Beacon Activated",0,0,0,0)
	BEAC D 1
    Wait
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom3", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,0,Random(4,-4),Random(4,-4),Random(4,8),0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/rocklx")
    TNT1 D 1 A_SpawnItem("RocketEx")
	Stop
}
}

Actor SpecOpsStrafing : AIStrafing
{
  States
  {
  Pickup:
    NULL A 1
	NULL A 1 A_Jump(188,2)
	NULL A 1 A_GiveInventory("AIJumping",1)
	NULL A 1 A_JumpIf(velx != 0 || vely != 0,2)
	NULL A 1 A_Jump(256,2)
	NULL A 1 A_Jump(235,5)
	NULL A 1 A_JumpIfInventory("StrafeSens",1,3)
	NULL A 1 A_GiveInventory("StrafeSens",1)
	NULL A 1 A_Jump(256,2)
	NULL A 1 A_TakeInventory("StrafeSens",1)
	NULL A 1 A_JumpIfInventory("StrafeSens",1,3)
	NULL A 1 ThrustThing(angle*256/360+38.7,3,0,0)
	NULL A 1 A_Jump(256,2)
	NULL A 1 ThrustThing(angle*256/360+38.7,-3,0,0)
    NULL A 1 A_FaceTarget
	NULL A 1 A_Jump(24,2)
	NULL A 1 A_JumpIfCloser(300,2)
	NULL A 1 A_Recoil(-1.5)
    Stop
	NULL A 1 A_Recoil(1.5)
    Stop
  }
}

Actor ZombieSpecops
{
Health 230
Radius 20
Height 56
Speed 6
Mass 100

+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE

+DONTHARMSPECIES
+NODROPOFF
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
SeeSound "SpecOps/See"
PainSound "SpecOps/Pain"
DeathSound "SpecOps/Death"
ActiveSound " SpecOps/Idle"
AttackSound "mp45/fire"
Obituary "%o was owned by a zombie specops."
var int user_script;
Tag "\c[m3]Specops\c[g8] Machinegunner\c-"
Decal BulletChip
States
{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
        ZMCH A 10 A_Look
        Loop
	See:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	    ZMCH A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Strafing")
		ZMCH AABB 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		ZMCH CCDD 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		Loop
	Strafing:
		ZMCH A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZMCH AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZMCH C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZMCH CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
	Missile:
		ZMCH E 0 A_Jump(45,"FragGrenade")
        ZMCH EE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZMCH A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",12,6,30,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
        ZMCH F 1 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(7,7,1,2,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZMCH E 1 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZMCH A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",12,6,30,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
        ZMCH F 1 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(7,7,1,2,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZMCH E 1 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZMCH A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",12,6,30,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
        ZMCH F 1 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(7,7,1,2,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZMCH E 1 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZMCH A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",12,6,30,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
        ZMCH F 1 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(7,7,1,2,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZMCH E 1 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZMCH A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",12,6,30,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
        ZMCH F 1 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(7,7,1,2,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZMCH E 1 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZMCH A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",12,6,30,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
        ZMCH F 1 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(7,7,1,2,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZMCH E 1 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZMCH A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",12,6,30,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
        ZMCH F 1 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(7,7,1,2,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZMCH E 1 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZMCH A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",12,6,30,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
        ZMCH F 1 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(7,7,1,2,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZMCH E 1 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZMCH A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",12,6,30,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
        ZMCH F 1 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(7,7,1,2,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZMCH E 1 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZMCH A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",12,6,30,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
        ZMCH F 1 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(7,7,1,2,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZMCH E 1 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)

        ZMCH F 1 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(7,7,1,2,"HellBulletPuff")

        ZMCH F 1 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(7,7,1,2,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZMCH E 1 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
	FragGrenade:
        ZMCH E 1 A_JumpIfCloser(1000,1)
		Goto Missile
		ZMCH E 0 A_JumpIfCloser(280,"Missile")
        ZMCH E 6 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)

		ASGZ RSTUV 3
		ASGZ W -1
        Stop
}

Actor ZGrenade : ThrownGrenade
{
Damage 8
Damagetype "Hell"
Obituary "%o was exploded by a zombie specops."
+BOUNCEONACTORS
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	HGN1 A 3 A_StopSound
	HGN1 BCDEFGHABCDEFGHABCDEFGH 3
	Goto Death
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_AlertMonsters
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/hgrenadeex",CHAN_BODY)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Explosion",CHAN_WEAPON)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("FAREXPL",CHAN_VOICE)
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(2,24,0,15,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(64,156)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DiggerExplosion",0,0,random(80,100),2,random(80,100))
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,0,random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,8),0,128)
	TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("DiggerEx")
    Stop
}
}

Actor ZombieSpecops2 : ZombieSpecops
{
AttackSound ""
Tag "\c[m3]Specops\c[g8] Plasmagunner\c-"
States
{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
        ZSP2 A 10 A_Look
        Loop
	See:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	    ZSP2 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Strafing")
		ZSP2 AABB 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		ZSP2 CCDD 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		Loop
	Strafing:
		ZSP2 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZSP2 AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP2 C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZSP2 CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
	Missile:
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(45,"FragGrenade")
        ZSP2 EE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP2 E 1 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP2 F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("FasterZombiePlasmaBall",32,0,random(-3,3))
        ZSP2 E 1 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP2 F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("FasterZombiePlasmaBall",32,0,random(-3,3))
		TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(16,"See")
        TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
        Goto Missile+3
	FragGrenade:
        ZSP2 E 1 A_JumpIfCloser(1000,1)
		Goto Missile
		ZSP2 E 0 A_JumpIfCloser(280,"Missile")
        ZSP2 E 6 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP2 EEE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP2 E 6 A_CustomMissile("ZGrenade",32,0,0,2,10)
		ZSP2 E 1
		Goto See
	Pain:
		ZSP2 G 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP2 G 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
        Goto See
	Death:
        ZSP2 H 4
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        ZSP2 I 4 A_Scream
        ZSP2 J 4 A_Fall
        ZSP2 KLM 3
		ZSP2 N -1
        Stop
		}
}

	See:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	    ZPS1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Strafing")
		ZPS1 AABB 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		ZPS1 CCDD 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		Loop
	Strafing:
		ZPS1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZPS1 AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS1 C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZPS1 CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
	Missile:
	    ZPS1 E 0 A_Jump(45,"FragGrenade")
		ZPS1 EEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",Random(28,34),0,Random(6,-6),0)
		ZPS1 F 5 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,4,Random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
		ZPS1 EE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS1 E 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/12gsgcock")
		ZPS1 EE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", -8, 0, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
		ZPS1 EE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",Random(28,34),0,Random(6,-6),0)
		ZPS1 F 5 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,4,Random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
		ZPS1 EE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS1 E 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/12gsgcock")
		ZPS1 EE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", -8, 0, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
		ZPS1 EE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
	FragGrenade:
        ZPS1 E 1 A_JumpIfCloser(1000,1)
		Goto Missile
		ZPS1 E 0 A_JumpIfCloser(280,"Missile")
        ZPS1 E 6 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZPS1 EEE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZPS1 E 6 A_CustomMissile("ZGrenade",32,0,0,2,10)
		ZPS1 E 1
		Goto See
	Pain:
	    ZPS1 G 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZPS1 G 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
        Goto See
	Death:
        ZPS1 H 3
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        ZPS1 I 3 A_Scream
        ZPS1 J 3 A_Fall
        ZPS1 KLMOP 2
		ZPS1 Q -1
        Stop
		}
}

Actor ZombieSpecops4 : ZombieSpecops
{
AttackSound ""
Tag "\c[m3]Specops\c[g8] Double Shotgunner\c-"
States
{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
        ZSP4 A 10 A_Look
        Loop
	See:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	    ZSP4 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Strafing")
		ZSP4 AABB 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		ZSP4 CCDD 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		Loop
	Strafing:
		ZSP4 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZSP4 AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP4 C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZSP4 CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
	Missile:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(45,"FragGrenade")
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(275,"Double")
	Normal:
		ZSP4 EE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP4 E 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/ssgsingleshot")
		TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",Random(28,34),0,Random(6,-6),0)
		ZSP4 F 4 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,3,Random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
		ZSP4 EE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP4 E 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/ssgsingleshot")
		TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",Random(28,34),0,Random(6,-6),0)
		ZSP4 F 4 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,3,Random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
		ZSP4 EE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto Reload
	Double:
		ZSP4 EEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP4 E 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/sshotf")
		TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",Random(28,34),0,Random(6,-6),0)
		ZSP4 F 5 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(13.8,9.6,10,Random(1,4)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
		ZSP4 EEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto Reload
	Reload:
		ZSP4 E 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP4 E 6 A_PlaySound("weapons/sawedopen")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", -8, 6, 36, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
		ZSP4 E 1 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", -10, 6, 36, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
		ZSP4 E 6 A_PlaySound("weapons/shellslide")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP4 E 6 A_PlaySound("weapons/sawedclose")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(40,"See")
		ZSP4 E 6 A_CPosRefire
		Goto Missile
	FragGrenade:
        ZSP4 E 1 A_JumpIfCloser(1000,1)
		Goto Missile
		ZSP4 E 0 A_JumpIfCloser(280,"Missile")
        ZSP4 E 6 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP4 EEE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP4 E 6 A_CustomMissile("ZGrenade",32,0,0,2,10)
		ZSP4 E 1
		Goto See
	Pain:
	    ZSP4 G 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP4 G 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
        Goto See
	Death:
        ZSP4 H 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        ZSP4 I 5 A_Scream
        ZSP4 J 5 A_Fall
        ZSP4 K 5
		ZSP4 L -1
        Stop
		}
}

Actor ZombieSpecops5 : ZombieSpecops
{
	AttackSound "asg/fire"
	Tag "\c[m3]Specops\c[g8] Assault Shotgunner\c-"
	States
	{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		ZSP5 A 10 A_Look
		Loop
	See:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		ZSP5 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Strafing")
        ZSP5 AABB 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
        ZSP5 CCDD 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
        Loop
	Strafing:
		ZSP5 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZSP5 AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP5 C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZSP5 CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
     Missile:
	    ZSP5 E 0 A_Jump(45,"FragGrenade")
        ZSP5 EE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", -8, 7, 30, 4, 0, (0.1)*Random(30, 40), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",Random(28,34),0,Random(6,-6),0)
        ZSP5 F 4 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,5,Random(1,4)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(40,"Pause")
	    TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
        ZSP5 EE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        Goto Missile+3
	Pause:
        ZSP5 EEEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	    Goto See
	 FragGrenade:
        ZSP5 E 1 A_JumpIfCloser(1000,1)
		Goto Missile
		ZSP5 E 0 A_JumpIfCloser(280,"Missile")
        ZSP5 E 6 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP5 EEE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP5 E 6 A_CustomMissile("ZGrenade",32,0,0,2,10)
		ZSP5 E 1
		Goto See
	Pain:
		ZSP5 G 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP5 G 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
		Goto See
	Death:
        ZSP5 H 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        ZSP5 I 5 A_Scream
        ZSP5 J 5 A_Fall
        ZSP5 KLM 5
		ZSP5 N -1
        Stop
	}
}

Actor ZombieSpecops6 : ZombieSpecops
{
	AttackSound "weapons/arifle"
	Tag "\c[m3]Specops\c[g8] Assault Rifleman\c-"
	States
	{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		ZSP6 A 10 A_Look
		Loop
	See:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	    ZSP6 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Strafing")
        ZSP6 AABB 3 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
        ZSP6 CCDD 3 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
        Loop
	Strafing:
		ZSP6 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZSP6 AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP6 C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZSP6 CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
    Missile:
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(45,"FragGrenade")
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(750,"Close")
    Far:
        ZSP6 EE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
        ZSP6 F 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(15.4,0,1,5,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZSP6 E 2 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
        ZSP6 F 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(15.4,0,1,5,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZSP6 E 2 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
        ZSP6 F 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(15.4,0,1,5,"HellBulletPuff")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(16,"See")
        TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
        ZSP6 EE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        Goto Far+2
     Close:
        ZSP6 EE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
        ZSP6 F 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(16,"See")
        TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
        ZSP6 E 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto Close+2
	 FragGrenade:
        ZSP6 E 1 A_JumpIfCloser(1000,1)
		Goto Missile
		ZSP6 E 0 A_JumpIfCloser(280,"Missile")
        ZSP6 E 6 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP6 EEE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP6 E 6 A_CustomMissile("ZGrenade",32,0,0,2,10)
		ZSP6 E 1
		Goto See
	 Pain:
		ZSP6 G 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP6 G 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
		Goto See
	Death:
        ZSP6 H 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        ZSP6 I 5 A_Scream
        ZSP6 J 5 A_Fall
        ZSP6 KLM 5
		ZSP6 N -1
        Stop
	}
