{
	AttackSound "weapons/minigunfire"
	Tag "\c[m3]Specops\c[g8] Minigunner\c-"
	States
	{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		ZSP7 A 10 A_Look
		Loop
	See:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Strafing")
        ZSP7 AABB 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
        ZSP7 CCDD 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		Loop
	Strafing:
		ZSP7 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZSP7 AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP7 C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZSP7 CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
    Missile:
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(45,"FragGrenade")
        TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/mgunspinstart")
        ZSP7 EE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/mgunspin","Voice")
	    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(30,34),0,Random(5,-5),0)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 12, 6, 28, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
        ZSP7 E 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(30,34),0,Random(5,-5),0)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
        ZSP7 F 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
		TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(4,"See")
        TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
        Goto Missile+4
	 FragGrenade:
        ZSP7 E 1 A_JumpIfCloser(1000,1)
		Goto Missile
		ZSP7 E 0 A_JumpIfCloser(280,"Missile")
        ZSP7 E 6 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP7 EEE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP7 E 6 A_CustomMissile("ZGrenade",32,0,0,2,10)
		ZSP7 E 1
		Goto See
	Pain:
		ZSP7 G 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP7 G 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
		Goto See
	Death:
        ZSP7 H 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        ZSP7 I 5 A_Scream
        ZSP7 J 5 A_Fall
        ZSP7 KLM 5
		ZSP7 N -1
        Stop
	}

Actor ZombieSpecops8 : ZombieSpecops
{
AttackSound ""
Tag "\c[m3]Specops\c[g8] Quad Shotgunner\c-"
States
{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
        ZPS6 A 10 A_Look
        Loop
	See:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	    ZPS6 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Strafing")
		ZPS6 AABB 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		ZPS6 CCDD 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		Loop
	Strafing:
		ZSP4 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZPS6 AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS6 C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZPS6 CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
	Missile:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(45,"FragGrenade")
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(325,"Quad")
	Normal:
		ZPS6 EEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/qsgdoublefire")
		TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",Random(28,34),0,Random(6,-6),0)
		ZPS6 F 5 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(13.8,9.6,10,Random(1,4)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
		ZPS6 EE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/qsgdoublefire")
		TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",Random(28,34),0,Random(6,-6),0)
		ZPS6 F 5 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(13.8,9.6,10,Random(1,4)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
		ZPS6 EEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto Reload
	Quad:
		ZPS6 EEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/qsgfire")
		TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",Random(28,34),0,Random(6,-6),0)
		ZPS6 F 5 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(15.4,10.6,24,Random(1,4)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
		ZPS6 EEEEE 5 A_GiveInventory("AIStrafing",1)
		Goto Reload
	Reload:
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/qsgopen")
		ZPS6 EEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", -8, 6, 36, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
		ZPS6 E 1 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", -10, 6, 36, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", -8, 6, 38, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
		ZPS6 E 2 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", -10, 6, 38, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
		ZPS6 E 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/qsgshellslide")
		ZPS6 EE 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS6 EE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS6 E 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/qsgshellslide")
		ZPS6 EE 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS6 EE 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS6 EE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS6 E 5 A_PlaySound("weapons/qsgclose")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(40,"See")
		ZPS6 E 5 A_CPosRefire
		Goto Missile
	FragGrenade:
        ZPS6 E 1 A_JumpIfCloser(1000,1)
		Goto Missile
		ZPS6 E 0 A_JumpIfCloser(280,"Missile")
        ZPS6 E 6 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZPS6 EEE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZPS6 E 6 A_CustomMissile("ZGrenade",32,0,0,2,10)
		ZPS6 E 1
		Goto See
	Pain:
	    ZPS6 G 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZPS6 G 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
        Goto See
	Death:
        ZPS6 H 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        ZPS6 I 5 A_Scream
        ZPS6 J 5 A_Fall
        ZPS6 K 5
		ZPS6 L -1
        Stop
		}
}

Actor ZombieSpecops9 : ZombieSpecops
{
AttackSound ""
Tag "\c[m3]Specops\c[g8] Rocket Launcher\c-"
States
{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
        ZSP8 A 10 A_Look
        Loop
	See:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	    ZSP8 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Strafing")
		ZSP8 AABB 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		ZSP8 CCDD 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		Loop
	Strafing:
		ZSP8 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZSP8 AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSP8 C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZSP8 CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
	Missile:
        ZSP8 EEE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP8 F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",30,0,random(-2,2))
		ZSP8 F 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	    ZSP8 E 0 A_PlaySound("rocket/drumspin")
		ZSP8 EEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"See")
        TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
        Goto Missile+4
	Pain:
		ZSP8 G 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP8 G 3 A_Pain	
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
        Goto See
	Death:
        ZSP8 H 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        ZSP8 I 5 A_Scream
        ZSP8 J 5 A_Fall
        ZSP8 K 5
		ZSP8 L -1
        Stop
		}
}

{

	States
	{
	Spawn:

        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)

		Loop

	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)

        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)

	 FragGrenade:

		Goto See

        ZPS2 I 5 A_Scream
        ZPS2 J 5 A_Fall
        ZPS2 KLM 5

Actor ZombieSpecops12 : ZombieSpecops
{
	Health 550
	RadiusDamageFactor 0.6
	PainChance 30
	SeeSound "SpecOps/See"
	PainSound "SpecOps/Pain"
	DeathSound "SpecOps/Death"
	ActiveSound " SpecOps/Idle"
	AttackSound ""
	Obituary "%o was disintegrated by a zombie specops commando."
	Tag "\c[m3]Specops\c[l2] BFG9500\c[g8] Commando\c-"
	States
	{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		ZPS3 A 10 A_Look
		Loop
	 See:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Strafing")
        ZPS3 AABB 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
        ZPS3 CCDD 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		Loop
	Strafing:
		ZPS3 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZPS3 AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS3 C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZPS3 CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
	Missile:
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfgf")
		ZPS3 EEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS3 FF 5 Bright A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS3 F 10 A_CustomMissile("ZBFG9500Ball",32,0,0)
		ZPS3 FF 5 Bright A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS3 EEEEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
	Pain:
		ZPS3 G 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS3 G 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
		Goto See
	Death:
        ZPS3 H 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
        ZPS3 I 5 A_Scream
        ZPS3 J 5 A_Fall
        ZPS3 KL 5
		ZPS3 M -1
        Stop
	XDeath:
		ASGZ A 0 A_PlaySound("gibbage/xsplat")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
		ASGZ O 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
		ASGZ P 3 A_XScream
		ASGZ Q 3 A_Fall
		ASGZ RSTUV 3
		ASGZ W -1
        Stop
	}
}

{

{
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenHugeExplosionShockWave",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenLightningSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenDiggerExplosionFlare",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenHugeExplosionParticle",random(32,-32),random(32,-32),random(32,-32),random(8,-8),random(8,-8),random(8,-8),0,128)
    TNT1 AAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenDiggerExplosionKaboom",0,0,0,frandom(-4,4),frandom(-4,4),frandom(-4,4))  
	BFE3 AB 8 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(NODAMAGETHRUST,TRUE)
	TNT1 A 0 A_RadiusGive("ZBFGBallEffect",404,RGF_MONSTERS|RGF_PLAYERS,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(256,384,0)
    BFE3 CDEF 8 Bright
    Stop 
}
}

Actor UpdatedDemonDevastatorTrail : DevastatorTrail
{
Scale 2.0
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetScale(ScaleX-0.08,ScaleY-0.08)
    RDCR A 4 Bright A_FadeOut(0.1)
    Loop
}
}

Actor ZombieSpecops13 : ZombieSpecops12
{
	Obituary "%o was exploded by a zombie specops captain."
	Tag "\c[m3]Specops\c[l2] BFG10000\c[g8] Captain\c-"
	States
	{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		ZPS4 A 10 A_Look
		Loop
	 See:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Strafing")
        ZPS4 AABB 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
        ZPS4 CCDD 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		Loop
	Strafing:
		ZPS4 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZPS4 AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS4 C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZPS4 CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
    Missile:
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/charge15k")
		ZPS4 EEEEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS4 F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",30,0,0,Random(-4,4))
		ZPS4 EE 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS4 F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",30,0,0,Random(-4,4))
		ZPS4 EE 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS4 F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",30,0,0,Random(-4,4))
		ZPS4 EE 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS4 F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",30,0,0,Random(-4,4))
		ZPS4 EE 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS4 F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",30,0,0,Random(-4,4))
		ZPS4 EE 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS4 F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",30,0,0,Random(-4,4))
		ZPS4 EE 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS4 F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",30,0,0,Random(-4,4))
		ZPS4 EE 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS4 F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",30,0,0,Random(-4,4))
		ZPS4 EE 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown")
		ZPS4 EEEEEEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
	Pain:
		ZPS4 G 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS4 G 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
		Goto See
	Death:
        ZPS4 H 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
        ZPS4 I 5 A_Scream
        ZPS4 J 5 A_Fall
        ZPS4 K 5
		ZPS4 L -1
        Stop
	XDeath:
		ZPS4 A 0 A_PlaySound("gibbage/xsplat")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
		ZPS4 O 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
		ZPS4 P 3 A_XScream
		ZPS4 Q 3 A_Fall
		ZPS4 RSTUV 3
		ZPS4 W -1
        Stop
	}
}

Actor ZombieSpecops14 : ZombieSpecops12
{
	Obituary "%o was thoroughly rekt by a zombie specops commando."
	Tag "\c[m3]Specops\c[t1] DTBFG10K\c[g8] Commando\c-"
	States
	{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		PYRZ A 10 A_Look
		Loop
	 See:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Strafing")
        PYRZ AABB 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
        PYRZ CCDD 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		Loop
	Strafing:
		PYRZ A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		PYRZ AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		PYRZ C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        PYRZ CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
	Missile:
		PYRZ EEEEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Cardinal/9k")
		PYRZ EEEEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		PYRZ FF 5 Bright A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		PYRZ F 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonDTBFG10KBall",32,0,0)
		PYRZ FF 5 Bright A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		PYRZ EEEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
	Pain:
		PYRZ G 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		PYRZ G 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
		Goto See
    Death:
		PYRZ H 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
		PYRZ I 5 A_Scream
		PYRZ J 5 A_NoBlocking
		PYRZ KLM 5
		PYRZ N -1
		Stop
	}
}

        ZPS5 I 5 A_Scream
        ZPS5 J 5 A_Fall
        ZPS5 KL 5
		ZPS5 M -1
        Stop
	}

Actor ZombieSpecops16 : ZombieSpecops
{
	AttackSound ""
	Tag "\c[m3]Specops\c[g8] Explosive Minigunner\c-"
	States
	{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		ZPS7 A 10 A_Look
		Loop
	See:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Strafing")
        ZPS7 AABB 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
        ZPS7 CCDD 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		Loop
	Strafing:
		ZPS7 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZPS7 AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS7 C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZPS7 CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
	Missile:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(45,"FragGrenade")
        TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/expmgunspinstart")
        ZPS7 EEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/expmgunspin","Voice")
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
	    ZPS7 E 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",Random(30,34),0,Random(5,-5),0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 12, 6, 28, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
	    ZPS7 F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",Random(30,34),0,Random(5,-5),0)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
		TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Weapon")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(4,"See")
        TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
        Goto Missile+5
	 FragGrenade:
        ZPS7 E 1 A_JumpIfCloser(1000,1)
		Goto Missile
		ZPS7 E 0 A_JumpIfCloser(280,"Missile")
        ZPS7 E 6 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZPS7 EEE 4 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZPS7 E 6 A_CustomMissile("ZGrenade",32,0,0,2,10)
		ZPS7 E 1
		Goto See
	Pain:
		ZPS7 G 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZPS7 G 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
		Goto See
	Death:
        ZPS7 H 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        ZPS7 I 5 A_Scream
        ZPS7 J 5 A_Fall
        ZPS7 KLM 5
		ZPS7 N -1
        Stop
	}
}

{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)

	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)

		ZSP0 AABB 2 A_Chase

        ZSP0 CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)

        ZSP0 G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",48,0,random(-2,2))
		ZSP0 G 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
	    ZSP0 E 0 A_PlaySound("rocket/drumspin")
		ZSP0 EEEEEEEEE 5 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"See")
        TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
        Goto Missile+4
	Pain:
		ZSP0 G 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        ZSP0 G 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
        Goto See
	Death:
        ZSP0 I 5 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        ZSP0 J 5 A_Scream
        ZSP0 K 5 A_Fall
        ZSP0 L 5
		ZSP0 M -1
        Stop
		}
}

Actor PGMZombie : ZombieSpecops
{
	Health 500
	AttackSound "sniper/fire"
	Obituary "%o get 360 quickscoped flashscoped by a PGM Zombie, he is now running back home with tears."
	Tag "\c[g8]Pro Gamer Master Zombie\c-"
	+NOPAIN
	States
	{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		ZSN2 A 10 A_Look
		Loop
	See:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Strafing")
        ZSN2 AABB 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
        ZSN2 CCDD 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		Loop
	Strafing:
		ZSN2 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZSN2 AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSN2 C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZSN2 CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		Goto See
    Missile:
		ZSN2 E 0 A_GiveInventory("SniperStrafing",1)
		ZSN2 E 2 A_SetAngle(angle + 45)
		ZSN2 E 0 A_GiveInventory("SniperStrafing",1)
		ZSN2 E 2 A_SetAngle(angle + 45)
		ZSN2 E 0 A_GiveInventory("SniperStrafing",1)
		ZSN2 E 2 A_SetAngle(angle + 45)
		ZSN2 E 0 A_GiveInventory("SniperStrafing",1)
		ZSN2 E 2 A_SetAngle(angle + 45)
		ZSN2 E 0 A_GiveInventory("SniperStrafing",1)
		ZSN2 E 2 A_SetAngle(angle + 45)
		ZSN2 E 0 A_GiveInventory("SniperStrafing",1)
		ZSN2 E 2 A_SetAngle(angle + 45)
		ZSN2 E 0 A_GiveInventory("SniperStrafing",1)
		ZSN2 E 2 A_SetAngle(angle + 45)
		ZSN2 E 0 A_GiveInventory("SniperStrafing",1)
		ZSN2 E 2 A_SetAngle(angle + 45)
	    ZSN2 F 0 A_CustomBulletAttack(1,1,1,28,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZSN2 FF 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
		ZSN2 E 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
		ZSN2 E 0 A_PlaySound("sniper/clip")
		ZSN2 EEEE 3 A_GiveInventory("SpecOpsStrafing",1)
        Goto See
	XDeath:
	Death:
        ZSN2 H 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
        ZSN2 I 5 A_Scream
        ZSN2 J 5 A_Fall
        ZSN2 KLM 3
		ZSN2 N -1
        Stop
	}
}

Actor SniperStrafing : SpecOpsStrafing
{
  States
  {
  Pickup:
    NULL A 1
	NULL A 1 A_Jump(188,2)
	NULL A 1 A_GiveInventory("AIJumping",1)
	NULL A 1 A_JumpIf(velx != 0 || vely != 0,2)
	NULL A 1 A_Jump(256,2)
	NULL A 1 A_Jump(235,5)
	NULL A 1 A_JumpIfInventory("StrafeSens",1,3)
	NULL A 1 A_GiveInventory("StrafeSens",1)
	NULL A 1 A_Jump(256,2)
	NULL A 1 A_TakeInventory("StrafeSens",1)
	NULL A 1 A_JumpIfInventory("StrafeSens",1,3)
	NULL A 1 ThrustThing(angle*256/360+38.7,3,0,0)
	NULL A 1 A_Jump(256,2)
	NULL A 1 ThrustThing(angle*256/360+38.7,-3,0,0)
    NULL A 1 //A_FaceTarget
	NULL A 1 A_Jump(24,2)
	NULL A 1 A_JumpIfCloser(300,2)
	NULL A 1 A_Recoil(-1.5)
    Stop
	NULL A 1 A_Recoil(1.5)
    Stop
  }
}

Actor SniperZombie
{
Health 150
Radius 20
Height 56
Speed 6
Mass 100
PainChance 130
MONSTER
+FLOORCLIP
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
SeeSound "superzombie/sight"
PainSound "superzombie/pain"
DeathSound "superzombie/death"
ActiveSound "superzombie/active"
AttackSound "sniper/fire"
Obituary "A sniper zombie put a bullet through %o's head."
Tag "\cu Sniper Zombieman\c-"
Decal BulletChip
States
{
	Spawn:
        ZSNP A 10 A_Look
        Loop
	 See:
	    ZSNP A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(100,"TooClose")
		ZSNP AABB 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		ZSNP CCDD 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		Loop
     TooClose:
	  	ZSNP A 1 A_Jump(188,"See")
	    ZSNP A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZSNP A 2 A_FaceTarget
		ZSNP A 2 A_Recoil(2)
		ZSNP B 2 A_FaceTarget
		ZSNP B 2 A_Recoil(2)
		ZSNP C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		ZSNP C 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZSNP C 2 A_FaceTarget
		ZSNP C 2 A_Recoil(2)
		ZSNP D 2 A_FaceTarget
		ZSNP D 2 A_Recoil(2)
		ZSNP A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
	    ZSNP A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
        ZSNP A 2 A_FaceTarget
		ZSNP A 2 A_Recoil(2)
		ZSNP B 2 A_FaceTarget
		ZSNP B 2 A_Recoil(2)
		ZSNP C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		ZSNP C 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
		ZSNP C 2 A_FaceTarget
		ZSNP C 2 A_Recoil(2)
		ZSNP D 2 A_FaceTarget
		ZSNP D 1 A_Recoil(2)
		ZSNP D 1 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
		Goto See
	Missile:
        ZSNP EEE 4 A_FaceTarget
	    ZSNP F 6 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(1,1,1,20,"HellBulletPuff")
        ZSNP EEEE 3 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
		ZSNP E 10 A_PlaySound("sniper/clip")
		ZSNP EEEE 3 A_FaceTarget
		Goto See
	Pain:
        ZSNP G 6 A_Pain
        Goto See
	Death:
        ZSNP H 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        ZSNP I 5 A_Scream
        ZSNP J 5 A_Fall
        ZSNP K 5
		ZSNP L -1
        Stop
	XDeath:
		ZSNP A 0 A_PlaySound("gibbage/xsplat")
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
		ZSNP O 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
		ZSNP P 3 A_XScream
		ZSNP Q 3 A_Fall
		ASGZ RSTUV 3
		ASGZ W -1
        Stop
      Raise:
	    TNT1 A 0
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
        ZSNP LKJIH 5
        Goto See
		}
}

Actor PhasePoe
{
Health 2100
Radius 30
Height 56
Mass 800
Speed 8
PainChance 24
Monster
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+FASTMELEE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.5
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
BloodColor "cf 00 b0"
SeeSound "Poe/sight"
PainSound "Poe/pain"
DeathSound "Poe/death"
ActiveSound "Poe/active"
MeleeSound "imp/melee"
MeleeDamage 8
Obituary "%o thought that he had a chance against the Phase Poe."
HitObituary "%o's soul was consumed by the Phase Poe."
var int user_heal;
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Poe\c-"
States
{
    Spawn:
        POE1 A 10 A_look
        Loop
	See:
		POE1 A 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(38,"Rush")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(14,"Evade","Teleport")
		Loop
	Rush:
		POE1 AA 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(6,"See")
		POE1 A 2 A_SpawnItemEx("PoeGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
		Loop
	Evade:
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,7)
		TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,14,0,0)
		POE1 AAAA 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
		Goto See
		TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)
		POE1 AAAA 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
		Goto See
   Teleport:
        POE1 A 1 A_UnSetShootable
	    POE1 AAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PoeLineSpawner")
	    POE1 AAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_FadeOut(0.1,0)
	    POE1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
		POE1 A 8
	    POE1 AAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PoeLineSpawner")
		POE1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FakePoe",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS,85)
		POE1 A 8
	    POE1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
        POE1 A 1 A_PlayWeaponSound("boss/teleport")
	    POE1 AAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PoeLineSpawner")
	    POE1 AAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_FadeIn(0.1)
        POE1 A 1 A_SetShootable
        Goto See
	Missile:
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(16,"BestAttack")
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(25,"Rage","Healing")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(196,"Comet","Poel","Lazer","Baby")
	Normal:
        POE1 EF 5 A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",24,0,0,0,0)
        POE1 G 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",24,0,3,0,0)
        POE1 G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",24,0,3,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Comet")
		Goto See
	Comet:
        POE1 EF 5 A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("PArchonComet",24,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Poel")
		Goto See
	Poel:
        POE1 EF 5 A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("PoeLazer",24,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Lazer")
		Goto See
	Lazer:
        POE1 EF 5 A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0)
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0)
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0)
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0)
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0)
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0)
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0)
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0)
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0)
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0)
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0)
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0)
        POE1 G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Baby")
		Goto See
	Baby:
        POE1 EF 5 A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 5 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BabyCaco",62,0,14,0,0,0,0,SXF_SETMASTER)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(25,"Rage")
		Goto See
	Rage:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	    POE1 EF 2 A_FaceTarget
		POE1 G 2 Bright A_PlaySound("Poe/sight")
		POE1 G 0 A_DamageChildren(5,"Poe")
		POE1 G 0 HealThing(50)
	    POE1 GGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("PoeLineSpawner",0,0,0,0)
		POE1 GGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("PoeLineSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	    POE1 G 2
	    Goto See
   BestAttack:
   	    TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	    POE1 EF 2 A_FaceTarget
		POE1 G 2 Bright A_PlaySound("Poe/sight")
		POE1 GGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("PoeSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
        POE1 A 1 A_UnSetShootable
	    POE1 AAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PoeLineSpawner")
	    POE1 AAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_FadeOut(0.1,0)
		POE1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 10 A_GiveToTarget("PoeTrap",1)
		POE1 A 70
        POE1 A 1 A_PlayWeaponSound("boss/teleport")
	    POE1 AAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PoeLineSpawner")
	    POE1 AAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_FadeIn(0.1)
        POE1 A 1 A_SetShootable
        Goto See
	Healing:
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_heal > 3,"Normal")
		TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_heal",user_heal+1)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	    POE1 EF 2 A_FaceTarget
		POE1 G 2 Bright A_PlaySound("Poe/sight")
		POE1 G 0 A_RaiseChildren
		POE1 G 0 HealThing(300)
	    POE1 GGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("PoeSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
		POE1 GGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("PoeSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	    POE1 G 2 A_Jump(110,"Rage")
	    Goto See
	Melee:
		POE1 EF 4 A_FaceTarget
		POE1 G 4 A_MeleeAttack
		Goto See
	Pain:
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(25,"Rage","Healing","Teleport")
		POE1 H 3
		POE1 H 3 A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Missile")
		Goto See
	Death:
		POE1 J 3 A_NoBlocking
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
		POE1 K 3 A_Scream
		POE1 LMNOPQR 3
		POE1 S -1
		Stop
	}
}

Actor FakePoe
{
Health 10
Radius 30
Height 56
Mass 800
Speed 8
PainChance 24
Monster
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+FASTMELEE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+NORADIUSDMG
-COUNTKILL
-SOLID
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.5
BloodColor "cf 00 b0"
SeeSound "boss/teleport"
PainSound "Poe/pain"
DeathSound "Poe/death"
ActiveSound "Poe/active"
MeleeSound "imp/melee"
MeleeDamage 0
Obituary "%o died."
var int user_delay;
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Poe\c-"
States
{
    Spawn:
        POE1 A 10 A_look
        Loop
	See:
		TNT1 A 0 
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_delay > 240,"Over")
		TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_delay",user_delay+1)
		POE1 A 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(14,"Evade")
		Loop
	Evade:
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,7)
		TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,14,0,0)
		POE1 AAAA 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
		Goto See
		TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)
		POE1 AAAA 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
		Goto See
	Over:
		TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
		POE1 A 1 A_Die
		Goto See
	Missile:
        POE1 EF 5 A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",24,0,0,0,0)
        POE1 G 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",24,0,3,0,0)
        POE1 G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",24,0,3,0,0)
		Goto See
	Melee:
		POE1 EF 4 A_FaceTarget
		POE1 G 4 A_MeleeAttack
		Goto See
	Pain:
		POE1 H 3
		POE1 H 3 A_Pain
		Goto See
	Death:
		POE1 EF 5 A_FaceTarget
        POE1 G 4 A_ScreamAndUnblock
		POE1 GGGGGGGGGG 4 A_FadeOut(0.1)
		POE1 G 1
		Stop
	}
}

	POE1 AAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PoeLineSpawner")

	Stop
	}

Actor PoeGhostA : ClientSideEffect
{
RENDERSTYLE Translucent
Alpha 0.75
+NOGRAVITY
+CLIENTSIDEONLY
+DONTSPLASH
+NOINTERACTION
+NOCLIP
States
{
Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
    POE1 A 2 A_FadeOut(0.18)
    Loop
    }
}

Actor PoeGhostG: PoeGhostA
{
States
{
Spawn:
    POE1 G 2 A_FadeOut(0.18)
    Loop
    }
}

Actor PoeLineSpawner : BluePowerLineSpawner
{
States
{
Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurplePowerLine",random(32,-32),random(24,-24),random(0,24),0,0,random(2,6),0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItemEx("PurplePowerLine",random(32,-32),random(24,-24),random(0,24),0,0,random(2,6),0,128,0)
    Stop
    }
}

Actor PoeSmokeSpawner : RedParticleSpawner
{
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PHellionSmoke",random(32,-32),random(24,-24),random(0,24),0,0,random(1,5),0,128,0)
    TNT1 A 1
    Stop
  }
}

Actor NewSpiderMastermind : SpiderMastermind
{
  Health 6000
  Speed 12
  PainChance 5
  Radius 65
  Mass 2500
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.75
  DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.5
  DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.5
  DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.5
  DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
  DamageFactor 0.75
  RadiusDamageFactor 0.5
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +MISSILEEVENMORE
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  +NOFEAR
  AttackSound ""
  PainSound "monsters/darkmasterpain"
  Obituary "%o stood in awe of the Spider Mastermind."
  var int user_script;
  Tag "\c[m8]Spider Mastermind\c-"
  Decal BulletChip
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    SPID AB 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    SPID A 2 A_Metal
    SPID ABB 2 A_Chase
    SPID C 2 A_Metal
    SPID CDD 2 A_Chase
    SPID E 2 A_Metal
    SPID EFF 2 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/darkmasterwind")
	SPID AAA 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", 10, 12, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("RapidShotgun/Fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer3",Random(24,34),0,Random(4,-4),0)
	SPID G 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(12.5,0,5,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", 10, -12, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("RapidShotgun/Fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer3",Random(24,34),0,Random(4,-4),0)
	SPID H 4 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(12.5,0,5,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(3,"See")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
	Goto Missile+4
  Pain:
    SPID I 3
    SPID I 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(196,"Missile")
    Goto See
 Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
	SPID I 20 A_Fall
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	SPID JJJJJ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	SPID KKKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	SPID LLLLL 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	SPID MMMMM 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect",random(-64,64),random(-64,64),random(-16,16))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	SPID NNNNN 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	SPID OOOOO 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect",random(-64,64),random(-64,64),random(-16,16))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	SPID PPPPP 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	SPID QR 5
	SPID S -1
	Stop
  }
}

Actor Arachnophyte : NewSpiderMastermind
{
FloatSpeed 12
Scale 1.1
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+NOFEAR
-FLOORCLIP
Obituary "%o was perforated by the Arachnophyte."
Tag "\c[m8]Arachnophyte\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 2 Bright A_Look
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	APIT B 2 Bright A_Look
	Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	APIT B 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(26,"Evade")
	Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,19)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,20,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT B 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT B 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT B 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT B 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,20,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT B 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT B 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT B 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner2",0,0,0,0)
	APIT B 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/darkmasterwind")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", 10, 12, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("RapidShotgun/Fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer3",Random(24,34),0,Random(4,-4),0)
	APIT C 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(12.5,0,5,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", 10, -12, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("RapidShotgun/Fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer3",Random(24,34),0,Random(4,-4),0)
	APIT D 4 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(12.5,0,5,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(3,"See")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
	Goto Missile+7
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 3 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	APIT A 3 Bright A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(196,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
	APIT E 20 A_Fall
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	APIT FFFFF 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    APIT GGGGG 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect",random(-64,64),random(-64,64),random(-16,16))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    APIT HHHHH 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    APIT IIIII 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect",random(-64,64),random(-64,64),random(-16,16))
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	APIT J 5
	TNT1 A -1
	Stop
}
}

Actor DemolisherMkII : Arachnophyte
{
Health 7500
AttackSound ""
PainSound "monsters/darkmasterpain"
SeeSound "monsters/darkmastermindsee"
DeathSound "monsters/darkmasterminddie"
Obituary "The Demolisher Mk II exploded %o."
Tag "\ccDemolisher MKII\c-"
+NOICEDEATH
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CerebralSentientFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	DMK2 AB 2 Bright A_Look
	Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	DMK2 AB 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(26,"Evade")
	Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Evade2")
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,20,0,0)
	DMK2 ABABAB 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Evade2:
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,20,0,0)
	DMK2 ABABAB 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"BFG9K","BFG10K")
  Normal:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(1500,1)
	Goto BFG9K
	DMK2 AAA 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", 10, 12, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("RapidShotgun/Fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer3",Random(24,34),0,Random(10,-10),0)
	DMK2 C 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5, 0, 3, random(1,5)*3, "HellBulletPuff", 0, CBAF_NORANDOM)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", 10, -12, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("RapidShotgun/Fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer3",Random(24,34),0,Random(10,-10),0)
	DMK2 D 4 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5, 0, 3, random(1,5)*3, "HellBulletPuff", 0, CBAF_NORANDOM)
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(3,"See","BFG9K","BFG10K")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
	Goto Normal+4
  BFG9K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfgf")
	DMK2 KKKKKKKKKKKKLLLL 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	DMK2 L 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZBFG9500Ball",34,0,0)
	DMK2 KKK 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	DMK2 KKKKKKKKKKKKLLLL 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	DMK2 L 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZBFG9500Ball",34,0,0)
	DMK2 KKKKKKK 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"BFG10K")
	Goto See
  BFG10K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
	DMK2 KKKKKKKK 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	DMK2 L 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",42,0,random(4,-4))
	DMK2 K 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	DMK2 L 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",42,0,random(4,-4))
	DMK2 K 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	DMK2 L 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",42,0,random(4,-4))
	DMK2 K 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	DMK2 L 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",42,0,random(4,-4))
	DMK2 K 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	DMK2 L 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",42,0,random(4,-4))
	DMK2 K 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	DMK2 L 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",42,0,random(4,-4))
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
	DMK2 KKKKK 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("SentientFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	Goto See
  Pain:
	DMK2 A 3 Bright
	DMK2 A 3 Bright A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(196,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
	DMK2 E 20 Bright A_Fall
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
 	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	DMK2 FFFFF 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    DMK2 GGGGG 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect",random(-64,64),random(-64,64),random(-16,16))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    DMK2 HHHHH 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    DMK2 IIIII 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect",random(-64,64),random(-64,64),random(-16,16))
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	DMK2 IJ 5
	TNT1 A -1
    Stop
}
}

Actor NewCyberdemon : Cyberdemon
{
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.75
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.5
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.5
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.5
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor 0.75
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+NOFEAR
Health 6000
Obituary "%o was reduced to splashes by the Cyberdemon."
PainChance 5
var int user_script;
Tag "\c[m8]Cyberdemon\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    CYB2 AB 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    CYB2 A 3 A_Hoof
    CYB2 ABBCC 3 A_Chase
    CYB2 D 3 A_Metal
    CYB2 D 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(400,"Grenadier")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"HeavyRocket","Digger")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Seekers")
    CYB2 E 10 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",40,-27,random(-6,6))
    CYB2 E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",40,-27,random(-6,6))
    CYB2 E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",40,-27,random(-6,6))
    CYB2 E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",40,-27,random(-6,6))
    CYB2 E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",40,-27,random(-6,6))
    CYB2 E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",40,-27,random(-6,6))
    CYB2 E 8 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Seekers")
    Goto See
  Seekers:
    CYB2 E 10 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",40,-27,random(-6,6))
    CYB2 E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",40,-27,random(-6,6))
    CYB2 E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",40,-27,random(-6,6))
    CYB2 E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",40,-27,random(-6,6))
    CYB2 E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",40,-27,random(-6,6))
    CYB2 E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",40,-27,random(-6,6))
    CYB2 E 8 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"HeavyRocket","Digger")
    Goto See
  HeavyRocket:
	CYB2 E 0 A_PlaySound("cyber/sight")
    CYB2 EEEEEEEEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",40,-27,0)
    CYB2 E 10 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",40,-27,0)
    CYB2 E 10 A_FaceTarget
    CYB2 F 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",40,-27,0)
    CYB2 E 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Digger")
    Goto See
  Digger:
	CYB2 E 0 A_PlaySound("cyber/sight")
    CYB2 EEEEEEEEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	CYB2 F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("digger/fire")
    CYB2 F 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerDiggerGrenade",40,-27,0)
    CYB2 E 10 A_FaceTarget
	CYB2 F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("digger/fire")
    CYB2 F 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerDiggerGrenade",40,-27,0)
    CYB2 E 10 A_FaceTarget
	CYB2 F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("digger/fire")
    CYB2 F 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerDiggerGrenade",40,-27,0)
    CYB2 E 10 A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
  Grenadier:
    CYB2 E 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
    CYB2 F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonGrenade",40,-27,random(-4,4))
    CYB2 E 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
    CYB2 F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonGrenade",40,-27,random(-4,4))
    CYB2 E 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
	CYB2 F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonGrenade",40,-27,random(-4,4))
    CYB2 E 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
	CYB2 F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonGrenade",40,-27,random(-4,4))
    CYB2 E 8 A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
 Pain:
    CYB2 G 10 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(196,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
    CYB2 G 10 A_Scream
    CYB2 H 10 A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CYB2 IIIII 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CYB2 JJJJJ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CYB2 KKKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CYB2 LLLLL 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CYB2 MMMMM 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", Random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))

ACTOR MinigunCyberdemon : NewCyberdemon
{
Obituary "%o was ripped to ribbons by the Cyberdemon."
Tag "\c[m8]Cyberdemon \c[g8]Minigunner\c-"
Decal BulletChip
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    ZYBR AB 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    ZYBR A 3 A_Hoof
    ZYBR ABBCC 3 A_Chase
    ZYBR D 3 A_Metal
    ZYBR D 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/mgunspinstart")
    ZYBR EEEE 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/mgunspin","Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/minigunfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",60,-24,Random(2,-2),0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",-24,6,60,Random(2,6),0,Random(1,3),Random(-80,-90),128)
    ZYBR F 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(6.4,0,3,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
    ZYBR E 1 A_CposRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(2,"See")
	Goto Missile+5
  Pain:
    ZYBR G 10 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(196,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
    ZYBR G 10 A_Scream
    ZYBR H 10 A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    ZYBR IIIII 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    ZYBR JJJJJ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    ZYBR KKKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    ZYBR LLLLL 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    ZYBR MMMMM 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", Random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    ZYBR N 10
    ZYBR O 8
    ZYBR P -1
    Stop
  }

ACTOR Apprentice : NewCyberdemon
{
Mass 2500
Speed 10
FloatSpeed 8
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+BRIGHT
+NOICEDEATH
-FLOORCLIP
Obituary "%o was defeated by an apprentice."
Tag "\c[w8]Apprentice\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ApprenticeFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	C4RD AB 2 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ApprenticeFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	C4RD AB 2 A_Chase
	Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"HeavyRocket","Seekers","Railgun","BFG10K","EradicationBFG")
  Normal:
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",48,-27,random(-4,4))
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",48,-27,random(-4,4))
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",48,-27,random(-4,4))
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",48,-27,random(-4,4))
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",48,-27,random(-4,4))
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",48,-27,random(-4,4))
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",48,-27,random(-4,4))
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Seekers","HeavyRocket","Railgun","BFG10K")
	Goto See
  Seekers:
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",48,-27,random(-4,4))
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",48,-27,random(-4,4))
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",48,-27,random(-4,4))
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",48,-27,random(-4,4))
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",48,-27,random(-4,4))
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",48,-27,random(-4,4))
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",48,-27,random(-4,4))
	C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"HeavyRocket","Railgun","BFG10K")
	Goto See
  HeavyRocket:
	C4RD C 0 A_PlaySound("cyber/sight")
    C4RD CCCCCCCCCC 5 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 10 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",48,-27,random(-4,4))
    C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 10 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",48,-27,random(-4,4))
    C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 10 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",48,-27,random(-4,4))
    C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 10 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",48,-27,random(-4,4))
    C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 10 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",48,-27,random(-4,4))
    C4RD CCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Railgun","BFG10K")
    Goto See
  Railgun:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/rgcharge")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("ApprenticeFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	C4RD CCCCCCCCCCCCCCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 2 A_CustomMissile("CardinalRail",48,-27,0)
	C4RD DDDD 2 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD CCCCCCC 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"BFG10K")
	Goto See
  BFG10K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
	C4RD CCCCCCC 4 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 3 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",48,-27,random(4,-4))
	C4RD C 4 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 3 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",48,-27,random(4,-4))
	C4RD C 4 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 3 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",48,-27,random(4,-4))
	C4RD C 4 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 3 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",48,-27,random(4,-4))
	C4RD C 4 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 3 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",48,-27,random(4,-4))
	C4RD C 4 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 3 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",48,-27,random(4,-4))
	C4RD C 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
	C4RD CCCCC 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"EradicationBFG")
	Goto See
  EradicationBFG:
	C4RD C 10 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD D 45 A_PlaySound("cyber/sight")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("EradicationBFG/Charge")
    C4RD CCCCCCCCCCCCCCCC 5 A_GiveInventory("AvatarLightningCharge")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DEradicationBFGProjectile",48,-27,0)
    C4RD DCC 5 A_FaceTarget
	C4RD C 20
	Goto See
  Pain:

	C4RD E 6
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:

	C4RD F 10 A_NoBlocking

	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)

	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	C4RD GGGGG 2 A_SpawnItemEx("RedKaboom",random(-32,32),random(-40,40),random(32,96),random(-4,4),random(-4,4),random(0,4))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	C4RD HHHHH 2 A_SpawnItemEx("RedKaboom",random(-32,32),random(-40,40),random(32,96),random(-4,4),random(-4,4),random(0,4))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))

Actor ZombieTank
{
Monster
Speed 6
Mass 99999
Radius 27
Height 72
Health 1100
Decal Bulletchip
SeeSound "ZTank/see"
AttackSound "ZTank/attack"
PainSound "ZTank/pain"
DeathSound "ZTank/death"
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.75
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.5
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.5
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.5
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor 0.75
RadiusDamageFactor 0.5
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+FLOORCLIP
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+NODROPOFF
+NOPAIN
+NOBLOOD
+DONTRIP
Obituary "%o was shot by a zombie in a tank."
Tag "\cqZombie Tank\c-"
Decal BulletChip
States
{
  Spawn:
    ZTNK A 8 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    ZTNK A 0 A_PlaySound("ZTank/Run")
    ZTNK AABBCC 1 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    ZTNK A 1 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", 20, 36, 36, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
    ZTNK D 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(8,5,random(1,3)*2,5,"HellBulletPuff")
    ZTNK A 1 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", 20, -24, 36, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    ZTNK E 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(8,5,random(1,3)*2,5,"HellBulletPuff")
    ZTNK A 0 A_Jump(128,1)
    Goto See
    ZTNK A 1 A_CPosRefire
    Goto Missile
  Death:
    ZTNK G 4
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    ZTNK G 4 Bright A_PlaySound("ZTank/death")
	ZTNK HHHHIIIIJJJJJKKKKLLLLMMMMNNNN 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("NewSmallKaboomEffect",random(-24,24),random(-24,24),random(8,48))
    TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SmallVehicleExplosionEffect")
    ZTNK O -1
    Stop
}
}

    Loop

    ZTNK A 1 A_FaceTarget

    ZTNK E 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(8,5,random(1,3)*2,5,"HellBulletPuff")
    ZTNK A 0 A_Jump(128,1)
    Goto See
    ZTNK A 1 A_CPosRefire
    Goto Missile
}

Actor ZombiePlasmaTank : ZombieTank
{
Health 1500
Obituary "%o was melted by a zombie in a plasma tank."
Tag "\cnZombie Plasma Tank\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    ZPTK A 8 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    ZPTK A 0 A_PlaySound("ZTank/Run")
    ZPTK AABBCC 1 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
	ZPTK A 0 A_Jump(100,"Missile1","Missile2")
    ZPTK A 1 A_FaceTarget
	ZPTK D 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("plasmagun/fire")
	ZPTK D 0 A_CustomMissile("ZPlasmaProj",46,32,0)
    ZPTK D 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZPlasmaProj",66,32,0)
    ZPTK A 2 A_FaceTarget
	ZPTK D 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("plasmagun/fire")
	ZPTK E 0 A_CustomMissile("ZPlasmaProj",46,-29,0)
    ZPTK E 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZPlasmaProj",66,-29,0)
    ZPTK A 0 A_Jump(198,1)
    Goto Missile1
    ZPTK A 0 A_CPosRefire
    Goto Missile+1
  Missile1:
    ZPTK AAA 5 A_FaceTarget
	ZPTK D 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("plasmacaster/fire")
    ZPTK D 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZPlasmaCasterProj",56,32,0)
    ZPTK AAAA 2 A_FaceTarget
	ZPTK E 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("plasmacaster/fire")
    ZPTK E 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZPlasmaCasterProj",56,-29,0)
	ZPTK AAAA 2 A_FaceTarget
	ZPTK D 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("plasmacaster/fire")
    ZPTK D 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZPlasmaCasterProj",56,32,0)
    ZPTK AAAA 2 A_FaceTarget
	ZPTK E 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("plasmacaster/fire")
    ZPTK E 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZPlasmaCasterProj",56,-29,0)
	ZPTK AAAA 2 A_FaceTarget
	ZPTK D 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("plasmacaster/fire")
    ZPTK D 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZPlasmaCasterProj",56,32,0)
    ZPTK AAAA 2 A_FaceTarget
	ZPTK E 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("plasmacaster/fire")
    ZPTK E 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZPlasmaCasterProj",56,-29,0)
	ZPTK AAAA 2 A_FaceTarget
	ZPTK A 1 A_Jump(88,"Missile2")
    Goto See
  Missile2:
	ZPTK A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/rgcharge")
    ZPTK AAAAAAAAAAA 5 A_FaceTarget
	ZPTK D 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("monsters/darkcyberrail")
    ZPTK D 9 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZRailgunProj",56,32,0)
    ZPTK AAAA 4 A_FaceTarget
	ZPTK E 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("monsters/darkcyberrail")
    ZPTK E 9 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZRailgunProj",56,-29,0)
	ZPTK AAAA 4 A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
  Death:
    ZPTK G 4
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    ZPTK G 4 Bright A_PlaySound("ZTank/death")
	ZPTK HHHHIIIIJJJJJKKKKLLLLMMMMNNNN 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("NewSmallKaboomEffect",random(-24,24),random(-24,24),random(8,48))
    TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SmallVehicleExplosionEffect")
    ZPTK O -1
    Stop
}

	TNT1 A 0

    TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(28,158,0)
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom3",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RocketExplosionFlare",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RocketExplosionShockWave",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128) 
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,0,random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,8),0,128)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("RocketEx")
    Stop
}
}

Actor Aracnorb
{
  MONSTER
  +NOGRAVITY
  +FLOAT
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +FLOATBOB
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  Health 170
  Radius 24
  Height 56
  Mass 400
  Speed 12
  PainChance 150
  SeeSound "aracnorb/sight"
  ActiveSound "baby/active"
  PainSound "baby/pain"
  DeathSound "aracnorb/death"
  MeleeSound "aracnorb/melee"
  MeleeDamage 6
  MissileHeight 36
  MissileType AracnorbBall
  Obituary "%o suffered psychic trauma from an aracnorb's brainwaves."
  HitObituary "%o had %p skull chewed by an aracnorb."
  Scale 0.85
  Tag "\c[j4]Aracnorb\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    ACNB A 1 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    ACNB A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(16,"Evade")
    Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,7)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,14,0,0)
	ACNB AAAA 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)
	ACNB AAAA 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Melee:
    ACNB AB 5
    ACNB C 6 A_MeleeAttack
    Goto See
  Missile:
    ACNB B 12 Bright A_FaceTarget
    ACNB C 2 Bright A_MissileAttack
    ACNB B 2 Bright
    ACNB D 0 A_Jump(32,"See")
    ACNB D 0 A_SpidRefire
    Goto Missile+1
  Pain:
    ACNF I 2
    ACNF I 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    ACNB D 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOATBOB",0)
	ACNB D 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    ACNB D 0 A_Scream
	ACNB D 6 A_Fall
    ACNB D 1
    Wait
  Crash:
    ACNB EE 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    ACNB EFG 6
    ACNB H -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    ACNB HGFEDA 8
    ACNB A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOATBOB",1)
	Goto See
  }
}

{
  +THRUSPECIES
  -COUNTKILL
  Species "Hell"
}

Actor AracnorbBall
{
  Radius 13
  Height 8
  Speed 32
  Damage 4

  DeathSound "baby/shotx"

  +SEEKERMISSILE
