  States
  {
  Spawn:
    ACNF A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("AracnorbBallTrail",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    ACNF A 1 Bright A_BishopMissileWeave
	ACNF A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("AracnorbBallTrail",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    ACNF B 1 Bright A_BishopMissileWeave
    Loop
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX4", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    ACNF CDEFG 5 Bright
    Stop
  }
}

Actor AracnorbBallTrail : ClientSideEffect
{
RenderStyle Add
PROJECTILE
+CLIENTSIDEONLY
+FORCEXYBILLBOARD
+NOBLOCKMAP
+DONTSPLASH
States
{
Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
    TNT1 A 1
    ACNF AB 1 Bright A_FadeOut(0.15)
    Goto Spawn+1
    }
}

Actor CyberDemolisher
{
Health 9000
Radius 64
Height 100
Mass 1000
Speed 16
PainChance 3
MinMissileChance 160
SeeSound "cyber/sight"
PainSound "monsters/cyberlordpain"
DeathSound "cybdemo/death"
ActiveSound "cyber/active"
AttackSound "spider/attack"
+BOSS
+NOFEAR
+NOFEAR
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+FLOORCLIP
+NORADIUSDMG
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.75
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.5
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.5
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.5
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor 0.75
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
Monster
Decal BulletChip
Obituary "%o was destroyed by the Cyber Demolisher."
var int user_script;
Tag "\c[m8]Cyber Demolisher\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    CYDE AB 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    CYDE A 2 A_Metal
    CYDE ABB 2 A_Chase
    CYDE C 2 A_Metal
    CYDE CDD 2 A_Chase
    CYDE E 2 A_Metal
    CYDE EFF 2 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Rocket","Seeker","BFG10K","Railgun","DTBFG")
  Normal:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(2000,1)
	Goto Rocket
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/darkmasterwind")
    CYDE A 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", 10, 12, 36, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("RapidShotgun/Fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer3",Random(24,34),0,Random(10,-10),0)
	CYDE K 4 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5, 0, 3, random(1,5)*3, "HellBulletPuff", 0, CBAF_NORANDOM)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", 10, -12, 36, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("RapidShotgun/Fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer3",Random(24,34),0,Random(10,-10),0)
	CYDE L 4 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5, 0, 3, random(1,5)*3, "HellBulletPuff", 0, CBAF_NORANDOM)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/darkmasterwind2")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"BFG10K","Rocket")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
    Goto Normal+3
  Rocket:
	CYDE I 6 Bright A_Facetarget
	CYDE J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",40,-26,0)
	CYDE I 6 Bright A_Facetarget
	CYDE J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",40,-26,random(-4,4))
	CYDE I 6 Bright A_Facetarget
	CYDE J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",40,-26,random(-4,4))
	CYDE I 6 Bright A_Facetarget
	CYDE J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",40,-26,random(-4,4))
	CYDE I 6 Bright A_Facetarget
	CYDE J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",40,-26,random(-4,4))
	CYDE I 6 Bright A_Facetarget
	CYDE J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",40,-26,random(-4,4))
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Seeker")
    Goto See
  Seeker:
	CYDE I 6 Bright A_Facetarget
	CYDE J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",40,-26,0)
	CYDE I 6 Bright A_Facetarget
	CYDE J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",40,-26,random(-4,4))
	CYDE I 6 Bright A_Facetarget
	CYDE J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",40,-26,random(-4,4))
	CYDE I 6 Bright A_Facetarget
	CYDE J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",40,-26,random(-4,4))
	CYDE I 6 Bright A_Facetarget
	CYDE J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",40,-26,random(-4,4))
	CYDE I 6 Bright A_Facetarget
	CYDE J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",40,-26,random(-4,4))
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"BFG10K")
    Goto See
  BFG10K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
	CYDE G 18 Bright A_FaceTarget
	CYDE G 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	CYDE H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile", 44, 0, Random(4, -4))
	CYDE G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	CYDE H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile", 44, 0, Random(4, -4))
	CYDE G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	CYDE H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile", 44, 0, Random(4, -4))
	CYDE G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	CYDE H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile", 44, 0, Random(4, -4))
	CYDE G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	CYDE H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile", 44, 0, Random(4, -4))
	CYDE G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	CYDE H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile", 44, 0, Random(4, -4))
	CYDE G 20 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Railgun")
	Goto See
  Railgun:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/rgcharge")
	CYDE GG 10 A_FaceTarget
	CYDE G 10 A_FaceTarget
	CYDE H 10 A_CustomMissile("DarkCyberRail", 32, 0, 0)
	CYDE GG 10 A_FaceTarget
	CYDE H 10 A_CustomMissile("DarkCyberRail", 32, 0, Random(4, -4))
	CYDE G 15
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"DTBFG")
	Goto See
  DTBFG:
	CYDE G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("Cardinal/9k")
	CYDE GG 10 A_FaceTarget
	CYDE G 10 A_FaceTarget
    CYDE H 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkAnniDTBFGBall",25,0,0)
    CYDE GG 10 A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
  Pain:
	CYDE M 2
	CYDE M 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    CYDE M 16 A_Scream
    CYDE N 6 A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateStrongGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("BossCrateGiver",1)
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CYDE OOOOO 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CYDE PPPPP 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CYDE QQQQQ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect",random(-64,64),random(-64,64),random(-16,16))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CYDE RRRRR 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CYDE SSSSS 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect",random(-64,64),random(-64,64),random(-16,16))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CYDE TTTTT 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", Random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	CYDE UV 2
    CYDE W -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
}

Actor StoneImp
{
  Health 250
  Radius 20
  Height 56
  Speed 6
  Mass 400
  Monster
  MaxTargetRange 350
  RadiusDamageFactor 0.25
  SeeSound "imp/sight"
  PainSound "imp/pain"
  DeathSound "imp/death"
  ActiveSound "imp/active"
  Obituary "%o was smashed by a stone imp."
  +FLOORCLIP
  +NOBLOOD
  +NOPAIN
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  MaxTargetRange 900
  Tag "\cuStone Imp\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    GIMP A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	GIMP AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	GIMP CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
    Loop
  Missile:
    GIMP EF 8 A_FaceTarget
    GIMP G 6 A_CustomMissile("StoneImpBoulder",32,0,0)
    Goto See
  Melee:
    GIMP EF 8 A_FaceTarget
    GIMP G 6 A_CustomMeleeAttack(20,"stoneimp/hit",none)
    Goto See
  Pain:
    GIMP H 2
    GIMP H 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    GIMP I 6 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX",Random(10,40),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,0,Random(4,-4),Random(4,-4),Random(4,8),0,128)
    GIMP J 6 A_Scream
    GIMP K 5 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX",Random(10,40),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    GIMP L 5 A_Fall
    GIMP M 5
    GIMP N -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    GIMP MLKJI 4
	Goto See
  }
}

    STON MNOP 4

Actor SuicideBomber
{
  Monster
  Health 150
  Radius 20
  Height 56
  Mass 100
  Speed 10
  PainChance 20
  SeeSound "suicide/run"
  AttackSound "shotguy/death"
  PainSound "shotguy/pain"
  DeathSound "shotguy/death"
  Obituary "%o was killed by a crazy suicide bomber."
  +FLOORCLIP
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +MISSILEMORE
  +MISSILEEVENMORE
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  MaxTargetRange 2048
  Tag "\cmSuicide Bomber\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    ZBMB AB 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    ZBMB AAABBBCCCDDD 2 A_Chase
    ZBMB A 0 A_PlaySound("suicide/loop")
    Loop
  Missile:
    ZBMB A 1 A_PlayWeaponSound("suicide/run")
    ZBMB AAAA 2 A_FaceTarget
	ZBMB A 1 A_Jump(256,2)
	ZBMB A 0 A_JumpIf(velx != 0 || vely != 0,1)
	Goto ChargeStop
	ZBMB A 0 A_CposRefire
	ZCHW D 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("suicide/loop")
	ZBMB A 0 A_FaceTarget
	ZBMB A 0 A_GiveInventory("SuicideJumping",1)
    ZBMB A 0 A_Recoil(-11)
    ZBMB ABCD 1 A_JumpIfCloser(90,"Melee")
	ZBMB A 0 A_FaceTarget
	ZBMB A 0 A_Recoil(-11)
    ZBMB ABCD 1 A_JumpIfCloser(90,"Melee")
	ZBMB A 0 A_FaceTarget
	ZBMB A 0 A_Recoil(-11)
    ZBMB ABCD 1 A_JumpIfCloser(90,"Melee")
	ZBMB A 0 A_FaceTarget
	ZBMB A 0 A_Recoil(-11)
	ZBMB A 0 A_JumpIf(z - floorz >= 64,"ChargeStop")
    ZBMB ABCD 1 A_JumpIfCloser(90,"Melee")
    Goto Missile+6
  ChargeStop:
    ZBMB A 1 A_Stop
    Goto See
  Melee:
    ZBMB A 2 A_Die
    Stop
  Pain:
    ZBMB A 3
    ZBMB A 3 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SuicideBomb",32,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom3",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RocketExplosionFlare",0,0,32,0,0,0,0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RocketExplosionShockWave",0,0,32,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner",0,0,32,0,0,0,0,128) 
    TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("RocketEx",0,32)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
    ZBMB M 5 Bright A_PlaySound("weapons/rocklx")
    ZBMB N 5 Bright A_XScream
    ZBMB O 5 A_NoBlocking
    ZBMB PQRST 5
    ZBMB U -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    ZBMB TSRQPONM 3
	Goto See
  }
}

Actor SuicideJumping : CustomInventory
{
  +INVENTORY.QUIET
  +INVENTORY.UNDROPPABLE
  +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
  +INVENTORY.AUTOACTIVATE
  Inventory.Amount 1
  Inventory.MaxAmount 0
  States
  {
  Pickup:
    NULL A 1
    NULL A 1 A_CheckFloor(1)
    Stop
	NULL A 1 A_Jump(160,2)
	NULL A 1 ThrustThingZ(0,25,0,1)
    Stop
	NULL A 1
    Stop
  }
}

Actor CCrackoDemon
{
	Health 1500
	Speed 10
	Radius 32
	Height 52
	PainChance 20
    BloodColor "DarkRed"
	Mass 1500
	Species "Hell"
	DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
    Meleedamage 15
	SeeSound "Cracko/See"
	ActiveSound "Caco/Active"
	PainSound "Cracko/Pain"
	DeathSound "Caco/Death"
    MeleeSound "Caco/Melee"
	Obituary "%o Was Toasted By The Corrupted Cracko Demon"
    HitObituary "%o Was Crounched By The Corrupted Cracko Demon"
    DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
	MONSTER
    +FLOAT
    +NOGRAVITY
    +MISSILEEVENMORE
    +MISSILEMORE
    +QUICKTORETALIATE
	+DontHarmSpecies
	var int user_script;
	Tag "\c[w8]Corrupted\c[m3] Cracko Demon\c-"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
   	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HED9 A 3 Bright A_Look
    Loop
   See:
   	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HED9 A 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"Evade")
    Loop
   Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,7)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,14,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	HED9 AAAA 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	HED9 AAAA 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
   Melee:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HED9 B 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HED9 C 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HED9 D 5 Bright A_Meleeattack
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HED9 B 5
    Goto See
   Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Comets","Spam")
    HED9 B 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HED9 C 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HED9 D 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HED9 B 0 A_CustomMissile("RictusBall", 24, 0, 0, 1)
    HED9 B 0 A_CustomMissile("RictusBall", 24, 0, -5, 1)
	HED9 B 0 A_CustomMissile("RictusBall", 24, 0, 3, 1)
    HED9 B 0 A_CustomMissile("RictusBall", 24, 0, -3, 1)
    HED9 B 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("RictusBall", 24, 0, 5, 1)
    Goto See
   Comets:
    HED9 B 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HED9 C 0 A_CustomMissile("BehemothSeekingComet", 24, 0, 0, 1)
	HED9 C 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("BehemothSeekingComet", 24, 0, 7, 1)
    HED9 D 5 Bright A_facetarget
    HED9 B 5 Bright A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    Goto See
   Spam:
    HED9 B 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HED9 C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("RictusBall", 24, 0, 16, 1)
    HED9 C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("RictusBall", 24, 0, 12, 1)
    HED9 B 0 A_FaceTarget
    HED9 C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("RictusBall", 24, 0, 8, 1)
    HED9 C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("RictusBall", 24, 0, 4, 1)
    HED9 B 0 A_FaceTarget
    HED9 D 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BombBall", 24, 0, 0, 1)
    HED9 D 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BombBall", 24, 0, -4, 1)
    HED9 B 0 A_FaceTarget
    HED9 D 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BombBall", 24, 0, -8, 1)
    HED9 D 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BombBall", 24, 0, -12, 1)
    HED9 B 0 A_FaceTarget
    HED9 B 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("RictusBall", 24, 0, -16, 1)
    HED9 B 4 Bright A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HED9 E 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HED9 E 3 Bright A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HED9 F 6 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FPetFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
    Goto See
   Death:
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    HED9 H 8 Bright A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    HED9 IJ 8 Bright
    HED9 K 8 Bright A_NoBlocking
    HED9 L -1 A_SetFloorClip
    Stop
}
}

Actor CHelemental
{
  Obituary "%o was frozen by a Corrupted Hades Elemental."
  HitObituary "%o got chomped on by a Corrupted Hades elemental."
  Health 1300
  PainChance 30
  Radius 24
  Height 44
  Mass 400
  Meleedamage 14
  Speed 10
  Monster
  +FLOAT
  +NOGRAVITY
  +MISSILEEVENMORE
  +MISSILEMORE
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  +DontHarmSpecies
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Corrupt", 0.0
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  SeeSound "monster/helsit"
  PainSound "monster/helpai"
  DeathSound "monster/heldth"
  ActiveSound "monster/helact"
  MeleeSound "caco/melee"
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  bloodcolor "DarkBlue"
  var int user_script;
  Tag "\c[w8]Corrupted\c[m3] Hades Elemental\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("IPetWindSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    INC2 A 3 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("IPetWindSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    INC2 A 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("IPetWindSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"Evade")
    Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,7)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("IPetWindSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,14,0,0)
	INC2 AAAA 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("IPetWindSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("IPetWindSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	INC2 CCCC 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Comet","Seeker")
  Normal:
    INC2 DE 6 A_Facetarget
	INC2 F 1 Bright A_Facetarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FrostMissile3",24,0,-2,0,0)
    INC2 F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FrostMissile3",24,0,2,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FrostMissile3",24,0,-5,0,0)
    INC2 F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("FrostMissile3",24,0,5,0,0)
	INC2 ED 4
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Comet","Seeker")
    Goto See
  Comet:
    INC2 DE 6 A_Facetarget
	INC2 F 0 A_CustomMissile("FrostComet",24,0,0,0,0)
	INC2 F 0 A_CustomMissile("FrostComet",24,0,-3,0,0)
	INC2 F 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("FrostComet",24,0,3,0,0)
    INC2 ED 4
	Goto See
  Seeker:
    INC2 DE 6 A_Facetarget
	INC2 F 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("SnowStormBomb3",24,0,0,0,0)
    INC2 ED 4
	Goto See
  Melee:
    INC2 DE 4 A_Facetarget
    INC2 F 4 A_MeleeAttack
    INC2 ED 4 A_Facetarget
    Goto See
  Pain:
    INC2 H 6 A_Pain
	INC2 H 6
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
  XDeath:
    INC2 I 5 A_Scream
    INC2 J 5 A_NoBlocking
	INC2 J -1
	Stop
  Crash:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegBlueGibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	INC2 K 4 A_PlaySound("Gore/Splat")
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	INC2 L 4 A_NoBlocking
	INC2 M 4
	INC2 N -1 A_SetFloorClip
	Stop
    }
}

Actor FrostComet : Comet
{
Damage 5
Speed 30
Decal Scorch
States
{
Spawn:
FCMT AAAABBBBCCCC 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("LNCometTail",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
Loop
Death:
TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(32,112)
TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
FCMT DE 3 Bright
TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FCometDeath",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
Stop
}
}

Actor CorruptionServant
{

+FLOORCLIP

+MISSILEEVENMORE
+DONTHarmSPECIES

{
   Spawn:
   	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)

    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    MDCS A 7 Bright A_Look
    Loop
   See:
   	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)

    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"rush")

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
    MDCS CCDD 3 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
   Rush:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
    MDCS A 2 A_SpawnItemEx("MCTGHOST",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
	MDCS AAAA 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
    MDCS A 2 A_SpawnItemEx("MCTGHOST",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
	MDCS AAAA 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
    MDCS B 2 A_SpawnItemEx("MCTGHOST",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
	MDCS AAAA 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
    MDCS B 2 A_SpawnItemEx("MCTGHOST",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
	MDCS AAAA 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
    MDCS C 2 A_SpawnItemEx("MCTGHOST",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
	MDCS AAAA 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")

	MDCS AAAA 0 A_Chase

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)

	MDCS AAAA 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
    MDCS D 2 A_SpawnItemEx("MCTGHOST",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)

	MDCS AAAA 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ServantFWSpawner")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(75,"See")
	Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"WComets","Spikes","MfireBalls","SComets","SBomb","DMatter","IceMissile","SnowStorm")
  Normal:
    MDCS EF 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	MDCS G 0 A_CustomMissile("CorruptBaronBall", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CorruptBaronBall", 32, 0, -5)

	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CorruptBaronBall", 32, 0, -3)

    MDCS IJ 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	MDCS K 0 A_CustomMissile("CorruptBaronBall", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CorruptBaronBall", 32, 0, -5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CorruptBaronBall", 32, 0, 3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CorruptBaronBall", 32, 0, -3)
	MDCS K 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("CorruptBaronBall", 32, 0, 5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Wcomets","MfireBalls","Spikes","SComets","SBomb","Dmatter","IceMissile","SnowStorm")
    Goto See
  WComets:
    MDCS MN 8 A_FaceTarget
	MDCS O 0 A_CustomMissile("WComet", 32, 0, 0)
	MDCS O 0 A_CustomMissile("WComet", 32, 0, -5)
	MDCS O 0 A_CustomMissile("WComet", 32, 0, 5)

  MFireBalls:

	MDC3 G 0 A_CustomMissile("MiniFireBall", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MiniFireBall", 32, 0, -5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MiniFireBall", 32, 0, 3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MiniFireBall", 32, 0, -3)

    MDC3 IJ 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	MDC3 K 0 A_CustomMissile("MiniFireBall", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MiniFireBall", 32, 0, -5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MiniFireBall", 32, 0, 3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MiniFireBall", 32, 0, -3)
	MDC3 K 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("MiniFireBall", 32, 0, 5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"SComets","SBomb")
    Goto See
  SComets:
    MDC3 EF 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	MDC3 G 0 A_CustomMissile("BehemothComet", 32, 0, 0)
	MDC3 G 0 A_CustomMissile("BehemothComet", 32, 0, 5)

	MDC3 K 0 A_CustomMissile("BehemothComet", 32, 0, 8)
	MDC3 K 8 A_CustomMissile("BehemothComet", 32, 0, -8)
    MDC3 IJ 6 A_FaceTarget
	MDC3 K 0 A_CustomMissile("BehemothComet", 32, 0, 0)
	MDC3 K 0 A_CustomMissile("BehemothComet", 32, 0, 5)
	MDC3 K 0 A_CustomMissile("BehemothComet", 32, 0, -5)
	MDC3 K 0 A_CustomMissile("BehemothComet", 32, 0, 8)
	MDC3 K 8 A_CustomMissile("BehemothComet", 32, 0, -8)
	Goto See
 SBomb:
	MDC3 MN 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	MDC3 O 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("PyroBlast", 32, 0, 0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"IceMissile")
	Goto See
 Spikes:
	MDC2 MN 8 A_FaceTarget
	MDC2 O 0 A_CustomMissile("CIceSpikeSpawner", 32, 0, 0)
	MDC2 O 0 A_CustomMissile("CIceSpikeSpawner", 32, 0, -3)

	MDC2 O 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("CIceSpikeSpawner", 32, 0, 5)
	Goto See

	MDC2 G 0 A_CustomMissile("FrostMissile3", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FrostMissile3", 32, 0, -5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FrostMissile3", 32, 0, 3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FrostMissile3", 32, 0, -3)
	MDC2 G 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("FrostMissile3", 32, 0, 5)
    MDC2 IJ 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	MDC2 K 0 A_CustomMissile("FrostMissile3", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FrostMissile3", 32, 0, -5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FrostMissile3", 32, 0, 3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FrostMissile3", 32, 0, -3)
	MDC2 K 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("FrostMissile3", 32, 0, 5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"SnowStorm")
	Goto See
  SnowStorm:
	MDC2 MN 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	MDC2 O 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("SnowStormBomb3", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"Spikes")
	Goto See
  DMatter:
	MDC4 MN 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	MDC4 O 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkMatterBall", 32, 0, 0)
	MDC4 O 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkMatterBall", 32, 0, 5)
	MDC4 O 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMatterBall", 32, 0, -5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Melee:
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"FireHands")
     MDCS EF 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
     MDCS G 5 Bright A_MeleeAttack
	 MDCS IJ 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
     MDCS K 5 Bright A_MeleeAttack
	 MDCS MN 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	 MDCS O 0 A_MeleeAttack
     MDCS O 5 Bright A_MeleeAttack
     Goto See
   FireHands:
     MDC3 EF 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	 MDC3 G 0 A_CustomMissile("ExplosiveMelee", 32, 0, 0)
     MDC3 G 2 Bright A_CustomMeleeAttack(30,"Pyro/FlamePoof","pyro/blastexplosion",1)
	 MDC3 IJ 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	 MDC3 K 0 A_CustomMissile("ExplosiveMelee", 32, 0, 0)
     MDC3 K 5 Bright A_CustomMeleeAttack(30,"Pyro/FlamePoof","pyro/blastexplosion",1)
	 MDC3 MN 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
     MDC3 O 0 A_CustomMissile("ExplosiveMelee", 32, 0, 0)
	 MDC3 O 0 A_CustomMissile("ExplosiveMelee", 32, 0, 0)
	 MDC3 O 0 A_CustomMissile("ExplosiveMelee", 32, 0, 0)
     MDC3 O 5 Bright A_CustomMeleeAttack(50,"Pyro/FlamePoof","pyro/blastexplosion",1)
	 Goto See
   Pain:
     MDCS Q 8 Bright A_Pain
	 TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"Evade")
     Goto See
   Evade:
     MDCS E 1 A_FaceTarget
	 MDCS E 0 A_SetAngle(angle+random(0,359))
	 MDCS E 0 A_Recoil(-50)
	 MDCS E 0 A_FaceTarget
	 MDCS EEEEEEEEEEEEE 1 A_SpawnItemEx("MCTGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	 Goto See
   Death:
     MDCS R 8 Bright
     MDCS S 7 Bright A_Scream
	 TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	 TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RedParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 40, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
     MDCS U 5 Bright A_Fall
     MDCS VW 5 Bright
	 TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
     MDCS X 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PyroSoul",86,0,0,2,90)
     MDCS Z 4 Bright
     TNT1 A -1
	 Stop
     }
}

Actor DTechSpider
{
  Obituary "%o was eliminated by a Demon Tech Spider."
  Health 1000
  Radius 26
  Height 64
  Mass 600
  speed 12
  Scale 1.1
  painchance 80
  BloodColor "DarkGreen"
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  SeeSound "minidemo/sight"
  ActiveSound "minidemo/active"
  PainSound "monsters/fusionitepain"
  DeathSound "minidemo/death"
  DamageFactor "Baby15K", 0.0
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  Species "Hell"
  MONSTER
  +FLOORCLIP
  +MISSILEMORE
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  Tag "\c[l2]Demon Tech Spider\c-"
  states
  {
  Spawn:
    DTSD A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(62,"Rush")
    DTSD A 2 A_BabyMetal
    DTSD ABBCC 2 A_Chase
    DTSD D 2 A_BabyMetal
    DTSD DEEFF 2 A_Chase
    Loop
  Rush:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Metal
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DTSpidGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DTSD A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DTSpidGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DTSD A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DTSpidGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DTSD B 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DTSpidGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DTSD B 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Metal
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DTSpidGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DTSD C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DTSpidGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DTSD C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DTSpidGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DTSD D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DTSpidGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DTSD D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Metal
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DTSpidGhostE",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DTSD E 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DTSpidGhostE",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DTSD E 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DTSpidGhostF",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DTSD F 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DTSpidGhostF",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DTSD F 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(84,"See")
	Loop
  Missile:
	DTSD G 10 A_FaceTarget
	DTSD G 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DTSDemonTechProjectile",28,0,Random(150,-150)/100.00,0)
	DTSD H 2 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(6,"Pause")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
	Goto Missile+1
  Pause:
	DTSD G 15 A_PlaySound("weapons/demontechsteam")
	Goto See
  Pain:
    DTSD I 3
    DTSD I 3 A_Pain
    Goto See+1
  Death:
    DTSD J 20 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    DTSD K 7 A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    DTSD LMNO 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom5", random(20,40), random(10,-10), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    DTSD P -1 A_BossDeath
    stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    DTSD PONMLKJ 5
    goto See+1
  }
}

Actor DTSDemonTechProjectile : ZDemonTechProjectile{DamageType "Hell"}

ACTOR BabyDarkDemolisher : DTechSpider
{
  Obituary "%o was annihilated by a Dark Baby Demolisher."
  Health 1650
  Scale 1.2
  PainChance 20
  RadiusDamageFactor 0.4
  +MISSILEEVENMORE
  var int user_script;
  Tag "\c[l2]Dark Baby Demolisher\c-"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    DMSP A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(62,"Rush")
    DMSP A 2 A_BabyMetal
    DMSP ABBCC 2 A_Chase
    DMSP D 2 A_BabyMetal
    DMSP DEEFF 2 A_Chase
    Loop
  Rush:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Metal
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyDDGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DMSP A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyDDGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DMSP A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyDDGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DMSP B 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyDDGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DMSP B 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Metal
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyDDGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DMSP C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyDDGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DMSP C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyDDGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DMSP D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyDDGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DMSP D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Metal
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyDDGhostE",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DMSP E 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyDDGhostE",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DMSP E 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyDDGhostF",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DMSP F 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyDDGhostF",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DMSP F 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(84,"See")
	Loop
  Pause:
    DMSP A 10
    Goto See
  Pause2:
	DMSP G 15 A_PlaySound("weapons/demontechsteam")
	Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(148,"BFG10K","DTechRifle")
  Normal:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(2000,1)
    Goto BFG10K
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/darkmasterwind")
    DMSP A 13 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/darkmasterwind2")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/minigunfire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(26,30),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 8, 8, 18, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
    DMSP Q 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(20.0, 0, 1, Random(1,5)*3, "HellBulletPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/minigunfire","Weapon")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 8, -8, 18, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    DMSP R 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(20.0, 0, 1, Random(1,5)*3, "HellBulletPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"DTechRifle","BFG10K")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(3,"Pause","Missile")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
    Goto Normal+3
  BFG10K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
    DMSP G 16 Bright A_FaceTarget
	DMSP G 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
    DMSP H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",20,0,Random(4,-4))
    DMSP G 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
    DMSP H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",20,0,Random(4,-4))
    DMSP G 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
    DMSP H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",20,0,Random(4,-4))
	DMSP G 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
    DMSP H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",20,0,Random(4,-4))
    DMSP G 20 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"DTechRifle")
    Goto See
  DTechRifle:
	DMSP A 5 A_FaceTarget
	DMSP Q 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DTSDemonTechProjectile",16,8,Random(150,-150)/100.00,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DTSDemonTechProjectile",16,-8,Random(150,-150)/100.00,0)
	DMSP R 2 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"Normal","BFG10K")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(3,"Pause","Missile")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
	Goto DTechRifle+1
  Pain:
    DMSP I 10 A_Pain
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
    DMSP I 20 A_Scream
	DMSP J 6 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	DMS2 KKKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom5", random(20,40), random(10,-10), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    DMSP L 6 A_NoBlocking
    DMSP MN 6
    DMSP O 6
    DMSP P -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    DMSP PONMLKJ 5
    Goto See+1
  }
}

Actor Afrit : BaronOfHell
{
Health 1250
Speed 10
PainChance 30
Bloodcolor "ff 50 00"
Mass 2000
DamageFactor "NobleComet", 0.0
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
Meleedamage 8
PainSound "monsters/baronpain"
MeleeSound "baron/melee"
Species "Hell"
MONSTER
+MISSILEMORE
+FASTMELEE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+NOICEDEATH
+BRIGHT
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
Obituary "%o was deep fried by an Afrit."
HitObituary "%o couldnt take an Afrits heat."
var int user_script;
Tag "\cgAfrit\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LesserCardinalFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    AFRT ABCD 4 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LesserCardinalFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    AFRT ABCD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Melee:
    AFRT ST 5 A_FaceTarget
    AFRT U 4 A_MeleeAttack
    AFRT TS 4 A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
  Missile:
  Normal:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Comet","Tracer")
    AFRT ST 6 A_FaceTarget
    AFRT U 3 A_FaceTarget
    AFRT U 1 A_CustomMissile("AfritBall", 44, 0, 0)
    AFRT U 0 A_CustomMissile("AfritBall", 44, 0, 3)
    AFRT U 1 A_CustomMissile("AfritBall", 44, 0, -3)
    AFRT TS 5 A_FaceTarget
    AFRT T 6 A_FaceTarget
    AFRT U 3 A_FaceTarget
    AFRT U 1 A_CustomMissile("AfritBall", 44, 0, 0)
    AFRT U 0 A_CustomMissile("AfritBall", 44, 0, 3)
    AFRT U 1 A_CustomMissile("AfritBall", 44, 0, -3)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Comet")
    Goto See
  Comet:
    AFRT EF 8 A_FaceTarget
    AFRT G 1 A_CustomMissile("Comet", 44, 0, 0)
    AFRT G 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet", 44, 0, 6)
    AFRT G 4 A_CustomMissile("Comet", 44, 0, -6)
    AFRT G 6 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Tracer")
    Goto See
  Tracer:
    AFRT GFE 8 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("AfritTracer",0,40,0)
    AFRT E 1 A_CustomMissile("AfritTracer",0,-40,0)
    AFRT E 4 A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
  Pain:
    AFRT H 8 A_Pain
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
    AFRT I 0
    AFRT I 6 A_Scream
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    AFRT J 4 A_Fall
    AFRT KLMNOPQ 3
    AFRT R 3
    TNT1 A -1
    Stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    AFRT RQPONMLKJI 3
    Goto See
}
}

	  TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX4", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
      FRTM CDE 3 Bright
      Stop
      }
}

{
States
{
Spawn:
Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
    FRTM B 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,1)
    FRTM A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,1)
    FRTM B 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,1)
    FRTM A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,1)
    FRTM B 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,1)
    Stop
    }

  Radius 5

    Loop

	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom9", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX4", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    FTRA L 4 Bright A_Explode(32, 64)
    FTRA MNO 3 Bright
    Stop
  }
}

Actor HellFireIfrit : Afrit
{
Health 1500
Speed 10
PainChance 50
Scale 1.15
Obituary "%o was scorched by a Hellfire Ifrit."
Tag "\c[z4]HellFire \c[v9]Ifrit\c-"
SeeSound "Ifrit/Sight"
DeathSound "Ifrit/Death"
PainSound "Ifrit/Pain"
ActiveSound "Ifrit/Active"
States
{
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LesserCardinalFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    HIFR AB 2 Bright A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LesserCardinalFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    HIFR AB 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(15,"Evade")
    Loop
  Evade:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Evade2")
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,14,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("AfritFireSpawner")
    HIFR ABABABAB 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Evade2:
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)
	HIFR ABABABAB 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Melee:
    TNT1 A 0
    Goto Missile
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,"Missile1","Missile2","Missile3")
  Missile1:
    HIFR CCCC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",60,0,random(-6,6))
    HIFR C 2 A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",60,0,random(-6,6))
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",60,0,random(-6,6))
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",60,0,random(-6,6))
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+random(64,192),16,0,0)
    HIFR A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR BABA 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
    HIFR B 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",60,0,random(-6,6))
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",60,0,random(-6,6))
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",60,0,random(-6,6))
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",60,0,random(-6,6))
    Goto See
  Missile2:
    HIFR CCCC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,random(-10,10))
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,0)
    HIFR CC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,random(-10,10))
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,0)
    HIFR CC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,random(-10,10))
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,0)
    HIFR CC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,random(-10,10))
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+random(64,192),16,0,0)
    HIFR ABABA 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
    HIFR B 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,random(-10,10))
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,0)
    HIFR CC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,random(-10,10))
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,0)
    HIFR CC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,random(-10,10))
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,0)
    HIFR CC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,random(-10,10))
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet",60,0,0)
    Goto See
  Missile3:
    HIFR CCCC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BehemothSeekingComet",60,0,0)
    HIFR CCCC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BehemothSeekingComet",60,0,0)
    HIFR CC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+random(64,192),16,0,0)
    HIFR ABABA 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
    HIFR B 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BehemothSeekingComet",60,0,0)
    HIFR CCC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HIFR C 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BehemothSeekingComet",60,0,0)
    HIFR CC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
  Pain:
    HIFR D 2 Bright
    HIFR D 2 Bright A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(111,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
    HIFR D 6 Bright A_ScreamAndUnblock
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner", Random(10,-10), Random(10,-10), Random(30,60), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
    HIFR EEEEFFFF 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner", Random(10,-10), Random(10,-10), Random(30,60), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
    HIFR GGGGHHHH 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    HIFR IIIIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFireFX",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(0,32))
    HIFR I -1 A_SetFloorClip
    Stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    HIFR IHGFED 3 Bright
    Goto See
  }
}

Actor HellFireAfrit : Afrit
{
Health 3500
Scale 1.3
MeleeDamage 14
Obituary "%o was deep fried by a HellFire Afrit."
HitObituary "%o couldnt take a HellFire Afrits heat."
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+NOICEDEATH
SeeSound "superbaron/scream"
PainSound "superbaron/pain"
ActiveSound "superbaron/act"
DeathSound "superbaron/death"
MeleeSound "baron/melee"
Tag "\c[z4]HellFire \c[v9]Afrit\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LesserCardinalFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    HFBS ABCD 4 Bright A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LesserCardinalFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("AfritFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFBS ABCD 3 Bright A_Chase
    Loop
  Melee:
    HFBS EF 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HFBS G 4 Bright A_MeleeAttack
    Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(148,"Comet","Seeking","BigBall","BigComet")
  Normal:
    HFBS EF 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	HFBS G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("AfritBall",56,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("AfritBall",56,0,-3)
	HFBS G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("AfritBall",56,0,3)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("AfritBall",56,0,-6)
	HFBS G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("AfritBall",56,0,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("AfritBall",56,0,-9)
	HFBS G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("AfritBall",56,0,9)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Normal","Normal","Comet","Seeking")
    Goto See
  Comet:
    HFBS EF 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	HFBS G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet",56,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",56,0,-3)
	HFBS G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet",56,0,3)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",56,0,-6)
	HFBS G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet",56,0,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",56,0,-9)
	HFBS G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet",56,0,9)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Comet","Comet","Normal","Seeking")
    Goto See
  Seeking:
    HFBS EF 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	HFBS G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("HeleBall",56,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HeleBall",56,7,0)
	HFBS G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("HeleBall",56,-7,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HeleBall",56,14,0)
	HFBS G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("HeleBall",56,-14,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HeleBall",56,21,0)
	HFBS G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("HeleBall",56,-21,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Seeking","Seeking","Comet","Normal","BigBall")
    Goto See
  BigBall:
    HFBS GF 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HFBS E 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",90,33,0)
	HFBS E 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",90,-33,0)
	HFBS E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HFBS E 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",90,33,0)
	HFBS E 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",90,-33,0)
	HFBS E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HFBS E 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",90,33,0)
	HFBS E 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",90,-33,0)
	HFBS E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"BigComet")
    Goto See
  BigComet:
    HFBS GF 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HFBS E 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoMComet",90,33,0)
	HFBS E 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoMComet",90,-33,0)
	HFBS E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
  Pain:
    HFBS H 8 Bright A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(111,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
    HFBS I 0
    HFBS I 6 Bright A_Scream
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    HFBS J 4 Bright A_Fall
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner", Random(10,-10), Random(10,-10), Random(30,60), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
    HFBS KKKLLLMMM 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner", Random(10,-10), Random(10,-10), Random(30,60), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
    HFBS OOOPPPQQQ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    HFBS RRR 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFireFX",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(0,32))
    HFBS ST 3
    HFBS U -1
    Stop
  Raise:

    HFBS TSRQOINLKK 2 Bright
    Goto See
    }

ACTOR HellArchon : HellKnight 31340
{
Health 650
Speed 8
PainChance 50
Mass 1000
Bloodcolor Red
Scale 1.05
Meleedamage 8
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "NobleComet", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
Species "Hell"
MONSTER
+FLOORCLIP
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
-BOSSDEATH
+DONTHARMSPECIES
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
Obituary "%o was annihilated by a Hell Archon."
HitObituary "The last thing %o saw was a Hell Archon's fist."
SeeSound "monster/ar2sit"
ActiveSound "superbaron/act"
PainSound "superbaron/pain"
DeathSound "monster/ar2dth"
MeleeSound "baron/melee"
Tag "\ccHell Archon\c-"
States
{
Spawn:
        HLAR A 10 Bright A_Look
        Loop
See:
        HLAR AABB 3 Bright A_Chase
        HLAR B 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
        HLAR CCDD 3 Bright A_Chase
        HLAR D 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
        Loop
Missile:
        TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Comet","FastBall")
	Normal:
        HLAR EF 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
        HLAR G 0 A_CustomMissile("HABall", 32, 0, 0)
		HLAR G 0 A_CustomMissile("HABall", 32, 0, 6)
		HLAR G 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("HABall", 32, 0, -6)
        HLAR IJ 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
        HLAR K 0 A_CustomMissile("HABall", 32, 0, 0)
		HLAR K 0 A_CustomMissile("HABall", 32, 0, 6)
		HLAR K 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("HABall", 32, 0, -6)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"FastBall")
        Goto See
	FastBall:
        HLAR EF 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
        HLAR G 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchonFastBall1", 32, 0, 0)
		HLAR G 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("ArchonFastBall1", 32, 0, -6)
        HLAR IJ 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
		HLAR K 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchonFastBall1", 32, 0, 0)
        HLAR K 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("ArchonFastBall1", 32, 0, -6)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Comet")
        Goto See
	Comet:
        HLAR MN 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
        HLAR O 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("HAComet", 32, 0, 0)
		Goto See
Melee:
        HLAR EF 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
        HLAR G 4 Bright A_MeleeAttack
        HLAR FE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
        Goto See
Pain:
        HLAR Q 10 A_Pain
        Goto See
Death:
        HLAR R 8 Bright
        HLAR S 7 Bright A_Scream
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
		TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RedParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 40, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
        HLAR U 5 Bright A_Fall
        HLAR VW 5 Bright
		TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    	HLAR X 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("HArchonSoul",86,0,0,2,90)
    	HLAR Z 4 Bright
        TNT1 A -1
	    Stop
Raise:
        TNT1 A 0
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
        HLAR ZYXWVUTSR 5 Bright
        Goto See
        }
}

ACTOR CyberBaron : CyberNoble
{
Health 1650
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+NORADIUSDMG
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
var int user_script;
MeleeDamage 12
SeeSound "cyberbaron/see"
Obituary "%o was annihilated by a Cyber Baron."
HitObituary "%o got whacked by a Cyber Baron."
BloodColor "Red"
Tag "\c[m8]Cyber \c[m4]Baron\c-"
Decal BulletChip
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    CB0S A 7 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    CB0S AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("cbaron/metal")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
    CB0S CCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
    Loop
  Pause:
	CB0S E 10
	Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"BurstBall","LargeBall","Rocket","BFG15K","Seeker")
  Normal:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(2000,1)
    Goto Rocket
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/mgunspinstart")
    CB0S E 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/mgunspin","Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(30,34),20,Random(5,-5),0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 12, 6, 28, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/minigunfire","Weapon")
    CB0S F 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    CB0S E 1 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(30,34),20,Random(5,-5),0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/minigunfire","Weapon")
    CB0S F 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    CB0S E 1 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(11,"Pause","Rocket")
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
    Goto Normal+3
  BurstBall:
	CB0S PQ 4 A_FaceTarget
	CB0S R 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 6)
	CB0S R 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, -6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 12)
	CB0S R 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, -12)
	CB0S PQ 4 A_FaceTarget
	CB0S R 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 6)
	CB0S R 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, -6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 12)
	CB0S R 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, -12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"LargeBall","Rocket")
	Goto See
  LargeBall:
  	CB0S PQ 6 A_FaceTarget
	CB0S R 3 A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	CB0S PQ 6 A_FaceTarget
	CB0S R 3 A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	CB0S PQ 6 A_FaceTarget
	CB0S R 3 A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	Goto See
  Rocket:
    CB0S E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CB0S F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",32,20,random(-3,3))
	CB0S E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CB0S F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",32,20,random(-3,3))
	CB0S E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CB0S F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",32,20,random(-3,3))
    CB0S E 10 A_Jump(110,"Seeker")
    Goto See
  Seeker:
    CB0S E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CB0S F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",32,20,random(-3,3))
	CB0S E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CB0S F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",32,20,random(-3,3))
	CB0S E 8 A_FaceTarget
    CB0S F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",32,20,random(-3,3))
    CB0S E 10 A_Jump(110,"BFG15K")
    Goto See
  BFG15K:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
    CB0S E 18 A_FaceTarget
	CB0S E 6 A_FaceTarget
    CB0S F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",32,20,random(-4,4))
	CB0S E 4 A_FaceTarget
	CB0S F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",32,20,random(-4,4))
	CB0S E 4 A_FaceTarget
	CB0S F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",32,20,random(-4,4))
	CB0S E 4 A_FaceTarget
	CB0S F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",32,20,random(-4,4))
	CB0S E 20 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
    Goto See
  Melee:
    CB0S PQ 7 A_FaceTarget
    CB0S R 7 A_MeleeAttack
    Goto See
  Pain:
    CB0S H 4 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
    CB0S I 20 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	CB0S JJJKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CB0S L 4 Bright A_NoBlocking
    CB0S MN 3 Bright
    CB0S O -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    CB0S N 5
	CB0S MLKJI 5
	Goto See
    }
}

ACTOR CyberArchBaron : CyberBaron
{ 
Health 1950
MeleeDamage 24
Obituary "%o was slooped by a Cyber Archbaron."
HitObituary "%o got cracked by a Cyber Archbaron."
Tag "\c[m8]Cyber \c[m4]Archbaron\c-"
PainChance 60
Scale 1.1
States 
{ 
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    CB3L A 7 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    CB3L AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("cbaron/metal")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
    CB3L CCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
    Loop
  Pause:
	CB3L E 10
	Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"BurstBall","LargeBall","Rocket","BFG15K","Seeker","Comet")
  Normal:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(2000,1)
    Goto Rocket
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/mgunspinstart")
    CB3L E 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/mgunspin","Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(30,34),20,Random(5,-5),0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 12, 6, 28, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/minigunfire","Weapon")
    CB3L F 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    CB3L E 1 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(30,34),20,Random(5,-5),0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/minigunfire","Weapon")
    CB3L F 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff",0,CBAF_NORANDOM)
    CB3L E 1 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(11,"Pause","Rocket")
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
    Goto Normal+3
  BurstBall:
	CB3L PQ 7 A_FaceTarget 
	CB3L R 1 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 0)		
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 6)
	CB3L R 5 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, -6)
    CB3L PQ 5 A_FaceTarget 
	CB3L R 1 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 0)		
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 6)
	CB3L R 5 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, -6)
    CB3L PQ 5 A_FaceTarget 
	CB3L R 1 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 0)		
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 6)
	CB3L R 5 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, -6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"LargeBall","Rocket")
	Goto See
  LargeBall:
  	CB3L PQ 7 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L R 2 A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	CB3L PQ 4 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L R 2 A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	CB3L PQ 4 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L R 2 A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	CB3L PQ 4 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L R 2 A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	CB3L PQ 4 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L R 2 A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	CB3L PQ 4 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L R 2 A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	CB3L E 0 A_Jump(110,"Rocket")
  Rocket:
    CB3L E 14 A_FaceTarget
    CB3L F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",32,20,0,0)
    CB3L E 12 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",32,20,0,0)
    CB3L E 10 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",32,20,0,0)
    CB3L E 8 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L E 0 A_Jump(110,"Seeker")
    Goto See
  Seeker:
    CB3L E 14 A_FaceTarget 
    CB3L F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",32,20,0,0)
    CB3L E 12 A_FaceTarget
    CB3L F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",32,20,0,0)
    CB3L E 10 A_FaceTarget
    CB3L F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",32,20,0,0)
    CB3L E 8 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L E 0 A_Jump(110,"BFG15K")
    Goto See	
  BFG15K:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
    CB3L E 18 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L E 6 A_FaceTarget
    CB3L F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",32,20,random(-4,4))
	CB3L E 4 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",32,20,random(-4,4))
	CB3L E 4 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",32,20,random(-4,4))
	CB3L E 4 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",32,20,random(-4,4))
	CB3L E 20 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
	CB3L E 0 A_Jump(110,"Comet")
    Goto See
  Comet:
  	CB3L PQ 12 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L R 11 A_CustomMissile("HDComet",32,0,0)
  	CB3L PQ 12 A_FaceTarget
	CB3L R 11 A_CustomMissile("HDComet",32,0,0)
    Goto See
  Melee:
    CB3L PQ 5 A_FaceTarget
    CB3L R 5 A_MeleeAttack
    Goto See
  Pain: 
    CB3L H 4 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
    CB3L I 20 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	CB3L JJJKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CB3L L 4 Bright A_NoBlocking
    CB3L MN 3 Bright
    CB3L O -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    CB3L N 5
	CB3L MLKJI 5
	Goto See
    }

Actor AssaultWarlord : CyberBaron
{
Scale 1.25
Health 3500
PainChance 5
SeeSound "AssaultWarlord/Sight"
PainSound "AssaultWarlord/Pain"
DeathSound "AssaultWarlord/Death"
ActiveSound "AssaultWarlord/Active"
Obituary "%o was not ready in front of a Assault Warlord."
Tag "\c[w8]Assault Warlord\c-"
States
	{
 Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	ASWA A 10 Bright A_Look
	Loop
 See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    ASWA AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("cbaron/metal")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
    ASWA CCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
    Loop
 Melee:
    Goto Missile
 Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"BFG10K","HeavyRocket","MiniDTBFG")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Seekers","Missiles","Digger")
 Normal: 
    ASWA E 12 A_FaceTarget
	ASWA N 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",35,-15,0)
    ASWA N 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",35,15,0)
	ASWA E 10 A_FaceTarget
	ASWA N 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",35,-15,0)
    ASWA N 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",35,15,0)
	ASWA E 10 A_FaceTarget
	ASWA N 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",35,-15,0)
    ASWA N 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",35,15,0)
	ASWA E 12 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Seekers","Missiles")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"HeavyRocket")
	Goto See
 Seekers: 
    ASWA E 12 A_FaceTarget
	ASWA N 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",35,-15,0)
    ASWA N 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",35,15,0)
	ASWA E 10 A_FaceTarget
	ASWA N 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",35,-15,0)
    ASWA N 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",35,15,0)
	ASWA E 10 A_FaceTarget
	ASWA N 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",35,-15,0)
    ASWA N 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",35,15,0)
	ASWA E 12 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missiles")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"HeavyRocket")
	Goto See
 Missiles:
    ASWA EEE 5 A_FaceTarget
    ASWA F 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",35,15,0)
	ASWA E 5 A_FaceTarget
    ASWA G 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",35,-15,0)
	ASWA E 5 A_FaceTarget
    ASWA F 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",35,15,0)
	ASWA E 5 A_FaceTarget
    ASWA G 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",35,-15,0)
	ASWA E 5 A_FaceTarget
    ASWA F 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",35,15,0)
	ASWA E 5 A_FaceTarget
    ASWA G 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",35,-15,0)
	ASWA E 5 A_FaceTarget
    ASWA F 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",35,15,0)
	ASWA E 5 A_FaceTarget
    ASWA G 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",35,-15,0)
	ASWA E 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Digger")
    Goto See
 Digger:
    ASWA EEEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	ASWA N 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("digger/fire")
	ASWA N 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerDiggerGrenade",35,-15,random(-2,2))
    ASWA N 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerDiggerGrenade",35,15,random(-2,2))
	ASWA EEE 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"BFG10K")
    Goto See
 BFG10K:

	ASWA EEEEE 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")

    ASWA N 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",35,15,random(-3,3))
	ASWA E 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	ASWA N 0 A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",35,-15,random(-3,3))
    ASWA N 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",35,15,random(-3,3))
	ASWA E 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	ASWA N 0 A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",35,-15,random(-3,3))
    ASWA N 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",35,15,random(-3,3))
	ASWA E 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	ASWA N 0 A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",35,-15,random(-3,3))
    ASWA N 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",35,15,random(-3,3))

    ASWA N 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",35,15,random(-3,3))

	Goto See

	ASWA N 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",35,-15,0)
    ASWA N 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",35,15,0)
	ASWA E 10 A_FaceTarget
	ASWA N 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",35,-15,0)
    ASWA N 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",35,15,0)
	ASWA E 12 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"MiniDTBFG")
	Goto See

	ASWA JJJKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    ASWA L 4 Bright A_NoBlocking
    ASWA M -1
    Stop
}

Actor CyberImp
{
Health 140
Radius 20
Height 56
Mass 200
Speed 8
PainChance 150
Monster
+FLOORCLIP
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
SeeSound "CIMPSIT"
PainSound "CIMPPAIN"
DeathSound "CIMPDTH"
ActiveSound "CIMPACT"
MeleeSound "imps/melee"
HitObituary "%o was torn apart by a cyber imp."
Obituary "%o was fried by a cyber imp."
MeleeDamage 4
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
Tag "\c[m8]Cyber Imp\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    CIMP A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	CIMP AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("cbaron/metal")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	CIMP CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
    Loop
  Melee:
    CIMP EF 8 A_FaceTarget
    CIMP F 6 A_MeleeAttack
    Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"Railgun")
    CIMP EF 7 A_FaceTarget
    CIMP G 5 Bright A_Custommissile("FasterZombiePlasmaBall",36,4)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(70,"Pause","Railgun")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
    Goto Missile+2
  Railgun:
    CIMP EF 7 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/railgf")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("RailgunImpact",30)
    CIMP G 5 Bright A_CustomRailgun(random(15,25),0,"00 85 FF",None,RGF_NOPIERCING,1,0,"HellBulletPuff",0,0,0,0,0.45,0,"NewRailgunTrail")
    CIMP E 40
	Goto See
  Pause:
	CIMP E 20
	Goto See
  Pain:
    CIMP H 2
    CIMP H 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    CIMP I 8
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    CIMP J 8 A_Scream
    CIMP K 6
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    CIMP L 6 A_NoBlocking
    CIMP M -1
    Stop
  XDeath:
    CIMP N 3
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    CIMP O 3 A_XScream
    CIMP P 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    CIMP Q 3 A_NoBlocking
    CIMP RST 3
    CIMP U -1
    Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	CIMP LKJI 5
	Goto See
}
}

Actor CyberDevil : CyberImp
{
Health 200
PainChance 100
SeeSound "devil/sight"
DeathSound "devil/death"
PainSound "voidimp/pain"
HitObituary "%o was torn apart by a cyber devil."
Obituary "%o was fried by a cyber devil."
MeleeDamage 6
Tag "\c[m8]Cyber \c[l4]Devil\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    CD3V A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	CD3V AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("cbaron/metal")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	CD3V CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
    Loop
  Melee:
    CD3V EF 8 A_FaceTarget
    CD3V F 6 A_MeleeAttack
    Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Railgun","Seeker")
  Normal:
    CD3V EFG 4 A_FaceTarget
    CD3V H 5 Bright A_Custommissile("CacoBotPlasmaBall",36,4)
    CD3V GG 4 A_FaceTarget
    CD3V H 5 Bright A_Custommissile("CacoBotPlasmaBall",36,4)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(70,"Railgun")
	Goto See
  Railgun:
    CD3V EFG 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/railgf")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("RailgunImpact",30)
    CD3V H 5 Bright A_CustomRailgun(random(15,25),0,"00 85 FF",None,RGF_NOPIERCING,1,0,"HellBulletPuff",0,0,0,0,0.45,0,"NewRailgunTrail")
    CD3V G 40
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(70,"Seeker")
	Goto See
  Seeker:
	CD3V WX 7 A_FaceTarget
	CD3V Y 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("DevilBall",32,0,0)
	CD3V XW 4
	Goto See
  Pain:
    CD3V I 2
    CD3V I 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    CD3V J 8
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    CD3V K 8 A_Scream
    CD3V L 6
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    CD3V M 6 A_NoBlocking
    CD3V N -1
    Stop
  XDeath:
    CD3V O 3
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    CD3V P 3 A_XScream
    CD3V Q 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    CD3V R 3 A_NoBlocking
    CD3V STU 3
    CD3V V -1
    Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	CD3V MLKJ 5
	Goto See
}
}

        Loop

		TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,16,0,0)
		TIMP AAAA 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
		Goto See
		TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,16,0,0)

		TNT1 A 0 A_Stop

		TIMP G 0 A_CustomMissile("ToxicImpBall",32,0,5)
		TIMP G 0 A_CustomMissile("ToxicImpBall",32,0,-5)
        TIMP G 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("ToxicImpBall",32,0,0)
        Goto See
    Pain:
    	TIMP H 6 A_Pain
    	Goto See
    Death:
        TIMP J 8 A_Scream
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        TIMP K 6
        TIMP L 6 A_Fall
        TIMP M -1
        Stop
    XDeath:
		TIMP N 3
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)

		TIMP P 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
		TIMP Q 3 A_Fall
		TIMP RST 3
		TIMP U -1
        Stop

		TNT1 A 0
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
        TIMP TSRQPON 5
        Goto See
		}
