	 Goto See
	 TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)
	 TORT ABCA 3 A_Chase
	 TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	 Goto See
   Missile:
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(450,"ToxicBreath")
	 TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(138,"PoisonComet","Comet")
   Normal:
      TORT AA 3 A_FaceTarget
      TORT A 3 Bright A_PainAttack("PoisonSoulMinion")
	  TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(90,"PoisonComet")
      Goto See
   PoisonComet:
      TORT DE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	  TORT F 0 A_CustomMissile("BarbatosComet",38,0,-5)
	  TORT F 0 A_CustomMissile("BarbatosComet",38,0,5)
      TORT F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("BarbatosComet",38,0,0)
	  TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(90,"Comet")
      Goto See
   Comet:
      TORT DE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
      TORT F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("HDComet",38,0,0)
      Goto See
   ToxicBreath:
      TORT A 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	  TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/psoattack")
	  TORT AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("ToxicEleBreath",10,0,Random(18,-18))
	  TORT A 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	  TORT AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("ToxicEleBreath",10,0,Random(18,-18))
	  TORT A 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	  TORT AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("ToxicEleBreath",10,0,Random(18,-18))
	  TORT A 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	  TORT AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("ToxicEleBreath",10,0,Random(18,-18))
	  TORT A 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	  TORT AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("ToxicEleBreath",10,0,Random(18,-18))
	  TORT A 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	  TORT AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("ToxicEleBreath",10,0,Random(18,-18))
	  TORT A 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	  TORT AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("ToxicEleBreath",10,0,Random(18,-18))
	  TORT A 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	  TORT AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("ToxicEleBreath",10,0,Random(18,-18))
	  TORT A 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	  Goto See
   Pain:
      TORT G 3
      TORT G 3 A_Pain
      Goto See
   Death:
      TORT H 5
	  TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
      TORT I 5 Bright A_Scream
      TORT J 5 Bright A_NoBlocking
	  TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.75,1)
      TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PoisonEleGoreGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	  TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner", 0, 0, random(20,40), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	  TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	  TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	  TORT KM 6 Bright A_PainDie("PoisonSoulMinion")
      TORT N 6 Bright
      Stop
   }
}


ACTOR ToxicEleBreath : PoisonEleBreath
{
	Speed 19
    States
    {
    Spawn:
        TRPS AABBCDEFGDFEG 3 A_Explode(6,68)
    Death:
		TRPS CCBBAA 1 A_FadeOut(0.15)
        Stop
		}
}

ACTOR ArchbaronOfHell : BaronOfHell1
{
Health 1500
GibHealth 100
PainChance 100
SeeSound "ArchbaronOfHell/See" 
DeathSound "ArchbaronOfHell/Death"
MeleeDamage 16
+MISSILEMORE
+FASTMELEE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHURTSPECIES
Obituary "%o was slacked by an Archbaron Of Hell."
HitObituary "%o was cracked open by an Archbaron Of Hell."
Tag "\c[m4]Archbaron Of Hell\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	B3LP AA 7 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
    B3LP AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
    B3LP CCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
    Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"GiantBalls","Comet")
  Normal:
	B3LP IJ 8 A_FaceTarget
	B3LP K 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 0)		
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 6)
	B3LP K 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, -6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 12)
	B3LP K 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, -12)
	B3LP IJ 4 A_FaceTarget
	B3LP K 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 0)		
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 6)
	B3LP K 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, -6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 12)
	B3LP K 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, -12)
    B3LP IJ 4 A_FaceTarget
	B3LP K 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 0)		
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 6)
	B3LP K 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, -6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, 12)
	B3LP K 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall", 32, 0, -12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"GiantBalls","Comet")
	Goto See
  GiantBalls:
    B3LP EF 8 A_FaceTarget
	B3LP G 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
    B3LP ST 8 A_FaceTarget
	B3LP U 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	B3LP EF 5 A_FaceTarget
	B3LP G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
    B3LP ST 5 A_FaceTarget
	B3LP U 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	B3LP EF 4 A_FaceTarget
	B3LP G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
    B3LP ST 4 A_FaceTarget
	B3LP U 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Comet")
	Goto See
  Comet:
    B3LP IJ 8 A_FaceTarget	
	B3LP K 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("HDComet", 32, 0, 0)
	B3LP IJ 6 A_FaceTarget	
	B3LP K 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("HDComet", 32, 0, 0)
    Goto See
  Melee:
	B3LP EF 8 A_FaceTarget
	B3LP G 8 A_MeleeAttack
	Goto See
  Pain:
	B3LP H 4 A_Pain
	Goto See
  Death: 
    B3LD A 7
	B3LD B 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    B3LD B 6 A_Scream 
    B3LD C 5 A_Fall 	
    B3LD D 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	B3LD EF 4
    B3LD G -1
    Stop 
  XDeath: 
	B3LX AB 5
	B3LX C 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	B3LX C 4 A_XScream
	B3LX D 4 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	B3LX E 3 A_Fall
	B3LX F 3 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	B3LX GH 3
	B3LX I -1
	Stop 	
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	B3LD GFEDCBA 6
	Goto See
}
}

Actor NewBelphegor
{
Health 1500
Radius 24
Height 64
Mass 2000
Speed 8
PainChance 15
Monster
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+FASTMELEE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+NORADIUSDMG
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
BloodColor "Green"
SeeSound "superbaron/scream"
PainSound "superbaron/pain"
DeathSound "superbaron/death"
ActiveSound "superbaron/act"
MeleeSound "baron/melee"
Obituary "%o was slain by a Belphegor."
HitObituary "%o was slain by a Belphegor."
MeleeDamage 25
Scale 1.25
var int user_amount;
Tag "\c[m4]Belphegor\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    NBRN A 10 Bright A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DukeWalkFire",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	NBRN AA 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DukeWalkFire",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	NBRN BB 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DukeWalkFire",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	NBRN CC 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DukeWalkFire",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	NBRN DD 3 Bright A_Chase
	Loop
  Melee:
    NBRN EF 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    NBRN G 6 Bright A_ComboAttack
    Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(188,"Spread","Floor","FastBall","Comet","BurstComet","SuperComet")
  Normal:
	NBRN EF 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	NBRN G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2",40,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2",40,0,-4)
	NBRN G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DukeBall2",40,0,4)

	Goto See
  Spread:

	NBRN G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall",40,0,6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall",40,0,-9)
	NBRN G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall",40,0,9)
	NBRN E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	NBRN F 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	NBRN G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall",40,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall",40,0,-3)
	NBRN G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall",40,0,3)

	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall",40,0,-9)
	NBRN G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyNobleBall",40,0,9)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Floor")
	Goto See
  Floor:
  	NBRN GF 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	NBRN E 0 A_CustomMissile("DukeFireSpawner",20,0,random(-2,2))
	NBRN E 0 A_CustomMissile("DukeFireSpawner",-20,0,random(-2,2))

	NBRN E 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DukeFireSpawner",-10,0,random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"FastBall")
	Goto See
  FastBall:
    NBRN E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    NBRN F 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	NBRN G 1 Bright	A_CustomMissile("KnightFastBall",40,0,-40)

	NBRN G 1 Bright	A_CustomMissile("KnightFastBall",40,0,0)
	NBRN G 1 Bright	A_CustomMissile("KnightFastBall",40,0,5)
	NBRN G 1 Bright	A_CustomMissile("KnightFastBall",40,0,10)
    NBRN E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    NBRN F 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	NBRN G 1 Bright	A_CustomMissile("KnightFastBall",40,0,40)
	NBRN G 1 Bright	A_CustomMissile("KnightFastBall",40,0,35)

	NBRN G 1 Bright	A_CustomMissile("KnightFastBall",40,0,-10)
  	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Comet")
	Goto See
  Comet:
	NBRN GF 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BelphegorComet",70,27,random(-1,1))
	NBRN E 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("BelphegorComet",70,-27,random(-1,1))

	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(158,"Missile")
    Goto See
  PainRage:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_amount > 3,"Missile")

	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_amount",user_amount+1)
	NBRN E 4 Bright A_PlaySound("superbaron/scream")
	NBRN FF 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 HealThing(650)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	NBRN G 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("DukeHealFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	NBRN G 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("DukeHealFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)

	NBRN H 0 A_FadeOut(0.1)
	NBRN H 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner", Random(10,-10), Random(10,-10), Random(30,60), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	NBRN HH 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(40,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	NBRN HHHH 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4", random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	NBRN H 0 A_FadeOut(0.1)
	NBRN H 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner", Random(10,-10), Random(10,-10), Random(30,60), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	NBRN HH 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(40,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	NBRN HHHH 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4", random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	NBRN H 0 A_FadeOut(0.1)
	NBRN H 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner", Random(10,-10), Random(10,-10), Random(30,60), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	NBRN HH 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(40,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	NBRN HHHH 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4", random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	Stop
  }

ACTOR RocketImp
{
Health 200
Radius 20
Height 56
Mass 100
Speed 8
PainChance 200
Monster
+FLOORCLIP
+NORADIUSDMG
+MISSILEMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
SeeSound "CIMPSIT"
PainSound "CIMPPAIN"
DeathSound "CIMPDTH"
ActiveSound "CIMPACT"
Obituary "%o was blown apart by an Annihilator Imp"
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
Tag "\c[m8]Annihilator Imp\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    RIMP AB 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    RIMP AABBCCDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Melee:
  Missile:
    RIMP E 6 A_FaceTarget
    RIMP W 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket")
	RIMP F 5
	RIMP G 6 A_FaceTarget
    RIMP V 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket")
	RIMP G 5
    Goto See
  Pain:
    RIMP H 2
    RIMP H 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    RIMP I 0 A_Jump(128,"AltDeath")
    RIMP I 6 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    RIMP J 6 A_Scream
    RIMP K 4
    RIMP L 4 A_NoBlocking
    RIMP M -1
    Stop
  AltDeath:
    RIMP H 20 Bright A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	RIMP NO 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	RIMP PQR 4 Bright
    RIMP S 4 Bright A_NoBlocking
    RIMP T 3 Bright A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	RIMP U -1
	Stop
  Raise:
    RIMP MLKJI 7
    Goto See
  }
}

{

Mass 600

+MISSILEEVENMORE

		TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/load")

		TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")

		Goto See

	    RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
		RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
		RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
		RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
		RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
		RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
		RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
		RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
		RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
		RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	    RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
		RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
		RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
		RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
		RSPI G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
        RSPI H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	    RSPI GGGG 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
        Goto See
	Pain:
		RSPI I 3
		RSPI I 3 A_Pain
		Goto See
    Death:

		TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
		RSPI KKKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom2", random(20,40), random(10,-10), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
		TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
		RSPI L 6 A_NoBlocking
		RSPI MN 6
		RSPI O 6
		RSPI P -1
		Stop
    Raise:
		TNT1 A 0
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
		RSPI PONMLKJ 5
		Goto See+1
	}
}

ACTOR DErasusProjTrail
{

Scale 0.0875
Alpha 1
+NOINTERACTION
+NOGRAVITY
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 //A_SetScale(ScaleX,ScaleY-0.0875)
    YAE4 A 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("ErasusProjTrailSparks",random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,-4),0,0,0,0,128,0)
    YAE4 A 2 Bright
  Fly:
    YAE4 A 0 //A_SetScale(ScaleX-0.01,ScaleY-0.01)
    YAE4 A 1 Bright A_FadeOut(0.295)
    Loop
  }
}

	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",15)
	TNT1 A 1
	Goto Super::Spawn
}
}

Actor CryoImp
{
  obituary "%o was given severe frostburn by a Cryo Imp."
  hitobituary "%o was clawed by a Cryo Imp."
  health 100
  radius 20
  height 56
  mass 100
  speed 9
  painchance 80
  MeleeDamage 3
  seesound "frostimp/See"
  painsound "frostimp/freeze"
  deathsound "frostimp/shatter"
  MeleeSound "imps/melee"
  DamageFactor "Ice", 0.0
  DamageFactor "FreezerBurn", 0.0
  MONSTER
  +FLOORCLIP
  +NOBLOOD
  +MissileMore
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  Tag "\c[c1]Cryo Imp\c-"
  states
  {
  Spawn:
    ICEY A 5 A_Look
    loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(46,"Evade")
    ICEY AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	ICEY CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
    loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,7)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,16,0,0)
	ICEY AAAA 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,16,0,0)
	ICEY AAAA 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Melee:
   ICEY EF 5 A_FaceTarget
   ICEY G 5 A_MeleeAttack
   ICEY FE 5 A_FaceTarget
   Goto See
  Missile:
    ICEY EF 6 A_FaceTarget
    ICEY G 5 A_CustomMissile("FrostCoveredBall",32,0,0,0)
    ICEY FE 4 A_FaceTarget
    goto See
  Pain:
    ICEY H 2
    ICEY H 2 A_Pain
    goto See
  Death:
    ICEY A 0 A_NoBlocking
	ICEY A 5 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom6", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("IceDebris",0,0,0,Random(4,-4),Random(4,-4),Random(4,8),0,128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom6", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TROI A 0 A_PlaySound("frostimp/boom")
	TROI A 0 A_IceGuyDie
    stop
  }
}

  {

    TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ImpFrozenWind",random(12,-12),random(12,-12),random(12,64),0,0,random(1,3),0,128,0)
    TNT1 A 1
    Stop
  }
}
ACTOR ImpFrozenWind
{
+MISSILE
+DONTSPLASH
+NOBLOCKMAP
+NOGRAVITY
+NOTELEPORT
+FORCEXYBILLBOARD
+THRUACTORS
Scale 0.4
RenderStyle Normal
States
{

    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
    PLSS JKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ 2 Bright A_FadeOut
	Stop
Toaster:
    TNT1 A 0
    Stop
}

ACTOR FrostBallTrail
{
  Radius 8
  Height 16
  Scale 0.30
  RenderStyle Add
  Alpha 0.67
  PROJECTILE
  +CLIENTSIDEONLY
  +Randomize
  states
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
    ICE1 G 4 Bright
    goto death
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("IceSparkle", 0, 0, 0, random(-2, 2), random(-2, 2), random(-1, 1),0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("IceSparkle", 0, 0, 0, random(-2, 2), random(-2, 2), random(-1, 1),0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("IceSparkle", 0, 0, 0, random(-2, 2), random(-2, 2), random(-1, 1),0,128)
    ICE1 G 1 A_FadeOut(0.05)
    goto death+3
Toaster:
    TNT1 A 0
    Stop
  }
}

ACTOR CryoDemon : HellKnight
{
Health 750
PainChance 80
Scale 1.05
Bloodcolor "blue"
MeleeDamage 8
DamageFactor "Ice", 0.0
DamageFactor "FreezerBurn", 0.0
+MISSILEMORE
+FASTMELEE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+NoIceDeath
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Obituary "A Cryo Demon turned %o into a popsicle."
HitObituary "A Cryo Demon tore %o apart."
SeeSound "monster/ar2sit"
ActiveSound "pyro/active"
PainSound "superbaron/pain"
DeathSound "monster/ar2dth"
MeleeSound "baron/melee"
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.5
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
Tag "\c[c1]Cryo Demon\c-"
States
{
Spawn:
        CRYO A 7 Bright A_Look
		CRYO A 7 Bright A_Look
        Loop
See:
        CRYO AABB 3 Bright A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
        CRYO CCDD 3 Bright A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
        Loop
Missile:
        TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Comet","FloorHugger")
Normal:
        CRYO EF 7 Bright A_FaceTarget
		CRYO G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CBall", 32, 0, 0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CBall", 32, 0, -5)
		CRYO G 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("CBall", 32, 0, 5)
        CRYO IJ 7 Bright A_FaceTarget
		CRYO K 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("CBall", 32, 0, 0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CBall", 32, 0, -5)
		CRYO K 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("CBall", 32, 0, 5)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Comet","FloorHugger")
        Goto See
Comet:
        CRYO MN 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
        CRYO O 7 Bright A_Custommissile("CryoComet",32,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"FloorHugger")
        Goto See
FloorHugger:
        CRYO MN 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
        CRYO O 8 Bright A_Custommissile("CIceSpikeSpawner",16,0,0,0)
		Goto See
Melee:
        CRYO EF 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
        CRYO G 7 Bright A_MeleeAttack
        Goto See
Pain:
        CRYO Q 4 Bright A_Pain
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(61,"Missile")
        Goto See
Death:
        CRYO R 8 Bright A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
        CRYO S 7 Bright A_Scream
		TNT1 AAA 0 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BlueParticleSpawner", Random(10,-10), Random(10,-10), Random(30,60), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
        CRYO U 5 Bright A_Fall
        CRYO VW 5 Bright
        TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    	CRYO X 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("CryoDemonSoul",86,0,0,2,90)
    	CRYO Z 4 Bright
        TNT1 A -1
	    Stop
Raise:
	    TNT1 A 0
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
        CRYO ZYXWVUTSR 5 Bright
        Goto See
        }
}

ACTOR InfernoDemon
{
  Health 14000
  Speed 16
  Radius 45
  Height 110
  Mass 5000
  Damage 15
  Monster
  PainChance 4
  +BOSS
  +NOFEAR
  +MISSILEMORE
  +MISSILEEVENMORE
  +FLOORCLIP
  +NORADIUSDMG
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  +NOPAIN
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.5
  DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.25
  DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.2
  DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.2
  DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
  DamageFactor "Pierce", 0.5
  DamageFactor "MarinePierce", 0.5
  DamageFactor "Kaboom", 0.4
  DamageFactor "MarineKaboom", 0.4
  DamageFactor 0.75
  DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
  SeeSound "infernodemon/see"
  ActiveSound "infernodemon/idle"
  DeathSound "infernodemon/death"
  MinMissileChance 5
  Obituary "%o was sent to burn in the fires of hell for an eternity by the Inferno Demon."
  BloodColor "ff 5f 00"
  Scale 1.25
  Tag "\c[z4]Inferno Demon\c-"
  var int user_script;
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    INFD A 5 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
  	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(18,"Rush")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("infernodemon/step")
    INFD AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("infernodemon/step")
    INFD CCDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Rush:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("infernodemon/step")
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_Chase
	INFD A 2 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_Chase
	INFD B 2 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("infernodemon/step")
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_Chase
	INFD C 2 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_Chase
	INFD D 2 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(6,"See")
    Loop
 Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetShootable
    TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
	INFD E 0 A_Jump(16,"CometRain","BigComet")
	INFD E 0 A_Jump(32,"SpecilosComet")
    INFD E 0 A_Jump(256,"InfernoDemon","BruiserDemon","PyroDemon","HellArchonComet","HellArchonBall","BombElemental","Famine","Cacomental")
	INFD E 1
    Goto See
 InfernoDemon:
	INFD E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBall",120,45,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBall",120,-45,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBall",90,50,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBall",90,-50,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBall",60,55,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBall",60,-55,0,0,0)
    INFD F 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
	//INFD E 0 A_CposRefire
	//INFD E 0 A_Jump(32,"See")
    //Goto Combo
 BruiserDemon:
	INFD E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBruiserDemonComet",120,45,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBruiserDemonComet",120,-45,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBruiserDemonComet",90,50,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBruiserDemonComet",90,-50,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBruiserDemonComet",60,55,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBruiserDemonComet",60,-55,0,0,0)
    INFD F 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto MissileEnd
 PyroDemon:
	INFD E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDPyroDemonComet",120,45,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDPyroDemonComet",120,-45,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDPyroDemonComet",90,50,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDPyroDemonComet",90,-50,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDPyroDemonComet",60,55,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDPyroDemonComet",60,-55,0,0,0)
    INFD F 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto MissileEnd
 HellArchonComet:

	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDHellArchonComet",120,45,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDHellArchonComet",120,-45,0,0,0)

	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDHellArchonComet",90,-50,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDHellArchonComet",60,55,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDHellArchonComet",60,-55,0,0,0)
    INFD F 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto MissileEnd
 HellArchonBall:
	INFD E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDHellArchonBall",120,45,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDHellArchonBall",120,-45,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDHellArchonBall",90,50,0,0,0)

	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDHellArchonBall",60,55,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDHellArchonBall",60,-55,0,0,0)
    INFD F 4 Bright A_FaceTarget

 BombElemental:
	INFD E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBombElementalBall",120,45,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBombElementalBall",120,-45,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDBombElementalBall",90,50,0,0,0)

 Cacomental:
	INFD E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDCacomentalTracer",120,45,0,0,0)
	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDCacomentalTracer",120,-45,0,0,0)

	INFD F 0 A_CustomMissile("IFDCacomentalTracer",60,-55,0,0,0)
    INFD F 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto MissileEnd
 MissileEnd:
	INFD F 1 Bright A_Jump(90,"Missile")
	Goto See
 SpecilosComet:
	INFD HH 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	INFD FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("CardinalRageFlameSpawner")

ACTOR IFDBall
{
Radius 8
Height 8
Speed 30
Damage 8
Scale 1.0
PROJECTILE
RENDERSTYLE ADD
ALPHA 0.95
SeeSound "comet/launch"
DeathSound "weapons/firex3"
Decal "DoomImpScorch"
States
{
   Spawn:
      B4L3 AB 4 Bright A_SpawnItem("RedPuff",0,0)
      loop
   Death:
      TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
      B4L3 C 5 Bright A_Explode(32,96,0)
      B4L3 DE 5 Bright
      stop
   }
}

ACTOR RedPuff
{
Radius 0
Height 1
Speed 0
PROJECTILE
RENDERSTYLE ADD
ALPHA 0.85
+CLIENTSIDEONLY
 States
 {
   Spawn:
     TNT1 A 0
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
      TNT1 A 3 Bright
      RPUF ABCDE 3 Bright
      Stop
	  Toaster:
    TNT1 A 0
	Stop
   }
}

Actor InfernoDemonGhost : ClientSideEffect
{
RENDERSTYLE Translucent
Alpha 0.75
+NOGRAVITY
+CLIENTSIDEONLY
+DONTSPLASH
+NOINTERACTION
+NOCLIP
Scale 1.1
States
{
Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
    INFD A 2 A_FadeOut(0.18)
    Loop
    }
}

Actor ImpWarrior : Imp1
{
Health 250
Speed 9
PainChance 128
Obituary "%o couldn't run from the imp warrior's fireball."
HitObituary "%o was beaten to death by an imp warrior."
Tag "\c[k6]Imp Warrior\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	WARI A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	WARI AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	WARI CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
    Loop
  Melee:
	WARI E 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("implord/maceswing")
	WARI F 4 A_FaceTarget
	WARI G 5 A_CustomMeleeAttack(Random(1,8)*7, "implord/macehit", "None")
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Spread","Seeker")
  Normal:
	WARI O 7 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("implord/maceswing")
	WARI P 5 A_FaceTarget
	WARI Q 6 A_CustomMissile("ImpWarriorBall",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(85,"Spread","Seeker")
	Goto See
  Spread:
	WARI L 7 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("implord/maceswing")
	WARI M 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ToxicImpBall",40,0,-8,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ToxicImpBall",24,0,8,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ToxicImpBall",32,0,0,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ToxicImpBall",36,0,-4,1)
	WARI N 6 A_CustomMissile("ToxicImpBall",28,0,4,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(85,"Normal","Seeker")
	Goto See
  Seeker:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	WARI I 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("implord/shieldshot")
	WARI J 6 bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DevilBall",32,-8,0)
	WARI K 6 bright A_CustomMissile("DevilBall",32,8,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(85,"Normal","Spread")
	Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"PainShield")
	WARI H 8 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
	Goto See
  PainShield:
	WARI I 1 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	WARI III 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	Goto See
  Death:
	WARI R 8
	WARI S 8 A_Scream
	WARI T 6 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	WARI U 6 A_Fall
	WARI V -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	WARI VUTSR 6
	Goto See
}
}

Actor ImpWarriorBall
{
Damagetype "Hell"
Radius 8
Height 6
Speed 30
Damage 6
Projectile
RenderStyle Add
Alpha 0.67
Scale 1.2
SeeSound "monsters/newfireshoot"
DeathSound "monsters/newfireexplode"
Decal DoomImpScorch
States
{
  Spawn:
	IBAL FFFFGGGG 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("ImpWarriorBallTrail",0,0,0,random(0,-4),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),0,0,0)
	Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(16,24)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RedParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom14", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX4", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	IBAL HIJ 4 Bright
	Stop
}
}

ACTOR ZombieAssaultTank
{
Monster
Speed 6
Mass 99999
Radius 64
Height 100
Health 7500
Decal Bulletchip
SeeSound "ZTank/see"
AttackSound "ZTank/attack"
PainSound "ZTank/pain"
DeathSound "ZTank/death"
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.75
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.5
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.5
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.5
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor 0.75
RadiusDamageFactor 0.5
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+FLOORCLIP
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+NODROPOFF
+NOPAIN
+NOBLOOD
+DONTRIP
Obituary "%o was killed by a zombie assault tank."
Scale 0.75
Tag "\cuZombie Assault Tank\c-"
var int user_cannon;
var int user_missile;
States
{
  Spawn:
	ZT4K A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("tank/active","SoundSlot7",1)
	ZT4K A 0 A_StopSoundEx("SoundSlot6")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_missile",user_missile-4)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_cannon",user_cannon-4)
	ZT4K A 8 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	ZT4K A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("tank/move","SoundSlot7",1)
	ZT4K A 0 A_StopSoundEx("SoundSlot6")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_missile",user_missile-1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_cannon",user_cannon-1)
	ZT4K A 2 A_Chase
	Loop
  Missile:
	ZT4K AAA 8 A_FaceTarget
  Minigun:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_cannon < 1,"Cannon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_missile < 1,"Rockets")
  	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("hminigun/fire2","SoundSlot6",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BigTurretFlash",40,40,125)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",28,40,125,Random(2,4),Random(3,6),Random(3,6),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ZTankMinigunProj",125,40,random(-1,1))
	ZT4K A 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_missile",user_missile-1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_cannon",user_cannon-1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CposRefire
	Loop
  Cannon:
    ZT4K A 0
	ZT4K A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("tank/active","SoundSlot7",1)
	ZT4K A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("hminigun/fire2","SoundSlot6",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BigTurretFlash",40,40,125)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",28,40,125,Random(2,4),Random(3,6),Random(3,6),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ZTankMinigunProj",125,40,random(-1,1))
	ZT4K A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("tank/fire","Voice")
	ZT4K A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TankFlash",196,0,86)
	ZT4K A 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZTankShoot",80,0,random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_cannon",109)
	ZT4K A 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOTARGETSWITCH",0)
	Goto Minigun
  Rockets:
    ZT4K A 0
	ZT4K A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("tank/active","SoundSlot7",1)
	ZT4K A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("hminigun/fire2","SoundSlot6",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BigTurretFlash",40,40,125)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",28,40,125,Random(2,4),Random(3,6),Random(3,6),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ZTankMinigunProj",125,40,random(-1,1))
	ZT4K A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("rpg/fire","Voice")
	ZT4K A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TankFlash",196,0,112)
	ZT4K A 0 A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket",114,22,random(-1,1))
	ZT4K A 0 A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket",110,22,random(-1,1))
	ZT4K A 0 A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket",114,26,random(-1,1))
	ZT4K A 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket",110,26,random(-1,1))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_missile",28)
	Goto Minigun
  Death:
	ZT4K A 4
	ZT4K A 0 A_StopSoundEx("SoundSlot6")
	ZT4K A 0 A_StopSoundEx("SoundSlot7")
	ZT4K A 4 A_Scream
	ZT4K AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("NewKaboomEffect",random(-64,64),random(-64,64),random(12,96))
	ZTAK Z 0 A_Fall
	ZTAK Z 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BigVehicleExplosionEffect")
	ZTAK Z -1
	Stop
    }
}

ACTOR Infestor
{
Monster
Speed 0
Mass 99999
Radius 48
Height 64
Health 2500
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.5
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
+FLOORCLIP
+NOPAIN
+DONTRIP
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+LOOKALLAROUND
-SOLID
RadiusDamageFactor 0.15
Obituary "%o was killed."
BloodColor "Green"
Scale 1.6
var int user_minions;
var int user_script;
Tag "\cuInfestor\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    R0SE A 0
    R0SE A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
    R0SE A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Infestor Script Start",0,0,0)
    R0SE A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    R0SE AAAB 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    R0SE A 0
    R0SE A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Infestor Script Check",100,0,0) == TRUE,"Go")
    R0SE AAAB 10 A_Chase
    Loop
  Go:
    R0SE BBC 3
    R0SE C 3 A_SpawnItemEx("InfestorMinions",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),64,2,0,2,random(0,359),SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS|SXF_SETMASTER,0,user_minions)
    R0SE CDDCB 3
    Goto See
  Death:
    R0SE L 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    R0SE M 5 A_XScream
    R0SE N 5 A_Fall
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    R0SE OPQ 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    R0SE R -1
    Stop
	}
}

Actor Fodder
{
Monster
Health 100
Radius 15
Height 56
Mass 100
Speed 12

PainSound "Fodder/Pain"

DeathSound "Fodder/Death"

MaxDropOffHeight 68

+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHARMSPECIES

{
  Spawn:
    ZFOD A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
    ZFOD AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	ZFOD CCDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Melee:
    ZFOD E 0 A_PlaySound("Fodder/Attack")
    ZFOD EF 6 A_FaceTarget
    ZFOD G 6 A_CustomMeleeAttack(random(13,28),"Fodder/Melee",none,"Hell")
    Goto See

    ZFOD H 2
    ZFOD H 2 A_Pain
    Goto See

    ZFOD J 7 A_Scream
    ZFOD K 5 A_Fall

    ZFOD M -1
    Stop
  XDeath:

    ZFOD N 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    ZFOD O 5 A_XScream
    ZFOD P 5 A_Fall
    ZFOD QR 5
    ZFOD S -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    ZFOD LKJIH 5
    Goto See
  }

Actor DWraith
{
Monster
Health 150
Radius 15
Height 56
Mass 100
Speed 12
SeeSound "DWraith/See"
PainSound "DWraith/Pain"
ActiveSound "DWraith/Active"
DeathSound "DWraith/Death"
Obituary "%o was slashed by a Wraith."
HitObituary "%o was slashed by a Wraith."
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.5
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 68
+FLOORCLIP
+QUICKTORETALIATE
Tag "\cmWraith\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    3WRT A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	3WRT B 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
    3WRT BBCC 2 A_Chase
	3WRT C 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	3WRT DDEE 2 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    3WRT A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(220,"Charge")
    3WRT A 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Charge:
	3WRT FF 3 A_FaceTarget
	3WRT F 0 A_Recoil(-15)
    3WRT F 0 ThrustThingZ(0,28,0,1)
	3WRT F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("DWraith/Attack")
	3WRT FFFFFFF 2 A_JumpIfCloser(90,"BigMelee")
	Goto See
  Melee:
    3WRT FF 3 A_FaceTarget
    3WRT G 5 A_CustomMeleeAttack(random(27,55),"DWraith/Hit","DWraith/Attack","Hell")
    Goto See
  BigMelee:
    3WRT G 0 A_FaceTarget
    3WRT G 5 A_CustomMeleeAttack(random(55,85),"DWraith/Hit","DWraith/Attack","Hell")
    Goto See
  Pain:
    3WRT A 2
    3WRT A 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
	3WRT H 5
    3WRT I 5 A_Scream
    3WRT J 5
    3WRT K 5 A_Fall
    3WRT L -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    3WRT LKJIH 5
    Goto See
  }
}

+FLOORCLIP
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
SeeSound "imp/sight"
PainSound "imps/pain"
DeathSound "imp/death"
ActiveSound "imp/active"
MeleeSound "imps/melee"
Obituary "%o got burned by a Salamander."
HitObituary "%o was shredded by a Salamander."
MeleeDamage 6
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
BloodColor "ff 5f 00"
Scale 1.1
Tag "\c[z4]Salamander\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    SALA A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	SALA AABBCCDD 2 A_Chase
    Loop
  Melee:
    SALA EF 8 A_FaceTarget
    SALA F 6 A_MeleeAttack
    Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"Comet")
	SALA EF 8 A_FaceTarget
	SALA GGG 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("AfritBall",32,0,random(-3,3))
	Goto See
  Comet:
	SALA EF 8 A_FaceTarget
	SALA G 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,0)
	Goto See
  Pain:
    SALA H 2
    SALA H 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
	SALA I 5
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	SALA J 5 A_Scream
	SALA K 5
	SALA L 5 A_Fall
	SALA M -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	SALA LKJI 5
	Goto See
  }
}

ACTOR ToxicFiend : BullFiend
{
Health 350
PainChance 55
Speed 16
Scale 1.1
MaxTargetRange 790
SeeSound "magma/sight"
PainSound "monster/psopain"
DeathSound "magma/death"
ActiveSound "magma/active"
AttackSound "magma/attack"
Obituary "%o was turned into toxic waste by a Toxic Fiend."
HitObituary "%o was ripped open by a Toxic Fiend."
BloodColor "Green"
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+FASTMELEE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
Tag "\cqToxic Fiend\c-"
States
{
	Spawn:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("GHellionSmokeSpawnerFiend",0,0,0,0)
		TOXD A 12 Bright A_Look
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("GHellionSmokeSpawnerFiend",0,0,0,0)
		TAI3 A 12 Bright A_Look
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("GHellionSmokeSpawnerFiend",0,0,0,0)
        Loop
	See:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("GHellionSmokeSpawnerFiend",0,0,0,0)
        TOXD AABB 2 Bright A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HeavyFleshStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("GHellionSmokeSpawnerFiend",0,0,0,0)
        TOXD CCDD 2 Bright A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HeavyFleshStep",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("GHellionSmokeSpawnerFiend",0,0,0,0)
        Loop
	Melee:
        TOXD EF 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
        TOXD G 4 Bright A_MeleeAttack
        TOXD E 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
        Goto See
	Missile:
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Lunge","ToxicBreath","ToxicSwirlBall")
	Normal:
	    TOXD GE 10 Bright A_FaceTarget
	    TOXD F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("ToxicComet", 32, 0, 0)
		TOXD E 6 Bright
		Goto See
	ToxicSwirlBall:
	    TOXD GE 10 Bright A_FaceTarget
	    TOXD F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("ToxicSwirlComet", 32, 0, 0)
		TOXD E 8 Bright
		Goto See
	Lunge:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(355,1)
	    Goto See
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("magma/attack")
	    TOXD EF 7 Bright A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,1)
	    TNT1 A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,25,0,1)
	    TOXD F 2 Bright A_Recoil(-30)
	    TOXD F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("PinkyLunge",18,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	    TOXD G 6 Bright
	    TOXD G 2 Bright A_ScaleVelocity(0.2)
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	    TOXD G 1 Bright A_ScaleVelocity(0)
	    Goto See
	ToxicBreath:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(300,1)
		Goto See
	    TOXD EF 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("hectebus/flameready")
		TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Daedabus/Chem")
	    TOXD FFF 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ToxicChemSpray", 32, 0, Random(6,-6))
		TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	    TOXD FFF 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ToxicChemSpray", 32, 0, Random(6,-6))
		TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	    TOXD FFF 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ToxicChemSpray", 32, 0, Random(6,-6))
		TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	    TOXD FFF 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ToxicChemSpray", 32, 0, Random(6,-6))
	    TOXD E 5 Bright
	    Goto See
	Pain:
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
        TOXD H 4 Bright A_Pain
        Goto See
	Death:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
        TOXD I 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        TOXD J 5 A_Scream
        TOXD K 4
        TOXD L 4 A_NoBlocking
        TOXD M 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
        TOXD N -1
        Stop
	XDeath:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	    TOXD I 3
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
        TOXG A 3 A_XScream
        TOXG B 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
        TOXG C 3 A_NoBlocking
        TOXG D 3 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ToxicFiendPoison",0,0,20,Random(8,-8),Random(8,-8),Random(6,-6))
	    TOXG EFG 3
        TOXG H -1
        Stop
	Raise:
	    TNT1 A 0
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
        TOXD NMLKJI 5
        Goto See
        }
}

		}

ACTOR ToxicComet : BarbatosComet
{

DamageType "Hell"
States
{
Spawn:

Loop
Death:
TNT1 A 0
TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom13", 0, 0, random(0,360), random(2,3), random(0,360))

BRTB D 3 Bright A_SetTranslucent(0.75,1)
TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ToxicFiendPoison",0,0,10,Random(4,-4),Random(4,-4),Random(4,-2))
BRTB EFG 3 Bright
Stop
}
}

ACTOR Draugr : Revenant
{
Health 1900
Radius 20
Height 56
Mass 500
Speed 10
PainChance 55
Scale 1.1
DamageFactor "CadaverRocket", 0.0
HitObituary "%o was knocked out by a Draugr."
Obituary "%o was eviscerated by a Draugr"
SeeSound "skeletons/sight"
PainSound "monsters/guardianpain"
MONSTER
+FLOORCLIP
+LONGMELEERANGE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+FASTMELEE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
BloodColor Red
RadiusDamageFactor 0.5
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
var int user_script;
Tag "\c[j4]Draugr\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    SK32 A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(88,"Rush")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BonyStep",0,0,0,0)
    SK32 AAABBBCCC 2 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BonyStep",0,0,0,0)
    SK32 DDDEEEFFF 2 A_Chase
    Loop
  Rush:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BonyStep",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DraugrGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	SK32 A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DraugrGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	SK32 B 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DraugrGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	SK32 C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BonyStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DraugrGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	SK32 D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DraugrGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	SK32 E 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DraugrGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	SK32 F 1 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(66,"See")
	Loop
  Melee:
    TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SK32 I 6 A_SkelWhoosh
    SK32 J 6 A_FaceTarget
    SK32 K 6 A_SkelFist
    Goto See
  Missile:
    SK32 G 0 A_Jump(82,"DeadHands")
	SK32 G 0 A_Jump(38,"AntiLegendaryBlast")
    SK32 GGGG 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SK32 H 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",64,-12,0)
	SK32 G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SK32 H 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",64,-12,0)
	SK32 G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SK32 H 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",64,-12,0)
	SK32 G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SK32 H 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",64,-12,0)
	SK32 G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    SK32 II 5 A_FaceTarget
	SK32 I 0 A_Jump(90,"DeadHands")
    Goto See
  DeadHands:
    SK32 IJ 6 A_FaceTarget
    SK32 K 6 A_CustomMissile("LegRevFloorDeadHands",0,0,0)
	SK32 I 0 A_Jump(22,"AntiLegendaryBlast")
    Goto See
  AntiLegendaryBlast:
    SK32 GG 5 A_FaceTarget
	SK32 G 2 Bright A_PlayWeaponSound("lrball3/charge")
	SK32 GGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SK32 H 10 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SK32 H 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("lrball3/shot")
	SK32 H 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("SuperBall",64,-12,0)
	SK32 G 10 Bright A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
  Pain:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(42,"PainEvade","PainEvade2")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(104,"MissilePain")
    SK32 M 10 A_Pain
    Goto See
  PainEvade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(NOPAIN,1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,20,0,0)
    SK32 AAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("DraugrGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(NOPAIN,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(62,"Missile")
	Goto See
  PainEvade2:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(NOPAIN,1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,20,0,0)
    SK32 AAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("DraugrGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(NOPAIN,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(62,"Missile")
	Goto See
  MissilePain:
	SK32 M 10 A_Pain
    Goto Missile
  XDeath:
  Death:
    SK32 NO 7
    SK32 P 7 A_Scream
    SK32 Q 7 A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    SK32 R 7 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    SK32 S -1
    Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    SK32 SRQPON 4
    Goto See
    }
}

    Loop
  Toaster:

	Stop
}

{

  PainSound "superzombie/pain"

	EXPI A 10 A_Look

    EXP2 E 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",Random(30,34),0,Random(-4,4),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    EXP2 F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",Random(30,34),0,Random(-4,4),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/expmgunspinstop")
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(6,"See")
    Goto Missile+2
  Pain:
    EXP2 G 6 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    EXP2 H 5
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    EXP2 I 5 A_Scream
    EXP2 J 5 A_Fall
    EXP2 K 5 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    EXP2 LM 5
    EXP2 N -1
    Stop
  XDeath:
    EXP2 O 3
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    EXP2 P 3 A_XScream
    EXP2 Q 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    EXP2 R 3 A_Fall
    EXP2 STUV 3
	EXP2 W -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    EXP2 VUTSRQPO 5
    Goto See
  }
}

ACTOR BFG12KCaptain : BFGZombieman1
{
Health 280
Tag "\c[l2]BFG12K\c[g8] Captain\c-"
Obituary "%o was disintegrated by a BFG12K Captain."
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,4)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    B2GZ A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
    B2GZ AABB 3 A_Chase
    B2GZ B 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    B2GZ CCDD 3 A_Chase
    B2GZ D 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
  Missile:
	B2GZ EEEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG12000/Fire")
	B2GZ EEEEEEE 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DemonBFG12000Ball",32,0,0,0)
	B2GZ FFF 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	B2GZ EEE 6 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
    B2GZ G 6 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    B2GZ H 5
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    B2GZ I 5 A_Scream
    B2GZ J 5
    B2GZ K 5 A_Fall
    B2GZ L 5 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    B2GZ M 5
    B2GZ N -1
    Stop
  XDeath:
    B2GZ O 3
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    B2GZ P 3 A_XScream
    B2GZ Q 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    B2GZ R 3 A_Fall
	B2GZ S 3
    B2GZ T -1
    Stop
}
}

Actor InfernalKnight : HellKnight1
{
Health 1600
Speed 12
Mass 1000
Painchance 30
Scale 1.15
BloodColor "Red"
+FLOORCLIP
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+FASTMELEE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTBLAST
+BRIGHT
SeeSound "InfernalKnight/Sight" 
ActiveSound "InfernalKnight/Active"
PainSound "InfernalKnight/Pain"
DeathSound "InfernalKnight/Death"
Obituary "%o was obliterated by an Infernal Knight."
HitObituary "%o was teared by an Infernal Knight."
var int user_currenthp;
var int user_missile;
Tag "\c[z4]Infernal Knight\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	ST4X A 10 A_Look
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	STYI A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	ST4X AA 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronWalkFire")
	ST4X BB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronWalkFire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HoofStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
	ST4X CC 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronWalkFire")
	ST4X DD 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronWalkFire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HoofStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
	Loop
  Melee:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	ST4X EF 4 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X G 4 A_CustomMissile("StyxMeleeAttack",32)
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"BruiserBalls","BruiserComets","PyroComets","PyroFloorshits","HellfireTracers")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"SuperCombo")
  Normal:
	ST4X EF 4 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X G 2 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,-5)
	ST4X G 2 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,5)
	ST4X IJ 4 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X K 2 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,-5)
	ST4X K 2 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Normal","BruiserBalls")
	Goto See
  BruiserBalls:
	ST4X EF 4 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X G 1 A_CustomMissile("BBall2",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BBall",32,0,-5)
	ST4X G 1 A_CustomMissile("BBall",32,0,5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BBall",32,0,-10)
	ST4X G 2 A_CustomMissile("BBall",32,0,10)
	ST4X IJ 4 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X K 1 A_CustomMissile("BBall2",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BBall",32,0,-5)
	ST4X K 1 A_CustomMissile("BBall",32,0,5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BBall",32,0,-10)
	ST4X K 2 A_CustomMissile("BBall",32,0,10)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Normal","BruiserBalls")
	Goto See
  BruiserComets:
	ST4X EF 5 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X G 2 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,-5)
	ST4X G 3 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,5)
	ST4X IJ 5 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X K 2 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,-5)
	ST4X K 3 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"PyroComets")
	Goto See
  PyroComets:
	ST4X MN 6 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X O 1 A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",32,0,-7)
	ST4X O 1 A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",32,0,7)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",32,0,-14)
	ST4X O 4 A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",32,0,14)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"PyroFloorshits","HellfireTracers")
	Goto See
  PyroFloorshits:
	ST4X MN 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PyroFireSpawner",32,0,5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PyroFireSpawner",32,0,-5)
	ST4X O 6 A_CustomMissile("PyroFireSpawner",32,0,0)
	Goto See
  HellfireTracers:
	ST4X MN 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBaronTracer",32,0,5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBaronTracer",32,0,-5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBaronTracer",32,0,10)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBaronTracer",32,0,-10)
	ST4X O 6 A_CustomMissile("HFBaronTracer",32,0,0)
	Goto See
  SuperCombo:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("InfernalKnight/Sight",2)
	ST4X MMMMM 4 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	ST4X EF 4 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X G 2 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,-5)
	ST4X G 2 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,5)
	ST4X IJ 4 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X K 2 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,-5)
	ST4X K 2 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,5)
	ST4X EF 4 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X G 2 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,-5)
	ST4X G 2 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,5)
	ST4X IJ 4 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X K 2 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,-5)
	ST4X K 2 A_CustomMissile("HFBall",32,0,5)
	ST4X EF 3 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X G 2 A_CustomMissile("BBall2",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BBall2",32,0,-5)
	ST4X G 1 A_CustomMissile("BBall2",32,0,5)
	ST4X IJ 3 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X K 2 A_CustomMissile("BBall2",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BBall2",32,0,-5)
	ST4X K 1 A_CustomMissile("BBall2",32,0,5)
	ST4X EF 3 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X G 2 A_CustomMissile("BBall2",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BBall2",32,0,-5)
	ST4X G 1 A_CustomMissile("BBall2",32,0,5)
	ST4X IJ 3 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X K 2 A_CustomMissile("BBall2",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BBall2",32,0,-5)
	ST4X K 1 A_CustomMissile("BBall2",32,0,5)
	ST4X EF 5 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X G 2 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,-5)
	ST4X G 3 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,5)
	ST4X IJ 5 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X K 2 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,-5)
	ST4X K 3 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,5)
	ST4X EF 5 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X G 2 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,-5)
	ST4X G 3 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,5)
	ST4X IJ 5 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X K 2 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,-5)
	ST4X K 3 A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,5)
	ST4X MN 6 A_FaceTarget
	ST4X O 1 A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",32,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",32,0,-7)
	ST4X O 1 A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",32,0,7)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",32,0,-14)
	ST4X O 4 A_CustomMissile("PyroComet",32,0,14)
	ST4X MN 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBaronTracer",32,0,5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBaronTracer",32,0,-5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBaronTracer",32,0,10)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBaronTracer",32,0,-10)
	ST4X O 6 A_CustomMissile("HFBaronTracer",32,0,0)
	Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0
	ST4X Q 4 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Missile")
	Goto See
  XDeath:
  Death: 
	ST4X R 10 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	ST4X RRRRRRSSSSSSTTTTTTUUUUUUVVVVVV 2 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalKnightDeathEffectSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("BRIGHT",FALSE)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX",random(40,80),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	ST4X W 8 A_Fall
	ST4X XY 6
	ST4X Z -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("BRIGHT",1)
	ST4X ZYXWVUTSR 3
	Goto See
	}
}

Actor StyxMeleeAttack
{
  Projectile
  Height 6
  Radius 3
  Speed 35
  Renderstyle Add
  Damage (8*random(6,8))
  +THRUSPECIES
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  Species "Nobles"
  Damagetype "Hell"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 2
	Stop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(30,100,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom9",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX4",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	BRBA A 1 Bright A_PlaySound("monster/psodeath",0,1.0,0)
	BRBA DEFGGG 3 Bright A_FadeOut(0.1,1)
	Stop
	}
}

{
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CardinalFire",random(12,-12),random(12,-12),random(12,64),0,0,random(1,3),0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Kaboom9",random(12,-12),random(12,-12),random(12,64),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SmokeFX4",random(12,-12),random(12,-12),random(12,64),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronWalkFire",random(-20,20),random(-20,20),0,frandom(-1,1),frandom(-1,1))
    TNT1 A 1
    Stop
	}
}

Actor CyberInfernalNoble : InfernalKnight
{
Scale 1.25
Health 3600
Painchance 5
SeeSound "CyberInfernalNoble/Sight"
PainSound "CyberInfernalNoble/Pain"
DeathSound "CyberInfernalNoble/Death"

Obituary "%o was cremated alive by a Cyber Infernal Noble."
HitObituary "%o was incinerated from the mere touch of a Cyber Infernal Noble."
Tag "\c[m8]Cyber \c[z4]Infernal Noble\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	PBRU A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	PBRU AA 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronWalkFire")
	PBRU BB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronWalkFire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
	PBRU CC 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronWalkFire")
	PBRU DD 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronWalkFire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
	Loop
  Melee:
	PBRU GH 6 A_FaceTarget
	PBRU I 4 A_CustomMissile("StyxMeleeAttack",36)
	PBRU Z 4
    Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"BFG10K","MiniDTBFG","InfernalBlast")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(138,"Comets","FloorTracers")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Seekers","Digger")
  Normal: 
    PBRU E 12 A_FaceTarget
    PBRU F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",36,16,random(-3,3))
	PBRU EE 4 A_FaceTarget
    PBRU F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",36,16,random(-3,3))
	PBRU EE 4 A_FaceTarget
    PBRU F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",36,16,random(-3,3))
	PBRU EE 4 A_FaceTarget
    PBRU F 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",36,16,random(-3,3))
	PBRU EE 8 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Seekers")
	Goto See
  Seekers:
    PBRU E 12 A_FaceTarget
    PBRU F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",44,18,0)
	PBRU E 4 A_FaceTarget
    PBRU F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",44,18,0)
	PBRU E 4 A_FaceTarget
    PBRU F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",44,18,0)
	PBRU E 4 A_FaceTarget
    PBRU F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",44,18,0)
	PBRU E 4 A_FaceTarget
    PBRU F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",44,18,0)
	PBRU E 4 A_FaceTarget
    PBRU F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",44,18,0)
	PBRU E 4 A_FaceTarget
    PBRU F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",44,18,0)
	PBRU E 4 A_FaceTarget
    PBRU F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",44,18,0)
	PBRU E 4 A_FaceTarget
	PBRU EE 8 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Digger")
	Goto See
  Digger:
    PBRU EEEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	PBRU F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("digger/fire")

	PBRU EEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	PBRU F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("digger/fire")

	PBRU EEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	PBRU F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("digger/fire")

	PBRU EEE 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Comets")
    Goto See
  Comets:

	PBRU I 4 A_CustomMissile("Comet",36,0,14)
	PBRU IZ 4 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"FloorTracers")
	Goto See

    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"BFG10K")

  BFG10K:

	PBRU E 4 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
    PBRU F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",44,18,random(-2,2))
	PBRU E 4 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
    PBRU F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",44,18,random(-2,2))
	PBRU E 4 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
    PBRU F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",44,18,random(-2,2))
	PBRU E 4 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
    PBRU F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",44,18,random(-2,2))
	PBRU E 4 A_FaceTarget

    Goto See

	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    PBRU LMN 5

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)

	Goto See

Actor InfernalBlast : Comet 
{
Speed 64
Damage 85
Scale 1.7
Decal Scorch
SeeSound "HFCyb/rocket"
States
{
  Spawn:
    PC0M AAABBB 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("HugeExplosionParticle",random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(3,-3),random(3,-3),random(3,-3),0,128)
    Loop
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0 
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(192,256)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DiggerEx")
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(3,15,0,10,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DiggerExplosionFlare",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DiggerExplosionShockWave",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HugeExplosionParticle",random(64,-64),random(64,-64),random(64,-64),random(8,-8),random(8,-8),random(8,-8),0,128)
	TNT1 AAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("WarFireFlare",0,0,0,random(0,10),0,random(0,3),random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("DiggerExplosionKaboom",0,0,0,frandom(-4,4),frandom(-4,4),frandom(-4,4))
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SmokeFX3",random(8,-8),random(8,-8),random(8,-8),random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(0,3),0,128)
    TNT1 A 10
	Stop
}
}

ACTOR HellFireBaron : BaronOfHell
{
Health 4000
PainChance 30
Scale 1.3
BloodColor "ff 2c 00"
MeleeDamage 10
Obituary "%o was Burned to death by a HellFire Baron."
HitObituary "%o was ripped open by a HellFire Baron."
SeeSound "HellFireBaron/sight"
PainSound "monsters/baronpain"
DeathSound "HellFireBaron/Death"
MeleeSound "baron/melee"
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+FASTMELEE
+NOICEDEATH
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
var int user_script;
Tag "\c[z4]HellFire \c[v9]Baron\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	HFBY AA 7 Bright A_Look
	HFBI AA 7 Bright A_Look
	Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(70,"rush")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronWalkFire",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    HFBY AA 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronWalkFire",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    HFBY BB 3 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronWalkFire",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    HFBY CC 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronWalkFire",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	HFBY DD 3 Bright A_Chase
    Loop
  Rush:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	HFBY A 1 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	HFBY A 1 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	HFBY B 1 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	HFBY B 1 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	HFBY C 1 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	HFBY C 1 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	HFBY D 1 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HFBaronGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	HFBY D 1 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	HFBY D 1 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"See")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"GiantBalls","Comet","Tracers","Spread")
  Normal:
    HFBY EF 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	HFBY G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, -5)
	HFBY G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, 5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
    HFBY HI 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	HFBY G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, -5)
	HFBY G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, 5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"GiantBalls","Comet","Tracers","Spread")
	Goto See
  Spread:
	HFBY KL 8 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	HFBY M 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	HFBY M 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, 3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, -3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, 6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	HFBY M 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, -6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, 9)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, -9)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, 12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	HFBY M 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("HFBall", 32, 0, -12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"GiantBalls")
	Goto See
  GiantBalls:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")

	HFBY G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, 5)
	HFBY G 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, -5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
    HFBY HI 8 A_FaceTarget
	HFBY J 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	HFBY J 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, 5)
	HFBY J 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, -5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Comet")
	Goto See
  Comet:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
    HFBY EF 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	HFBY G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet", 32, 0, -5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	HFBY G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet", 32, 0, 5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
    HFBY HI 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	HFBY G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet", 32, 0, -5)
	HFBY G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet", 32, 0, 5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Tracers")
	Goto See

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFlameSpawner")

	Goto See

	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner", Random(10,-10), Random(10,-10), Random(30,60), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	HFBY OOOOOO 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner", Random(10,-10), Random(10,-10), Random(30,60), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	HFBY OOOOOO 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    HFBY PPPPPP 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("HellFireBaronFireFX",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(0,32))
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    HFBY Q 5 A_Fall
    HFBY R 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	HFBY ST 4
    HFBY U -1
    Stop
  XDeath:
	HFBX AB 5
	HFBX C 4 A_XScream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	HFBX D 4 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	HFBX E 3 A_Fall
	HFBX F 3 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	HFBX GH 3
	HFBX I -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	HFBY TSRQPO 6
	Goto See
}
