ACTOR Infernalist : Diabolist
{
Height 64
Radius 24
Health 5000
Scale 1.25
BloodColor "Black"
Obituary "%o was charred by an Infernalist."
+BOSS
+NOFEAR
+NORADIUSDMG
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.75
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.3
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.25
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.25
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor "Pierce", 0.6
DamageFactor "MarinePierce", 0.6
DamageFactor "Kaboom", 0.5
DamageFactor "MarineKaboom", 0.5
DamageFactor 0.75
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxTargetRange 6000
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
Tag "\c[z4]Infernalist\c-"
var int user_script;
var int user_amount;
var int user_rage;
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    IFLI A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Rush")
    IFLI A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
    IFLI AAB 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
	IFLI BCC 2 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
    IFLI DDE 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
	IFLI EFF 2 Bright A_Chase
    Loop
  Rush:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
    IFLI A 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
    IFLI A 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
    IFLI B 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
    IFLI B 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
    IFLI C 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
    IFLI C 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
    IFLI D 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
    IFLI D 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
    IFLI E 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
    IFLI E 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
    IFLI F 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
    IFLI F 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
    IFLI A 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
    IFLI A 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
    IFLI B 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
    IFLI B 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
    IFLI C 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
    IFLI C 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
    IFLI D 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
    IFLI D 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
    IFLI E 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
    IFLI E 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
    IFLI F 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistGhost",0,0)
    IFLI F 1 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"See")
    Loop
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetShootable
    TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(28,"Summon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(160,"FloorTracers","Comets","FloorTracer2")
  Normal:
    TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",1)
    IFLI G 10 Bright A_VileStart
    IFLI H 8 Bright A_VileTarget("InfernalistFireFX")
    IFLI IHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIH 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	IFLI IHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIH 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"FloorTracers")
    Goto See
  FloorTracers:
    IFL2 AABB 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    IFL2 C 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalistFloorFire",40,0,25)
    IFL2 C 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalistFloorFire",40,0,-25)
    IFL2 C 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalistFloorFire",40,0,15)
    IFL2 C 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalistFloorFire",40,0,-15)
    IFL2 C 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("InfernalistFloorFire",40,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Comets")
    Goto See
  Comets:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistCometFireSpawner",0,0,26)
	IFL2 A 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistCometFireSpawner",0,0,26)
	IFL2 B 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistCometFireSpawner",0,0,26)
	IFL2 C 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistCometFireSpawner",0,0,26)
    IFLI G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistCometFireSpawner",0,0,26)
    IFLI H 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistCometFireSpawner",0,0,26)
    IFLI I 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistCometFireSpawner",0,0,26)
    IFLI J 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistCometFireSpawner",0,0,26)
    IFLI K 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistCometFireSpawner",0,0,26)
    IFLI L 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistCometFireSpawner",0,0,26)
    IFLI M 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistCometFireSpawner",0,0,26)
    IFLI N 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalistComet",40,0,random(-4,4))
    IFLI O 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("InfernalistComet",40,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalistComet",40,0,random(-8,8))
    IFLI P 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("InfernalistComet",40,0,random(-8,8))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalistComet",40,0,random(-8,8))
    IFLI P 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("InfernalistComet",40,0,random(-8,8))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalistComet",40,0,random(-8,8))
    IFLI P 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("InfernalistComet",40,0,random(-8,8))
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"FloorTracer2")
	Goto See
  FloorTracer2:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("brain/spit",7)
    IFLI GHIJKLMN 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
    IFLI O 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("InfernalistFireSpawner",40,0,0)
    IFLI P 5 Bright
    Goto See
  Summon:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_amount > 3,"FloorTracer2")
    IFLI IHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIH 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistCometFireSpawner",0,0,26)
	//IFLI IIIIIIIIIIII 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistSpawners",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32,64)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("brain/spit")
	IFLI IIIIIIIIIIII 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistSummon",0,0,64,random(2,8),0,0,0,32,64)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_amount",user_amount+1)
	IFLI IHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIH 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistCometFireSpawner",0,0,26)
	Goto See
  Pain:
    IFLI Q 0 A_Jump(48,"PainRage")
    IFLI Q 3
	IFLI Q 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(138,"Missile")
	Goto See
  PainRage:
	IFLI Q 2 Bright A_Pain
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_rage >= 3,"Missile")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_rage",user_rage+1)
	IFLI I 1 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(10,80,0,24,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",300)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("Monster/diasit")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernoDemonRainCometSpawner",Random(1250,-1250),Random(1250,-1250),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	IFLI IIII 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("CardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
    IFLI II 3 Bright
    Goto See
  /*Heal:
	IFL2 A 8 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_RadiusGive("InfernalistResurrect",128,RGF_MONSTERS,1)
    IFL2 BC 8 Bright
    Goto See*/
  XDeath:
  Death:
    IFLI Q 6
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlackGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    IFLI R 5 A_Scream
	IFLI S 5 A_Fall
    IFLI TUV 5 A_SpawnItemEx("BlackGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	IFLI W 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    IFLI XY 4
    IFLI Z -1
    Stop
    }
}

Actor InfernalistSpawners
{
Radius 22
Height 56
Speed 17
Monster
+NODROPOFF
-SHOOTABLE
-COUNTKILL
-SOLID
MaxDropOffHeight 48
MaxStepHeight 32
var int user_limit;
States
{
   Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetAngle(random(0,359))
	TNT1 A 1 A_Recoil(-40)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_limit > 3,"Death")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",user_limit+1)
	TNT1 A 1 A_Recoil(-4)
	TNT1 A 2 A_Jump(48,"Death")
    Goto Spawn+3
   Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TeleportFog")
    TNT1 A 5 A_SpawnItemEx("Hellion")
	TNT1 A 1 A_Fall
	Stop
	}
}

  SpawnLoop:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_vilefire >= 3,"End")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_vilefire",user_vilefire+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistRainSpawner",0,0,128)
    FERF ABCD 1 Bright A_Fire
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistRainSpawner",0,0,128)

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistRainSpawner",0,0,128)

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalistRainSpawner",0,0,128)
    FERF EFGH 1 Bright A_Fire

  End:
	TNT1 A 1 //A_PlaySoundEx("exile/voidend","Voice")
	//TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    Stop
	}

Actor WidowMaker : Guardian
{
Health 750
Speed 10
Painchance 60
Radius 20
Height 56
DamageFactor "CadaverRocket", 0.0
SeeSound "widowmaker/sight"
ActiveSound "widowmaker/act"
PainSound "widowmaker/pain"
DeathSound "widowmaker/death"
Obituary "%o was perforated by a Widow maker."
+AVOIDMELEE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+FASTMELEE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.5
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
Tag "\cuWidow Maker\c-"
Decal BulletChip
States
{
  Spawn:
    WDMK O 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BonyStep",0,0,0,0)
    WDMK AAABBB 2 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BonyStep",0,0,0,0)
    WDMK CCCDDD 2 A_Chase
    Loop
  Melee:
    "####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
	"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("player/normjump")
    "####" "#" 8 A_Recoil(25)
	"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("plyrland")
    Goto Normal
  Pause:
	WDMK E 10
	Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"SeekMissile","SeekMissile2")
  Normal:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/mgunspinstart")
    WDMK E 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/mgunspin","Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(30,34),0,Random(5,-5),0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 12, 6, 28, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/minigunfire","Weapon")
    WDMK F 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(2,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
    WDMK E 1 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(30,34),0,Random(5,-5),0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/minigunfire","Weapon")
    WDMK F 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,0,1,random(2,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
    WDMK E 1 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(11,"Pause","SeekMissile")
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
    Goto Normal+3
  SeekMissile:
    WDMK EEEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	WDMK F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedHellfireRocket",40,0,0)
	WDMK E 3 A_FaceTarget
	WDMK F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedHellfireRocket",40,0,0)
	WDMK E 3 Bright
	Goto see
  SeekMissile2:
    WDMK G 0 A_JumpIf(ceilingz-floorz<=175,"SeekMissile")
    WDMK G 1 A_FaceTarget
	WDMK G 5
	WDMK G 1 A_FaceTarget
	WDMK G 3 A_PlaySound("widowmaker/beep")
	WDMK G 1 A_FaceTarget
	WDMK G 3 A_PlaySound("widowmaker/beep")
	WDMK G 1 A_FaceTarget
	WDMK G 3 A_PlaySound("widowmaker/beep")
	WDMK G 1 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("widowmaker/launch")
    WDMK H 4 Bright
	WDMK H 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("widowmakerMiniRockets",55,40,-25,90)
	WDMK H 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("widowmakerMiniRockets",55,25,0,90)
	WDMK H 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("widowmakerMiniRockets",55,10,25,90)
    WDMK H 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	WDMK G 2
    Goto See
  Pain:
    WDMK I 5
    WDMK I 5 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"Missile")
    Goto See
  XDeath:
  Death:
    WDMK I 7 A_Scream
	WDMK I 2 Bright A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	WDMK IIJJJ 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	WDMK JJJKK 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	WDMK KKLLL 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    WDMK M 6 A_NoBlocking
    WDMK N -1
    Stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    WDMK NMLKJI 6
    Goto See
	}
}

Actor WMPuff: CyNoblePuff

actor widowmakerMiniRockets : Hellfirerocket
{
	Radius 10
	Height 10
	Speed 24
	Scale 0.7
	Damage 6
	+ScreenSeeker
	ExplosionDamage 30
    ExplosionRadius 78
Decal RocketScorch
States
{
Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Homing")
Normal:
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    Loop
Homing:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Tracer2
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_Tracer2
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/homingrockbeep")
	Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Explode
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom3",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RocketExplosionFlare",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RocketExplosionShockWave",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128) 
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,0,random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,8),0,128)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("RocketEx")
    Stop

    }
}

Actor War : Guardian
{
Health 1600
Speed 12
Radius 20
Height 56
PainChance 20
Scale 1.05
SeeSound "War/Sight"
ActiveSound "War/Active"
PainSound "War/Pain"
DeathSound "War/Death"
Obituary "%o wanted war, and War %g received."
+AVOIDMELEE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+FASTMELEE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
var int user_missile;
var int user_script;
Tag "\cuWar\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    WARR C 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BonyStep",0,0,0,0)
    WARR AAABBB 2 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BonyStep",0,0,0,0)
    WARR CCCDDD 2 A_Chase
    Loop
  Melee:
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(350,"Flamethrower")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Combo")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(150,"HomingRockets","BFG15K","Napalm")
	Goto NormalRockets
  Flamethrower:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("hectebus/flameready")
	WARR EEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_missile",0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/fatsofire")
  FlamethrowerLoop:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_missile >= 40,"See")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_missile",user_missile+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarFlamethrower",39,-12,Random(-6,6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	WARR F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("WarFlamethrower",39,12,Random(-6,6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	Loop
  NormalRockets:
	WARR EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,-12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,-12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,-12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR E 5
	Goto See
  HomingRockets:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("War/Attack",7)
	WARR EEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,18,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,-11,0)
    WARR G 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,-18,0)
	WARR EEE 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,18,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,-11,0)
    WARR G 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,-18,0)
	WARR E 8
	Goto See
  BFG15K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("War/Attack",7)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
	WARR EEEEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",39,-12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR E 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",39,-12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR E 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",39,-12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR E 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",39,-12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR E 20
	Goto See
  Napalm:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("War/Attack",7)
	WARR EEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",39,-12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",39,-12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR E 20
	Goto See
  Combo:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("War/Attack",7)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("cydes/mischrg")
	WARR EEEEEEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,18,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,-11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,-18,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,-12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR H 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR EE 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,18,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,-11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,-18,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,-12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR H 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR EE 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,18,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,-11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,-18,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,-12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR H 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR EE 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,18,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,-11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,-18,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,-12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR H 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR EE 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,18,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,-11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,-18,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,-12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR H 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR EE 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,18,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,-11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,-18,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",39,-12,Random(-6,6))

	WARR EE 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,18,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,-11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,-18,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",39,-12,Random(-6,6))

	WARR E 5 A_FaceTarget

    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,18,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocket",68,-11,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("WarShoulderRocketHoming",68,-18,0)

	WARR H 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",39,12,Random(-6,6))
	WARR E 40
	Goto See
  Pain:
    WARR J 5
    WARR J 5 A_Pain
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"Missile")
    Goto See
  XDeath:
  Death:
    WARR J 7 A_Scream
	WARR J 2 Bright A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)

	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	WARR JJKKK 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))

	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))

	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	WARR LLLLL 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	WARR LLLMM 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	WARR MMMMM 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	WARR MMNNN 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    WARR N 6 A_NoBlocking
    WARR O -1
    Stop

ACTOR WarFlamethrower : MagmaBreath
{
  Species "Skeletons"
  DamageType "Hell"
  Speed 25
  Decal Scorch
  States
  {
  Spawn:
	FIR1 LKJIHGFEDCB 3 Bright A_Explode(Random(1,2),76)
	FIR1 AA 2 Bright A_FadeOut(0.15)
	Stop
	}
}

ACTOR WarShoulderRocket : UpdatedHellfireRocket
{
Speed 30
Decal RocketScorch
States
{
Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    Loop
    }
}

ACTOR WarShoulderRocketHoming : WarShoulderRocket
{
States
{
Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SeekerMissile(10,15)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SeekerMissile(10,15)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MissileTrail",0,Random(-2,2))
    CBRK A 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange",0,Random(-2,2))
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/homingrockbeep")
    Loop
    }
}

ACTOR WarFireFlare
{
  Projectile
  Height 4
  Radius 2
  Gravity 0.52
  Scale 1.8
  Renderstyle Add
  +DONTFALL
  -NOGRAVITY
  +NODAMAGETHRUST
  -EXTREMEDEATH
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +FORCERADIUSDMG
  Species "Skeletons"
  Damagetype "Hell"
  var int user_fireloop;
  States
  {
  Spawn:
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(waterlevel > 1, "MyFireDoesntActuallySuckUnlikeHEMCustom")
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(MOVEWITHSECTOR,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_fireloop",random(0,8))
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/ambientfire",7,1.0,1)
  DeathLoop:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_fireloop >= 20,"Death2")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_fireloop",user_fireloop+1)
	WARF AABBCC 1 Bright A_spawnItemEx("WarFireFlareParticle",random(-6,6),random(-6,6),random(0,3),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(2,7),random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(2,60)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_fireloop >= 20,"Death2")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_fireloop",user_fireloop+1)
	WARF DDEEFF 1 Bright A_spawnItemEx("WarFireFlareParticle",random(-6,6),random(-6,6),random(0,3),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(2,7),random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(2,60)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_fireloop >= 20,"Death2")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_fireloop",user_fireloop+1)
	WARF GGHHII 1 Bright A_spawnItemEx("WarFireFlareParticle",random(-6,6),random(-6,6),random(0,3),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(2,7),random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(2,60)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_fireloop >= 20,"Death2")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_fireloop",user_fireloop+1)
	WARF KKLLMM 1 Bright A_spawnItemEx("WarFireFlareParticle",random(-6,6),random(-6,6),random(0,3),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(2,7),random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(2,60)
	Loop
  Death2:
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSound(7)
	WARF MNOP 2 Bright
	Stop
  MyFireDoesntActuallySuckUnlikeHEMCustom:
	TNT1 A 1
	Stop
	}
}

Actor Hellion
{
Monster
Health 210
Radius 20
Height 56
Mass 120
Speed 6
BloodColor Yellow
PainChance 60
SeeSound "monster/hlnsit"
PainSound "monster/hlnpai"
DeathSound "monster/hlndth"
ActiveSound "monster/hlnact"
Obituary "A Hellion ignited %o alive."
//+FLOORCLIP
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
var int user_health;
Tag "\ciHellion\c-"
States
{
	Spawn:
		H2LN A 10 A_Look
		Loop
	See:
		TNT1 A 0
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HumanishStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
		H2LN AAAABBBBCCCCDDDD 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HumanishStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
		H2LN EEEFFF 1 A_Chase
		Loop
	Missile:
		TNT1 A 0
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Spreadshot","Tracers")
		H2LN G 0 A_VileStart
		H2LN GHIJ 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(53,"Spreadshot")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(39,"Tracers")
		H2LN KKKKK 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionBall",32,0,random(-2,2),0,0)
		H2LN KKKKK 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionBall",32,0,random(-2,2),0,0)
		H2LN KKKKK 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionBall",32,0,random(-2,2),0,0)
		H2LN KKKKK 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionBall",32,0,random(-2,2),0,0)
		H2LN KKKKK 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionBall",32,0,random(-2,2),0,0)
		H2LN L 7
		Goto See
	Spreadshot:
		H2LN KKKKKKKK 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionBall",32,0,0,0,0)
		TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionBall",32,0,-20,0,0)
		TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionBall",32,0,20,0,0)
		H2LN L 7
		GoTo See
	Tracers:
		H2LN KKKKKKKK 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionTracer1",32,5,0,0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionTracer2",32,-5,0,0,0)
		H2LN L 7
		GoTo See
	Pain:
		H2LN M 2
		H2LN M 2 A_Pain
		Goto See
	XDeath:
	Death:
		H2LN N 6
		H2LN O 6 A_Scream
		H2LN PQR 6
		H2LN S 6 A_Fall
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
		H2LN T 1 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
		HLDT AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("HellionCorpseIgnition",0,0,0)
		HLDT AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("HellionCorpseIgnition",0,0,0)
		HLDT BBBCCCDDD 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("HellionCorpseIgnition",0,0,0)
		HLDT EFG 3
		TNT1 A 0 A_RemoveChildren
		HLDT H -1
		Stop
	Raise:
		TNT1 A 0
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
		HLDT HGFE 4
		H2LN TSRQPON 6
		Goto See
	}
}

ACTOR DarkCybruiser
{
Monster
Health 1850
Height 64
Radius 24
Mass 1000
Speed 10
Scale 1.1
BloodColor Green
Painchance "Mine", 128
PainChance 5
MeleeDamage 8
+BOSSDEATH
+NOTARGET
+DONTMORPH
+FLOORCLIP
+FASTMELEE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+NORADIUSDMG
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
SeeSound "cbaron/sight"
ActiveSound "cbaron/active"
MeleeSound "baron/melee"
PainSound "blooddemon/pain"
DeathSound "monster/UBRdth"
AttackSound "weapons/dtrailf"
Obituary "%o was turned into a pile of guts 'n' bones by a Dark Cybruiser."
HitObituary "%o became a Dark Cybruiser's personal masochist bitch."
Tag "\c[l2]Dark Cybruiser\c-"
var int user_script;
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	UBRS AA 7 A_Look
	UBRI AA 7 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	UBRS AABB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
	UBRS CCDD 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(62,"Boost")
	Loop
  Boost:
	UBRS A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCybruiserGhostA",0,0)
	UBRS A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCybruiserGhostA",0,0)
	UBRS B 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCybruiserGhostB",0,0)
	UBRS B 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCybruiserGhostB",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
	UBRS C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCybruiserGhostC",0,0)
	UBRS C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCybruiserGhostC",0,0)
	UBRS D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCybruiserGhostD",0,0)
	UBRS D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCybruiserGhostD",0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(50,"See")
	Loop
  Pause:
	TNT1 A 0
	UBRS E 10
	UBRS E 20 A_PlaySound("weapons/12gsgcock")
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(300,"Grenadier")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Railgun","Rockets","HomingRockets","BFG15K")
  Normal:
	UBRS E 8 A_FaceTarget
	UBRS E 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ZDTRProjectile2",40,9,Random(-2,2),CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRR A 3 Bright A_PlaySound("weapons/demontechfire",CHAN_WEAPON)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(28,"Pause")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
	Goto Normal+1
  Railgun:
	UBRS E 2 A_FaceTarget
	UBRS E 5 A_PlaySound("weapons/rgcharge",CHAN_WEAPON)
	UBRS EEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	UBRS E 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("railgunner/chargedshot",CHAN_WEAPON)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DemonDTRail",32,20)
	UBRR A 5 Bright A_CustomRailgun(random(100,150),20,"00 85 FF",None,0,1,0,"DarkBruiserRailgunPuff",0,0,0,0,35.0,0.0,"DTRailCoreTrail")
	UBRS E 25
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Rockets","HomingRockets","BFG15K")
	Goto See
  Grenadier:
	UBRS E 8 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
	UBRR A 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkPaladinGrenade",32,20,random(-4,4))
	UBRS E 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
	UBRR A 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkPaladinGrenade",32,20,random(-4,4))
	UBRS E 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
	UBRR A 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkPaladinGrenade",32,20,random(-4,4))
	UBRS E 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/GrenadeFire")
	UBRR A 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkPaladinGrenade",32,20,random(-4,4))
	UBRS E 8 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Rockets:
	UBRS EE 6 A_FaceTarget
	UBRR A 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",32,20,0,CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRS EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	UBRR A 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",32,20,0,CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRS EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	UBRR A 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",32,20,0,CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRS EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	UBRR A 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonRocket",32,20,0,CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRS E 12
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"HomingRockets","BFG15K")
	Goto See
  HomingRockets:
	UBRS EE 6 A_FaceTarget
	UBRR A 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonHomer",32,20,0,CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRS EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	UBRR A 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonHomer",32,20,0,CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRS EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	UBRR A 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDarkDemonHomer",32,20,0,CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRS E 12
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"BFG15K")
	Goto See
  BFG15K:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k",CHAN_WEAPON)
	UBRS EEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	UBRS EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	UBRR A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",32,20,Random(2,-2),CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRS E 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	UBRR A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",32,20,Random(4,-4),CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRS E 4 A_FaceTarget
	UBRS F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyBruiser15K",32,20,Random(6,-6),CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRS E 4 A_FaceTarget
	UBRS F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyBruiser15K",32,20,Random(6,-6),CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRS E 4 A_FaceTarget
	UBRS F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyBruiser15K",32,20,Random(6,-6),CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRS E 4 A_FaceTarget
	UBRS F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyBruiser15K",32,20,Random(8,-8),CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRS E 4 A_FaceTarget
	UBRS F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyBruiser15K",32,20,Random(10,-10),CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	UBRS E 25 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_WEAPON)
	Goto See
  Melee:
	TNT1 A 0
	UBRS GH 4 A_FaceTarget
	UBRS I 4 A_MeleeAttack
	UBRS HG 4 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(107,"MissilePain")
	UBRS J 8 A_Pain
	Goto See
  MissilePain:
	TNT1 A 0
	UBRS J 8 A_Pain
	Goto Missile
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	UBRD K 30 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RockLX")
	UBRD KK 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4",Random(10,50),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	UBRD KK 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4",Random(10,50),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RockLX")
	UBRD KK 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4",Random(10,50),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	UBRD KK 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4",Random(10,50),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RockLX")
	UBRD KK 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4",Random(10,50),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	UBRD KK 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4",Random(10,50),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RockLX")
	UBRD KK 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4",Random(10,50),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	UBRD KK 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4",Random(10,50),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	UBRD KK 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4",Random(10,50),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	UBRD KK 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4",Random(10,50),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	UBRD LMN 5 Bright
	UBRD O 4 Bright A_Fall
	UBRD PQR 4 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_BossDeath
	UBRS S 3
	UBRS T -1
	Stop
	}

ACTOR DarkCydestroyer : DarkCybruiser
{
Health 2650
Speed 12
Scale 1.2
-FASTMELEE
SeeSound "cydes/sight"
PainSound "cydes/pain"
DeathSound "cydes/death"
Obituary "%o was dissolved into mere atoms by the Dark Cydestroyer."
Tag "\c[l2]Dark Cydestroyer\c-"
var int user_missile;
States
	{
	Spawn:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		DB2S AA 7 A_Look
		DB2I AA 7 A_Look
		Loop
	See:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
        TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	    TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
        TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
		DB2S AABB 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
		DB2S CCDD 2 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(62,"Boost")
		Loop
	Boost:
		DB2S A 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCydestroyerGhostA",0,0)
		DB2S A 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCydestroyerGhostA",0,0)
		DB2S B 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCydestroyerGhostB",0,0)
		DB2S B 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCydestroyerGhostB",0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
		DB2S C 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCydestroyerGhostC",0,0)
		DB2S C 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCydestroyerGhostC",0,0)
		DB2S D 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCydestroyerGhostD",0,0)
		DB2S D 1 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DCydestroyerGhostD",0,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(50,"See")
		Loop
	Pause:
		TNT1 A 0
		DB2S E 10
		DB2S E 20 A_PlaySound("weapons/12gsgcock")
		Goto See
	Melee:
	Missile:
		TNT1 A 0
		TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(150,"Flamethrowers")
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(300,"Grenadier")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Rockets","DTRailgun","HomingRockets","GreenLasers","ShoulderHomingRockets","ShoulderRockets")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"RocketSpammingCombo","BFG15K","BFG10K","RailgunV2")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"AntiLegendaryBlast")
	Normal:
		DB2S E 12 A_FaceTarget
		DB2S E 2 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DTSDemonTechProjectile",36,20,frandom(-2,2),0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DTSDemonTechProjectile",36,-20,frandom(-2,2),0)
		DB3S B 2 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(6,"Pause")
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
		Goto Normal+1
	DTRailgun:
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/rgcharge")
		DB2S EE 10 A_FaceTarget
		DB2S E 2 A_FaceTarget
		DB2S E 1
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/dtrailf")
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DemonDTRail",36,20,0)
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DemonDTRail",36,-20,0)

		DB3S E 0 A_PlaySound("smissile/fire")

		DB3S E 0 A_PlaySound("smissile/fire")
		DB3S E 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedShoulderRocket",60,-20,0)
		DB2S E 20
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"AntiLegendaryBlast")
		Goto See

		DB2S E 18 A_FaceTarget

		DB2S EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE 2 A_FaceTarget
		DB2S E 10 Bright A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("lrball3/shot")
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SuperBall",60,-20,0)
		DB3S D 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("SuperBall",60,20,0)
		DB2S E 10 A_FaceTarget
		Goto See
	Flamethrowers:

		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("hectebus/flameready")

		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Daedabus/Chem")

		TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
		DB2S GGGG 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
		DB2S HHHH 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
		TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
		TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
		DB2S IIIJJJ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
		TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
		TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
		DB2S KKKLLL 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
		TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
		TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
		DB2S M 4 Bright A_NoBlocking
		DB2S N 3 Bright
		DB2S OP 3
		DB2S Q -1
		Stop
	Raise:
		TNT1 A 0
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
		DB2S QPONMLK 4
		Goto See
	}
}

Actor DarkCydestroyerMiniLaser : FastProjectile
{
Height 5
Radius 5
Speed 70
Scale 1
Renderstyle Add
Alpha 0.8
Scale 0.65
Decal "Scorch"
Damage 7
+RANDOMIZE
//Missiletype "DarkCydestroyerMiniLaserTrail"
MissileHeight 8
SeeSound "lrball2/shot"
DeathSound "lrball2/exp"
Damagetype "Hell"
States
	{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeVelocity(1,0.5*random(-3,3),0.5*random(-2,2),CVF_RELATIVE)
		BRB2 A 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCydestroyerMiniLaserTrail")
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeVelocity(1,0.5*random(-3,3),0.5*random(-2,2),CVF_RELATIVE)
		BRB2 B 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCydestroyerMiniLaserTrail")
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeVelocity(1,0.5*random(-3,3),0.5*random(-2,2),CVF_RELATIVE)
		BRB2 A 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCydestroyerMiniLaserTrail")
		Loop
	Death:
		TNT1 A 0
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
		TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom7", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
		TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX4", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
		TNT1 A 10
		Stop
	}
}

ACTOR DarkCydestroyerMiniLaserTrail : BruiserBallTrail
{
  RenderStyle Add
  Alpha 0.75
  Scale 0.65
  +NOGRAVITY
  +CLIENTSIDEONLY
  +NOINTERACTION
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    //GDLS A 0 //A_SetScale(ScaleX -0.006, ScaleY -0.006)
    //GDLS A 2 Bright A_FadeOut(0.2)
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
	BRB2 CDEFGHIJ 1 Bright A_FadeOut
    Loop
  }
}

{

{

    TNT1 A 1
	Stop
}

ACTOR DCydestroyerGhostA
{
Radius 2
Height 64
RENDERSTYLE Translucent
Alpha 0.7
Scale 1.2
+NOINTERACTION
+CLIENTSIDEONLY
+NONETID
States
	{
	Spawn:
		TNT1 A 0
		TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
		TNT1 A 1
		DB2S A 2 A_FadeOut(0.1,1)
		Goto Spawn+1
    Toaster:
		TNT1 A 0
		Stop
	}
}

ACTOR CerebralCacodemon
{
Health 2000
Radius 24
Height 56
Mass 400
Meleedamage 8
Speed 10
PainChance 64
Monster
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+MISSILEMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
Species "CacoDemon"
SeeSound "CBcaco/see"
PainSound "CBcaco/pain"
DeathSound "CBcaco/death"
ActiveSound "CBcaco/active"
MeleeSound "caco/melee"
Obituary "%o was turned into a pile of mush by a Cerebral Cacodemon."
Tag "\c[m6]Cerebral Cacodemon\c-"
Scale 1.15
var int user_script;
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	CCAC A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	CCAC A 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(20,"Evade")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(62,"Rush")
	Loop
  Rush:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CBCacoGhostA")
	CCAC A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CBCacoGhostA")
	CCAC A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CBCacoGhostA")
	CCAC A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CBCacoGhostA")
	CCAC A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CBCacoGhostA")
	CCAC A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CBCacoGhostA")
	CCAC A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CBCacoGhostA")
	CCAC A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CBCacoGhostA")
	CCAC A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"See")
	Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,7)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,14,0,0)
	CCAC AAAA 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)
	CCAC AAAA 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(6,"BFG9500")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(12,"DTBFG10K")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"15K","HellStaffHoming")
  HellStaff:
	CCAC BC 6 A_FaceTarget
	CCAC D 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall1", 15, 0, -8)
	CCAC D 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall1", 15, 0, 8)
	CCAC D 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall1", 15, 0, -4)
	CCAC D 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall1", 15, 0, 4)
	CCAC D 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall1", 15)
	CCAC BC 6 A_FaceTarget
	CCAC D 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall1", 15, 0, -8)
	CCAC D 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall1", 15, 0, 8)
	CCAC D 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall1", 15, 0, -4)
	CCAC D 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall1", 15, 0, 4)
	CCAC D 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall1", 15)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"15K","HellStaffHoming")
	Goto See
  HellStaffHoming:
	CCAC BC 6 A_FaceTarget
	CCAC D 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall2", 15, 0, -20)
	CCAC D 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall2", 15, 0, 20)
	CCAC D 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall2", 15)
	CCAC BC 6 A_FaceTarget
	CCAC D 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall2", 15, 0, -20)
	CCAC D 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall2", 15, 0, 20)
	CCAC D 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoHellStaffBall2", 15)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"HellStaff")
	Goto See
  15K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
	CCAC BBBBCC 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	CCAC D 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15k", 15, 0, random(-4,4))
	CCAC C 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	CCAC D 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15k", 15, 0, random(-4,4))
	CCAC C 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	CCAC D 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15k", 15, 0, random(-4,4))
	CCAC C 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	CCAC D 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15k", 15, 0, random(-4,4))
	CCAC C 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  DTBFG10K:
	CCAC BBBBBBBBB 7 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Cardinal/9k")
	CCAC B 20 Bright A_FaceTarget
	CCAC C 15 Bright A_FaceTarget
	CCAC D 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonDTBFG10KBall",15)
	CCAC CB 15 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  BFG9500:
	CCAC BBBBBB 7 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfgf")
	CCAC B 15 Bright A_FaceTarget
	CCAC C 10 Bright A_FaceTarget
	CCAC D 10 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedSentientBFG9500Ball",15)
	CCAC CB 15 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Melee:
    CCAC BC 5 A_FaceTarget
	CCAC D 5 A_MeleeAttack
	CCAC CB 5 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
	CCAC E 3
	CCAC E 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
	CCAC G 8
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	CCAC H 8 A_Scream
	CCAC IJ 8
	CCAC K 8 A_NoBlocking
	CCAC L -1 A_SetFloorClip
	Stop
	}
}

  One:

ACTOR Corpulant
{  
Health 1500
Radius 30
Height 64
Mass 1000
Speed 8
PainChance 80
Scale 1.1
BloodColor "Red"
Monster
+FLOORCLIP
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+BOSSDEATH
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
SeeSound "Corpulant/See"
PainSound "Corpulant/Pain"
DeathSound "Corpulant/Death"
ActiveSound "Corpulant/Active"
Obituary "%o felt the relentless fury of the Corpulant."
Tag "\c[q7]Corpulant\c-"
var int user_script;
States
{
  Spawn:
    FOFO C 7 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BeefyStep",0,0,0,0)     
    FOFO AABBCCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BeefyStep",0,0,0,0)
    FOFO EEFF 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("FreezerBehe/Cannon",7)
	FOFO GG 5 A_FaceTarget
	FOFO G 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 10, 12, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 10, -12, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
	FOFO H 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("SentientExplosiveTracer",36,33,Random(-800,800)/100.00,0)
	TNT1 A 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("SentientExplosiveTracer",36,-33,Random(-800,800)/100.00,0)
	FOFO I 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 10, 12, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 10, -12, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
	FOFO H 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("SentientExplosiveTracer",36,33,Random(-800,800)/100.00,0)
	TNT1 A 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("SentientExplosiveTracer",36,-33,Random(-800,800)/100.00,0)
	FOFO I 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Weapon")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
    Goto Missile+3
  Pain:
    FOFO J 6 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
    FOFO K 6
    FOFO L 6 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    FOFO M 6 A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    FOFO NOPQRS 6
    FOFO T -1 A_BossDeath
    Stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    FOFO SRQPONMLK 6
    Goto See
}
}

Actor ChaosSoul
{
Monster
Health 200
Height 56
Radius 16
Mass 50
Speed 12
FloatSpeed 12
Damage 5
PainChance 100
BloodColor "Green"
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+MISSILEMORE
+DONTHARMCLASS
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTFALL
Damagetype "Hell"
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
SeeSound "ChaosSoul/Sight"
AttackSound "ChaosSoul/Sight"
PainSound "ChaosSoul/pain"
DeathSound "ChaosSoul/death"
Obituary "%o was driven insane by a Dark Umbra."
HitObituary "%o's head was taken by a Dark Umbra."
Tag "\c[l2]Dark Umbra\c-"
var int user_phase;
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
	CHOS A 2 Bright A_Look
	Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
	CHOS A 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(10,"Phase")
	Loop
  Phase:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner2")
    CHOS A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner2")
    CHOS A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.50)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner2")
    CHOS A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.25)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner2")
    CHOS A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner2")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_phase",0)
	Goto Phased
  Phased:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_phase >= 30,"Phased2")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_phase",user_phase+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ExtChase(0,0)
	CHOS A 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
	Loop
  Phased2:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase(0,0)
	CHOS A 1 A_Chase(0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(30,"Unphase")
	Loop
  UnPhase:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner2")
    CHOS A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner2")
    CHOS A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.25)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner2")
    CHOS A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.50)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner2")
    CHOS A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner2")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLOS("Missile")
    Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"Lightning")
  Normal:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	CHOS A 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
	CHOS B 1 Bright A_SkullAttack(40)
	CHOS BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS B 0 Thing_Stop(0)
	Goto See
  Lightning:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS B 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
	CHOS B 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosLightning",10,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS B 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
	CHOS B 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosLightning",10,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
    CHOS A 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
	CHOS C 2 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
	CHOS C 2 Bright A_Pain
	Goto See
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.75,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ChaosSoulSmokeSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(52,128)
	CHOS C 4 Bright A_NoGravity
	CHOS D 4 Bright A_Scream
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 15, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Chaos10KEx", 15, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,15,Random(4,-4),Random(4,-4),Random(4,8),0,128)
	CHOS E 3 Bright
	CHOS F 2 Bright A_NoBlocking
	CHOS G 4
	CHOS H 4
    Stop
	}
}

ACTOR ColdNightmare : BullFiend
{
Renderstyle Translucent
Alpha 0.75
Health 200
PainChance 80
Speed 14
Scale 1.1
MaxTargetRange 750
SeeSound "magma/sight"
PainSound "monster/psopain"
DeathSound "magma/death"
ActiveSound "magma/active"
AttackSound "magma/attack"
BloodColor "LightBlue"
DamageFactor "Ice", 0.0
DamageFactor "FreezerBurn", 0.0
+MISSILEMORE
+NOICEDEATH
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Damagetype "Hell"
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
Obituary "%o could not see the Cold Nightmare and was frostbitten."
HitObituary "%o was gnawed on by a Cold Nightmare."
Tag "\c[c1]Cold Nightmare\c-"
States
{
	Spawn:
		CNSP A 12 A_Look
		CNSI A 12 A_Look
        Loop
	See:
        CNSP AABB 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HeavyFleshStep",0,0,0,0)
        CNSP CCDD 2 A_Chase
        TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HeavyFleshStep",0,0,0,0)
        Loop
	Melee:
        CNSP EF 5 A_FaceTarget
        CNSP G 4 A_MeleeAttack
        CNSP E 5 A_FaceTarget
        Goto See
	Missile:
		TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Lunge")
	Normal:
	    CNSP GE 5 A_FaceTarget
	    CNSP F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("CNIceBall", 32, 0, 0)
		CNSP E 3
		Goto See
	Lunge:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(250,1)
	    Goto See
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("magma/attack")
	    CNSP EF 7 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,1)
	    TNT1 A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,20,0,1)
	    CNSP F 2 A_Recoil(-28)
	    CNSP F 3 A_CustomMissile("PinkyLunge",18,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	    CNSP G 6
	    CNSP G 2 A_ScaleVelocity(0.2)
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	    CNSP G 1 A_ScaleVelocity(0)
	    Goto See
	Pain:
		TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
        CNSP H 4 A_Pain
        Goto See
	Death:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
        CNSP I 5
        CNSP J 5 A_Scream
        CNSP K 4
        CNSP L 4 A_NoBlocking
        CNSP M 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
        CNSP N -1
        Stop
	XDeath:
	    TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	    CNSP I 3
        CNSX A 3 A_XScream
        CNSX B 3 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
        CNSX C 3 A_NoBlocking
        CNSX D 3 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	    CNSX EFG 3
        CNSX H -1
        Stop
	Raise:
	    TNT1 A 0
	    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
        CNSP NMLKJI 5
        Goto See
        }
}

Actor ChaosElemental
{
Health 2300
Radius 31
Height 56
Mass 1000
Speed 13
PainChance 20
Scale 0.85
Obituary "%o was fried by the Chaos Elemental's lightning."
Monster
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
Damagetype "Hell"
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
MeleeDamage 20
MeleeRange 68
Bloodcolor "Green"
SeeSound "ChaosElemental/Sight"
PainSound "ChaosElemental/Pain"
DeathSound "ChaosElemental/Death"
ActiveSound "ChaosElemental/Active"
MeleeSound "caco/melee"
Tag "\c[l2]Dark Beholder\c-"
var int user_script;
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	CHEL A 10 A_Look
    loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	CHEL A 0 A_SetShootable
    CHEL A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
    CHEL AABBAACC 3 A_Chase
    //CHEL A 0 A_Jump(32,"Teleport")
    Loop
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(200,"Missile2","Missile3")
    Goto Missile1
  Missile1:
    CHEL DE 8 A_FaceTarget
    CHEL FF 8 Bright A_PainAttack("ChaosSoul")
    CHEL ED 8 A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
  Missile2:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("ChaosElemental/Sight")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("OverseerBrainSFX",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("ChaosSuperLightningFX5",40,43,0,0)
    CHEL G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("OverseerBrainSFX",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("ChaosSuperLightningFX5",40,43,0,0)
    CHEL G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("OverseerBrainSFX",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("ChaosSuperLightningFX4",40,43,0,0)
    CHEL G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("OverseerBrainSFX",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("ChaosSuperLightningFX4",40,43,0,0)
    CHEL G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("OverseerBrainSFX",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("ChaosSuperLightningFX3",40,43,0,0)
    CHEL G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("OverseerBrainSFX",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("ChaosSuperLightningFX3",40,43,0,0)
    CHEL G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("OverseerBrainSFX",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("ChaosSuperLightningFX2",40,43,0,0)
    CHEL H 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("OverseerBrainSFX",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("ChaosSuperLightningFX2",40,43,0,0)
    CHEL H 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("OverseerBrainSFX",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("ChaosSuperLightningFX",40,43,0,0)
    CHEL H 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("OverseerBrainSFX",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("ChaosSuperLightningFX",40,43,0,0)
    CHEL H 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("OverseerBrainSFX",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("ChaosSuperLightningFX",40,43,0,0)
    CHEL H 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("OverseerBrainSFX",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("ChaosSuperLightningFX",40,43,0,0)
    CHEL H 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    CHEL I 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosSuperLightningProj",43,0,0,0,0)
	CHEL HG 10 Bright
	Goto See
  Missile3:
    CHEL JJJJJJJJ 1 A_FaceTarget
    CHEL K 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosLightning",82,-34,random(-3,3),0,random(-3,3))
    CHEL K 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosLightning",16,-34,random(-3,3),0,random(-3,3))
    CHEL K 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosLightning",82,34,random(-3,3),0,random(-3,3))
    CHEL K 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosLightning",16,34,random(-3,3),0,random(-3,3))
    CHEL K 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosLightning",54,-42,random(-3,3),0,random(-3,3))
    CHEL K 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosLightning",54,42,random(-3,3),0,random(-3,3))
    CHEL J 4 A_SpidRefire
    CHEL J 0 A_Jump(32,"See")
    goto Missile3+8
  Melee:
    CHEL ADF 5 A_FaceTarget
    CHEL E 5 A_MeleeAttack
    goto See
  Pain:
    //CHEL L 0 A_Jump(20,"Teleport")
    CHEL L 3
    CHEL L 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
    Goto See
  /*Teleport:
    CHEL J 1 Bright A_UnSetShootable
	CHEL JJJJJJJJJJJ 1 A_FadeOut(0.1,0)
	CHEL J 1
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
    CHEL J 1 A_PlayWeaponSound("boss/teleport")
	CHEL JJJJJJJJJJJ 1 A_FadeIn(0.1)
    CHEL J 1 Bright A_SetShootable
    Goto See*/
  Death:
    CHEL L 20 A_ScreamAndUnblock
    CHEL M 8 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("BFlan/LightningExp",7)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("PlayerDTBFGEx",0,30)
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner", 0, 0, random(30,50), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX",random(30,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom11",random(30,50),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(20,8,0,12,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(260,200)
    CHEL N 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,40),0,0,0,0,128,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(260,200)
    CHEL NOO 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,40),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,40),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PainDie("ChaosSoul")
    CHEL PPPPP 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosFlesh1",random(0,90),random(0,40),random(-180,180),2,random(-15,15))
    CHEL PPPPP 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosFlesh2",random(0,90),random(0,40),random(-180,180),2,random(-15,15))
    CHEL PPPPPPPPPP 0 A_CustomMissile("ChaosFlesh3",random(0,90),random(0,40),random(-180,180),2,random(-15,15))
    CHEL PPPPPPPPPP 0 A_CustomMissile("ChaosFlesh4",random(0,90),random(0,40),random(-180,180),2,random(-15,15))
    CHEL PPPPPPPPPP 0 A_CustomMissile("ChaosFlesh5",random(0,90),random(0,40),random(-180,180),2,random(-15,15))
    CHEL PPPPPPPPPP 0 A_CustomMissile("ChaosFlesh6",random(0,90),random(0,40),random(-180,180),2,random(-15,15))
    CHEL P 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosBigArm1",40,-40,-90,2,random(-1,1))
    CHEL P 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosBigArm2",40,40,90,2,random(-1,1))
    CHEL P 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosSmallArm1",100,-30,-90,2,random(-15,15))
    CHEL P 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosSmallArm1",100,30,90,2,random(-15,15))
    CHEL P 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosSmallArm2",100,-30,-90,2,random(-15,15))
    CHEL P 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosSmallArm2",100,30,90,2,random(-15,15))
    CHEL P 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosHorn1",110,-16,-90,2,random(-15,15))
    CHEL P 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("ChaosHorn2",110,16,90,2,random(-15,15))
    CHEL PQRSTUV 8 Bright
    Stop
  }
}

actor ChaosSuperLightningTrail : ImpballTrail
{
  Scale 1.2
  Renderstyle Add
  Alpha 0.8
  +NOINTERACTION
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
    TNT1 A 1
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(255, "Puff1", "Puff2", "Puff3")
  Puff1:
    CL2G F 1 Bright A_FadeOut(0.1)
    Loop
  Puff2:
    CL2G G 1 Bright A_FadeOut(0.1)
    Loop
  Puff3:
    CL2G H 1 Bright A_FadeOut(0.1)
    Loop
  }
}

ACTOR DarkCyberImp : CyberImp
{

{
	Spawn:
		DCIP A 10 A_Look
		Loop
	See:
		DCIP AABB 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("cbaron/metal")
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
		DCIP CCDD 3 A_Chase
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)

		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DCimpGhostC",0,0)

		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("DCimpGhostD",0,0)

		DCIP F 3 A_MeleeAttack
		Goto See

		DCIP G 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
		DCIP G 1 Bright A_Custommissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,4,random(-3,3))
		DCIP FFG 2 A_FaceTarget
		DCIP G 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
		DCIP G 1 Bright A_Custommissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,4,random(-3,3))
		DCIP FFG 2 A_FaceTarget
		DCIP G 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
		DCIP G 1 Bright A_Custommissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,4,random(-3,3))
		DCIP FFG 2 A_FaceTarget
		DCIP G 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
		DCIP G 1 Bright A_Custommissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,4,random(-3,3))
		DCIP FFG 2 A_FaceTarget
		DCIP G 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
		DCIP G 1 Bright A_Custommissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,4,random(-3,3))
		DCIP FFG 2 A_FaceTarget
		DCIP G 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
		DCIP G 1 Bright A_Custommissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,4,random(-3,3))
		DCIP FFG 2 A_FaceTarget
		DCIP G 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
		DCIP G 1 Bright A_Custommissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,4,random(-3,3))
		DCIP FFG 2 A_FaceTarget
		DCIP G 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
		DCIP G 1 Bright A_Custommissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,4,random(-3,3))
		DCIP FFG 2 A_FaceTarget
		DCIP G 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
		DCIP G 1 Bright A_Custommissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,4,random(-3,3))
		Goto See
	Railgun:
		DCIP EF 7 A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/railgf")
		TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("RailgunImpact",30)
		DCIP G 5 Bright A_CustomRailgun(Random(25,40),0,"Green",None,RGF_NOPIERCING,1,0,"HellBulletPuff",0,0,0,0,0.45,0,"NewRailgunTrailGreen")
		DCIP E 40
		Goto See
	BFG15K:
		TNT1 A 0
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
		DCIP FFFFFFF 5 A_FaceTarget
		DCIP G 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",36,4,random(-4,4))
		DCIP FFFFFFF 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
		TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
		DCIP F 25 Bright
		Goto See
	Pain:
		DCIP H 2
		DCIP H 2 A_Pain
		Goto See
	Death:
		DCIP I 8
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
		DCIP J 8 A_Scream
		DCIP K 6
		DCIP L 6 A_NoBlocking
		DCIP M -1
		Stop
	XDeath:
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
		DCIP N 5
		TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
		DCIP O 5 A_XScream
		DCIP P 5
		DCIP Q 5 A_NoBlocking
		DCIP RST 5
		DCIP U -1
		Stop
	Raise:
		TNT1 A 0
		TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
		DCIP MLKJI 8
		Goto See
	}
}

ACTOR DarkRocketImp : RocketImp
{
Health 400
PainChance 100
SeeSound "DarkHellRazer/Sight"
PainSound "DarkHellRazer/Pain"
DeathSound "DarkHellRazer/Death"
ActiveSound "DarkHellRazer/Active"
Obituary "%o was exterminated by a Dark Annihilator Imp."
Tag "\c[l2]Dark Annihilator Imp\c-"
BloodColor Green
Scale 1.15
States
{
  Spawn:
	KIMP A 10 A_Look
	KIMI A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	KIMP AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	KIMP CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(38,"Rush")
	Loop
  Rush:
	KIMP A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkRocketImpGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	KIMP A 1 A_Chase

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkRocketImpGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	KIMP B 1 A_Chase
	KIMP B 0 A_Chase
	KIMP B 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkRocketImpGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	KIMP B 1 A_Chase
	KIMP B 0 A_Chase
	KIMP B 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkRocketImpGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HumanishStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
	KIMP C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkRocketImpGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkRocketImpGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	KIMP D 1 A_Chase

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HumanishStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(42,"See")
	Loop
  Melee:
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"BFG15K")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Rocket")
  Normal:
    KIMP EE 3 A_FaceTarget
	KIMP W 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
    KIMP W 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",32,-8,-6)
	KIMP W 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
    KIMP W 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",32,-8,-3)
	KIMP W 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
    KIMP W 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",32,-8,0)
	KIMP W 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
    KIMP W 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",32,-8,3)
	KIMP FFF 4 A_FaceTarget
	KIMP GG 3 A_FaceTarget
	KIMP V 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
    KIMP V 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",32,8,6)
	KIMP V 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
    KIMP V 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",32,8,3)
	KIMP V 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
    KIMP V 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",32,8,0)
	KIMP V 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/demontechfire","Weapon")
    KIMP V 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",32,8,-3)
	KIMP G 5
    Goto See
  Rocket:
	KIMP EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	KIMP W 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkRocketImpRocket",32,-8,random(-4,4))
	KIMP FG 5 A_FaceTarget
	KIMP V 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkRocketImpRocket",32,8,random(-4,4))
	KIMP F 5 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  BFG15K:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
	KIMP FFFFF 5 A_FaceTarget
	KIMP EE 5 A_FaceTarget
	KIMP W 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",32,-8,random(-4,4))
	KIMP FG 5 A_FaceTarget
	KIMP V 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",32,8,random(-4,4))
	KIMP F 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
	KIMP F 25
	Goto See
  Pain:
    KIMP H 2
    KIMP H 2 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
    KIMP I 8
    KIMP J 8 A_Scream
    KIMP K 6
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    KIMP L 6 A_NoBlocking
	KIMP M 0 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    KIMP M -1
    Stop
  XDeath:
    KIMP H 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RockLX")
	KIMP HHHHH 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4",Random(10,50),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    KIMP H 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	KIMP H 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RockLX")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	KIMP HHQQRRSSTT 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom4",Random(10,50),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    KIMP U -1
    Stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    KIMP ML 8
    KIMP KJI 6
    Goto See
  }
}

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenRocketExplosionShockWave",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)

ACTOR DarkRocketImpGhostA
{
Height 56
Radius 2
Alpha 0.75
Scale 1.1
RENDERSTYLE Translucent
+NONSHOOTABLE
+NOINTERACTION
+CLIENTSIDEONLY
+NONETID
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
	KIMP A 2 A_FadeOut(0.1,1)
	Loop
    Toaster:
	TNT1 A 0
	Stop
}
}
