ACTOR LesserCardinal
{
Monster
Health 2700
Radius 24
Height 64
PainChance 40
Speed 8
Scale 1.1
Mass 800
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+BOSSDEATH
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+NORADIUSDMG
+NOICEDEATH
+Bright
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
BloodColor "ff 2c 00"
MeleeDamage 14
Obituary "%o underestimated a Lesser Cardinal."
HitObituary "%o underestimated a Lesser Cardinal."
SeeSound "cydes/sight"
PainSound "cydes/pain"
DeathSound "cydes/death"
ActiveSound "cbaron/active"
MeleeSound "baron/melee"
Tag "\c[w8]Lesser Cardinal\c-"
var int user_rageloop;
var int user_flames;
var int user_script;
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LesserCardinalFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/ambientfire",7,1.0,1)
	MCRD AB 2 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LesserCardinalFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    MCRD AB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"Avoid")
    Loop
  Avoid:
    MCRD A 0
    MCRD A 0 A_SetAngle(angle+random(0,359))
    MCRD A 0 A_Recoil(-35)
    MCRD A 0 A_FaceTarget
	MCRD HHHHHHHHHHHHHH 1 A_SpawnItemEx("LesserCardinalFX")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"See")
	MCRD A 1 A_Stop
	Goto Avoid
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Rocket")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"BFG10K","Railgun","Homing","CometRain","MiniDTBFG")
  Comets:
	MCRD EF 7 A_FaceTarget
	MCRD G 3 A_CustomMissile("Comet",46,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",46,0,6)
	MCRD G 3 A_CustomMissile("Comet",46,0,-6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Rocket")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Avoid")
	Goto See
  Rocket:
    MCRD C 12 A_FaceTarget
    MCRD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,20,0,0)
    MCRD C 6 A_FaceTarget
    MCRD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,20,0,0)
    MCRD C 6 A_FaceTarget
    MCRD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,20,0,0)
    MCRD C 6 A_FaceTarget
    MCRD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,20,0,0)
    MCRD C 6 A_FaceTarget
    MCRD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,20,0,0)
    MCRD C 10
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(40,"Homing")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Avoid")
    Goto See
  Homing:
    MCRD C 12 A_FaceTarget
    MCRD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalHomingRocket",46,20,0,0)
    MCRD C 6 A_FaceTarget
    MCRD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalHomingRocket",46,20,0,0)
    MCRD C 6 A_FaceTarget
    MCRD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalHomingRocket",46,20,0,0)
    MCRD C 6 A_FaceTarget
    MCRD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalHomingRocket",46,20,0,0)
    MCRD C 6 A_FaceTarget
    MCRD D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalHomingRocket",46,20,0,0)
    MCRD C 10
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(40,"Rocket")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Avoid")
    Goto See
  BFG10K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/charge15k")
    MCRD CCCCC 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
    MCRD D 3 A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",46,20,random(-3,3),0)
    MCRD C 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
    MCRD D 3 A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",46,20,random(-3,3),0)
    MCRD C 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
    MCRD D 3 A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",46,20,random(-3,3),0)
    MCRD C 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
    MCRD D 3 A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",46,20,random(-3,3),0)
    MCRD C 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
    MCRD D 3 A_CustomMissile("DemonRed10KProjectile",46,20,random(-3,3),0)
    MCRD C 16 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Railgun")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Avoid")
    Goto See
  Railgun:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/rgcharge")
	MCRD CCCCC 5 A_FaceTarget
	MCRD D 5 A_CustomMissile("CardinalRail",46,20)
	MCRD C 20
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Avoid")
	Goto See
  MiniDTBFG:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("LesserCardinal/BFGCharge")
	MCRD CCCCCCC 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("LesserCardinal/BFGFire")
	MCRD D 5 A_CustomMissile("LesserCardinalMiniDTBFG",46,20)
	MCRD C 30
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Railgun")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Avoid")
	Goto See
  CometRain:
	MCRD GF 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LesserRainCometSpawner2",46,0,-20)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LesserRainCometSpawner2",46,0,20)
	MCRD E 20 A_CustomMissile("LesserRainCometSpawner2",46,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Comets")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Avoid")
	Goto See
  Melee:
    MCRD EF 7 A_FaceTarget
    MCRD G 7 A_MeleeAttack
    Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(16,"PainRage")
    MCRD H 4 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Missile")
    Goto See
  PainRage:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(800,1)
	Goto Pain+1
	MCRD H 20 Bright A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(6,60,0,18,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",250)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("LesserCardinal/Laugh")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_rageloop",0)
  PainRageLoop:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_rageloop >= 15,"PainRageEnd")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_rageloop",user_rageloop+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LesserCardinalRageFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	MCRD H 2 A_SpawnItemEx("LesserRainCometSpawner",Random(-800,800),Random(-800,800),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION,0)
	Loop
  PainRageEnd:
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	MCRD H 6
	Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSound(7)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    MCRD I 20 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	MCRD JJJJ 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	MCRD KKKK 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	MCRD LLLL 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	MCRD MMMM 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    MCRD N 4 A_NoBlocking
    MCRD O 3
	TNT1 A 0 A_BossDeath
    Stop
    }
}

ACTOR LesserCardinalMiniDTBFG : CardinalDTBFG10KBall
{
Speed 50
DamageType "Hell"
Obituary "%o underestimated a Lesser Cardinal."
Scale 0.4
Damage 25
Decal BFG9500LightningRed
+SKYEXPLODE
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("LesserCardinal/BFGIdle","Voice",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange2",Random(-12,12),Random(-12,12),Random(12,22),Random(-2,2),Random(-2,2),Random(-2,2),Random(-20,20),128)
    CRS1 ABCD 1 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ProjectileTrailParticleOrange2",Random(-12,12),Random(-12,12),Random(12,22),Random(-2,2),Random(-2,2),Random(-2,2),Random(-20,20),128)
	CRS1 ABCD 1 Bright
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LesserCardinalBFGProjectileAttack",Random(-10,10),0,0,CMF_TRACKOWNER)
    Loop
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.75,1)
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(5,60,0,10,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(40,200)
	CRS1 A 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BFGShockwaveRed", 0, 0, 15, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(40,200)
	CRS1 B 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BFGShockwaveRed", 0, 0, 15, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(40,200)
	CRS1 C 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BFGShockwaveRed", 0, 0, 15, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(40,200)
	CRS1 D 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BFGShockwaveRed", 0, 0, 15, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(240,240)
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(20,12,0,12,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg95explode")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BFGShockwaveRed", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RedParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom14", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetScale(1.0)
    CFE1 ABCDEF 4 Bright
    Stop
}
}

ACTOR BabyMastermind : Arachnotron
{
  Health 500
  PainChance 80
  Speed 12
  Radius 36
  SeeSound "monsters/dualachsee"
  PainSound "monsters/fusionitepain"
  DeathSound "monsters/dualachdeath"
  AttackSound ""
  Species "Hell"
  DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
  DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2

  +MISSILEMORE
  +DONTHARMSPECIES
  +QUICKTORETALIATE
  MaxStepHeight 32
  MaxDropOffHeight 32
  Obituary "%o was filled full of lead by a Baby Mastermind."
  Tag "\ccBaby Mastermind\c-"
  Decal BulletChip
  States
  {

    CSP0 A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    CSP0 A 2 A_BabyMetal
    CSP0 ABBCC 2 A_Chase
    CSP0 D 2 A_BabyMetal
    CSP0 DEEFF 2 A_Chase
    Loop
  Pause:
    CSP0 A 10

	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/darkmasterwind2")

    CSP0 G 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(20.0, 0, 1, Random(1,5)*3, "HellBulletPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/minigunfire","Weapon")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 8, -8, 18, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    CSP0 H 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(20.0, 0, 1, Random(1,5)*3, "HellBulletPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(6,"Pause")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
    Goto Missile+2

    CSP0 I 12 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Missile")
    Goto See

	CSP0 J 6 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)

    CSP0 L 6 A_NoBlocking
    CSP0 MNO 6
    CSP0 P -1
    Stop

  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    CSP0 PONMLKJ 5
    Goto See+1
  }

Actor BattleLordOfHell
{
Scale 2.15
Health 6600
PainChance 8
Radius 40
Height 110
Mass 5000
Speed 15
Monster
+FLOORCLIP
+BOSS
+NOFEAR
+NORADIUSDMG
+LOOKALLAROUND
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.5
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.25
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.2
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.2
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor 0.55
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
MeleeDamage 36
MeleeRange 125
SeeSound "battlelord/see"
PainSound "battlelord/pain"
DeathSound "battlelord/death"
ActiveSound "baron/active"
Obituary "%o was fried by a Battlelord of Hell."
HitObituary "%o was beaten to death by a Battlelord of Hell."
Tag "\c[s0]Battlelord \c[i7]of Hell\c-"
var int user_script;
var int user_charge;
States
{
 Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	HLGD A 10 A_Look
	Loop
 See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("DROPOFF",FALSE)
    HLGD A 0 A_PlaySound("hellboss/step")
	HLGD AABB 3 A_Chase
	HLGD C 0 A_PlaySound("hellboss/step")
	HLGD CCDD 3 A_Chase
	Loop
 Missile:
    HLGD F 0 A_JumpIfCloser(1000,2)
    HLGD F 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	HLGD F 0 A_Jump(64,"Charge")
    HLGD F 0 A_Jump(127,"Seeker","SpiritBomb","Spread")
 Normal:
	HLGD EEEE 8 A_FaceTarget
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordBall",74,-24,0)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordBall2",58,-24,0)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordBall3",74,-8,0)
	HLGD F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BattleLordBall4",58,-8,0)
	HLGD EEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	HLGD E 0 A_Jump(40,"See","Seeker","Spread")
	HLGD E 0 A_MonsterRefire(190,"See")
	Goto Normal+4
 Seeker:
 	HLGD EE 8 A_FaceTarget
	HLGD F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSeekBall",66,-16,0)
	HLGD E 8 A_FaceTarget
	HLGD F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSeekBall",66,-16,0)
    HLGD E 8 A_FaceTarget
	HLGD F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSeekBall",66,-16,0)
	HLGD E 8 A_FaceTarget
	HLGD F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSeekBall",66,-16,0)
	HLGD F 0 A_Jump(127,"Spread")
    Goto See
 Spread:
 	HLGD EE 8 A_FaceTarget
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,16)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,-16)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,12)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,-12)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,8)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,-8)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,4)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,-4)
	HLGD F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,0)
	HLGD EE 8 A_FaceTarget
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,16)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,-16)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,12)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,-12)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,8)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,-8)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,4)
	HLGD F 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,-4)
	HLGD F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSoulBall",66,-16,0)
	HLGD EE 8 A_FaceTarget
	HLGD F 0 A_Jump(127,"SpiritBomb")
    Goto See
 SpiritBomb:
    HLGD E 0
    HLGD E 0 A_PlaySound("battlelord/see")
  	HLGD EEEE 8 A_FaceTarget
	HLGD F 14 Bright A_CustomMissile("BattleLordSpiritBomb",66,-16,0)
	HLGD EEEE 8 A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
 Charge:
    HLGD E 2 A_JumpIfCloser(1000,1)
	Goto Missile
  	HLGD EEE 8 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("DROPOFF",TRUE)
	HLGD E 0 A_SetUserVar("user_charge",0)
	HLGD E 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("InfernalEmperor/Hammer")
	HLGD E 0 A_Recoil(-100)
 ChargeGoing:
    HLGD E 0 A_JumpIf(user_charge >= 12,"ChargeEnd")
    HLGD E 0 A_SetUserVar("user_charge",user_charge+1)
	HLGD E 0 A_CustomMissile("BattleLordChargeDamage",24,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	HLGD E 1 A_SpawnItemEx("BattleLordOfHellGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	Loop
 ChargeEnd:
	HLGD A 8
	HLGD F 0 A_Jump(88,"Missile")
    Goto See
 Melee:
	HLGD AA 4 A_FaceTarget
	HLGD E 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("InfernalEmperor/Hammer")
	HLGD E 4 A_MeleeAttack
	HLGD EE 7 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
 Pain:
	HLGD G 3
	HLGD G 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Missile")
	Goto See
 Death:
    HLGD H 2 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RevengeLostSpirit",random(-48,48),random(-48,48),random(10,70),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(2,6),random(0,359))
 	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	HLGD IIIJJJ 2 A_SpawnItemEx("RevengeLostSpirit",random(-48,48),random(-48,48),random(10,70),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(2,6),random(0,359))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RevengeLostSpirit",random(-48,48),random(-48,48),random(10,70),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(2,6),random(0,359))
 	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	HLGD KKKLLL 2 A_SpawnItemEx("RevengeLostSpirit",random(-48,48),random(-48,48),random(10,70),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(2,6),random(0,359))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RevengeLostSpirit",random(-48,48),random(-48,48),random(10,70),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(2,6),random(0,359))
 	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	HLGD MMMMM 2 A_SpawnItemEx("RevengeLostSpirit",random(-48,48),random(-48,48),random(10,70),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(2,6),random(0,359))
    HLGD N 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    HLGD N -1
    Stop
}
}

ACTOR BattleLordSoulBall
{

  Spawn:

	Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX4", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	SHBA CDEFGHIJKL 2 Bright
	Stop
    }
}

ACTOR BattleLordSoulBallTrail : BFG9500Trail

Actor BattleLordSpiritBomb
{
PROJECTILE
Damage 85
Scale 2.0
Alpha 0.8
Renderstyle Add
Radius 7
Height 12
Speed 50
DamageType "Marine"
SeeSound "weapons/spirit1"
DeathSound "velocirator/spell1"
DamageType "Hell"
Decal Scorch
States
{
  Spawn:
	RS0L H 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RevengeLostSpirit",0,0,0,random(-10,10),random(-10,10),random(0,16),random(0,359))
	RS0L HHH 2 A_SpawnItemEx("BattleLordSpiritBombTrail",0,0,2,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 AAA 0
	TNT1 AAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RevengeLostSpirit",0,0,0,random(-10,10),random(-10,10),random(0,16),random(0,359))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetScale(3.0,3.0)
	RS0L ABC 3 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(65,384,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(128,256,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(256,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(0.1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,8,0,1)
	RS0L DDD 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("RevengeLostSpirit",0,0,0,random(-10,10),random(-10,10),random(0,16),random(0,359))
	TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(0.1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,8,0,1)
	RS0L EEE 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("RevengeLostSpirit",0,0,0,random(-10,10),random(-10,10),random(0,16),random(0,359))
	TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(0.1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,8,0,1)
	RS0L FFF 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("RevengeLostSpirit",0,0,0,random(-10,10),random(-10,10),random(0,16),random(0,359))
	TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(0.1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,8,0,1)
	RS0L GGG 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("RevengeLostSpirit",0,0,0,random(-10,10),random(-10,10),random(0,16),random(0,359))
	Stop
	}
}

ACTOR ArchdukeOfHell
{
Scale 1.75
Health 7000
Radius 40
Height 110
Mass 500000
Speed 13
Monster
+FLOORCLIP
+BOSS
+NOFEAR
+NORADIUSDMG
+LOOKALLAROUND
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.5
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.25
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.2
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.2
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor "Pierce", 0.6
DamageFactor "MarinePierce", 0.6
DamageFactor "Kaboom", 0.5
DamageFactor "MarineKaboom", 0.5
DamageFactor 0.6
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
MeleeDamage 29
MeleeRange 100
PainChance 4
BloodColor "Green"
SeeSound "ArchdukeOfHell/See"
ActiveSound "ArchdukeOfHell/Idle"
MeleeSound "baron/melee"
DeathSound "ArchdukeOfHell/Death"
Obituary "%o was burned to the bones by an Archduke of Hell."
HitObituary "%o was beaten to death by an Archduke of Hell."
Tag "\c[m4]Archduke Of Hell\c-"
var int user_script;
var int user_rage;
States
{
 Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	ARDU A 10 A_Look
	Loop
 See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
    ARDU AA 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
    ARDU BB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	ARDU CC 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
    ARDU DD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
    Loop
 Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetShootable
    TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf((ceilingz - floorz) < 220,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"GiantComet")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"FlameBreath","SuperComet")
 Normal:
	ARDU FG 6 A_FaceTarget
	ARDU H 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("HDComet", 64, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HDComet", 64, 0, 6)
	ARDU H 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("HDComet", 64, 0, -6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HDComet", 64, 0, 12)
	ARDU H 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("HDComet", 64, 0, -12)
	ARDU FG 6 A_FaceTarget
	ARDU H 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("HDComet", 64, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HDComet", 64, 0, 6)
	ARDU H 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("HDComet", 64, 0, -6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HDComet", 64, 0, 12)
	ARDU H 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("HDComet", 64, 0, -12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"SuperComet")
	Goto See
 SuperComet:
	ARDU FFFGG 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("NobleSuperComet", 64, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("NobleSuperComet", 64, 0, 12)
	ARDU H 12 Bright A_CustomMissile("NobleSuperComet", 64, 0, -12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"FlameBreath")
	Goto See
 FlameBreath:
    ARDU E 1 A_JumpIfCloser(550,1)
	Goto Missile
    ARDU EEEE 5 A_FaceTarget
	ARDU E 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("ArchdukeOfHell/Flame")
	ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("GreenFlameBreath",108,0,random(-1,1))
	ARDU E 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("GreenFlameBreath",108,0,random(-1,1))
	ARDU E 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("GreenFlameBreath",108,0,random(-1,1))
	ARDU E 2 Bright A_FaceTarget

	ARDU E 2 Bright A_FaceTarget

	ARDU E 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("GreenFlameBreath",108,0,random(-1,1))

    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_rage >= 3,"Missile")

	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable

	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",500)
    ARDU E 0 A_PlaySound("ArchdukeOfHell/See")
	ARDU EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("DarkAnniFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    ARDU E 0 A_PlaySound("ArchdukeOfHell/Cast")
    ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchDukeSpellFire",50,0,20)
    ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchDukeSpellFire",50,0,40)

    ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchDukeSpellFire",50,0,140)
    ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchDukeSpellFire",50,0,160)
    ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchDukeSpellFire",50,0,-20)
    ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchDukeSpellFire",50,0,-40)
    ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchDukeSpellFire",50,0,-60)
    ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchDukeSpellFire",50,0,-80)
    ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchDukeSpellFire",50,0,-100)
    ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchDukeSpellFire",50,0,-120)
    ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchDukeSpellFire",50,0,-140)
    ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchDukeSpellFire",50,0,-160)
    ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchDukeSpellFire",50,0,180)
    ARDU E 0 A_CustomMissile("ArchDukeSpellFire",50,0,0)
	ARDU EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("DarkAnniFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	ARDU EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("DarkAnniFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	ARDU EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("DarkAnniFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
    ARDU EE 3 Bright
    Goto See
 Death:
    ARDU I 2 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
 	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigGreenBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	ARDU IIIII 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom5", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
 	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigGreenBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	ARDU JJJJJ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom5", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
 	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigGreenBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	ARDU KKKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom5", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    ARDU L 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    ARDU L -1
    Stop
 	}
}

Actor ArchDukeSpellFire
{
Projectile
Radius 1
Height 1
Speed 80
Damage 0
YScale 1.25
XScale 2.25
RenderStyle Add
+FLOORHUGGER
+DONTSPLASH
+BLOODLESSIMPACT
+FORCERADIUSDMG
+RIPPER
SeeSound "ArchdukeOfHell/Spell"
var int user_delay;
Decal GreenRocketScorch
ReactionTime 540
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 2
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
  Fly: 
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR C 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR D 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR C 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR C 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR D 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR D 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_delay >= 5,"Go")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_delay",user_delay+1)
	Loop
  Go:
	TNT1 A 0 
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("ArchdukeOfHell/Explode")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Recoil(-32)//ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,38,0,0)
  Going:
	TNT1 A 0 
	TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR C 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)		
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR D 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)		
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR C 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)		
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR C 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)		
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR D 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)		
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR D 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)		
	Loop
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR E 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)		
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR F 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)		
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR G 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)		
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MOFCursedFireFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    HFIR H 2 Bright A_Explode(48,156,0)		
    Stop
  }
}

Actor KnightOfPurgatory
{
Monster
Radius 24 
Height 70
YScale 1.3
XScale 1.15
Health 1900
Mass 1000
Speed 13
+FLOORCLIP
+FASTMELEE
+NORADIUSDMG
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.5
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
BloodColor "Blue"
SeeSound "KnightOfPurgatory/Sight"
PainSound "KnightOfPurgatory/Pain"
ActiveSound "KnightOfPurgatory/Active"
DeathSound "KnightOfPurgatory/Death"
MeleeSound "imp/melee"
MeleeRange 70
MeleeDamage 45
PainChance 11
Obituary "%o was burnt from %p worthless existence by a Knight Of Purgatory."
HitObituary "%o was blown away by the fists of a Knight Of Purgatory."
Tag "\c[m5]Knight Of Purgatory\c-"
var int user_script;
var int user_rage;
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("KnightOfPurgatoryFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	SATG A 10 Bright A_Look
	SATI A 10 Bright A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("KnightOfPurgatoryFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("KnightOfPurgatoryWalkFire",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_CLIENTSIDE)
	SATG AA 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("KnightOfPurgatoryWalkFire",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_CLIENTSIDE)
	SATG BB 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("KnightOfPurgatoryWalkFire",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_CLIENTSIDE)
	SATG CC 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("KnightOfPurgatoryWalkFire",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_CLIENTSIDE)
	SATG DD 3 Bright A_Chase
	Loop
 Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(156,"Homing","Comet","FloorHug")
 Normal:
	SATG EF 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SATG G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",40,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",40,0,-5)
	SATG G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",40,0,5)
	SATG IJ 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SATG K 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",40,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",40,0,-5)
	SATG K 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",40,0,5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Homing")
	Goto See
 Homing:
	SATG ON 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ElementalOfPurgatoryHomingComet",72,-24,0)
	SATG M 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("ElementalOfPurgatoryHomingComet",72,24,0)
	SATG MM 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ElementalOfPurgatoryHomingComet",72,-24,0)
	SATG M 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("ElementalOfPurgatoryHomingComet",72,24,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Comet")
	Goto See
 Comet:
	SATG MN 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SATG O 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("ElementalOfPurgatoryComet",40,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ElementalOfPurgatoryComet",40,0,-5)
	SATG O 9 Bright A_CustomMissile("ElementalOfPurgatoryComet",40,0,5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"FloorHug")
	Goto See
 FloorHug:
	SATG ON 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryFloor",72,-24,0)
	SATG M 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryFloor",72,24,0)
	SATG MM 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Melee:
	SATG EF 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SATG G 5 Bright A_MeleeAttack
	Goto See
  Pain:
	SATG Q 4 Bright 
	SATG Q 4 Bright A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(89,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	SATG QQQQQQQQQ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BlueKaboomDeath",random(16,48),random(12,-12),random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 88, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX",random(40,80),0,random(0,360),CMF_AIMDIRECTION,random(0,360))
	SATG RRRSSSTT 2 A_CustomMissile("BlueKaboomDeath",random(16,48),random(12,-12),random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 88, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
	SATG UUUVVV 2 A_CustomMissile("BlueKaboomDeath",random(16,48),random(12,-12),random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 88, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	SATG W 7 A_Fall
	SATG XY 4
	SATG Z -1
	Wait
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ImDead",1)
	SATG YXWUVTSRQ 3
	Goto See
}
}

ACTOR JudgeOfPurgatory
{
Scale 1.75
Health 7300
Radius 40
Height 110
Mass 500000
Speed 13
Monster
+FLOORCLIP
+BOSS
+NOFEAR
+NORADIUSDMG
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.5
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.25
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.2
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.2
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor "Pierce", 0.6
DamageFactor "MarinePierce", 0.6
DamageFactor "Kaboom", 0.5
DamageFactor "MarineKaboom", 0.5
DamageFactor 0.55
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
BloodColor "Blue"
SeeSound "JudgeOfPurgatory/See"
PainSound "JudgeOfPurgatory/Pain"
ActiveSound "JudgeOfPurgatory/Idle"
DeathSound "JudgeOfPurgatory/Death"
PainChance 16
Obituary "%o was judged and sent to the Purgatory."
Tag "\c[m5]Judge Of Purgatory\c-"
var int user_script;
var int user_rage;
States
{
 Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	JUPU A 10 Bright A_Look
	Loop
 See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("hellboss/step")
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
    JUPU AABB 3 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("hellboss/step")
	JUPU CCDD 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(88,"Rush")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Avoid")
    Loop
 Rush:
	JUPU A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	JUPU AAA 0 A_Chase
	JUPU A 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("JudgeOfPurgatoryGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	JUPU AAA 0 A_Chase
	JUPU A 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("JudgeOfPurgatoryGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	JUPU AAA 0 A_Chase
	JUPU B 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("JudgeOfPurgatoryGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	JUPU AAA 0 A_Chase
	JUPU B 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("JudgeOfPurgatoryGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	JUPU A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	JUPU AAA 0 A_Chase
	JUPU C 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("JudgeOfPurgatoryGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	JUPU AAA 0 A_Chase
	JUPU C 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("JudgeOfPurgatoryGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	JUPU AAA 0 A_Chase
	JUPU D 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("JudgeOfPurgatoryGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	JUPU AAA 0 A_Chase
	JUPU D 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("JudgeOfPurgatoryGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"See")
	Loop
 Avoid:
	JUPU M 1 A_FaceTarget
	JUPU M 0 A_SetAngle(angle+random(0,359))
	JUPU M 0 A_Recoil(-32)
	JUPU M 0 A_FaceTarget
	JUPU MMMMMMMMMMMMM 1 A_SpawnItemEx("JudgeOfPurgatoryGhost2",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	JUPU M 0 A_SetAngle(angle+random(0,359))
	JUPU M 0 A_Recoil(-32)
	JUPU M 0 A_FaceTarget
	JUPU MMMMMMMMMMMMM 1 A_SpawnItemEx("JudgeOfPurgatoryGhost2",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	Goto See
 Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetShootable
    TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Comets","Floor")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Sniper")
 Normal:
	JUPU EF 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	JUPU G 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryBall",50,0,-20)
	JUPU G 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryBall",50,0,-16)
	JUPU G 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryBall",50,0,-12)
	JUPU G 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryBall",50,0,-8)
	JUPU G 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryBall",50,0,-4)
	JUPU G 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryBall",50,0,0)
	JUPU G 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryBall",50,0,4)
	JUPU H 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	JUPU IJ 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	JUPU K 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryBall",50,0,20)
	JUPU K 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryBall",50,0,16)
	JUPU K 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryBall",50,0,12)
	JUPU K 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryBall",50,0,8)
	JUPU K 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryBall",50,0,4)
	JUPU K 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryBall",50,0,0)
	JUPU K 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryBall",50,0,-4)
	JUPU L 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Avoid","Comets","Comets")
	Goto See
 Comets:
    JUPU PONM 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	JUPU M 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryComet",110,-50,random(-2,2))
	JUPU M 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryComet",110,50,random(-2,2))
	JUPU MMM 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	JUPU M 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryComet",110,-50,random(-2,2))
	JUPU M 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryComet",110,50,random(-2,2))
	JUPU MMM 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	JUPU M 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryComet",110,-50,random(-2,2))
	JUPU M 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryComet",110,50,random(-2,2))
	JUPU MMM 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	JUPU M 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryComet",110,-50,random(-2,2))
	JUPU M 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryComet",110,50,random(-2,2))
	JUPU MMM 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Avoid","Floor","Sniper","Sniper")
	Goto See
 Sniper:
    JUPU M 1 Bright A_PlaySound("JudgeOfPurgatory/See")
    JUPU MMMMMMMMMMNNNNNNNNNNOOOOOOOOOO 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	JUPU M 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatorySniperBall",50,0,0)
	JUPU PPP 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Avoid")
	Goto See
 Floor:
    JUPU M 1 Bright A_PlaySound("JudgeOfPurgatory/See")
    JUPU MMNNOO 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	JUPU M 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryFloor",0,90,0)
	JUPU M 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryFloor",0,-90,0)
	JUPU M 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryFloor",0,30,0)
	JUPU M 0 A_CustomMissile("PurgatoryFloor",0,-30,0)
	JUPU PPP 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Avoid","Comets","Sniper","Sniper")
	Goto See
 Pain:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"PainRage")
	JUPU Q 3 Bright
	JUPU Q 3 Bright A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Missile")
	Goto See
 PainRage:
	JUPU Q 2 Bright A_Pain
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_rage >= 3,"Missile")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_rage",user_rage+1)
	JUPU Q 1 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(10,80,0,24,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",400)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("JudgeOfPurgatory/Rage")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("JudgeOfPurgatory/Rage")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurgatorySpike",Random(1024,-1024),Random(1024,-1024),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	JUPU QQQQ 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("LegendaryCyberFlameSpawner3",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurgatorySpike",Random(1024,-1024),Random(1024,-1024),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	JUPU QQQQ 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("LegendaryCyberFlameSpawner3",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurgatorySpike",Random(1024,-1024),Random(1024,-1024),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	JUPU QQQQ 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("LegendaryCyberFlameSpawner3",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurgatorySpike",Random(1024,-1024),Random(1024,-1024),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	JUPU QQQQ 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("LegendaryCyberFlameSpawner3",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurgatorySpike",Random(1024,-1024),Random(1024,-1024),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)

	JUPU QQQQ 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("LegendaryCyberFlameSpawner3",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurgatorySpike",Random(1024,-1024),Random(1024,-1024),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	JUPU QQQQ 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("LegendaryCyberFlameSpawner3",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurgatorySpike",Random(1024,-1024),Random(1024,-1024),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	JUPU QQQQ 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("LegendaryCyberFlameSpawner3",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurgatorySpike",Random(1024,-1024),Random(1024,-1024),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	JUPU QQQQ 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("LegendaryCyberFlameSpawner3",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurgatorySpike",Random(1024,-1024),Random(1024,-1024),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)

	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurgatorySpike",Random(1024,-1024),Random(1024,-1024),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	JUPU QQQQ 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("LegendaryCyberFlameSpawner3",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
    JUPU QQ 3 Bright
    Goto See
 Death:
    JUPU I 2 Bright A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 88, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigBlueBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	JUPU RRRRRRRR 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BlueKaboomDeath", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 88, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigBlueBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	JUPU SSSSSSSS 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BlueKaboomDeath", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 88, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigBlueBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	JUPU TTTTTTTT 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BlueKaboomDeath", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 88, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigBlueBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))

	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 88, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigBlueBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	JUPU VVVVVVVV 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BlueKaboomDeath", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 88, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigBlueBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	JUPU WWWWWWWW 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BlueKaboomDeath", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 64, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	JUPU W 3 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", Random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 64, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	JUPU W 3 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", Random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 64, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	JUPU W 3 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", Random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 64, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	JUPU X 3 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", Random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 64, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	JUPU X 3 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", Random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 64, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	JUPU X 3 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", Random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 64, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	JUPU Y 3 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", Random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))

	JUPU Y 3 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", Random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryBlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 64, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	JUPU Y 3 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", Random(20,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    JUPU Z 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    JUPU Z -1
    Stop
 	}
}

Actor PurgatoryBall : BaronBall
{
Projectile
Renderstyle Add
Height 8
Scale 1.35
Radius 8
Damage 11
Speed 26
Decal Scorch
States
{
  Spawn:
	S4TC AAABBB 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PurgatoryBallTrail",random(3,-3),random(3,-3),random(3,-3),random(1,-1),random(1,-1),random(1,-1),random(0,360))
	Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(8,32,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom6", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX4", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurgatoryBallTrail",0,0,0,random(20,-20),random(20,-20),random(20,-20),random(0,360))
	S4TC CDEFG 3 Bright
	Stop
   }
}

   Spawn:

	  S4TC B 0 A_SeekerMissile(15,5)
      S4TC B 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PurgatorySniperBallTrail",random(3,-3),random(3,-3),random(3,-3),random(1,-1),random(1,-1),random(1,-1),random(0,360))

   Death:

ACTOR PurgatoryFloor

+DROPOFF
-NoGravity

+SeekerMissile
+EXTREMEDEATH
+DONTSPLASH
Speed 22

ACTOR HellishAvatar
{
Scale 1.25
Health 8000
PainChance 5
Radius 40
Height 110
Mass 5000
Speed 15
Monster
+FLOORCLIP
+BOSS
+NOFEAR
+NORADIUSDMG
+LOOKALLAROUND
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.5
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.25
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.2
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.2
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor "Pierce", 0.6
DamageFactor "MarinePierce", 0.6
DamageFactor "Kaboom", 0.5
DamageFactor "MarineKaboom", 0.5
DamageFactor 0.55
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
SeeSound "HellishAvatar/See"
PainSound "HellishAvatar/Pain"
DeathSound "HellishAvatar/Death"
ActiveSound "HellishAvatar/Idle"
Obituary "%o was smoten by the Hellish Avatar."
Tag "\c[w8]Hellish Avatar\c-"
var int user_rage;
var int user_script;
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	AVAT A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
    AVAT A 0 A_PlaySound("hellboss/step")
	AVAT AABB 3 A_Chase
	AVAT C 0 A_PlaySound("hellboss/step")
	AVAT CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Avoid")
	Loop
 Avoid:
	AVAT A 1 A_FaceTarget
	AVAT A 0 A_SetAngle(angle+random(0,359))
	AVAT A 0 A_Recoil(-32)
	AVAT A 0 A_FaceTarget
	AVAT AAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("HellishAvatarGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	AVAT A 0 A_SetAngle(angle+random(0,359))
	AVAT A 0 A_Recoil(-32)
	AVAT A 0 A_FaceTarget
	AVAT AAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("HellishAvatarGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	Goto See
 Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetShootable
    TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("HellishAvatar/Attack")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"ThunderBall","IceMegaBall","Comets")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"ThunderStrike","ThunderBolt","FireFloor","IceSpike")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,"IceBeam","StormLite","WindSlicer","FireTracer")
 IceBeam:
    AVAT IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII 2 Bright A_GiveInventory("AvatarIceCharge")
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("HellishAvatar/Ice",6)
	AVAT JJJ 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("AvatarIceBeam",64,0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("HellishAvatar/Ice",6)
	AVAT JJJ 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("AvatarIceBeam",64,0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("HellishAvatar/Ice",6)
	AVAT JJJ 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("AvatarIceBeam",64,0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("HellishAvatar/Ice",6)
	AVAT JJJ 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("AvatarIceBeam",64,0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("HellishAvatar/Ice",6)
	AVAT JJJ 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("AvatarIceBeam",64,0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("HellishAvatar/Ice",6)
	AVAT JJJ 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("AvatarIceBeam",64,0,0,0,0)

	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireTracer2",64,-5,0,0,0)
	AVAT L 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireTracer",64,5,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireTracer2",64,-5,0,0,0)
	AVAT L 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(58,"FireFloor")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"IceBeam","StormLite","WindSlicer")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Avoid")
	Goto See
 FireFloor:
    AVAT KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK 2 Bright A_GiveInventory("AvatarFireCharge")
	AVAT L 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,8)
	AVAT L 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,-8)
	AVAT L 14 Bright A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(58,"Comets")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Avoid")
	Goto See
 Comets:
    AVAT KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK 2 Bright A_GiveInventory("AvatarFireCharge")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosComet",64,-20,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosComet",64,20,0,0,0)
	AVAT L 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosComet",64,-20,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosComet",64,20,0,0,0)
	AVAT L 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosComet",64,-20,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosComet",64,20,0,0,0)
	AVAT L 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosComet",64,-20,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosComet",64,20,0,0,0)
	AVAT L 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
 Pain:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"PainRage")
	AVAT M 3
	AVAT M 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
	Goto See
 PainRage:
	AVAT M 3 Bright A_Pain
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_rage >= 3,"Missile")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_rage",user_rage+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(10,80,0,24,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",400)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("HellishAvatar/See")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"PainRageThunder","PainRageFire")
 PainRageThunder:
	AVAT MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("AvatarLightningCharge")
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarThunderStrike",0,0,0,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarThunderStrike",0,0,45,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarThunderStrike",0,0,90,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarThunderStrike",0,0,135,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarThunderStrike",0,0,180,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarThunderStrike",0,0,225,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarThunderStrike",0,0,270,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarThunderStrike",0,0,315,0)
	AVAT MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("AvatarLightningCharge")
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
    AVAT MM 3 Bright
    Goto See
 PainRageFire:
	AVAT MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("AvatarFireCharge")
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,30,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,60,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,90,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,120,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,150,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,180,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,210,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,240,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,270,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,300,0)
	AVAT M 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireSpawner",0,0,330,0)
	AVAT MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("AvatarFireCharge")
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
    AVAT MM 3 Bright
    Goto See
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	TNT1 A 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RedParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 88, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	AVAT NNNNNNOOOOO 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("AvatarRedKaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RedParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 88, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	AVAT PPPPPPQQQQQQ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("AvatarRedKaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellishAvatarSkeleton")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellishAvatarLightning")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RedBossExplosionEffect")
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RedParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 88, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	AVAT RRRRRRSSSSSS 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("AvatarRedKaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))	
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RedParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 88, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	AVAT TTTTTTUUUUUU 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("AvatarRedKaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	AVAT V -1
	Stop
   }
}

{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
	Z4PR ABCDEF 2 Bright A_FadeOut(0.07)
	Loop
  Toaster:
    TNT1 A 0
	Stop
}
}

Actor AvatarFireTracer : HellionTracer1
{
Speed 42
Scale 2.0
Damage 7
-SEEKERMISSILE
-HEXENBOUNCE
BounceCount 0
Decal Scorch
States
{
  Spawn:
	CFFX N 1 Bright A_SpawnItem("AvatarFireTracerTail")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Weave(3,3,1,1.5)
	CFFX N 1 Bright A_SpawnItem("AvatarFireTracerTail")
	TNT1 A 0  A_Weave(3,3,1,1.5)
	CFFX N 1 Bright A_SpawnItem("AvatarFireTracerTail")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Weave(3,3,1,1.5)
	CFFX N 1 Bright A_SpawnItem("AvatarFireTracerTail")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Weave(3,3,1,1.5)
	CFFX N 1 Bright A_SpawnItem("AvatarFireTracerTail")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Weave(3,3,1,1.5)
	Loop
}
}

{

	{

Actor HellishAvatarSkeleton
{
+NOCLIP
+NOINTERACTION
+CLIENTSIDEONLY
-SOLID
Scale 1.25
States
{
  Spawn:
    AVTS A 105
	AVTS BCD 4 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3",Random(20,80),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	AVTS E 0 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	AVTS E 4 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3",Random(20,80),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    Stop
}
}

ACTOR HellishAvatarGhost
{

+DONTSPLASH

+NOCLIP

{
Spawn:
    AVAT A 2 A_FadeOut(0.18)
    Loop
    }
}

ACTOR InfernalEmperor
{
Scale 1.15
Health 8000
PainChance 5
Radius 40
Height 110
Mass 5000
Speed 15
Monster
+FLOORCLIP
+BOSS
+NOFEAR
+NORADIUSDMG
+LOOKALLAROUND
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.5
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.25
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.2
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.2
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor "Pierce", 0.5
DamageFactor "MarinePierce", 0.5
DamageFactor "Kaboom", 0.4
DamageFactor "MarineKaboom", 0.4
DamageFactor 0.55
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
MeleeDamage 19
MeleeRange 100
SeeSound "InfernalEmperor/See"
PainSound "InfernalEmperor/Pain"
DeathSound "InfernalEmperor/Death"
ActiveSound "baron/active"
Obituary "%o was turned into nothing by the Infernal Emperor."
Tag "\c[z4]Infernal \c[v9]Emperor\c-"
var int user_script;
States
{
 Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	IFEP A 10 A_Look
	Loop
 See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("DROPOFF",FALSE)
    IFEP A 0 A_PlaySound("hellboss/step")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
	IFEP AABB 3 A_Chase
	IFEP C 0 A_PlaySound("hellboss/step")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
	IFEP CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Rush")
	Loop
 Rush:
	IFEP OO 0 A_Chase
	IFEP O 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
	IFEP O 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalEmperorGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	IFEP OO 0 A_Chase
	IFEP O 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalEmperorGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	IFEP OO 0 A_Chase
	IFEP O 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalEmperorGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(14,"See")
	Loop
 Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetShootable
    TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(40,"PrepareCharge")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(156,"Spread","SuperComet","FloorTracers","FloorFire","Spikes")
 Normal:
    IFEP HHHH 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
 NormalCombo:
    IFEP HHH 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	IFEP I 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",64,0,-5)
	IFEP I 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",64,0,5)
	IFEP I 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",64,0,0)
	IFEP I 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProjUp",64,0,0)
	IFEP I 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProjDown",64,0,0)
	IFEP I 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("InfernalEmperor/Hammer")
	IFEP III 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	IFEP MMM 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	IFEP N 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",64,0,-5)
	IFEP N 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",64,0,5)
	IFEP N 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",64,0,0)
	IFEP N 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProjUp",64,0,0)
	IFEP N 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProjDown",64,0,0)
	IFEP N 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("InfernalEmperor/Hammer")
	IFEP NNN 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	IFEP HHH 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	IFEP I 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",64,0,-5)
	IFEP I 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",64,0,5)
	IFEP I 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",64,0,0)
	IFEP I 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProjUp",64,0,0)
	IFEP I 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProjDown",64,0,0)
	IFEP I 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("InfernalEmperor/Hammer")
	IFEP III 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	IFEP MMM 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	IFEP N 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",64,0,-5)
	IFEP N 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",64,0,5)
	IFEP N 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",64,0,0)
	IFEP N 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProjUp",64,0,0)
	IFEP N 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProjDown",64,0,0)
	IFEP N 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("InfernalEmperor/Hammer")
	IFEP NNN 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CposRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"See","Spread","SuperComet")
	Loop
 SuperComet:
    IFEP HHH 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	IFEP I 0 A_CustomMissile("SuperComet",64,0,5)
	IFEP I 0 A_CustomMissile("SuperComet",64,0,-5)

 PrepareCharge:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(2000,1)
    Goto Missile
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("DROPOFF",TRUE)
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(10,80,0,24,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("InfernalEmperor/See")
    IFEP OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("HellishEmperorFireCharge")
 Charge:
    IFEP O 0 A_Recoil(-15)
	IFEP O 0 A_JumpIfCloser(110,"ChargeExplosion")
	IFEP O 0 A_SpawnItemEx("InfernalEmperorGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	IFEP O 0 A_SpawnItem("InfernalistWalkFire")
	IFEP O 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Charge Position Check",0)
	//IFEP A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
    IFEP O 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("HellishEmperorFireCharge")
    Loop
 ChargeExplosion:
	TNT1 A 0 
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LandKaBoom")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellishEmperorBomb",24,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("InfernalEmperor/Hammer")
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(3,15,0,10,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	IFEP LLLLLLLLL 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("HellishEmperorFireChargeNoFace")
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("DROPOFF",FALSE)
    Goto See
 Melee:
	IFEP EF 4 A_FaceTarget
	IFEP G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("InfernalEmperor/Hammer")
	IFEP G 4 A_MeleeAttack
	IFEP JK 4 A_FaceTarget
	IFEP L 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("InfernalEmperor/Hammer")
	IFEP L 4 A_MeleeAttack
	Goto See
 Pain:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(44,"PrepareCharge")
	IFEP P 3
	IFEP P 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Missile")
	Goto See
 Death:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	IFEP PPPPP 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	IFEP PPPPP 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	IFEP PPPPP 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	IFEP QRS 4 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	IFEP TUV 4 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	IFEP WX 4
    IFEP Y -1
	Stop
}
}

Actor Pestilence
{
Monster
Health 1100
Radius 20
Height 44
Mass 100
Speed 7
FloatSpeed 8
BloodColor "Green"
PainChance 80
SeeSound "PestilenceSee"
ActiveSound "PestilenceActive"
PainSound "PestilencePain"
DeathSound "PestilenceDeath"
Monster
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+LONGMELEERANGE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+Bright
RadiusDamageFactor 0.5
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
Obituary "%o couldn't take on a dark revenant's foul attacks."
Tag "\c[l2]Dark Revenant\c-"
var int user_script;
States
{
 Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	PSEV B 2 Bright A_Look
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("PestilenceFX",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
 See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	PSEV B 1 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("PestilenceFX",0,0,0,0)
	PSEV B 1 Bright A_Chase("","")
	PSEV B 1 Bright A_Chase("","")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("PestilenceFX",0,0,0,0)
	PSEV B 1 Bright A_Chase("","")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(12,"Evade")
	Loop
 Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,7)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,14,0,0)
	PSEV B 3 Bright A_Chase
	PSEV B 3 Bright A_Chase
	PSEV B 3 Bright A_Chase
	PSEV B 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)
	PSEV B 3 Bright A_Chase
	PSEV B 3 Bright A_Chase
	PSEV B 3 Bright A_Chase
	PSEV B 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
 Missile:
	PSEV J 11 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PSEV J 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PestilenceRocket",44,-16,0)
	PSEV K 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("PestilenceRocket",44,16,0)
	PSEV K 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"See")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CposRefire
	Goto Missile+1
 Pain:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(42,"Evade")
	PSEV L 3 Bright
	PSEV L 3 Bright A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(104,"Missile")
	Goto See
 Death:
	PSEX A 5 Bright
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 15, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner",0,0,40,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE,0)
	PSEX B 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 15, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	PSEX B 5 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner",0,0,40,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE,0)
	PSEX C 3 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner",0,0,40,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE,0)
	PSEX D 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner",0,0,40,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE,0)
	PSEX EFG 3 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("GreenParticleSpawner",0,0,40,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE,0)
	PSEX H 3 Bright A_FadeOut(0.1,1)
	Wait
	}
}

ACTOR NewDarkImp : Imp
{
Health 120
Speed 9
MeleeDamage 6
PainChance 80
Obituary "%o was cursed by a Dark Imp."
HitObituary "%o was touched by a Dark Imp."
Tag "\cmDark Imp\c-"
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
States
{
  Spawn:
	DR3S AB 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(54,"Evade")
	DR3S AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	DR3S CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
    Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,7)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,16,0,0)
	DR3S AAAA 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,16,0,0)
	DR3S AAAA 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Melee:
    DR3S EF 5 A_FaceTarget
    DR3S G 4 A_MeleeAttack
    Goto See
  Missile:
	DR3S EF 4 A_FaceTarget
	DR3S G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("NewDarkImpBall", 34, 0, 0)
	DR3S FEF 4 A_FaceTarget
	DR3S G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("NewDarkImpBall", 34, 0, 0)
	DR3S FEF 4 A_FaceTarget
	DR3S G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("NewDarkImpBall", 34, 0, 0)
	DR3S FE 4 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
    DR3S H 0
	DR3S H 4 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
	DR3S I 8
	DR3S J 8 A_Scream
	DR3S K 6
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	DR3S L 0 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	DR3S L 6 A_Fall
	DR3S M -1
	Stop
  XDeath:
    DDVL S 5
    DDVL T 5 A_XScream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    DDVL U 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    DDVL V 5 A_NoBlocking
    DDVL WXY 5
    DDVL Z -1
    Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	DR3S LKJI 5
	Goto See
    }
}

Actor Illus
{

Radius 22

+MISSILEEVENMORE
+FLOORCLIP
+NOPAIN

    Loop

    ILLS B 0 A_SpawnItemEx("IllusImageB", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
    ILLS C 3 Bright A_Chase
    ILLS C 0 A_SpawnItemEx("IllusImageC", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
    ILLS C 3 Bright A_Chase
    ILLS C 0 A_SpawnItemEx("IllusImageC", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
    ILLS D 3 Bright A_Chase
    ILLS D 0 A_SpawnItemEx("IllusImageD", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
    ILLS D 3 Bright A_Chase
    ILLS D 0 A_SpawnItemEx("IllusImageD", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
    Loop
  Melee:
    ILLS EFG 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    ILLS H 6 Bright A_MeleeAttack
    Goto See
  Missile:
    ILLS E 0 A_Jump(128,"Spread")
    Goto See
  Ghoster:
    ILLS EFG 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    ILLS H 6 Bright A_SpawnItem("IllusGhost")
    Goto See
  Spread:
    ILLS E 0 A_Jump(92,"Shield")
    ILLS EFG 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    ILLS H 0 A_CustomMissile("IllusBlast", 38, 0, Random(-8, 8))
    ILLS H 0 A_CustomMissile("IllusBlast", 38, 0, Random(-8, 8))
    ILLS H 0 A_CustomMissile("IllusBlast", 38, 0, Random(-8, 8))
    ILLS H 0 A_CustomMissile("IllusBlast", 38, 0, Random(-8, 8))
    ILLS H 0 A_CustomMissile("IllusBlast", 38, 0, Random(-8, 8))
    ILLS H 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("IllusBlast", 38, 0, Random(-8, 8))
    Goto See
  Shield:
    ILLS E 0 Bright A_JumpIfCloser(256,"Spread")
    ILLS EFG 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    ILLS G 0 A_FaceTarget
    ILLS G 0 A_CustomMissile("IllusShieldSpawner", 38, 0, 0, 2)
    ILLS G 0 A_CustomMissile("IllusShieldSpawner", 38, 0, 10, 2)
    ILLS G 0 A_CustomMissile("IllusShieldSpawner", 38, 0, -10, 2)
    ILLS G 0 A_CustomMissile("IllusShieldSpawner", 38, 0, 20, 2)
    ILLS G 0 A_CustomMissile("IllusShieldSpawner", 38, 0, -20, 2)
    ILLS G 0 A_CustomMissile("IllusShieldSpawner", 38, 0, 30, 2)
    ILLS G 6 A_CustomMissile("IllusShieldSpawner", 38, 0, -30, 2)
    ILLS G 0
    Goto See
  Death:
    ILLS I 0 A_Scream
    ILLS I 0 A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    ILLS I 3 Bright A_FadeOut(0.02)
    Goto Death+3
  }
}

    Stop
  }

ACTOR CyberBruiserDemon : CyberBaron
{
Health 2800
SeeSound "superbaron/scream"
PainSound "superbaron/pain"
ActiveSound "superbaron/act"
DeathSound "superbaron/death"
Obituary "%o got whooped by a Cyber Bruiser Demon."
HitObituary "%o was dismembered by a Cyber Bruiser Demon."
BloodColor "ff 5f 00"
MeleeDamage 16
Tag "\c[m8]Cyber \c[z4]Bruiser Demon\c-"
Scale 1.2
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    BRCY A 7 Bright A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)

	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("cbaron/metal")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
    BRCY CCDD 3 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
    Loop
  Pause:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/expmgunspinstop")
	BRCY E 10 Bright A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
	Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"BigBall")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(200,"BigBall","Spread","Floor","Missiles","Railgun","BFG10K","MiniDTBFG")

    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(2000,1)
    Goto Rocket
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/expmgunspinstart")
    BRCY E 10 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/expmgunspin","Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    BRCY F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",Random(38,42),8,Random(4,-4),0)
    BRCY E 1 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(30,34),0,Random(5,-5),0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 12, 6, 30, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    BRCY F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("HitlerExplosiveTracer",Random(38,42),8,Random(4,-4),0)
    BRCY E 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(11,"Pause","Pause","Missiles","BigBall","BigBall","BigBall")
    TNT1 A 0 A_MonsterRefire(10,"Pause")
    Goto Normal+3
  BigBall:
	BRCY HI 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	BRCY J 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, 6)
	BRCY J 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, -6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, 12)
	BRCY J 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, -12)
	BRCY HI 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	BRCY J 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, 6)
	BRCY J 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, -6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, 12)
	BRCY J 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("BBall2", 32, 0, -12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(156,"Spread","Missiles")
	Goto See
 Spread:
	BRCY HI 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	BRCY J 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("BBall", 32, 0, 0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("BBall", 32, 0, 4)

    BRCY J 7 Bright A_MeleeAttack

    BRCY S -1
    Stop

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)

	Goto See

	BPWA CCDD 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HeavyFleshStep",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
  Melee:
	BPBI AB 5 A_FaceTarget
	BPBI C 4 A_MeleeAttack
	BPBI A 5 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(300,1)
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("demon/melee")
	BPBI AB 7 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,25,0,1)
	BPBI B 2 A_Recoil(-28)
	BPBI B 3 A_CustomMissile("PinkyLunge",18,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	BPBI C 6
	BPBI C 2 A_ScaleVelocity(0.2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	BPBI C 1 A_ScaleVelocity(0)
	BPBI C 0 A_CposRefire
	Goto Missile
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	BPPA A 4 A_Pain
	Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	BPDE A 5 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	BPDE B 5 A_Scream
	BPDE C 4
	BPDE D 4 A_NoBlocking
	BPDE E 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	BPDE F -1
	Stop
  XDeath:
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	SAR2 I 3 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	SA2X A 3 A_XScream
	SA2X B 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	SA2X C 3 A_NoBlocking
	SA2X D 3 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	SA2X EFG 3
	SA2X H -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	BPDE FEDBCA 5
	Goto See
	}
}

ACTOR IronFiend : BullFiend1
{
Health 400
Mass 300
Speed 12
Scale 1.2
PainChance 30
+FLOORCLIP
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+NORADIUSDMG
SeeSound "blooddemon/sight"
PainSound "blooddemon/pain"
DeathSound "blooddemon/death"
ActiveSound "blooddemon/active"
AttackSound "cyberfiend/melee"
Obituary "%o was smeared against the wall by an Iron Fiend's advanced weaponry."
HitObituary "%o was torn to shreds by an Iron Fiend's titanium jaw."
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.5
MeleeDamage 8
Tag "\c[m8]Iron Fiend\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	IFN2 A 3 A_Look
	IFIN A 3 A_Look
	IFN2 B 3 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk")
	IFIN AABB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk")
	IFIN CCDD 2 A_Chase
	Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(250,"Lunge")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(275,"Flamethrower")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(168,"Rockets")
	Goto PulseRifle
  Melee:
  Lunge:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("cyberfiend/melee")
	IFIN AA 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,20,0,1)
	IFIN B 2 A_Recoil(-28)
	IFIN B 3 A_CustomMissile("PinkyLunge",18,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	IFIN B 6
	IFIN B 2 A_ScaleVelocity(0.2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	IFIN B 1 A_ScaleVelocity(0)
	Goto See
  PulseRifle:
	IFIN E 10 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN E 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",36,0,FRandom(2,-2))
	IFIN F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	IFIN E 1 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",36,0,FRandom(2,-2))
	IFIN F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	IFIN E 1 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",36,0,FRandom(2,-2))
	IFIN F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	IFIN E 3 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN E 3 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN E 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Pause")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
	Goto PulseRifle+1
  Rockets:
	IFIN EE 3 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket")
	IFIN EE 3 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSRocket")
	IFIN E 3 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  FlameThrower:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(82,"Missile")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("hectebus/flameready")
	IFIN EE 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/fatsofire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget

	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget

	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	IFIN F 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlameSoldierFlame",36,0,Random(6,-6),CMF_AIMOFFSET)
	IFIN EE 12
	Goto See
  Pause:
	IFIN E 15 A_PlaySound("weapons/demontechsteam")
	Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	IFIN G 4 A_Pain
	Goto See
  XDeath:
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(NOPAIN,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CyberImpDeathRocket",0,0,28)
	IFIN I 5 Bright A_PlaySound("weapons/rocklx")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CyberImpDeathRocket",0,0,28)
	IFIN J 5 Bright A_Scream
	IFIN JJJJJ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom",FRandom(20,80),FRandom(20,-20),FRandom(0,360),2,FRandom(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("RedBloodCloud",FRandom(30,60),0,FRandom(0,360),2,FRandom(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CyberImpDeathRocket",0,0,28)
	IFIN K 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	IFIN L 4 Bright A_NoBlocking
	IFIN M 4 Bright A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	IFIN N -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	IFIN NMLKJI 5
	Goto See
}
