ACTOR Cacobot : Cacodemon1
{
Health 1250
Speed 9
Scale 1.2
PainChance 25
Mass 1000
MeleeDamage 8
SeeSound "caco/sight"
PainSound "monsters/cacopain"
ActiveSound "caco/active"
MeleeSound "caco/melee"
DeathSound "cacos/death"
Obituary "%o was seek and destroyed by a Cacobot."
HitObituary "%o was turn into pieces by a Cacobot."
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+NORADIUSDMG
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
Tag "\c[m8]Cacobot\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	CABT A 1 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	CABT A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(16,"Evade")
	Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,7)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,14,0,0)
	CABT AAAA 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)
	CABT AAAA 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(280,"ChemSpray")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(148,"PlasmaCaster","PulseRifle","Erasus")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(2000,1)
    Goto PulseRifle
	CABT BC 6 A_FaceTarget
	CABT DDDDDD 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaBall",24,0,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CABT CB 4 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"PulseRifle","PulseRifle","Evade")
	Goto See
  PlasmaCaster:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("PlasmaCaster/Full")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("PlasmaCaster/Charge",5)
	CABT BC 6 A_FaceTarget
    CABT D 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("PlasmaCaster/Shot")
	CABT DDDDD 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoBotPlasmaCasterBall",24,0,random(-6,6),0,0)
	CABT D 10 Bright A_FaceTarget
	CABT C 1 A_CposRefire
	CABT C 1 A_JumpIfCloser(2000,1)
    Goto Erasus
	CABT C 1 A_Jump(48,"Missile","See","Evade")
	Goto PlasmaCaster+4
  PulseRifle:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(111,"PulseRifle","PulseRifle","Erasus")
	CABT MMMM 3 A_FaceTarget
	CABT N 2 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CABT N 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",40,0,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CABT M 2 A_FaceTarget
	CABT N 2 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CABT N 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",40,0,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CABT M 2 A_FaceTarget
	CABT N 2 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CABT N 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",40,0,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CABT M 2 A_FaceTarget
	CABT N 2 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CABT N 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",40,0,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CABT M 2 A_FaceTarget
	CABT N 2 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CABT N 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",40,0,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CABT M 2 A_FaceTarget
	CABT N 2 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CABT N 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",40,0,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CABT M 2 A_FaceTarget
	CABT N 2 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CABT N 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",40,0,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CABT M 2 A_FaceTarget
	CABT N 2 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CABT N 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",40,0,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CABT MMM 3 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(55,"Erasus","Erasus","Evade")
	Goto See
  Erasus:
	CABT MMM 3 A_FaceTarget
	CABT M 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/load")
	CABT MMMMMMMMMMM 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	CABT N 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	CABT N 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",40,0,random(-1,1))
	CABT MMMM 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(147,"Evade")
	Goto See
  ChemSpray:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("hectebus/flameready")
	CABT BC 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Daedabus/Chem")
	CABT D 0 A_FaceTarget
	CABT DDD 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("DaedabusChemSpray",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	CABT D 0 A_FaceTarget
	CABT DDD 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("DaedabusChemSpray",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	CABT D 0 A_FaceTarget
	CABT DDD 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("DaedabusChemSpray",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	CABT D 0 A_FaceTarget
	CABT DDD 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("DaedabusChemSpray",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	CABT D 0 A_FaceTarget
	CABT DDD 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("DaedabusChemSpray",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	CABT D 0 A_FaceTarget
	CABT DDD 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("DaedabusChemSpray",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	CABT D 0 A_FaceTarget
	CABT DDD 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("DaedabusChemSpray",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	CABT D 0 A_FaceTarget
	CABT DDD 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("DaedabusChemSpray",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	CABT D 0 A_FaceTarget
	CABT DDD 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("DaedabusChemSpray",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	CABT D 0 A_FaceTarget
	CABT DDD 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("DaedabusChemSpray",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	CABT CB 4 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Melee:
	CABT BC 5 A_FaceTarget
	CABT D 5 A_MeleeAttack
	CABT CB 5 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(156,"Evade")
	CABT E 5 A_Pain
	CABT F 5
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(156,"Missile")
	Goto See
  XDeath:
  Death:
	CABT G 7 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	CABT HHHHIIII 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	CABT J 0 A_PlaySound("Gore/Splat")
	CABT J 5 A_SpawnItemEx("CacoGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	CABT K 4
	CABT L -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	CABT KJIHG 4
	Goto See
}
}

{

Actor CacoBotPlasmaCasterBall : PlasmaCasterBall
{
-MTHRUSPECIES
Damage 4
DamageType "Hell"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,1,2,3)
    TNT1 A 1
	Goto Fly
    TNT1 A 1 ThrustThingZ(0,random(8,16),0,1)
	Goto Fly
    TNT1 A 1 ThrustThingZ(0,random(-8,-16),0,1)
	Goto Fly
  Fly:
	TNT1 A 5
	Loop
}
}

ACTOR Specilos : Fatso
{
Health 2400
Radius 30
Height 64
Mass 1000
Speed 8
PainChance 45
Monster
+FLOORCLIP
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+NOTARGET
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
+DONTHURTSPECIES
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+NOICEDEATH
SeeSound "Specilos/See"
PainSound "Specilos/Pain "
DeathSound "Specilos/Death"
ActiveSound "Specilos/Idle"
Obituary "%o was blown to smithereens by Specilos's hell forged cannons."
BloodColor "ff 2c 00"
Scale 1.15
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
DamageType "Hell"
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
var int user_delay;
Tag "\c[z4]Specilos\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    SPC2 CC 8 Bright A_Look
	SPCI CC 8 Bright A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BeefyStep",0,0,0,0)
    SPC2 AABBCCDD 3 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BeefyStep",0,0,0,0)
	SPC2 EEFF 3 Bright A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(188,"Bombs")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(148,"Spikes","Comet")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Seekers")
  Normal:
    SPC2 G 0 A_PlaySound("Specilos/Attack")
	SPC2 G 15 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,30,Random(0,-6))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,-30,Random(0,6))
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,30,Random(-7,-12))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,-30,Random(7,12))
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,30,Random(-13,-18))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,-30,Random(13,18))
	SPC2 IG 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,30,Random(0,-6))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,-30,Random(0,6))
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,30,Random(-7,-12))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,-30,Random(7,12))
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,30,Random(-13,-18))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,-30,Random(13,18))
	SPC2 IG 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,30,0)
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,-30,0)
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,30,Random(0,-6))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,-30,Random(0,6))
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,30,Random(-7,-12))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,-30,Random(7,12))
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,30,Random(-13,-18))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosProj",30,-30,Random(13,18))
	SPC2 IG 8 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(99,"Comet")
    Goto See
  Bombs:
	SPC2 G 0 A_PlaySound("Specilos/Attack")
	SPC2 G 15 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosBomb",30,30,0)
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosBomb",30,-30,0)
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosBomb",30,30,Random(0,-6))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosBomb",30,-30,Random(0,6))
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosBomb",30,30,Random(-7,-12))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosBomb",30,-30,Random(7,12))
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosBomb",30,30,Random(-13,-18))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosBomb",30,-30,Random(13,18))
	SPC2 IG 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Seekers:
	SPC2 G 0 A_PlaySound("Specilos/Attack")
	SPC2 G 15 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("BehemothSeekingComet",30,30,Random(0,-6))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BehemothSeekingComet",30,-30,Random(0,6))
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("BehemothSeekingComet",30,30,Random(-7,-12))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BehemothSeekingComet",30,-30,Random(7,12))
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("BehemothSeekingComet",30,30,Random(-13,-18))
	SPC2 H 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("BehemothSeekingComet",30,-30,Random(13,18))
	SPC2 IG 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Comet:
	SPC2 G 0 A_PlaySound("Specilos/Attack")
	SPC2 GG 15 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SPC2 H 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosComet",30,30,Random(3,0))
	SPC2 H 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosComet",30,-30,Random(0,-3))
	SPC2 IG 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(99,"Spikes")
	Goto See
  Spikes:
	SPC2 G 0 A_PlaySound("Specilos/Attack")
	SPC2 G 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",TRUE)
	SPCO A 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SPCO B 0 A_SetUserVar("user_delay",0)
	SPCO A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,56,0,1)
	SPCO A 20 Bright A_FaceTarget
  SpikesCheck:
	SPCO B 0 A_JumpIf(user_delay >= 105,"SpikesLand")
	SPCO B 0 A_SetUserVar("user_delay",user_delay+1)
	SPCO B 0 A_Explode(8,256)
	SPCO B 1 Bright A_CheckFloor("SpikesLand")
	Loop
  SpikesLand:
    SPCO BB  0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	SPCO BB  0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    SPCO BBBBBB 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	SPCO B 0 A_SetUserVar("user_delay",0)
	SPCO B 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",FALSE)
	SPCO B 0 Radius_Quake(40,80,0,40,0)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 0)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 10)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 20)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 30)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 40)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 50)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 60)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 70)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 80)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 90)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 100)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 110)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 120)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 130)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 140)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 150)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 160)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 180)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 190)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 200)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 210)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 220)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 230)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 240)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 250)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 260)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 270)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 280)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 290)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 300)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 310)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 320)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 330)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 340)
	SPCO B 0 A_CustomMissile("SpecilosQuake", 0, -48, 350)
	SPCO B 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("SpecilosSpikeSpawner",0,0,0)
	Goto See
  Pain:
	SPC2 J 4 Bright A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(120,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
    SPC2 K 6 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    SPC2 L 6 Bright A_Scream
    SPC2 M 6 Bright A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    SPC2 NOPQRS 6 Bright
    SPC2 T -1
    Stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    SPC2 R 5 Bright
    SPC2 QPONMLK 5 Bright
    Goto See
  }
}

ACTOR BersekerOfHell
{
Scale 2.0
Health 10000
PainChance 12
Radius 80
Height 138
Mass 7800
Speed 12
Monster
+FLOORCLIP
+BOSS
+NOFEAR
+NORADIUSDMG
+LOOKALLAROUND
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.5
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.25
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.2
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.2
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor "Pierce", 0.5
DamageFactor "MarinePierce", 0.5
DamageFactor "Kaboom", 0.4
DamageFactor "MarineKaboom", 0.4
DamageFactor 0.45
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
MeleeDamage 36
MeleeRange 125
SeeSound "BersekerOfHell/See"
PainSound "BersekerOfHell/Pain"
DeathSound "BersekerOfHell/Death"
ActiveSound "BersekerOfHell/Idle"
Obituary "%o was brutaly killed by a Berserker of Hell."
Tag "\c[s0]Berserker \c[i7]of Hell\c-"
var int user_script;
var int user_charge;
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	INCB A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	INCB AAABBB 3 A_Chase
	INCB A 0 A_SpawnItem("BeefyStep",0,0,0,0)
	INCB CCCDDD 3 A_Chase
	INCB C 0 A_SpawnItem("BeefyStep",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
  Pain:
	INCB D 3
	INCB C 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(144,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(156,"Rockets","Digger")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(88,"Napalm","Homing","M79Grenade")
  Normal:
	INCB E 0 A_PlaySound("BersekerOfHell/Idle")
	INCB EEEE 4 A_FaceTarget
	INCB F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("mrl/fire")
	INCB F 0 A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket",50,78,0)
	INCB F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket",50,78,0)
	INCB E 2 A_FaceTarget
	INCB G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("mrl/fire")
	INCB G 0 A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket",50,-78,0)
    INCB G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket",50,-78,0)
	INCB E 0 A_Jump(8,"See","Rockets","Digger")
	INCB E 0 A_CposRefire
    INCB E 2 A_FaceTarget
	Goto Normal+5
  Rockets:
	INCB E 0 A_PlaySound("BersekerOfHell/Idle")
	INCB EEEE 4 A_FaceTarget
	INCB F 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,78,random(2,6))
	INCB F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,78,0)
	INCB E 4 A_FaceTarget
    INCB G 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,-78,random(-2,-6))
    INCB G 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,-78,0)
    INCB EE 4 A_FaceTarget
	INCB F 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,78,random(2,6))
	INCB F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,78,0)
	INCB E 4 A_FaceTarget
    INCB G 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,-78,random(-2,-6))
    INCB G 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,-78,0)
    INCB EE 4 A_FaceTarget
	INCB F 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,78,random(-2,-6))
	INCB F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,78,random(2,6))
	INCB E 4 A_FaceTarget
    INCB G 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,-78,random(2,6))
    INCB G 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,-78,random(-2,-6))
	INCB EE 4 A_FaceTarget
	INCB F 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,78,random(-2,-6))
	INCB F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,78,random(2,6))
	INCB E 4 A_FaceTarget
    INCB G 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,-78,random(2,6))
    INCB G 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket",50,-78,random(-2,-6))
    INCB EEEE 4 A_FaceTarget
	INCB E 0 A_Jump(120,"Digger")
    Goto See
  Digger:
	INCB E 0 A_PlaySound("BersekerOfHell/Idle")
	INCB EEEE 4 A_FaceTarget
	INCB F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("digger/fire")
	INCB FFF 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerDiggerGrenade",50,78,random(2,6))
	INCB F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerDiggerGrenade",50,78,0)
	INCB EE 4 A_FaceTarget
	INCB G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("digger/fire")
    INCB GGG 0 A_CustomMissile("BersekerDiggerGrenade",50,-78,random(-2,-6))
    INCB G 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerDiggerGrenade",50,-78,0)
    INCB EEEE 4 A_FaceTarget
	INCB E 0 A_Jump(120,"M79Grenade")
    Goto See
  M79Grenade:
    INCB EEEEE 8 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("M79/Fire")
    INCB F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZM79Grenade",50,78,random(-2,2))
	INCB EEEEE 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("M79/Fire")
    INCB G 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZM79Grenade",50,-78,random(-2,2))
	INCB EEEEE 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Napalm")
    Goto See
  Napalm:
	INCB E 0 A_PlaySound("BersekerOfHell/Idle")
	INCB EEE 8 A_FaceTarget
	INCB H 0 A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",132,-24,0)
	INCB H 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",132,24,0)
	INCB E 3 A_FaceTarget
	INCB H 0 A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",132,-24,0)
	INCB H 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",132,24,0)
	INCB E 3 A_FaceTarget
	INCB H 0 A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",132,-24,random(6,-6))
	INCB H 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",132,24,random(6,-6))
	INCB E 3 A_FaceTarget
	INCB H 0 A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",132,-24,random(6,-6))
	INCB H 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",132,24,random(6,-6))
	INCB E 3 A_FaceTarget
	INCB H 0 A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",132,-24,random(6,-6))
	INCB H 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",132,24,random(6,-6))
	INCB E 3 A_FaceTarget
	INCB H 0 A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",132,-24,random(6,-6))
	INCB H 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("WarNapalmBall",132,24,random(6,-6))
	INCB E 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Homing")
	Goto See
  Homing:
	INCB E 0 A_PlaySound("BersekerOfHell/Idle")
	INCB EEE 8 A_FaceTarget
	INCB H 0 A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",132,-24,0)
	INCB H 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",132,24,0)
	INCB EEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	INCB H 0 A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",132,-24,0)
	INCB H 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",132,24,0)
	INCB EEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	INCB H 0 A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",132,-24,0)
	INCB H 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",132,24,0)
	INCB EEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	INCB H 0 A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",132,-24,0)
	INCB H 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",132,24,0)
	INCB EEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	INCB H 0 A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",132,-24,0)
	INCB H 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",132,24,0)
	INCB EEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Death:
    INCB I 10 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)

    INCB JJJJJJJJJJ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect",random(-64,64),random(-64,64),random(-16,16))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect",random(-64,64),random(-64,64),random(-16,16))

+DONTHARMSPECIES

	Loop
  See:

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BeefyStep",0,0,0,0)

	Loop

	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",18,20,Random(6,-12))
	BFAT H 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",18,-20,Random(12,-6))
	BFAT I 6 A_FaceTarget
	BFAT G 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",18,20,Random(6,-12))
	BFAT H 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",18,-20,Random(12,-6))
	BFAT I 10 A_FaceTarget
	BFAT G 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",18,20,Random(-7,-13))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",18,20,Random(0,-6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",18,-20,Random(0,6))
	BFAT H 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",18,-20,Random(7,13))
	BFAT I 8
	Goto See
  Pain:
	BFAT J 4 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(120,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
	BFAT K 6
	BFAT L 6 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	BFAT M 6 A_NoBlocking
	BFAT NOPQR 6
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	BFAT S 6
	BFAT T -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	BFAT SRQPONMLK 6
	Goto See
	}

ACTOR SuperImp : Imp
{
Health 400
Speed 10
Mass 500
PainChance 30
SeeSound "superimp/sight"
PainSound "voidimp/pain"
DeathSound "superimp/death"
ActiveSound "superimp/active"
MeleeSound "baron/melee"
BloodColor "DarkRed"
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.5
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
+MISSILEMORE
+FLOORCLIP
+FASTMELEE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
Obituary "%o was smashed by an Super Imp."
HitObituary "%o was smashed by an Super Imp."
MeleeDamage 10
Tag "\crSuper Imp\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	LROO A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	LROO AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	LROO CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(250,"Claw")
	LROO EF 7 A_FaceTarget
	LROO G 5 A_CustomMissile("ImpLordBall",32,0,0)
	Goto See
  Claw:
	LROO AA 7 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,20,0,1)
	LROO F 2 A_Recoil(-30)
	LROO F 3 A_CustomMissile("ImpLunge",18,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("baron/melee")
	LROO F 6
	LROO F 2 A_ScaleVelocity(0.2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	LROO F 1 A_ScaleVelocity(0)
	Goto See
  Melee:
	LROO EF 6 A_FaceTarget
	LROO G 4 A_MeleeAttack
	Goto See
  Pain:
	LROO H 2
	LROO H 2 A_Pain
	Goto See
  Death:
	LROO J 8 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	LROO K 6
	LROO L 6 A_Fall
	LROO M -1
	Stop
  XDeath:
	LROO N 3
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	LROO O 3 A_XScream
	LROO P 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	LROO Q 3 A_Fall
	LROO RST 3
	LROO U -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	LROO TSRQPON 5
	Goto See
	}
}

{
Health 150
Mass 125

+QUICKTORETALIATE
Tag "\c[m8]Cyber Fodder\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    ZFOC A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	ZFOC AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("cbaron/metal")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	ZFOC CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
    Loop
  Missile:
    ZFOC EF 7 A_FaceTarget
    ZFOC G 5 Bright A_Custommissile("FasterZombiePlasmaBall",36,4)
	ZFOC E 20
    Goto See
  Melee:
    ZFOC E 0 A_PlaySound("Fodder/Attack")
    ZFOC EF 6 A_FaceTarget
    ZFOC G 6 A_CustomMeleeAttack(random(16,32),"Fodder/Melee",none,"Hell")
    Goto See
  Pain:
    ZFOC H 2
    ZFOC H 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    ZFOC I 7
    ZFOC J 7 A_Scream
    ZFOC K 5 A_Fall
    ZFOC L 5 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    ZFOC M -1
    Stop
  XDeath:
    ZFOC N 0 A_PlaySound("gibbage/xsplat")
    ZFOC N 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    ZFOC O 5 A_XScream
    ZFOC P 5 A_Fall
    ZFOC QR 5
    ZFOC S -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    ZFOC LKJIH 5
    Goto See
  }
}

	SAML AB 2 Bright A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(12,"Evade")
    Loop

	SAML D 0 A_FaceTarget

	SAML D 0 A_Jump(19,"Missile","Missile","Evade")
	SAML D 0 A_CposRefire
    Goto Normal+7

    SAML ABABAB 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SAML C 0 A_FaceTarget

	SAML D 0 A_FaceTarget

	SAML C 12 Bright A_CustomMissile("DraugrMissile",16,8,random(-1,1))

    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    CYHU AB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(4,"Avoid")
    Loop
  Avoid:
    CYHU A 0
    CYHU A 0 A_SetAngle(angle+random(0,359))
    CYHU A 0 A_Recoil(-35)
    CYHU A 0 A_FaceTarget
	CYHU AAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("CyHunterFX")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"See")
	CYHU A 1 A_Stop
	Goto Avoid
  Melee:
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"WomboCombo")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"NormalCombo","HomingCombo")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(200,"BFG10K","Railgun","Homing","MiniDTBFG","Missiles","Napalm","AntiLegendaryBlast")
  Normal:
    CYHU C 12 A_FaceTarget
	CYHU D 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,-20,random(-2,2),0)
    CYHU D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,20,random(-2,2),0)
    CYHU C 6 A_FaceTarget
	CYHU D 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,-20,random(-2,2),0)
    CYHU D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,20,random(-2,2),0)
    CYHU C 6 A_FaceTarget
	CYHU D 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,-20,random(-2,2),0)
    CYHU D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,20,random(-2,2),0)
    CYHU C 6 A_FaceTarget
	CYHU D 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,-20,random(-2,2),0)
    CYHU D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,20,random(-2,2),0)
    CYHU C 6 A_FaceTarget
	CYHU D 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,-20,random(-2,2),0)
    CYHU D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalRocket",46,20,random(-2,2),0)
    CYHU C 10
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(144,"Homing","Homing","Avoid")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Avoid")
    Goto See
  Homing:
    CYHU C 12 A_FaceTarget
	CYHU D 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalHomingRocket",46,-20,random(-2,2),0)
    CYHU D 6 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalHomingRocket",46,20,random(-2,2),0)
    CYHU C 6 A_FaceTarget
	CYHU D 0 A_CustomMissile("UpdatedCardinalHomingRocket",46,-20,random(-2,2),0)

	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("LesserCardinal/BFGFire")

	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Avoid")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(99,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSound(7)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    CYHU H 20 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	CYHU IIII 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	CYHU KKKK 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	CYHU LLLL 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	CYHU MMMM 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CYHU N 4 A_NoBlocking
    CYHU O 3
	TNT1 A 0 A_BossDeath
    Stop
    }
}

ACTOR PhaseFiend : BullFiend1
{
Health 280
Speed 12
PainChance 80
BloodColor "cf 00 b0"
Scale 1.15
+MISSILEMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
SeeSound "blooddemon/sight"
PainSound "blooddemon/pain"
DeathSound "blooddemon/death"
ActiveSound "blooddemon/active"
AttackSound "cyberfiend/melee"
Obituary "%o was pierced by a Phase Fiend."
HitObituary "Phase Fiend will hide the remnants for not giving the other Pinkys."
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Fiend\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	ADEM A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
	ADEM AABB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk",CHAN_BODY)
	ADEM CCDD 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk",CHAN_BODY)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(46,"Phase")
	Loop
  Phased:
	ADEM AABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_Chase("","",CHF_NOPLAYACTIVE)
  PhasedLoop:
	ADEM AABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"UnPhase")
	Loop
  Phase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport",6)
	ADEM E 2 A_FaceTarget
	ADEM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75,0)
	ADEM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55,0)
	ADEM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35,0)
	ADEM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15,0)
	Goto Phased
  UnPhase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport",6)
	ADEM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15,0)
	ADEM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35,0)
	ADEM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55,0)
	ADEM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
	ADEM E 2 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Melee:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
	ADEM EF 5 A_FaceTarget
	ADEM G 4 A_MeleeAttack
	ADEM E 5 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Lunge")
  Normal:
	ADEM GE 7 A_FaceTarget
	ADEM F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseImpBall", 32, 0, 0)
	ADEM E 5
	Goto See
  Lunge:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(250,1)
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("cyberfiend/melee")
	ADEM EF 7 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,20,0,1)
	ADEM F 2 A_Recoil(-28)
	ADEM F 3 A_CustomMissile("PinkyLunge",18,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	ADEM G 6
	ADEM G 2 A_ScaleVelocity(0.2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	ADEM G 1 A_ScaleVelocity(0)
	Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	ADEM H 4 A_Pain
	Goto See
 XDeath:
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
	ADEM I 5 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	ADEM J 5 A_Scream
	ADEM K 4 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	ADEM L 4 A_NoBlocking
	ADEM M 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	ADEM N -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	ADEM NMLKJI 5
	Goto See
	}
}

ACTOR PhaseNightmare : PhaseFiend
{
Health 500
Speed 15
PainChance 15
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+AVOIDMELEE
MaxTargetRange 256
MeleeDamage 12
Obituary "%o became easy prey for a phase nightmare."
HitObituary "%o is too salty to the refined tastes of the Phase Nightmare."
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Nightmare\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	PHNM A 10 A_look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
	PHNM AABB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HeavyFleshStep",0,0,0,0)
	PHNM CCDD 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HeavyFleshStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Phase")
	Loop
  Phased:
	PHNM AABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_Chase("","",CHF_NOPLAYACTIVE)
  PhasedLoop:
	PHNM AABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(12,"UnPhase")
	Loop
  Phase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport",6)
	PHNM E 2 A_FaceTarget
	PHNM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75,0)
	PHNM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55,0)
	PHNM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35,0)
	PHNM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15,0)
	Goto Phased
  UnPhase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport",6)
	PHNM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15,0)
	PHNM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35,0)
	PHNM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55,0)
	PHNM E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
	PHNM E 2 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Melee:
	PHNM E 4 A_FaceTarget
	PHNM F 6 A_MeleeAttack
	PHNM G 3 A_FaceTarget
  Missile:
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Lunge")
  Normal:
	PHNM E 7 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("PhaseNightmareBall",32,0,random(-6,6))
	PHNM F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseNightmareBall",32,0,0)
	PHNM E 5
	Goto See
  Lunge:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(250,1)
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("cyberfiend/melee")
	PHNM EF 7 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,20,0,1)
	PHNM F 2 A_Recoil(-28)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PinkyLunge",18,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	PHNM F 3 A_CustomMissile("PinkyLunge",18,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	PHNM G 6
	PHNM G 2 A_ScaleVelocity(0.2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	PHNM G 1 A_ScaleVelocity(0)
	Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	PHNM H 4 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(89,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
  XDeath:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
	PHNM I 8 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	PHNM J 8 A_Scream
	PHNM K 4 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	PHNM L 4 A_Noblocking
	PHNM M 4
    PHNM N -1
	stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	PHNM MLKJJII 4
	Goto See
}
}

+DONTHARMSPECIES

MaxDropOffHeight 68

PainSound "observer/pain"
DeathSound "observer/death"

{

	OBVS A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	OBVS AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_Chase
	OBVS AAA 0 A_FastChase
	Loop

	OBVS DBCA 4
	Goto See
  Melee:

	OBVS A 0 A_MeleeAttack
	OBVS A 2
	Goto See
  Pain:
	OBVS H 3
	OBVS H 3 A_Pain
	Goto See

	TNT1 A 0 //A_PlaySound("Gore/Splat")

	OBVS J 3 A_Fall
	OBVS K 3 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	OBVS JKMN 3
	OBVS O -1
	Stop
	}
}

ACTOR CyberSlayer
{
Health 300
Radius 20
Height 56
Mass 100
Speed 8
PainChance 70
Monster
SeeSound "CyberSlayer/Sight"
PainSound "CyberSlayer/Pain"
DeathSound "CyberSlayer/Death"
ActiveSound "CyberSlayer/Active"
+FLOORCLIP
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.5
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
Obituary "%o was disintegrated by a Cyber Slayer."
Tag "\c[m8]Cyber Slayer\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	HRZR A 5 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	HRZR AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	HRZR CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(144,"Railgun","Lazer")
  Normal:
	HRZR E 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",34,0,0)
	HRZR F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(20,"Pause","Railgun","Lazer")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
	Loop
  Pause:
	TNT1 A 0
	HRZR E 15 A_PlaySound("weapons/demontechsteam")
	Goto See
  Railgun:
	HRZR EEE 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("railgunner/chargedshot")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("RailgunImpactRed",30)
	HRZR F 5 Bright A_CustomRailgun(Random(15,25),0,"Red",None,RGF_NOPIERCING,1,1,"HellBulletPuff",0,0,0,0,0.45,0,"NewRailgunTrailRed")
	HRZR EEEE 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(144,"Lazer")
	Goto See
  Lazer:
	HRZR EE 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("vulcan/altfire","Weapon")
	HRZR F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",34,0,random(-2,2))
	HRZR EEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("vulcan/altfire","Weapon")
	HRZR F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",34,0,random(-2,2))
	HRZR EEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("vulcan/altfire","Weapon")
	HRZR F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",34,0,random(-2,2))
	HRZR EEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("vulcan/altfire","Weapon")
	HRZR F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",34,0,random(-2,2))
	HRZR EEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	HRZR EE 10 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
	HRZR G 3
	HRZR G 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
	HRZR H 5 Bright A_Scream
	HRZR I 5 Bright A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("RocketEx",0,32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,0,Random(4,-4),Random(4,-4),Random(4,8),0,128)
	HRZR J 5 Bright A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	HRZR K 5 Bright A_Fall
	HRZR L -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	HRZR LKJIH 3
	Goto See
	}
}

ACTOR DarkCyberSlayer : CyberSlayer
{

Tag "\c[l2]Dark Cyber Slayer\c-"
BloodColor Green
States
{
  Spawn:
	DRHR A 10 A_Look
	DRHR Z 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	DRHR AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	DRHR CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(38,"Rush")
	Loop
  Rush:
	DRHR A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HumanishStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(50,"See")
	Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"BFG15K")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Rocket")
  Normal:
	DRHR E 3 A_FaceTarget
	DRHR F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/demontechfire")
	DRHR F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,0,0,0)
	DRHR E 3 A_FaceTarget
	DRHR F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/demontechfire")
	DRHR F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,0,0,0)

	DRHR F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/demontechfire")
	DRHR F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,0,0,0)

	DRHR F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/demontechfire")
	DRHR F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,0,0,0)
	DRHR E 3 A_FaceTarget
	DRHR F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/demontechfire")
	DRHR F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,0,0,0)
	DRHR E 3 A_FaceTarget
	DRHR F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("weapons/demontechfire")
	DRHR F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("DTFDemonTechProjectile",36,0,0,0)

	DRHR F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkRocketImpRocket",36,0,random(-3,3))

	DRHR E 8 A_FaceTarget
	DRHR F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkRocketImpRocket",36,0,random(-3,3))

	DRHR E 5 A_FaceTarget
	DRHR F 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",36,0,random(-4,4))

	Goto See

	DRHR G 3 
	DRHR G 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Missile")
	Goto See

	DRHR I 5
	DRHR J 5 A_Scream
	DRHR KL 5
	DRHR L 5
	DRHR M 0 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	DRHR M 5 A_Fall
	DRHR M -1

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	DRHR MLKJI 3
	Goto See
}

ACTOR DarkCyberSlayerGhostA
{
Height 56
Radius 2
Alpha 0.75
Scale 1.1
RENDERSTYLE Translucent
+NONSHOOTABLE
+NOINTERACTION
+CLIENTSIDEONLY
+NONETID
States
	{
	Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
		DRHR A 2 A_FadeOut(0.1,1)
		Loop
    Toaster:
		TNT1 A 0
		Stop
	}
}

Actor CyberBrute
{
Monster
Health 1000
Speed 6
Mass 500
Height 59
Radius 24
MeleeDamage 25
MeleeRange 24
+FLOORCLIP
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+NOPAIN
+FASTMELEE
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
SeeSound "CyberBrute/See"
ActiveSound "CyberBrute/Active"
PainSound "CyberBrute/Pain"
DeathSound "CyberBrute/Death"
AttackSound "plasmaminigun/fire"
MeleeSound "imp/melee"
Obituary "%o was immediately gunned down by a Cyber Brute."
HitObituary "%o was blown away by the fists of a Cyber Brute."
Tag "\c[m8]Cyber Brute\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	CBRT A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FootStep",0,0,5,0,0,-20)
	CBRT AAAABBBB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FootStep",0,0,5,0,0,-20)
	CBRT CCCCDDDD 2 A_Chase
	Loop
  Melee:
	CBRT DG 2
	CBRT HH 1 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT I 4 A_CustomMeleeAttack(random(20,30),"imp/melee","","Melee")
	CBRT HH 1 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT G 2
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(180,"Lazer","Erasus","BFG15K","Vulcan","Rocket")
  PulseRifle:
	CBRT EE 3 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 0 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CBRT F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",38,15,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CBRT EE 2 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 0 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CBRT F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",38,15,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CBRT EE 2 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 0 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CBRT F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",38,15,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CBRT EE 2 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 0 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CBRT F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",38,15,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CBRT EE 2 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 0 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CBRT F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",38,15,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CBRT EE 2 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 0 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CBRT F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",38,15,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CBRT EE 2 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 0 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CBRT F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",38,15,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CBRT EE 2 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 0 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CBRT F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",38,15,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CBRT EE 2 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 0 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CBRT F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",38,15,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CBRT EE 2 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 0 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
	CBRT F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",38,15,random(-2,2),0,0)

	CBRT EEE 4 A_FaceTarget

	CBRT F 0 A_PlaySoundEx("vulcan/altfire","Weapon")
	CBRT F 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SSVulcanLazer",44,15,random(-2,2),0,0)
	CBRT EE 2 A_FaceTarget

	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(155,"Vulcan")
	Goto See
  Vulcan:
	CBRT EEE 3 A_FaceTarget

	CBRT E 2 A_FaceTarget

	CBRT E 2 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	CBRT E 2 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	CBRT E 2 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(3,3,1,6,"ShockTrooperPlasmaPuff")
	CBRT E 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(155,"Rocket")
	Goto See
  Rocket:
	CBRT EEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",34,15,Random(-2,2))
	CBRT EE 4 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",34,15,Random(-2,2))
	CBRT EE 4 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",34,15,Random(-2,2))
	CBRT EE 4 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",34,15,Random(-2,2))
	CBRT EE 4 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonRocket",34,15,Random(-2,2))
	CBRT EE 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Erasus")
	Goto See
  Erasus:
	CBRT EEE 3 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT E 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/load")
	CBRT EEEEEEEEEEE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	CBRT F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",38,15,random(-1,1))
	CBRT EEEE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(155,"BFG15K")
	Goto See
  BFG15K:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
    CBRT E 18 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT E 6 A_FaceTarget
    CBRT F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",32,15,random(-4,4))
	CBRT E 4 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",32,15,random(-4,4))
	CBRT E 4 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",32,15,random(-4,4))
	CBRT E 4 A_FaceTarget
	CBRT F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",32,15,random(-4,4))
	CBRT E 20 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
    Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	CBRD A 4 Bright A_Scream
	CBRD B 4 Bright A_Fall
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	CBRD CD 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	CBRD E -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	CBRD EDCBA 4
	Goto See
}
}

Actor SoulOfPurgatory
{
Monster
Health 250
Height 56
Radius 16
Mass 100
Speed 7
FloatSpeed 7
Damage 7
PainChance 75
BloodColor "Blue"
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+DONTHARMCLASS
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTFALL
+NOICEDEATH
Damagetype "Hell"
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
SeeSound "SoulOfPurgatory/Sight"
ActiveSound "SoulOfPurgatory/Active"
AttackSound "SoulOfPurgatory/Sight"
PainSound "SoulOfPurgatory/Pain"
DeathSound "SoulOfPurgatory/Death"
Obituary "%o was crisped by a Soul of Purgatory."
HitObituary "%o was severed by a Soul of Purgatory."
Tag "\c[m5]Soul Of Purgatory\c-"
var int user_script;
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SoulOfPurgatoryFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	ISUL A 10 Bright A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SoulOfPurgatoryFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	ISUL AAA 1 Bright A_Chase
	Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"FireBall","MiniComet")
  Normal:
	ISUL A 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	ISUL B 40 Bright A_SkullAttack(39)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(88,"FireBall")
	Goto See
  FireBall:
	ISUL A 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	ISUL B 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",8,0,-4)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",8,0,4)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",8,0,0)
	ISUL A 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(88,"MiniComet")
	Goto See
  MiniComet:
	ISUL A 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	ISUL B 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryComet",8,0,0)
	ISUL A 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	ISUL C 5 Bright A_Pain
	GoTo See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.75,1)
	ISUL C 4 Bright A_NoGravity
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/rocklx",0,1.0,0)
	ISUL D 4 Bright A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(20,92)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueParticleSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_CLIENTSIDE)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",15,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom23",15,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,15,Random(4,-4),Random(4,-4),Random(4,8),0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_CLIENTSIDE)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	ISUL E 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
	ISUL F 2 Bright A_Fall
	ISUL GH 4
	Stop
	}
}

ACTOR SoulOfPurgatoryFireFollower : SamaelFireFollower
{
States
{

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueFire3",random(-5,-9),random(-3,3),random(10,45),random(-1,1),random(-1,1),random(-1,1),random(0,360),SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_CLIENTSIDE,64)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("ImDead",1,"Death",AAPTR_TARGET)
	Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 1
	Stop
	}

Actor ElementalOfPurgatory
{
Monster
Health 1700
Height 56
Radius 30
Mass 1200
Speed 6
FloatSpeed 6
PainChance 15
BloodColor "Blue"
MeleeRange 70
MeleeDamage 15
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+DONTHARMCLASS
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
Damagetype "Hell"
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
SeeSound "ElementalOfPurgatory/Sight"
ActiveSound "ElementalOfPurgatory/Active"
PainSound "ElementalOfPurgatory/Pain"
DeathSound "ElementalOfPurgatory/Death"
MeleeSound "caco/melee"
Obituary "%o was reduced to ashes by an Elemental of Purgatory."
HitObituary "%o was mangled by an Elemental of Purgatory."
Tag "\c[m5]Elemental of Purgatory\c-"
var int user_souls;
States
{
  Spawn:
	IMCC A 10 Bright A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	IMCC AAAAAAA 1 Bright A_Chase
	Loop
  Melee:
	IMCC EFG 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_MeleeAttack
	IMCC FE 4 Bright
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"RapidFire","Comet","HomingComets")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Souls","Dual","Rapid")
  Spread:
	IMCC EF 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	IMCC G 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",24,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",24,0,5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",24,0,10)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",24,0,-5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",24,0,-10)
	IMCC FE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"RapidFire")
	Goto See
  RapidFire:
	IMCC EF 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	IMCC G 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",24,0,random(-2,2))
	IMCC G 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",24,0,random(-2,2))
	IMCC G 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",24,0,random(-2,2))
	IMCC G 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",24,0,random(-2,2))
	IMCC G 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",24,0,random(-2,2))
	IMCC G 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SoulOfPurgatoryBall",24,0,random(-2,2))
	IMCC FE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Comet")
	Goto See
  Comet:
	IMCC EF 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	IMCC G 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ElementalOfPurgatoryComet",24,0,0)
	IMCC GFE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"HomingComets")
	Goto See
  HomingComets:
	IMCC EF 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	IMCC G 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ElementalOfPurgatoryHomingComet",24,0,5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ElementalOfPurgatoryHomingComet",24,0,-5)
	IMCC GFE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"RapidFire","Comet")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(89,"Souls")
	Goto See
  Souls:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_souls >= 6,"Spread")
	IMCC EF 5 Bright
	IMCC G 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_souls",user_souls+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PainAttack("SoulOfPurgatory")
	IMCC EF 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Dual:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_souls >= 5,"Comet")
	IMCC EF 5 Bright
	IMCC G 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_souls",user_souls+2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_DualPainAttack("SoulOfPurgatory")
	IMCC EF 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"RapidFire","Comet")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(89,"Rapid")
	TNT1 A 0
	Goto See
  Rapid:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_souls >= 7,"RapidFire")
	IMCC EF 5 Bright
	IMCC G 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_souls",user_souls+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PainAttack("SoulOfPurgatory")
	IMCC G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_souls",user_souls+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PainAttack("SoulOfPurgatory")
	IMCC G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_souls",user_souls+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PainAttack("SoulOfPurgatory")
	IMCC G 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_souls",user_souls+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PainAttack("SoulOfPurgatory")
	IMCC EF 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"RapidFire","Comet")
	Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0
	IMCC H 6 Bright A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(78,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	IMCC I 6 Bright A_Scream
	IMCC J 3 Bright A_Fall
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("comet/explosion",CHAN_BODY,1.0,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueParticleSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,32,Random(8,-8),Random(8,-8),Random(8,12),0,128)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX",32,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom27",32,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_PainDie("SoulOfPurgatory")
	IMCC KL 3 Bright
	IMCC MNOPQ 2 Bright
	IMCC RSTU 3
	IMCC V -1
	Stop
}
}

Actor ElementalOfPurgatoryComet : Comet
{
Projectile
Speed 35
Damage 5
Decal Scorch
States
{
  Spawn:
	BCMT AAAABBBBCCCC 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("ElementalOfPurgatoryCometTail",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_CLIENTSIDE,0)
	Loop
  XDeath:
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(64,112)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueParticleSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE,0)
	BCMT DE 3 Bright
	TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItemEx("ElementalOfPurgatoryCometDeath",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE,0)
	Stop
}
}

ACTOR ElementalOfPurgatoryCometTail
{

Radius 1
Scale 1.15

Alpha 0.3
+NOINTERACTION
+CLIENTSIDEONLY

{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
	TNT1 A 1
	BCMT DEFGHI 2 Bright
	Stop
  Toaster:
	TNT1 A 1
	Stop
}
}

	Stop
}

	HPCM E 3 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BlueCometDeath",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE,0)

Actor Kaboom27 : Kaboom6 { Scale 1.15 }

Actor OverlordOfPurgatory : ElementalOfPurgatory
{
Monster
Health 10000
Height 100
Radius 84
Mass 10000
Speed 8
FloatSpeed 8
PainChance 16
MeleeRange 100
MeleeDamage 100
MeleeThreshold 168
+BOSS
+NOFEAR
+NORADIUSDMG
DamageFactor 0.55
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.5
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.25
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.2
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.2
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor "Pierce", 0.5
DamageFactor "MarinePierce", 0.5
DamageFactor "Kaboom", 0.4
DamageFactor "MarineKaboom", 0.4
SeeSound "OverlordOfPurgatory/Sight"
PainSound "OverlordOfPurgatory/Pain"
DeathSound "OverlordOfPurgatory/Death"
ActiveSound "OverlordOfPurgatory/Active"
Obituary "%o was turned into dust by the Overlord of Purgatory."
HitObituary "Overlord of Purgatory Overlord ate %o for lunch."
Tag "\c[m5]Overlord of Purgatory\c-"
Scale 1.5
var int user_script;
var int user_rage;
var int user_elementals;
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	0VER A 10 Bright A_Look
	Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
	0VER AAAABBBBCCCC 1 Bright A_Chase
	Loop
  Melee:
	0VER DDDDDEEEE 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
	0VER F 1 A_MeleeAttack
	0VER FFFEEED 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetShootable
    TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Comets","HomingComets","Sniper")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Elemental")
  Normal:
	0VER DDDDEEEE 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
	0VER FF 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("OverlordOfPurgatoryBall",59,0,random(-8,8),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	0VER FF 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("OverlordOfPurgatoryBall",59,0,random(-8,8),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	0VER FF 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("OverlordOfPurgatoryBall",59,0,random(-8,8),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	0VER FF 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("OverlordOfPurgatoryBall",59,0,random(-8,8),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	0VER FF 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("OverlordOfPurgatoryBall",59,0,random(-8,8),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	0VER FF 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("OverlordOfPurgatoryBall",59,0,random(-8,8),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	0VER FF 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("OverlordOfPurgatoryBall",59,0,random(-8,8),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	0VER FF 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("OverlordOfPurgatoryBall",59,0,random(-8,8),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	0VER EDD 5 Bright
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Comets")
	Goto See
  Comets:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("OverlordOfPurgatoryFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	0VER JJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJ 1 Bright A_FaceTarget

    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(88,"Elemental")

  Elemental:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_elementals >= 4,"Normal")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("OverlordOfPurgatoryFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)

	0VER HGEDD 5 Bright A_SpawnItem("OverlordOfPurgatoryFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"PainRage")
	0VER L 6 Bright A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(118,"Missile")
	Goto See
  PainRage:
	0VER L 3 Bright A_Pain
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_rage >= 2,"Missile")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_rage",user_rage+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(10,80,0,24,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",400)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("legbanished/see")
	0VER LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("LegendaryCyberFlameSpawner3",0,0,0,0)
	0VER LLLL 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OverlordOfPurgatorySpawners",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32,64)
	0VER LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("LegendaryCyberFlameSpawner3",0,0,0,0)
	0VER LLLL 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OverlordOfPurgatorySpawners",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32,64)
	0VER LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("LegendaryCyberFlameSpawner3",0,0,0,0)
	0VER LLLL 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OverlordOfPurgatorySpawners",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32,64)
	0VER LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("LegendaryCyberFlameSpawner3",0,0,0,0)
	0VER LLLL 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OverlordOfPurgatorySpawners",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32,64)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
    0VER LL 3 Bright
    Goto See
  Death:
    0VER M 5 Bright A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
    0VER NNNNNNNNNNNNN 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BlueKaboomDeath",random(-64,64),random(-64,46),random(16,96),random(-4,4),random(-4,4),random(0,4),0,SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	0VER OOOOOOOOOOOOO 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BlueKaboomDeath",random(-64,64),random(-64,46),random(16,96),random(-4,4),random(-4,4),random(0,4),0,SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PainDie("SoulOfPurgatory")
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigBlueBloodCloud", random(10,96), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)

ACTOR HomingRocketZombie
{
Health 120
Radius 20
Height 56
Mass 100
Speed 8
PainChance 90
Monster
+FLOORCLIP
+MISSILEMORE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
SeeSound "grunt/sight"
PainSound "grunt/pain"
Deathsound "grunt/death"
ActiveSound "grunt/active"
Obituary "%o was splattered by a Rocket Zombie's Homing rocket."
Tag "\ccHoming Rocket Zombie\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    MMGY A 10 A_Look
	MMGI A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	MMGY AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    MMGY CCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
  Missile:
    MMGY E 14 A_FaceTarget
    MMGY F 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("UpdatedDemonHomer",50,10,0)
	MMGY E 20 A_PlaySound("rocket/drumspin")
    Goto See
  Pain:
	MMGY H 2
	MMGY H 2 A_Pain
	Goto See
  Death:
	MMGY I 4
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	MMGY J 4 A_Scream
	MMGY K 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	MMGY L 4 A_Fall
	MMGY L -1
	Stop
  XDeath:
	MMGY M 5
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	MMGY O 5 A_XScream
	MMGY P 5 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	MMGY Q 5 A_Fall
	MMGY RSTU 5
	MMGY U -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	MMGY LLKJI 5
	Goto See
   }
}

ACTOR MRLZombie : HomingRocketZombie
{
Obituary "%o got noobed by a Mini Rocket Launcher Zombieman."
Tag "\cbMini Rocket Launcher Zombieman\c-"

  Spawn:

	Loop
  See:
	MP0S AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    MP0S CCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
	Loop
  Missile:

	MP0S E 5 A_FaceTarget

	MP0S F 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZMiniRocket",40,10,random(-2,2),CMF_TRACKOWNER)
	MP0S G 5
	Goto See
  Pain:
	MP0S H 2
	MP0S H 2 A_Pain
	Goto See
  Death:

	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	MP0S J 5 A_Scream

	MP0S L 5 A_Fall

	MP0S M -1
	Stop
  XDeath:

	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	MP0S O 5 A_XScream
	MP0S P 5
	MP0S Q 5 A_Fall
	MP0S RSTU 5
	MP0S V -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	MP0S MJKJI 5
	Goto See
	}

Actor Maledict
{
Monster
Health 12500
Height 100
Radius 84
Mass 10000
Speed 16
FloatSpeed 8
PainChance 8
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+DONTHARMCLASS
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+BOSS
+NOFEAR
+NORADIUSDMG
Damagetype "Hell"
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.5
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.25
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.2
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.2
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor "Pierce", 0.5
DamageFactor "MarinePierce", 0.5
DamageFactor "Kaboom", 0.4
DamageFactor "MarineKaboom", 0.4
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
DamageFactor 0.55
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
SeeSound "brain/sight"
PainSound "brain/pain"
DeathSound "brain/death"
ActiveSound "Maledict/Active"
Obituary "%o was turned into dust by the Overlord of Purgatory."
HitObituary "Overlord of Purgatory Overlord ate %o for lunch."
Tag "\c[d9]Maledict\c-"
Scale 1.5
var int user_script;
var int user_bigsummon;
var int user_summoner;
var int user_gate;
var int user_rage;
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	MALD ABCDCB 4 A_Look
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sound/wingflap")
	Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
	MALD AABBCCDDCCBB 2 A_Chase
 	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sound/wingflap")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Evade")
	Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,9)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,14,0,0)
	MALD ABCDCB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)
	MALD ABCDCB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetShootable
    TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Summoner","Gate")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Summon","Summon","BigSummon")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Focus")
  Normal:
    MALD AABBCCDDCCBB 2 A_FaceTarget
    MALD EEEEEEEEE 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictProjectile",85,0,random(-8,8))
    MALD E 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictProjectile",85,0,0)
    MALD EEE 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    MALD EEEEEEEEE 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictProjectile",85,0,random(-8,8))
    MALD E 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictProjectile",85,0,0)
    MALD EEE 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    MALD EEEEEEEEE 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictProjectile",85,0,random(-8,8))
    MALD E 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictProjectile",85,0,0)
    MALD EEE 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(138,"Focus","Evade")
    Goto See
  Focus:
    MALD AABBCCDDCCBB 2 A_FaceTarget
    MALD E 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictProjectileBig",125,14,0)
    MALD E 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictProjectileBig",125,-14,0)
    MALD EEE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    MALD E 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictProjectileBig",125,14,0)
    MALD E 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictProjectileBig",125,-14,0)
    MALD EEE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    MALD E 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictProjectileBig",125,14,0)
    MALD E 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictProjectileBig",125,-14,0)
    MALD EEE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    MALD E 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictProjectileBig",125,14,0)
    MALD E 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictProjectileBig",125,-14,0)
    MALD EEE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(138,"Summon","Evade")
    Goto See
  Summon:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(z - floorz >= 384,"Normal")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Maledict In Sky",0,0,0) == 1,"Normal")
    MALD AABBCCDDCCBB 2 A_FaceTarget
    MALD EEEEE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("brain/spit","Voice",0,2)
    MALD EEEEEEE 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MaledictSummon",35,0,120,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(138,"Evade")
    Goto See
  Summoner:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(z - floorz >= 384,"Normal")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Maledict In Sky",0,0,0) == 1,"Normal")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_summoner >= 1,"Summon")
  	MALD AABBCCDDCCBB 2 A_FaceTarget
 	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sound/wingflap")
    MALD AABBCCDDCCBB 2 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("Summoner/Sight","Voice",0,2)
 	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sound/wingflap")
    MALD EEEEE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("brain/spit","Voice",0,2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_summoner",user_summoner+1)
    MALD EE 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MaledictSummoner",35,0,120,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(138,"Evade")
    Goto See
  BigSummon:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(z - floorz >= 384,"Focus")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Maledict In Sky",0,0,0) == 1,"Focus")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_bigsummon >= 3,"Summoner")
  	MALD AABBCCDDCCBB 2 A_FaceTarget
 	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sound/wingflap")
    MALD AABBCCDDCCBB 2 A_FaceTarget
 	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sound/wingflap")
    MALD EEEEEEEEEEEE 5 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("TerminatorLineSpawner")
    MALD EEE 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("brain/spit","Voice",0,2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_bigsummon",user_bigsummon+1)
    MALD E 0 A_CustomMissile("MaledictBigSummon",100,0,0)
    MALD EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE 5 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("TerminatorLineSpawner")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(138,"Evade")
    Goto See
  Gate:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(z - floorz >= 384,"Focus")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Maledict In Sky",0,0,0) == 1,"Focus")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_gate >= 1,"Summon")
  	MALD AABBCCDDCCBB 2 A_FaceTarget
 	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sound/wingflap")
    MALD AABBCCDDCCBB 2 A_FaceTarget
 	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sound/wingflap")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("brain/sight","Voice",0,2)
    MALD EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE 5 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("TerminatorLineSpawner")
    MALD EEE 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("brain/spit","Voice",0,2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_gate",1)
  GateSelect:
    MALD E 0
    MALD E 0 A_Jump(64,2,3)
    MALD E 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MaledictInvasionGateZombie",100,0,0,random(4,8),0,random(2,6),0,32)
    Goto GateGo
    MALD E 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MaledictInvasionGateImp",100,0,0,random(4,8),0,random(2,6),0,32)
    Goto GateGo
    MALD E 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MaledictInvasionGateFiend",100,0,0,random(4,8),0,random(2,6),0,32)
    Goto GateGo
  GateGo:
    TNT1 A 0
    MALD EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE 5 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("TerminatorLineSpawner")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(138,"Evade")
    Goto See
  Pain:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"PainRage")
	MALD F 3
	MALD F 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
	Goto See
  PainRage:
	MALD F 3 Bright
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_rage >= 3,"Missile")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_rage",user_rage+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(10,80,0,24,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",500)
    MALD F 0 A_PlaySound("brain/sight")
	MALD FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("DarkAnniFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("brain/spit","Voice",0,2)
    MALD FFFFFFFF 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinSummon",35,0,120,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	MALD FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("DarkAnniFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("brain/spit","Voice",0,2)
    MALD FFFFFFFF 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinSummon",35,0,120,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	MALD FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("DarkAnniFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("brain/spit","Voice",0,2)
    MALD FFFFFFFF 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinSummon",35,0,120,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	MALD FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF 3 Bright A_SpawnItem("DarkAnniFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
    MALD FF 3 Bright
    Goto See
  Death:
    MALD G 5 A_ScreamAndUnblock
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
    MALD HHHHHIIIIIJJJJJKKKKKLLLLL 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SuperBossExplosionEffect",0,0,0)
    MALD M -1
    Stop
	}
}

Actor MaledictProjectile
{
Projectile
Speed 38
Damage 13
SeeSound "monsters/newfireshoot"
DeathSound "phaseimp/shotx"
Decal DoomImpScorch
States
{
  Spawn:
    BAD1 AB 3 Bright
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MaledictProjectileParticle",Random(-12,12),Random(-12,12),Random(-12,12),Random(-2,2),Random(-2,2),Random(-2,2),Random(-20,20),128)
    BAD1 CB 3 Bright
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MaledictProjectileParticle",Random(-12,12),Random(-12,12),Random(-12,12),Random(-2,2),Random(-2,2),Random(-2,2),Random(-20,20),128)
    Loop
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom8", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX4", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    BAD1 E 8 A_Gravity
    BAD1 F 8
    BAD1 G 105
    BAD1 GGGGGGGGGG 2 A_FadeOut(0.1)
    Stop
}
}

Actor MaledictSummon : FleshWizardSpawners
{
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+THRUSPECIES
Reactiontime 35
States
{
   Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_limit > 3,"Landing")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",user_limit+1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetAngle(random(0,359))
	BOSF ABCD 1 Bright A_Recoil(-2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Landing")
    Loop
   Landing:
    TNT1 A 0 A_CheckFloor("Land")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",0)
    BOSF ABCD 1 Bright ThrustThingZ(0,-2,0,1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
    Loop
   Land:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_limit > 2,"Death")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",user_limit+1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetAngle(random(0,359))
	BOSF ABCD 1 Bright A_Recoil(-2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Death")
    Loop
   Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TeleportFog")
    TNT1 A 5 A_SpawnItemEx("MaledictMinions",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 1 A_Fall
	Stop
	}
}

ACTOR MonolithOfSin
{
Monster
Speed 3
Mass 99999
Radius 48
Height 64
Health 3000
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.5
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
PainChance 15
+FLOORCLIP
+FLOATBOB
+DONTRIP
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+LOOKALLAROUND
+NOBLOOD
+DONTHARMSPECIES
-SOLID
SeeSound "MonolithOfSin/Sight"
PainSound "MonolithOfSin/Pain"
AttackSound "MonolithOfSin/Fire"
DeathSound "MonolithOfSin/Death"
ActiveSound "MonolithOfSin/Slot"
RadiusDamageFactor 0.15
Obituary "%o was killed."
Scale 0.3
var int user_minions;
var int user_script;
Tag "\c[d9]Monolith Of Sin\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSW A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSW A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSW B 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSW B 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSW C 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSW C 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSW D 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSW D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(156,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_minions >= 200,"SeeChase")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("MonolithOfSin/Fire")
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinSummon",0,0,60,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_minions",user_minions+2)
  SeeChase:
	ICSW A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSW A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSW B 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLos("Missile")
	ICSW B 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSW C 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSW C 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSW D 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSW D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(20,"Teleport")
    Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_minions >= 200,"MissileWander")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("MonolithOfSin/Fire")
    TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinSummon",0,0,60,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_minions",user_minions+6)
  MissileWander:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW B 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW B 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW C 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW C 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW D 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW B 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW B 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW C 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW C 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW D 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSW D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("MonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CposRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"Pause")
    Goto Missile
  Pause:
    TNT1 A 0 
	ICSW AABBCCDD 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
	ICSW AABBCCDD 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Teleport")
	ICSW A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Teleport:
    ICSW A 1 Bright A_UnSetShootable
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("TeleportFog")
	ICSW AAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_FadeOut(0.1,0)
	ICSW AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
	ICSW A 105 
	ICSW AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("TeleportFog")
	ICSW AAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_FadeIn(0.1)
    ICSW A 4 Bright A_SetShootable
    Goto See
  Death:
	ICSW A 0
	ICSW A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOATBOB",FALSE)
	ICSW A 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	ICSW AAAAABBBBBCCCCCDDDDDAAAAABBBBBCCCCCDDDDD 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom",random(16,76),random(32,-32),random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	ICSW AAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(0,48),random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,8),0,128)
	ICSW A 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
	Stop
}
}

ACTOR MonolithOfSinTrail
{
Radius 2
Height 2
Speed 4
Damage 0
Projectile
RenderStyle Add
Scale 0.3
Alpha 0.95
+NOCLIP
+DONTSPLASH
+NOINTERACTION
+CLIENTSIDEONLY
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
	ICSW AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_FadeOut
	Stop
  Toaster:
	TNT1 A 0
	Stop
}
}
