ACTOR DarkMonolithOfSin : MonolithOfSin
{
Health 4500
Tag "\c[l2]Dark Monolith Of Sin\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSV A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSV A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSV B 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSV B 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSV C 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSV C 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSV D 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSV D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(156,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_minions >= 100,"SeeChase")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("MonolithOfSin/Fire")
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinSummon",0,0,60,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_minions",user_minions+2)
  SeeChase:
	ICSV A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSV A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSV B 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLos("Missile")
	ICSV B 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSV C 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSV C 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSV D 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSV D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(20,"Teleport")
    Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_minions >= 100,"MissileWander")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("MonolithOfSin/Fire")
    TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinSummon",0,0,60,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_minions",user_minions+6)
  MissileWander:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV B 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV B 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV C 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV C 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV D 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV B 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV B 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV C 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV C 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV D 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSV D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CposRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"Pause")
    Goto Missile
  Pause:
    TNT1 A 0 
	ICSV AABBCCDD 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
	ICSV AABBCCDD 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Teleport")
	ICSV A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Teleport:
    ICSV A 1 Bright A_UnSetShootable
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("TeleportFog")
	ICSV AAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_FadeOut(0.1,0)
	ICSV AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
	ICSV A 105 
	ICSV AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("TeleportFog")
	ICSV AAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_FadeIn(0.1)
    ICSV A 4 Bright A_SetShootable
    Goto See
  Death:
	ICSV A 0
	ICSV A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOATBOB",FALSE)
	ICSV A 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	ICSV AAAAABBBBBCCCCCDDDDDAAAAABBBBBCCCCCDDDDD 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom5",random(16,76),random(32,-32),random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	ICSV AAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(0,48),random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,8),0,128)
	ICSV A 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("GreenBossExplosionEffect")
	Stop
}
}

Actor DarkMonolithOfSinSummon : MaledictSummon
{
States
{
   Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_limit > 3,"Landing")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",user_limit+1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetAngle(random(0,359))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticleGreen",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSW AB 1 Bright A_Recoil(-2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticleGreen",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSW CD 1 Bright A_Recoil(-2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Landing")
    Loop
   Landing:
    TNT1 A 0 A_CheckFloor("Land")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticleGreen",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSW AB 1 Bright ThrustThingZ(0,-2,0,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticleGreen",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSW CD 1 Bright ThrustThingZ(0,-2,0,1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
    Loop
   Land:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_limit > 2,"Death")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",user_limit+1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetAngle(random(0,359))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticleGreen",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSW AB 1 Bright A_Recoil(-2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticleGreen",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSW CD 1 Bright A_Recoil(-2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Death")
    Loop
   Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TeleportFog")
    TNT1 A 5 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkMonolithOfSinMinions",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 1 A_Fall
	Stop
	}
}

ACTOR CyberMonolithOfSin : MonolithOfSin
{
Health 4000
Tag "\c[m8]Cyber Monolith Of Sin\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSY A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	ICSY A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyberMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(156,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_minions >= 150,"SeeChase")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("MonolithOfSin/Fire")
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CyberMonolithOfSinSummon",0,0,60,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_minions",user_minions+2)
  See:
	ICSY A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSY A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyberMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSY A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLos("Missile")
	ICSY A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyberMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSY A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSY A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyberMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSY A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	ICSY A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("CyberMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(156,1)
	Goto SeeSummon
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(20,"Teleport")
    Loop
  SeeSummon:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_minions >= 150,"See")
	ICSY JKLMNOPQR 4 Bright A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("MonolithOfSin/Fire")
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CyberMonolithOfSinSummon",0,0,60,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_minions",user_minions+2)
	ICSY SRQPONMLKHJ 4 Bright A_Chase
    Goto See+5
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"MissileAttack")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_minions >= 150,"MissileAttack")
	ICSY JKLMNOPQRS 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("MonolithOfSin/Fire")
    TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CyberMonolithOfSinSummon",0,0,60,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_minions",user_minions+6)
  MissileWander:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	ICSY SRQPONMLKJ 4 Bright A_Wander
    TNT1 A 0 A_CposRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"Pause")
    Goto Missile+2
  MissileAttack:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
    ICSY BBBB 6 A_FaceTarget
    ICSY C 0 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",56,16,Random(4,-4))	
    ICSY C 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",56,-16,Random(4,-4))	
    ICSY D 0 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",56,16,Random(4,-4))	
    ICSY D 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",56,-16,Random(4,-4))	
    ICSY E 0 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",56,16,Random(4,-4))	
    ICSY E 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",56,-16,Random(4,-4))	
    ICSY F 0 A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",56,16,Random(4,-4))	
    ICSY F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("Cybruiser15K",56,-16,Random(4,-4))	
	ICSY G 5 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
	ICSY H 5 A_FaceTarget
	ICSY B 10 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pause:
    TNT1 A 0 
	ICSY IIIIIIII 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
	ICSY IIIIIIII 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Teleport")
	ICSY I 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Teleport:
    ICSY I 1 Bright A_UnSetShootable
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("TeleportFog")
	ICSY IIIIIIIIIII 1 A_FadeOut(0.1,0)
	ICSY IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII 0 A_Wander
	ICSY I 105 
	ICSY IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII 0 A_Wander
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("TeleportFog")
	ICSY IIIIIIIIIII 1 A_FadeIn(0.1)
    ICSY I 4 Bright A_SetShootable
    Goto See
  Death:
	ICSY A 0
	ICSY A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOATBOB",FALSE)
	ICSY A 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	ICSY AAAAABBBBBCCCCCDDDDDAAAAABBBBBCCCCCDDDDD 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom",random(16,76),random(32,-32),random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	ICSY AAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(0,48),random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,8),0,128)
	ICSY A 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BossExplosionEffect")
	Stop
}
}

ACTOR CyberMonolithOfSinTrail : MonolithOfSinTrail
{
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
	ICSY AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_FadeOut
	Stop
}
}

Actor CyberMonolithOfSinSummon : MaledictSummon
{
States
{
   Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_limit > 3,"Landing")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",user_limit+1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetAngle(random(0,359))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticlerRed",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSC AB 1 Bright A_Recoil(-2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticlerRed",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSC CD 1 Bright A_Recoil(-2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Landing")
    Loop
   Landing:
    TNT1 A 0 A_CheckFloor("Land")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticlerRed",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSC AB 1 Bright ThrustThingZ(0,-2,0,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticlerRed",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSC CD 1 Bright ThrustThingZ(0,-2,0,1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
    Loop
   Land:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_limit > 2,"Death")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",user_limit+1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetAngle(random(0,359))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticlerRed",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSC AB 1 Bright A_Recoil(-2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticlerRed",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSC CD 1 Bright A_Recoil(-2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Death")
    Loop
   Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TeleportFog")
    TNT1 A 5 A_SpawnItemEx("CyberMonolithOfSinMinions",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 1 A_Fall
	Stop
	}
}

Actor ConquerorLich
{
Scale 1.25
Health 10600
PainChance 5
Radius 40
Height 110
Mass 5000
Speed 15
Monster
+FLOORCLIP
+BOSS
+NOFEAR
+NORADIUSDMG
+LOOKALLAROUND
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.5
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.25
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.2
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.2
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor "Pierce", 0.5
DamageFactor "MarinePierce", 0.5
DamageFactor "Kaboom", 0.4
DamageFactor "MarineKaboom", 0.4
DamageFactor 0.45
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
SeeSound "ConquerorLich/Sight"
PainSound "ConquerorLich/Pain"
DeathSound "ConquerorLich/Death"
ActiveSound "ConquerorLich/Active"
Obituary "%o was hunted down by The Conqueror Lich."
Tag "\c[s0]Conqueror \c[i7]Lich\c-"
var int user_script;
var int user_rage;
Decal Scorch
States 
{ 
 Spawn: 
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	CQLH A 10 A_Look 
	Loop 
 See: 
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	CQLH A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
    CQLH A 0 A_PlaySound("hellboss/step")
	CQLH AABB 3 A_Chase
	CQLH C 0 A_PlaySound("hellboss/step")
	CQLH CCDD 3 A_Chase 
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Avoid","Rush")
	Loop 
 Avoid:
	CQLH A 1 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH A 0 A_SetAngle(angle+random(0,359))
	CQLH A 0 A_Recoil(-32)
	CQLH A 0 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH AAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("ConquerorLichGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)	 
	CQLH A 0 A_SetAngle(angle+random(0,359))
	CQLH A 0 A_Recoil(-32)
	CQLH A 0 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH AAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("ConquerorLichGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)		   
	Goto See
 Rush:
	CQLH A 0 A_PlaySound("hellboss/step")
	CQLH AAA 0 A_Chase
	CQLH A 2 A_SpawnItemEx("ConquerorLichGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	CQLH AAA 0 A_Chase
	CQLH A 2 A_SpawnItemEx("ConquerorLichGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	CQLH AAA 0 A_Chase
	CQLH B 2 A_SpawnItemEx("ConquerorLichGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	CQLH AAA 0 A_Chase
	CQLH B 2 A_SpawnItemEx("ConquerorLichGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)	   
	CQLH A 0 A_PlaySound("hellboss/step")
	CQLH AAA 0 A_Chase
	CQLH C 2 A_SpawnItemEx("ConquerorLichGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	CQLH AAA 0 A_Chase
	CQLH C 2 A_SpawnItemEx("ConquerorLichGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	CQLH AAA 0 A_Chase
	CQLH D 2 A_SpawnItemEx("ConquerorLichGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	CQLH AAA 0 A_Chase
	CQLH D 2 A_SpawnItemEx("ConquerorLichGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"See")	
	Loop
 Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetShootable
    TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(88,"Railgun","RPGRocket")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Rockets","HeavyRocket","NapalmRocket")
 Normal:
	CQLH EEE 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 34, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 34, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SentientExplosiveTracer",74,-21,random(-3,3))
	CQLH F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SentientExplosiveTracer",74,21,random(-3,3))
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 34, 24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing", 34, -24, 40, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SentientExplosiveTracer",74,-21,random(-3,3))
	CQLH G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("SentientExplosiveTracer",74,21,random(-3,3))
	CQLH A 0 A_Jump(11,"Rockets","Rockets","Railgun","HeavyRocket","NapalmRocket")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Missile","Missile","See")
	TNT1 A 0 A_MonsterRefire(10,"Avoid")
	Goto Normal+3
 Rockets:
	CQLH IIII 4 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH I 2 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH I 2 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH I 2 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH I 2 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH I 2 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH I 2 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZMRLFastRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH II 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Avoid","Railgun","HeavyRocket","NapalmRocket")
	Goto See
 Railgun:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("ExplosiveRailgun/Charge")
    CQLH II 20 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("ExplosiveRailgun/Fire")
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("NobleExplosiveRailgunImpact",70, 0, 0)
    CQLH J 5 Bright A_CustomRailgun(50,0,None,None,RGF_SILENT,1,0,"HellBulletPuff",0,0,0,0,40,0,"ExplosiveRailgunTrail",15)
    CQLH II 9 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("ExplosiveRailgun/Fire")
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("NobleExplosiveRailgunImpact",70, 0, 0)
    CQLH J 5 Bright A_CustomRailgun(50,0,None,None,RGF_SILENT,1,0,"HellBulletPuff",0,0,0,0,40,0,"ExplosiveRailgunTrail",15)
    CQLH II 9 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("ExplosiveRailgun/Fire")
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("NobleExplosiveRailgunImpact",70, 0, 0)
    CQLH J 5 Bright A_CustomRailgun(50,0,None,None,RGF_SILENT,1,0,"HellBulletPuff",0,0,0,0,40,0,"ExplosiveRailgunTrail",15)
    CQLH II 15 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Avoid","Avoid","RPGRocket")
	Goto See
 HeavyRocket:
	CQLH IIII 4 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH II 4 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH II 4 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("BersekerHeavyRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH II 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Avoid","Railgun")
	Goto See
 NapalmRocket:
	CQLH IIII 4 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("ConqLichNapalmRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH II 4 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("ConqLichNapalmRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH II 4 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("ConqLichNapalmRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH II 4 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("ConqLichNapalmRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH II 4 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH J 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("ConqLichNapalmRocket", 70, 0, 0)
	CQLH II 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Avoid","Railgun")
	Goto See
 RPGRocket:
	CQLH IIIII 8 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("tank/fire","Voice")//A_PlayWeaponSound("rpg/fire")
    CQLH J 14 Bright A_CustomMissile("ZTankShoot",70,00,0)//A_CustomMissile("ZRPGRocket",70,00,0)
	CQLH I 4 A_FaceTarget
	CQLH IIII 8 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Avoid")
	Goto See
 Pain:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"PainRage")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(144,"Avoid")
	CQLH H 3
	CQLH H 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(144,"Missile")
	Goto See
 PainRage:
	CQLH H 3 Bright
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_rage >= 3,"Missile")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_rage",user_rage+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(10,80,0,24,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",500)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("ConquerorLich/Rage")
	CQLH H 0 A_CustomMissile("ConquerorLichRageAttackSpammer",64,0,0)
	CQLH HHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("AvatarLightningCharge")
	CQLH HHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("AvatarLightningCharge")
	CQLH HHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("AvatarLightningCharge")
	CQLH HHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH 3 Bright A_GiveInventory("AvatarLightningCharge")
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
    CQLH HH 3 Bright
    Goto See
 Death:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	CQLH KKKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	CQLH LLLLL 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	CQLH MMMMM 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom", random(20,80), random(20,-20), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigRedBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	CQLH N 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	CQLH OPQ 4
	CQLH R 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	CQLH STUV 4
    CQLH V -1 
	Stop
   } 
}

Actor CyberSoul 
{
Health 250
Radius 16
Height 32
Mass 150
Speed 12
FloatSpeed 12
PainChance 60
Monster
Obituary "%o was targeted and destroyed by a Cyber Soul."
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+LOOKALLAROUND
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+DONTFALL
+NOPAIN
+NOBLOOD
+NOICEDEATH
+BRIGHT
Damagetype "Hell"
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
Damagetype "Hell"
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
MaxStepHeight 32
MaxDropOffHeight 32
SeeSound "CyberSoul/See"
ActiveSound "CyberSoul/Idle"
DeathSound "CyberSoul/Death"
Tag "\c[m8]Cyber Soul\c-"
var int user_script;
States 
{ 
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CyberSoulFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    CYCB A 2 A_Look
    Loop 
  See: 
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CyberSoulFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(100,"SeeSuicide")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(26,"Evade")
    CYCB AAA 2 A_Chase
    Loop 
  SeeSuicide:
    CYCB AAA 2 A_Chase("","Kamikaze")
    Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,6)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,14,0,0)
	CYCB AAA 5 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)
	CYCB AAA 5 A_Chase
	Goto See
  Missile:
    CYCB B 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
    CYCB B 2 A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",12,0,random(-2,2),0)
    CYCB C 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("drone/fire","Weapon")
    CYCB B 2 A_CustomMissile("MPulseProj",12,0,random(-2,2),0)
    CYCB BBBBBBBBBBBB 5 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Kamikaze:
	TNT1 B 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("world/alarm1")
	CYCB BBBB 5 A_FaceTarget
	CYCB B 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLos(1)
	Goto SeeSuicide
	CYCB B 0 A_JumpIfCloser(80,"Explode")
    CYCB B 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CyberSoulGhost",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    CYCB B 3 A_SkullAttack(35)
    Goto Kamikaze+6  
  Explode:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SuicideBomb",24,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
    CYCB B 3 A_Die
    Goto SeeSuicide
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
	CYCB E 0 A_StopSoundEx("SoundSlot7")
	CYCB E 0 A_NoBlocking
    CYCB E 0 A_SetFloorClip
    CYCB F 5 A_Scream
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HArchonSoul",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom3",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RocketExplosionFlare",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RocketExplosionShockWave",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128) 
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,0,random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,8),0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("RocketEx")
    CYCB GHIJ 5 Bright
    Stop 
} 
}

{

ACTOR ArgentineElemental : SoulKeeper
{ 
Health 1500
Monster

+NOPAIN

{
  Spawn:
	CPAN A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:

  Evade:

	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop

	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Rockets","Lazer","Spread","Erasus")

	CPAN F 12 Bright A_CustomMissile("ArgentineElementalProjectile",26,0,0)

    Goto See

	CPAN FDDE 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(147,"Evade")

	CPAN F 0 A_FaceTarget

	CPAN F 0 A_FaceTarget
	CPAN FFFFFF 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("HectebusFlamethrower",24,0,random(-3,3),0,0)
	CPAN F 0 A_FaceTarget
	CPAN FFFFFF 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("HectebusFlamethrower",24,0,random(-3,3),0,0)
	CPAN F 0 A_FaceTarget
	CPAN FFFFFF 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("HectebusFlamethrower",24,0,random(-3,3),0,0)
	CPAN F 0 A_FaceTarget
	CPAN FFFFFF 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("HectebusFlamethrower",24,0,random(-3,3),0,0)
	CPAN DE 4 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Melee:
	Goto FlameThrowers
  Pain:
	CPAN G 4
	CPAN G 4 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death: 
	CPAN H 20 Bright A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))	
	CPAN IIIJJJ 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner", 0, 0, random(20,40), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)  
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom3", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))	 
	TNT1 A 0 A_PainDie("CyberSoul")
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))	
	CPAN KKKLLL 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom17", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	CPAN M 5 Bright 
	Stop
} 
}

Actor ArgentineElementalProjectile : SuperSmallBall
{
DamageType "Hell"
Damage 4
-SEEKERMISSILE
-EXTREMEDEATH
Obituary "%o was eleminated by an Argentine Elemental."
Decal DoomImpScorch
States
{
  Spawn:
	RRB3 AABBCCDD 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("SuperBallTrail2",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_CLIENTSIDE)
    Loop
}
}

Actor LegendaryArchvile
{
Monster
Health 2500
Radius 20
Height 56
Mass 500
Speed 18
PainChance 10
Scale 1.15
+QUICKTORETALIATE 
+FLOORCLIP 
+NOTARGET
+NORADIUSDMG
+BOSS
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE  
+NOICEDEATH
+DONTGIB
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+NOTARGET
+NOTIMEFREEZE
+NOFEAR
SeeSound "LegendaryVile/See"
PainSound "LegendaryVile/Pain"
DeathSound "LegendaryVile/Death"
ActiveSound "LegendaryVile/Active"
Obituary "Every last bit of %o was consumed by the Legendary Archvile's void."
Tag "\c[z3]Legendary Archvile\c-"
Bloodcolor Blue
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor 0.65
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary1", 0.0
DamageFactor "Cyber10K", 0.0
DamageFactor "LegMind", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.0
DamageFactor "LegendaryPlayer", 0.3
DamageFactor "LegendaryGuru", 0.0
DamageFactor "LegendaryGuruPlayer", 0.3
DamageFactor "NobleComet", 0.0
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.25
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.25
DamageFactor "PlayerDevBall", 0.125
DamageFactor "PlayerDevBall2", 0.125
DamageFactor "PlayerDTBFGRailgunSlug", 0.125
DamageFactor "PlayerDevTracer", 0.125
DamageFactor "DBFG10K2", 0.65
DamageFactor "PlayerDBFG10K2", 0.65
DamageFactor "DBFG2", 0.65
DamageFactor "PlayerDBFG2", 0.65
DamageFactor "Pierce", 0.25
DamageFactor "MarinePierce", 0.25
DamageFactor "Kaboom", 0.2
DamageFactor "MarineKaboom", 0.2
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
var int user_script;
var int user_minion;
States 
{ 
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    LVLL A 10 Bright A_Look 
    Loop 
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(82,"Rush")
    LVLL A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    LVLL AA 2 Bright A_VileChase
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    LVLL BB 2 Bright A_VileChase
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    LVLL CC 2 Bright A_VileChase
    LVLL A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    LVLL DD 2 Bright A_VileChase
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    LVLL EE 2 Bright A_VileChase
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    LVLL FF 2 Bright A_VileChase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Teleport")
    Loop
  Rush:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegVileGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_VileChase
	LVLL A 1 Bright A_VileChase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegVileGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_VileChase	
	LVLL A 1 Bright A_VileChase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegVileGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_VileChase
	LVLL B 1 Bright A_VileChase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegVileGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_VileChase
	LVLL B 1 Bright A_VileChase		
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegVileGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_VileChase
	LVLL C 1 Bright A_VileChase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegVileGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_VileChase
	LVLL C 1 Bright A_VileChase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegVileGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_VileChase
	LVLL D 1 Bright A_VileChase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegVileGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_VileChase
	LVLL D 1 Bright A_VileChase		
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegVileGhostE",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_VileChase
	LVLL E 1 Bright A_VileChase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegVileGhostE",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_VileChase
	LVLL E 1 Bright A_VileChase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegVileGhostF",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_VileChase
	LVLL F 1 Bright A_VileChase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegVileGhostF",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_VileChase
	LVLL F 1 Bright A_VileChase
	//TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetinLOS("Missile")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(28,"Teleport")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"See")
	Loop
  Teleport:
    LVL2 A 1 Bright A_UnSetShootable
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVL2 AAAAAABBBB 1 A_FadeOut(0.1,0)
	LVL2 B 2 
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
    LVL2 B 1 A_PlayWeaponSound("boss/teleport")
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVL2 BBBBBCCCCCC 1 A_FadeIn(0.1)
    LVL2 C 1 Bright A_SetShootable
    Goto See
  MinionSummoner:
    LVLL P 0 
    LVLL P 0 A_JumpIf(user_minion >= 3,"Missile")	 
    LVLL P 1 Bright A_SetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("vile/sight")
	LVLL GHIHGHIHGHIHGHIHGH 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("GHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("hk/summon")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_minion",user_minion+1)
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryVileSummon",0,0,64,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	LVLL GHI 9 Bright
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
	Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetShootable
    TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"RageSkull","WaitAttack","LegendaryLightning")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"MinionSummoner")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Projectiles","AssaultProjectile","ThunderBall","FloorFire")
	TNT1 A 0 
  Normal:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(1386,2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,"RageSkull")
    TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("LegendaryVile/Attack",5)
    LVLL G 10 Bright A_PlaySound("exile/voidstart")
    LVLL H 8 Bright A_VileTarget("LegendaryArchvileLightningBomb")
    LVLL IJ 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(300,"TeleportVoid")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"TeleportVoid")
	LVLL KLMN 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    LVLL O 4 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",10,20,70,0.5,"Hell")
    LVLL N 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    LVLL O 4 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",10,20,70,0.5,"Hell")
    LVLL N 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    LVLL O 4 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",10,20,70,0.5,"Hell")
    LVLL N 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    LVLL O 4 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",10,20,70,0.5,"Hell")
    LVLL N 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    LVLL O 4 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",10,20,70,0.5,"Hell")
    LVLL N 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    LVLL O 4 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",10,20,70,0.5,"Hell")
    LVLL N 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    LVLL O 4 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",10,20,70,0.5,"Hell")
    LVLL P 20 Bright
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Projectiles")
    Goto See
  TeleportVoid:
    TNT1 A 0 Bright A_UnSetShootable
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL KKKKKKKKLL 1 Bright A_FadeOut(0.1,0)
	LVLL L 2 
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("boss/teleport")
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL LLLLMMMMMMMM 1 Bright A_FadeIn(0.1)
    TNT1 A 0 Bright A_SetShootable
    LVLL N 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    LVLL O 4 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",10,20,70,0.5,"Hell")
    LVLL N 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    LVLL O 4 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",10,20,70,0.5,"Hell")
    LVLL N 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    LVLL O 4 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",10,20,70,0.5,"Hell")
    LVLL N 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    LVLL O 4 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",10,20,70,0.5,"Hell")
    LVLL N 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    LVLL O 4 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",10,20,70,0.5,"Hell")
    LVLL N 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    LVLL O 4 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",10,20,70,0.5,"Hell")
    LVLL N 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    LVLL O 4 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",10,20,70,0.5,"Hell")
    LVLL P 20 Bright
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Projectiles")
    Goto See
  Projectiles:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("LegendaryVile/Attack",5)
	LVLL GHIJKLMN 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	LVLL O 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("LegendaryArchvileProj",34,0,random(-5,5))
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	LVLL N 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("LegendaryArchvileProj",34,0,random(-5,5))
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	LVLL O 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("LegendaryArchvileProj",34,0,random(-5,5))
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	LVLL N 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("LegendaryArchvileProj",34,0,random(-5,5))
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	LVLL O 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("LegendaryArchvileProj",34,0,random(-5,5))
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	LVLL N 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("LegendaryArchvileProj",34,0,random(-5,5))
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	LVLL O 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("LegendaryArchvileProj",34,0,random(-5,5))
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	LVLL N 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("LegendaryArchvileProj",34,0,random(-5,5))
	LVLL P 6 Bright
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"ThunderBall")
	Goto See
  ThunderBall:
    LVLL G 10 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("LegendaryVile/Attack",5)
    LVLL HIJKLMNO 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	LVLL P 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("legbanished/attack2")
    LVLL P 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryArchvileThunderBall",34,0,-9)
    LVLL P 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryArchvileThunderBall",34,0,9)
    LVLL P 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryArchvileThunderBall",34,0,0)
    LVLL P 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"FloorFire")
    Goto See
  FloorFire:
	LVL2 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("LegendaryVile/Attack",5)
	LVL2 A 0 A_FaceTarget
    LVL2 AAAAAABBBBBB 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("BHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,360)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,270)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,-270)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,240)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,-240)

	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,-210)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,180)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,-180)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,150)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,-150)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,120)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,-120)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,90)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,-90)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,60)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,-60)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,30)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,-30)
	LVLL C 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryNobleFloorFireSpawner",0,0,0)
    LVL2 CCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCC 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("BHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"AssaultProjectile")
    Goto See
  AssaultProjectile:
    LVLL G 10 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("LegendaryVile/Attack",5)
    LVLL HIJKLMNO 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	LVLL P 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("LegendaryAssaultProjectile/Shot")
    LVLL P 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryAssaultProjectile",34,0,random(-5,5))
    LVLL P 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
    LVLL ONO 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	LVLL P 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("LegendaryAssaultProjectile/Shot")
    LVLL P 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryAssaultProjectile",34,0,random(-5,5))
    LVLL P 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
    LVLL ONO 5 Bright A_FaceTarget
	LVLL P 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("LegendaryAssaultProjectile/Shot")
    LVLL P 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryAssaultProjectile",34,0,random(-5,5))
    LVLL P 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"WaitAttack")
	Goto See
  WaitAttack:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("LegendaryVile/Attack",5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	LVLL GGGGGGGGGGGG 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryArchvileWaitBall",0,0,90,frandom(-40,40),frandom(-40,40),frandom(10,40),0,SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL H 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL H 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL H 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL I 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL I 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL I 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryArchvileWaitBall",0,0,90,frandom(-40,40),frandom(-40,40),frandom(10,40),0,SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL H 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL H 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL H 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL I 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL I 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL I 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryArchvileWaitBall",0,0,90,frandom(-40,40),frandom(-40,40),frandom(10,40),0,SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL H 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL H 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL H 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL I 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL I 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)

	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LHellionSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	LVLL G 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
	Goto See
  RageSkull:

    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Pain: 
  	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(58,"Teleport")	
    LVLL Q 5 Bright
    LVLL Q 5 Bright A_Pain 
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,"Rush")
    Goto See 
  Heal:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("brain/spit")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,20,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,40,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,60,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,80,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,100,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,120,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,140,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,160,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,180,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,200,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,220,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,240,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,260,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,280,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,300,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,320,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,340,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("LegVileResRadius",10,0,360,0)
    LVL2 AAAABBBBCCCC 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("LRedeGSmokeSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0
	LVLL QQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQ 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PainfulDeathKaboom",random(-32,32),random(-40,40),random(16,48),random(-4,4),random(-4,4),random(0,4),0,SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS) 
	LVLL QQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQ 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PainfulDeathKaboom",random(-32,32),random(-40,40),random(16,48),random(-4,4),random(-4,4),random(0,4),0,SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)  
	LVLL Q 6 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BlueGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("MiniDeathBall")
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
    LVLL R 5 Bright A_Scream
    LVLL S 5 Bright A_Fall
    LVLL TUV 5 Bright
	LVLL W 4 Bright A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    LVLL XY 4 Bright
    LVLL Z -1
    Stop
  } 
}

ACTOR LegendaryArchvileLightningBomb : ArchvileFire
{
RenderStyle Add
Scale 0.5
Alpha 1
+DONTSPLASH
+NOTIMEFREEZE
DamageType "Hell"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    LMVI A 1 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("LegendaryVile/Thunder","Voice",1)
    LMVI ABBCCDDEEFFGGHHIIJJKKLLMMNNOOPPQQRRSSTTUUVVWWXXYYZZ 1 Bright A_Fire
    LMV0 AABBCCDD 1 Bright A_Fire
    LMVI ABBCCDDEEFFGGHHIIJJKKLLMMNNOOPPQQRRSSTTUUVVWWXXYYZZ 1 Bright A_Fire
    LMV0 AABBCCDD 1 Bright A_Fire
	LMVI A 1 Bright A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
	LMVI A 1 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("exile/voidend","Voice")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("LegendaryArchvileLightning")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(100,200,1)
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(5,15,0,20,0)
    TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("LegendaryArchvileLightningBombFlame1",0,0,0,random(-3,3),random(-3,3),random(-3,3),random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("LegendaryArchvileLightningBombFlame3",random(5,55),0,random(0,360),CMF_AIMDIRECTION,frandom(-40,70))
	LMVI BBCCDDEE 1 Bright
	TNT1 A 20
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    Stop
}
}

ACTOR LegendaryArchvileProj
{
Radius 6
Height 8
Speed 60
Damage 14
Projectile 
+SEEKERMISSILE
+NOTIMEFREEZE
RenderStyle Add
Damagetype "Hell"
Scale 1.2
Alpha 0.8
Decal DoomImpScorch
SeeSound "LegendaryVile/Soul"
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SeekerMissile(5,5)
    IFX1 AA 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BHellionSmoke",-10)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SeekerMissile(5,5)
    IFX1 AA 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BHellionSmoke",-10)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SeekerMissile(5,5)
    IFX1 AA 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BHellionSmoke",-10)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SeekerMissile(5,5)
    IFX1 AA 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BHellionSmoke",-10)
    Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Setscale(1.0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(30,100)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("devil/scream")
    LVSK ABCDEFGHIJKL 2 Bright A_Explode(10,100)
    Stop
  }
}

ACTOR LegendaryArchvileThunderBall
{

Actor LegendaryArchvileThunderBallTrail : DevastatorTrail
{
+NOTIMEFREEZE
Scale 0.85
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
    TDCR A 4 bright A_FadeOut(0.15)
    Loop
}
}

ACTOR DarkCacodemon : Cacodemon~
{
Health 700
Speed 9
PainChance 80
MeleeDamage 7
Obituary "%o was smitten by a Dark Cacodemon."
HitObituary "%o was eaten by a Dark Cacodemon." 
BloodColor "Green"
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+DONTHARMSPECIES
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.2
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
Tag "\c[l2]Dark Cacodemon\c-"
Scale 1.1
States
{
  Spawn:
	DCAC A 1 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	DCAC A 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(38,"Rush")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(16,"Evade")		 
	Loop
  Rush:
	DCAC AAAA 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(6,"See","See","Evade")
	DCAC A 2 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCacodemonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Evade2")
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,14,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCacodemonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DCAC A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCacodemonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DCAC A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCacodemonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DCAC A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCacodemonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DCAC A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCacodemonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DCAC A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCacodemonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DCAC A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Evade2:
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)		 
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCacodemonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DCAC A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCacodemonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DCAC A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCacodemonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DCAC A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCacodemonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DCAC A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCacodemonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DCAC A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCacodemonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	DCAC A 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop		 
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(56,"Speede")
  Normal:
	DCAC BC 6 A_FaceTarget
	DCAC D 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkCacodemonBall",24,0,0)		
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkCacodemonBall",24,0,6)
	DCAC D 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkCacodemonBall",24,0,-6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkCacodemonBall",24,0,12)
	DCAC D 5 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkCacodemonBall",24,0,-12)
	DCAC CB 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Speede","Speede","Evade")
  Speede:
	DCAC BC 6 A_FaceTarget
	DCAC D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkCacodemonProjectile",24,0,0,0,0)
	DCAC CB 4 A_FaceTarget
	DCAC BC 6 A_FaceTarget
	DCAC D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkCacodemonProjectile",24,0,0,0,0)
	DCAC CB 4 A_FaceTarget
	DCAC BC 6 A_FaceTarget
	DCAC D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkCacodemonProjectile",24,0,0,0,0)
	DCAC CB 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Spamm","Spamm","Evade")
	Goto See
  Spamm:
	DCAC BC 6 A_FaceTarget
	DCAC D 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("ObserverShot",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	DCAC D 0 A_FaceTarget
	DCAC D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ObserverShot",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	DCAC D 0 A_FaceTarget
	DCAC D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ObserverShot",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	DCAC D 0 A_FaceTarget
	DCAC D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ObserverShot",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	DCAC D 0 A_FaceTarget
	DCAC D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ObserverShot",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	DCAC D 0 A_FaceTarget
	DCAC D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ObserverShot",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	DCAC D 0 A_FaceTarget
	DCAC D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("ObserverShot",24,0,random(-4,4),0,0)
	DCAC CB 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Evade")
	Goto See
  Melee:
	DCAC BC 5 A_FaceTarget
	DCAC D 5 A_MeleeAttack
	DCAC CB 5 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
	DCAC E 6 A_Pain
	DCAC F 6
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
	DCAC G 7 A_Scream
	DCAC H 7 A_NoBlocking
	DCAC I 6
	DCAC J 5
	DCAC K 4
	DCAC L -1
	Stop
  XDeath:
	DCAX A 4 
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	DCAX B 3 A_PlaySound("Gore/Splat")
	DCAX C 3 A_SpawnItemEx("DarkCacodemonGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	DCAX D 3 A_NoBlocking
	DCAX EFGHI 3
	DCAX J -1
	Stop		 
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	DCAC KJIHG 4
	Goto See         
}
}

	Loop
  Toaster:

	Stop

ACTOR PhaseSoul : TerrorSoul1
{
Damage 5
Health 100
+NOBLOOD
+NOBLOODDECALS
+MISSILEMORE
+NOICEDEATH
+BRIGHT
PainSound "monsters/terrorsoulpain"
Obituary "%o was eaten by a Phase soul"
var int user_script;
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Soul\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseSoulFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	PSKU AABB 2 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseSoulFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	PSKU AABB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(46,"Phase")		
	Loop
  Phased:
    PSKU AABBAABBAABBAABBAABBAABBAABBAABB 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
    PSKU AABBAABBAABBAABB 1 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"UnPhase")
    Goto Phased+32	
  Phase:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")
    PSKU C 2 A_FaceTarget
    PSKU C 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
    PSKU C 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
    PSKU C 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
    PSKU C 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
    Goto Phased
  UnPhase:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")
    PSKU C 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
    PSKU C 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
    PSKU C 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
    PSKU C 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	TNT1 C 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
    PSKU C 2 A_FaceTarget		
    Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	PSKU AAC 2 A_FaceTarget
	PSKU C 2 A_SkullAttack(23)
    PSKU DDCC 2
    Goto Missile+4
  Pain:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	PSKU E 3 A_Pain
	PSKU E 3
	Goto See
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
 	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
	PSKU F 4 A_NoGravity
	PSKU G 4 A_Scream
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SoulPart1",0,0,Random(10,20),Random(8,-8),Random(8,-8),Random(6,8))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SoulPart2",0,0,Random(10,20),Random(8,-8),Random(8,-8),Random(6,8))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SoulPart3",0,0,Random(10,20),Random(8,-8),Random(8,-8),Random(6,8))
	PSKU H 4
	PSKU I 4 A_Fall
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128) 
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	PSKU JK 4
    Stop
}
}

ACTOR PhaseCarrier : SoulKeeper1
{
Health 1000
PainChance 80
Alpha 0.8
SeeSound "Defier/Sight"
DeathSound "Defiler/Death"
BloodColor "cf 00 b0"
Obituary "%o was pierced by a Phase Carrier."
HitObituary "%o is too salty to the refined tastes of the Phase Carrier."
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Carrier\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	PELE A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	PELE AABBCCBB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(46,"Phase")	
	Loop
  Phased:
	PELE AABBCCAAAABBCCAAAABBCCAAAABBCCAA 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
	PELE AABBCCAAAABBCCAA 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"UnPhase")
	Goto Phased+32
  Phase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")
	PELE E 2 A_FaceTarget
	PELE E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	PELE E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PELE E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PELE E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	Goto Phased
  UnPhase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")
	PELE E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	PELE E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PELE E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PELE E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PELE E 2 A_FaceTarget		
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	TNT1 A 0 Bright A_Jump(87,"Seeker")
  Normal:
	PELE DE 6 A_FaceTarget
	PELE F 5 Bright A_PainAttack("PhaseSoul")
	PELE ED 4
	PELE F 5 Bright A_PainAttack("PhaseSoul")
	PELE ED 4
	Goto See
  Seeker:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PELE D 6 Bright A_FaceTarget 
	PELE E 4 Bright	A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 Bright A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PELE F 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseBaronBall", 26, 0, -30)
	PELE F 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseBaronBall", 26, 0, 30)
	PELE ED 4
	Goto See
  Melee:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PELE DE 5 A_FaceTarget 
	PELE F 4 A_MeleeAttack
	PELE ED 3 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See		
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PELE G 12 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(61,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PELE H 5 
	PELE I 5 Bright A_Scream
	PELE J 5 Bright A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.75,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleParticleSpawner", 0, 0, random(20,40), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom8", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))		
	PELE K 5 Bright A_PainDie("PhaseSoul")
	PELE LM 5 Bright
	Stop
} 
}

Actor PhaseCacodemon : Cacodemon1
{
Health 750
Speed 16
PainChance 40
MeleeDamage 7
BloodColor "Purple"
Alpha 0.8
SeeSound "monsters/watchersight"
PainSound "monsters/watcherpain"
DeathSound "monsters/watcherdeath"
Obituary "%o was smitten by a Phase Cacodemon."
HitObituary "%o became a Phase Cacodemon's dessert."
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Cacodemon\c-"
var int user_phased;
States
{
  Spawn:
	PHCC A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	PHCC A 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(10,"Evade")	
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(12,"Phase")		
	Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,7)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,14,0,0)
	PHCC AAAA 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,14,0,0)	
	PHCC AAAA 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop	
	Goto See
  Phase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_phased == 1,"UnPhase")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_phased",1)
	PHCC A 2 A_FaceTarget
	PHCC A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	PHCC A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PHCC A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PHCC A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	Goto Phased
  Phased:
	PHCC AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
	PHCC A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(4,"UnPhase")
	Goto Phased+32
  UnPhase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_phased",0)
	PHCC A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	PHCC A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PHCC A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PHCC A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	PHCC A 2 A_FaceTarget		
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(88,"Seeker","Lazer")
  Normal:
	PHCC BC 7 A_FaceTarget
	PHCC D 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PHCC D 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkCacoBall",24,0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkCacoBall",24,0,4,0,0)
	PHCC D 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkCacoBall",24,0,-4,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkCacoBall",24,0,8,0,0)
	PHCC D 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("DarkCacoBall",24,0,-8,0,0)
	PHCC CB 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Seeker")
	Goto See
  Seeker:
	PHCC BC 7 A_FaceTarget
	PHCC D 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PHCC D 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseImpBall",24,0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PHCC D 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseImpBall",24,0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PHCC D 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseImpBall",24,0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PHCC D 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseImpBall",24,0,0,0,0)
	PHCC CB 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Lazer")
	Goto See
  Lazer:
	PHCC BC 7 A_FaceTarget
	PHCC D 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	PHCC D 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	PHCC D 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	PHCC D 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",24,0,0,0,0)
	PHCC CB 6 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Melee:
	PHCC BC 5 A_FaceTarget
	PHCC D 5 A_MeleeAttack
	PHCC CB 5 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PHCC E 6 A_Pain
	PHCC F 6
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Missile")
	Goto See
  XDeath:
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	PHCC G 7 A_Scream
	PHCC H 7 A_NoBlocking
	PHCC I 6 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	PHCC J 5
	PHCC K 4
	PHCC L -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	PHCC KJIHG 4
	Goto See
}
}

ACTOR PhaseCadaver : Cadaver1
{
Speed 14
Health 700
PainChance 96
Alpha 0.8
SeeSound "PhaseCadaver/Sight"
PainSound "PhaseCadaver/Pain"
ActiveSound "PhaseCadaver/Active"
DeathSound "PhaseCadaver/Death"
+MISSILEMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
BloodColor "51 07 94"
MeleeRange 100
Obituary "A phase cadaver seeked and destroyed %o."
HitObituary "%o got tko'd by a phase cadaver."
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Cadaver\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	PGHL A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BonyStep",0,0,0,0)
    PGHL AAABBBCCC 2 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BonyStep",0,0,0,0)
    PGHL DDDEEEFFF 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(62,"Phase")
	Loop
  Phase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")   
	PGHL J 2 A_FaceTarget
	PGHL J 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	PGHL J 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PGHL J 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PGHL J 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	Goto Phased
  Phased:
	PGHL AABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
  PhaseChase:
	PGHL AABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"UnPhase")
	Loop
  UnPhase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")		
	PGHL J 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	PGHL J 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PGHL J 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PGHL J 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PGHL J 2 A_FaceTarget		
	Goto See
  Melee:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PGHL J 0 A_SkelWhoosh
	PGHL JK 3 A_FaceTarget
	PGHL L 3 A_CustomMeleeAttack(random(6,9)*7,"skeleton/melee")
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Seeker")
  Normal:
	PGHL GGGG 4 A_FaceTarget
	PGHL H 7 A_CustomMissile("PhaseRocket",60,-16)
	PGHL IIII 6 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Seeker:
	PGHL GGGG 4 A_FaceTarget
	PGHL H 7 A_CustomMissile("PhaseHomer",60,-16)
	PGHL IIII 6 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
	PGHL M 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PGHL M 3 A_Pain
	PGHL M 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
	Goto See
  XDeath:
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PGHL M 6 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	PGHL NOPQR 6
	PGHL S -1
	Loop
  Raise:
	PGHL RQPONM 6
	Goto See
}
}

	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/homingrockbeep")
    Loop
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(8,128)
    TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("PurpleExplosionKaboom",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleRocketExplosionFlare",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleRocketExplosionShockWave",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleParticleSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128) 
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",0,0,0,random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,8),0,128)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("PurpleRocketEx")
    Stop
}
}

Actor PhaseExile : Exile1
{
Health 1500
Speed 24
Scale 1.0
Obituary "%o was caught by a Phase Exile."
SeeSound "PhaseExile/Sight" 
PainSound "PhaseExile/Pain" 
DeathSound "PhaseExile/Death" 
ActiveSound "PhaseExile/Active" 
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
BloodColor "51 07 94"
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Exile\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PVIL A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	PVIL ABC 2 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	PVIL DEF 2 A_VileChase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Phase")
	Loop
  Phased:
	PVIL ABCDEFABCDEFABCDEFABCDEFABCDEF 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
	PVIL ABCDEFABCDEF 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"UnPhase")
	Goto Phased+30
  Phase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")   
	PVI2 E 2 A_FaceTarget
	PVI2 E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	PVI2 E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PVI2 E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PVI2 E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	Goto Phased
  UnPhase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")		
	PVI2 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	PVI2 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PVI2 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PVI2 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PVI2 A 2 A_FaceTarget		
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"PhaseBalls")
  VileAttack:
	TNT1 A 0 
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
    PVIL G 10 Bright A_PlaySound("exile/voidstart")
    PVIL H 8 Bright A_VileTarget("PhaseExileFireFX")
    PVIL IJKLMN 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    PVIL O 8 Bright A_VileAttack("vile/stop",40,80,120,1.5)
    PVIL P 20 Bright
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(88,"PhaseBalls")
    Goto See
  PhaseBalls:
	TNT1 A 0 
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PVI2 O 5 A_CustomMissile("PhaseArchonTracer",38,0,0)
    PVI2 P 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PVI2 P 5 A_CustomMissile("PhaseArchonTracer",38,0,random(-4,4))
    PVI2 N 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PVI2 N 5 A_CustomMissile("PhaseArchonTracer",38,0,random(-4,4))
    PVI2 O 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PVI2 O 5 A_CustomMissile("PhaseArchonTracer",38,0,random(-4,4))
    PVI2 P 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PVI2 N 5 A_CustomMissile("PhaseArchonTracer",38,0,random(-4,4))
    PVI2 O 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PVI2 O 5 A_CustomMissile("PhaseArchonTracer",38,0,random(-4,4))
    PVI2 P 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PVI2 P 5 A_CustomMissile("PhaseArchonTracer")
    PVI2 N 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PVI2 P 5 Bright
    Goto See
  Heal:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("brain/spit")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,60,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,120,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,180,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,240,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellionResRadius",10,0,300,0)
    PVI2 ABC 10 Bright
    Goto See
  Pain:
    PVIL Q 10 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    PVIL Q 6 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
    PVIL R 5 A_Scream
    PVIL S 5 A_Fall
    PVIL TUV 5
 	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	PVIL W 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    PVIL XY 4
    PVIL Z -1
    Stop
  XDeath:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PVIX A 4 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	PVIX B 3 A_XScream
	PVIX C 3 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	PVIX D 3 A_Fall
	PVIX E 3 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	PVIX FG 3
	PVIX H -1
	Stop
}
}

{

{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    PVOI H 1 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("exile/voidsuck","Voice")
    PVOI HGGHHGGHHGGFFEEFFEEFFEEDDEEDDEEDDCCDDCCDDCCBBCCBBCCBBBBAAAA 1 Bright A_Fire
	PVOI B 1 Bright A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
	PVOI C 1 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("exile/voidend","Voice")
	PVOI DEFGH 1 Bright
	TNT1 A 20
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    Stop
}

ACTOR PhaseArchon : PhaseOverlord1
{ 
Health 800
Scale 1.0
MeleeDamage 8
+BRIGHT
+QUICKTORETALIATE
-NORADIUSDMG
-NOTARGET
Alpha 0.8
Obituary "%o was phased out of existence by a phase archon" 
HitObituary "%o was gutted by a Phase Archon."
SeeSound "PhaseArchon/See"
ActiveSound "PhaseArchon/Active"
PainSound "PhaseArchon/Pain"
DeathSound "PhaseArchon/Death"
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Archon\c-"
States 
{ 
  Spawn:
	PWRL A 10 A_Look
	Loop  
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Rush")
	PWRL AA 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	PWRL BB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	PWRL CC 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	PWRL DD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(62,"Phase")
	Loop
  Rush:
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnHideThing
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)		
	PWRL A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchonGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)		
	PWRL A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchonGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PWRL B 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchonGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PWRL B 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchonGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PWRL C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchonGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PWRL C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchonGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PWRL D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchonGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PWRL D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(84,"See")		
	Loop
  Phased:
	PWRL AABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
	PWRL AABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"UnPhase")
	Goto Phased+32
  Phase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")   
	PWRL E 2 A_FaceTarget
	PWRL E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	PWRL E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PWRL E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PWRL E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	Goto Phased
  UnPhase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")		
	PWRL E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	PWRL E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PWRL E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PWRL E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PWRL E 2 A_FaceTarget		
	Goto See
  Melee:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PWRL EF 5 A_FaceTarget 
	PWRL G 4 A_MeleeAttack
	PWRL FE 3 A_FaceTarget 		
	Goto See
  Missile:        
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Tracer")
  Normal:    
	PWRL EF 6 A_FaceTarget 
	PWRL G 1 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",32,0,0) 
	PWRL G 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",32,0,-6)
	PWRL G 5 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",32,0,6)
	PWRL IJ 6 A_FaceTarget
	PWRL K 1 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",32,0,0)
	PWRL K 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",32,0,-6)
	PWRL K 5 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",32,0,6)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Tracer")
	Goto See
  Tracer:    
	PWRL PONM 4 A_FaceTarget 
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhaseArchonTracer",64,30)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhaseArchonTracer",64,-30)
	PWRL MMMM 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhaseArchonTracer",64,30)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhaseArchonTracer",64,-30)
	PWRL MMMM 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Comet")
	Goto See
  Comet:    
	PWRL MN 8 A_FaceTarget 
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PArchonComet",32,0)
	PWRL OP 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Comet")
	Goto See
  Pain:     
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PWRL Q 3 A_Pain 
	PWRL Q 3  
	Goto See 
  XDeath: 
  Death: 
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PWRL R 8 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	PWRL S 7 A_Scream 
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 40, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128) 
	PWRL U 5 A_Fall 
	PWRL VW 5
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", Random(30,60), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))		
	PWRL X 4 A_CustomMissile("PhaseArchonSoul",86,0,0,2,90)
	PWRL Z 4
	Stop  
  Raise:
	PWRL XWVUSRA 4
	Stop
} 
}

ACTOR PhaseArchonTracer
{
Speed 14
FastSpeed 16
Damage 6
Radius 8
Height 6
Renderstyle Translucent
Alpha 0.85
Scale 0.45
SeeSound "famine/attack"
DeathSound "monsters/newfireexplode"
PROJECTILE
+SEEKERMISSILE
+DOOMBOUNCE
+DONTSPLASH

BounceFactor 1
Decal RevenantScorch
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Homing")
  Normal:
    PSAB AB 2 Bright
	Loop
  Homing:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,1,3,5,7,9)
    PSAB ABABABABAB 2 Bright
	Goto StartSeek
  StartSeek:
    TNT1 A 0 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchonTrailSmoke",0,0,6,0,0,0,0,128) 
    PSAB A 2 Bright	A_Tracer2
	PSAB B 2 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchonTrailSmoke",0,0,6,0,0,0,0,128) 
	Loop
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom8", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX4", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchonTracerEx")
    Stop
}
}
