ACTOR PhaseArchduke : BruiserDemon1
{ 
Scale 1.75
Health 8000
Radius 40
Height 110
Mass 500000
Speed 13
PainChance 6
BloodColor "Purple"
MeleeDamage 24
+BRIGHT
+BOSS
+NOFEAR
+NORADIUSDMG
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
Obituary "%o was killed in the darkness by the Phase Archduke."
HitObituary "%o was punched to death by the Phase Archduke."
SeeSound "PhaseArchduke/See"
DeathSound "PhaseArchduke/Death"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.5
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.25
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.2
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.2
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor "Pierce", 0.6
DamageFactor "MarinePierce", 0.6
DamageFactor "Kaboom", 0.5
DamageFactor "MarineKaboom", 0.5
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
DamageFactor 0.55
var int user_rage;
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Archduke\c-"
States
{  
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	PLBB AA 7 A_Look
	PLBI AA 7 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	PLBB AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	PLBB CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(99,"Rush","Phase","Phase")
	Loop
  SeePhase:
	PLBB AABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_Chase("Melee","Missile",CHF_NOPLAYACTIVE)
  PhasedLoop:
	PLBB AABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_Chase("Melee","Missile",CHF_NOPLAYACTIVE)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"UnPhase")
	Loop
  Phase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")
	PLBB A 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PLBB A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.6)
	PLBB A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.4)
	PLBB A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.2)
	Goto SeePhase
  UnPhase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport",6)
	PLBB A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15,0)
	PLBB A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35,0)
	PLBB A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55,0)
	PLBB A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
	PLBB A 2 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Rush:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB B 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB B 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB D 1 A_Chase
	PLBB D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(84,"See")
	Loop
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetShootable
    TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"PhaseClone")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(144,"Long","Laser","PoeLazer","Comet","RageSoul","RageLightning")
  Normal:
	PLBB EF 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,-28)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,-24)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,-20)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,-16)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,-12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,-8)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,-4)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,0)
	PLBB G 6 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,4)
	PLBB HI 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,28)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,24)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,20)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,16)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,8)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,4)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,0)
	PLBB J 6 A_CustomMissile("PhazoFastShot",64,0,-4)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Long")
	Goto See
  Long:
	PLBB EF 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PLBB GGG 3 A_CustomMissile("PhaseBaronBall",64,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PLBB GGG 3 A_CustomMissile("PhaseBaronBall",64,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PLBB GGG 3 A_CustomMissile("PhaseBaronBall",64,0,0)
	PLBB HI 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PLBB JJJ 3 A_CustomMissile("PhaseBaronBall",64,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PLBB JJJ 3 A_CustomMissile("PhaseBaronBall",64,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PLBB JJJ 3 A_CustomMissile("PhaseBaronBall",64,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Laser")
	Goto See
  Laser:
    PLBB ML 5 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB K 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB K 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB K 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB K 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB K 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB K 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB K 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB K 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB K 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB K 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB K 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB K 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB K 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB K 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,-58,0)
	PLBB M 0 A_CustomMissile("PhazoLaser",110,58,0)
	PLBB KKKK 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Comet")
	Goto See
  Comet:
	PLBB KL 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PArchonComet",64,0,12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PArchonComet",64,0,-12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PArchonComet",64,0,8)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PArchonComet",64,0,-8)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PArchonComet",64,0,4)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PArchonComet",64,0,-4)
	PLBB M 12 A_CustomMissile("PArchonComet",64,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"PoeLazer")
	Goto See
  PoeLazer:
	PLBB EEFF 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PoeLazer",64,-24,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PoeLazer",64,24,0)
	PLBB G 6 A_CustomMissile("PoeLazer",64,0,0)
	PLBB HHII 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PoeLazer",64,-24,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PoeLazer",64,24,0)
	PLBB J 6 A_CustomMissile("PoeLazer",64,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"RageSoul","RageLightning")
	Goto See
  RageSoul:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("PhaseArchduke/See")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeRageSoul",-20,random(120,300),random(64,250),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-3,3),(180*random(0,1)),SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeRageSoul",-20,random(120,300),random(64,250),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-3,3),(180*random(0,1)),SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeRageSoul",-20,random(120,300),random(64,250),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-3,3),(180*random(0,1)),SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeRageSoul",-20,random(120,300),random(64,250),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-3,3),(180*random(0,1)),SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeRageSoul",-20,random(120,300),random(64,250),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-3,3),(180*random(0,1)),SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeRageSoul",-20,random(120,300),random(64,250),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-2,2),frandom(-3,3),(180*random(0,1)),SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"PhaseClone")
	Goto See
  RageLightning:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("PhaseArchduke/See")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeLightningStrike",Random(684,-684),Random(684,-684),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeLightningStrike",Random(684,-684),Random(684,-684),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeLightningStrike",Random(684,-684),Random(684,-684),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeLightningStrike",Random(684,-684),Random(684,-684),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeLightningStrike",Random(684,-684),Random(684,-684),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeLightningStrike",Random(684,-684),Random(684,-684),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeLightningStrike",Random(684,-684),Random(684,-684),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeLightningStrike",Random(684,-684),Random(684,-684),0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"PhaseClone")
	Goto See
  PhaseClone:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("DarkCyber/Laugh","Voice")
	PLBB NNNNNNNNNNNNN 3 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeSmallFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FakePhaseArchduke",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	PLBB N 4 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB N 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PLBB N 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.6)
	PLBB N 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.4)
	PLBB N 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
	PLBB AABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
	PLBB AABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
	Goto SeePhase
  Melee:
	PLBB EF 8 A_FaceTarget
	PLBB G 7 A_MeleeAttack
	Goto See
  Pain:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"PainRage")
	PLBB N 4 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"Missile")
	Goto See
  PainRage:
	PLBB K 3 A_Pain
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_rage >= 3,"Missile")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_rage",user_rage+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(10,80,0,24,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",500)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("PhaseArchduke/See")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(156,"RageSoul","RageLightning")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("brain/sight")
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK 3 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("brain/spit","Voice",0,2)
    TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeSummon",0,0,96,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK 3 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("brain/spit","Voice",0,2)
    TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeSummon",0,0,96,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK 3 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("brain/spit","Voice",0,2)
    TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeSummon",0,0,96,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	PLBB KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK 3 A_SpawnItem("PhaseArchdukeFlameSpawner")
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
    PLBB K 6
    Goto See
  Death:
	PLBD A 7
	TNT1 A 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX",random(30,60),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))  
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleParticleSpawner",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(8,96),0,0,0,0,128) 
	PLBD BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB 1 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleKaboom5",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(8,128),0,0,0,0,128) 
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX",random(30,60),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))  
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleParticleSpawner",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(8,96),0,0,0,0,128) 
	PLBD DDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD 1 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleKaboom5",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(8,128),0,0,0,0,128) 
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("PowerCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX",random(30,60),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))  
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleParticleSpawner",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(8,96),0,0,0,0,128) 
	PLBD EEFFGGHHIIJJKKLL 2 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleKaboom5",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(8,128),0,0,0,0,128) 
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("BRIGHT",0)
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleParticleSpawner",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(8,96),0,0,0,0,128) 
	PLBD MNOP 4 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleKaboom5",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(8,128),0,0,0,0,128) 
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleParticleSpawner",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(8,96),0,0,0,0,128) 
	PLBD QRST 3 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleKaboom5",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(8,128),0,0,0,0,128) 
	PLBD V 3 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash")
	PLBD W -1
	Stop 
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	PLBD VUTSRQP 2
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("BRIGHT",1)
	PLBD ONMLKJIHGFEDCBA 2
	Goto See
}
}

ACTOR PhaseArchdukeLightningStrike : DukeFire
{
+EXTREMEDEATH
+FORCERADIUSDMG
Scale 5.0
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(156,200,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Explode(32,512,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleLightning")
    Stop
}
}

Actor FakePhaseArchduke : PhaseArchduke
{
Health 300
+NOTARGET
+THRUSPECIES
-COUNTKILL
-BOSS
SeeSound " "
DeathSound " "
DropItem ""
ReactionTime 500
States
{
  Spawn:
	PLBB AABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
	PLBB AABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
  See:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
	PLBB AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	PLBB CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(84,"Rush")
	Loop
  Rush:
    TNT1 A 0 
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)    
	TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostA",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB A 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB B 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostB",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB B 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostC",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB C 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeGhostD",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
	PLBB D 1 A_Chase
	PLBB D 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HoofStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(84,"See")
	Loop
  Melee:
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Long")
	PLBB EF 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,-28)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,-24)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,-20)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,-16)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,-12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,-8)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,-4)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,0)
	PLBB G 6 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,4)
	PLBB HI 6 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,28)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,24)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,20)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,16)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,12)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,8)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,4)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,0)
	PLBB J 6 A_CustomMissile("FakePhazoFastShot",64,0,-4)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"Long")
	Goto See
  Long:
	PLBB EF 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PLBB GGG 3 A_CustomMissile("FakePhaseBaronBall",64,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PLBB GGG 3 A_CustomMissile("FakePhaseBaronBall",64,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PLBB GGG 3 A_CustomMissile("FakePhaseBaronBall",64,0,0)
	PLBB HI 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PLBB JJJ 3 A_CustomMissile("FakePhaseBaronBall",64,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PLBB JJJ 3 A_CustomMissile("FakePhaseBaronBall",64,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("imp/attack")
	PLBB JJJ 3 A_CustomMissile("FakePhaseBaronBall",64,0,0)
	Goto See
  Pain:
	PLBB N 4 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(80,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Over:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	PLBB N 1 A_Die
	Goto See
  Death:
	PLBB N 4 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	PLBB NNNNNNNNNNN 4 A_FadeOut(0.1)
	PLBB N 1
	Stop
}
}

Actor FakePhazoFastShot : PhazoFastShot {Damage(2)}
Actor FakePhaseBaronBall : PhaseBaronBall {Damage(2)}

Actor PhaseArchdukeSummon : MaledictSummon
{
States
{
   Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_limit > 3,"Landing")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",user_limit+1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetAngle(random(0,359))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticlePurple",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSP AB 1 Bright A_Recoil(-2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticlePurple",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSP CD 1 Bright A_Recoil(-2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Landing")
    Loop
   Landing:
    TNT1 A 0 A_CheckFloor("Land")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticlePurple",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSP AB 1 Bright ThrustThingZ(0,-2,0,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticlePurple",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSP CD 1 Bright ThrustThingZ(0,-2,0,1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
    Loop
   Land:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_limit > 2,"Death")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_limit",user_limit+1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetAngle(random(0,359))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticlePurple",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSP AB 1 Bright A_Recoil(-2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CubeParticlePurple",random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-12,12),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-2,2),random(-20,20))
	BOSP CD 1 Bright A_Recoil(-2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Countdown
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Death")
    Loop
   Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TeleportFog")
    TNT1 A 5 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeMinions",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 1 A_Fall
	Stop
	}
}

ACTOR PhaseArchdukeGhostA
{

	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
	TNT1 A 1
	PLBB A 2 A_FadeOut(0.10)
	Goto Spawn+1
  Toaster:
	TNT1 A 0
	Stop
}

ACTOR CryoSoul : PhaseSoul
{
Damage 6
Health 150
Obituary "%o was frozen solid by a Cryo Soul."
Tag "\c[c1]Cryo Soul\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CryoSoulFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	CRSO AABB 2 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("CryoSoulFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	CRSO AABB 2 A_Chase
	Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Charge")
  Normal:
	CRSO A 4  A_FaceTarget
	CRSO C 2 A_CustomMissile("CryoSoulProj",10,0,0)
    CRSO CD 2
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Charge")
    Goto See
  Charge:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	CRSO AAC 2 A_FaceTarget
	CRSO C 2 A_SkullAttack(23)
    CRSO DDCC 2
    Goto Charge+5
  Pain:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	CRSO E 3 A_Pain
	CRSO E 3
	Goto See
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
 	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
	CRSO F 4 A_NoGravity
	CRSO G 4 A_Scream
	TNT1 AAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("IceDebris",0,0,Random(10,20),Random(8,-8),Random(8,-8),Random(6,8))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SoulPart1",0,0,Random(10,20),Random(8,-8),Random(8,-8),Random(6,8))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SoulPart2",0,0,Random(10,20),Random(8,-8),Random(8,-8),Random(6,8))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SoulPart3",0,0,Random(10,20),Random(8,-8),Random(8,-8),Random(6,8))
	CRSO H 4
	CRSO I 4 A_Fall
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueParticleSpawner", 0, 0, 12, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128) 
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Bluekaboom4", 12, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX4", 12, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	CRSO JK 4
    Stop
}
}

Actor CryoSoulProj : FRZRBehBombProj{Speed 32}

ACTOR HellFrostRevenant : HellfireRevenant1
{
Health 750
PainChance 80
BloodColor "00 88 ff"
Obituary "%o got iced rekt through by a Corrupted Revenant."
HitObituary "%o got iced rekt through by a Corrupted Revenant."
Tag "\c[c1]HellFrost Soul\c-"
+NOBLOOD
+BRIGHT
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFrostRevenantFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    CREV A 3 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HellFrostRevenantFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BonyStep",0,0,0,0)
    CREV AAABBBCCC 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BonyStep",0,0,0,0)	  
    CREV DDDEEEFFF 2 A_Chase
    Loop
  Melee:
  Missile:
    CREV JJJJJJJJ 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("HellFrostRevenantRocket",54,14,0)  
    CREV K 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("HellFrostRevenantRocket",54,-14,0)
	CREV K 18
	Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("IceDebris",0,0,0,Random(4,-4),Random(4,-4),Random(4,8),0,128)
    CREV L 6 Bright A_Pain		
    CREV L 6 Bright
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
    CREV LM 7
 	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",0)
    CREV N 7 A_Scream
    CREV O 7 A_NoBlocking
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)	
    CREV P -1
    Stop
  XDeath:
    CREX A 5 A_XScream
    CREX B 4 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128)
 	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",0)
    CREX C 4 A_NoBlocking
    CREX D 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    CREX E 4 
    CREX F -1
    Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
 	TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ImDead",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    CREV ONML 7
    Goto See
}
}

ACTOR BabyOverseer : BabySentient1
{
Health 1600
PainChance 20
Scale 1.4
SeeSound "BabyOverseer/See"
PainSound "BabyOverseer/Pain"
DeathSound "BabyOverseer/Death"
ActiveSound "BabyOverseer/Active"
BloodColor "Green"
Obituary "%o was eradicated by a Baby Overseer."
Tag "\c[A6]Baby Overseer\c-"
var int user_wait;
+BRIGHT
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyOverseerFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	BOVS AB 2 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyOverseerFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	BOVS AB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Evade")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLos(2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Strafing")	
	TNT1 A 0 
	Loop
  Strafing:
	BOVS A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
	BOVS A 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	BOVS B 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
	BOVS B 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLos(2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,"See")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"See")
	Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"EvadeAlt")
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,35,0,0)
	BOVS ABABABAB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  EvadeAlt:
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,35,0,0)
	BOVS ABABABAB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"BFG10K","Railgun")
  Normal:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("FocusedPlasma/Spin")
	BOVS KKKKKKKKKK 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
  NormalGo:
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DFocusedPlasma",7,-12,random(-6,6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DFocusedPlasma",7,12,random(-6,6))
	BOVS KL 1
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DFocusedPlasma",7,-12,random(-6,6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DFocusedPlasma",7,12,random(-6,6))
	BOVS KL 1
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"NormalEnd")
	TNT1 A 0 A_MonsterRefire(36,"NormalEnd")
	Loop
  NormalEnd:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("FocusedPlasma/Down")
	BOVS KKKKK 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	Goto See
  BFG10K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_wait",0)
	BOVS CCCCCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
  BFG10KGo:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_wait >= 6,"BFG10KEnd")	 
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_wait",user_wait+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",18,0,random(-400,400)/100.00)
	BOVS DDCC 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	Loop
  BFG10KEnd:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
	BOVS CCCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Evade","Evade","Railgun")
	Goto See
  Railgun:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/rgcharge")
	BOVS CCCCC 4 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	BOVS CC 5 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	BOVS D 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkCyberRail",18,0,random(2,-2))
	BOVS DDCCC 5 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Evade")
	Goto See
  Pain:
	BOVS A 3
	BOVS A 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
    BOVS A 20 A_Scream
    BOVS E 6 A_Fall
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	BOVS F 6 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	BOVS GGGGG 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom5", random(20,40), random(10,-10), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    BOVS H 6
    BOVS I 4
	BOVS J 2
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    BOVS JIHGFE 5
    Goto See
}
}

{

States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyOverseerFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	SACW AB 2 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabyOverseerFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	SACW AB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Evade")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLos(2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Strafing")	
	TNT1 A 0 
	Loop
  Strafing:
	SACW A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
	SACW A 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	SACW B 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
	SACW B 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLos(2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,"See")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"See")
	Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"EvadeAlt")
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,35,0,0)
	SACW ABABABAB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  EvadeAlt:
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,35,0,0)
	SACW ABABABAB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(164,"BFG9K","BFG10K","Railgun","ChaosProj")
  Normal:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("FocusedPlasma/Spin")
	SACW KKKKKKKKKK 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
  NormalGo:
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DFocusedPlasma",7,0,random(-6,6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DFocusedPlasma",7,16,random(-6,6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DFocusedPlasma",7,-16,random(-6,6))
	SACW KL 1
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DFocusedPlasma",7,0,random(-6,6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DFocusedPlasma",7,16,random(-6,6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DFocusedPlasma",7,-16,random(-6,6))
	SACW KL 1
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"NormalEnd")
	TNT1 A 0 A_MonsterRefire(36,"NormalEnd")
	Loop
  NormalEnd:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("FocusedPlasma/Down")
	SACW KKKKK 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	Goto See
  BFG9K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfgf")         
	SACW CCCCCCCCCCCCDDDD 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ZBFG9500Ball",18,0,0)
	SACW DDDCCC 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Evade","BFG10K","BFG10K")
	Goto See
  BFG10K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_wait",0)
	SACW CCCCCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
  BFG10KGo:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_wait >= 9,"BFG10KEnd")	 
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_wait",user_wait+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",18,0,random(-400,400)/100.00)
	SACW DDCC 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	Loop
  BFG10KEnd:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
	SACW CCCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Evade","Railgun","Railgun")
	Goto See
  Railgun:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/rgcharge")
	SACW CCCCC 4 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	SACW CC 5 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	SACW D 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkCyberRail",18,0,random(2,-2))
	SACW DD 5 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/rgcharge")
	SACW CCCCC 4 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	SACW CC 5 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	SACW D 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkCyberRail",18,0,random(2,-2))
	SACW DDCCC 5 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Evade","ChaosProj","ChaosProj")
	Goto See
  ChaosProj:
    SACW VVVVVVVVVVVVVVVV 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("SacrosanctObserver/Attack",5)
    SACW VVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVV 3 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_wait",0)
  ChaosProjGo:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_wait >= 3,"ChaosProjEnd")	 
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_wait",user_wait+1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ChaosSuperLightningProj",60,0,random(-4,4))
	SACW VVVVV 3 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX",1)
	Loop
  ChaosProjEnd:
	SACW VVVVVVVVV 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Evade")
	Loop
  Pain:
	SACW A 3
	SACW A 3 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
	SACW A 20 A_Scream
	SACW E 6 A_Fall
	SACW F 6 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	SACW GGGGG 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom5", random(20,40), random(10,-10), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	SACW H 6
	SACW I 4
	SACW J 2
	Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    SACW JIHGFE 5
    Goto See
}
}

Actor Overseer : CerebralSentient1
{
Health 8000
SeeSound "Overseer/See"
PainSound "Overseer/Pain"
DeathSound "Overseer/Death"
ActiveSound "Overseer/Active"
BloodColor "Green"
Tag "\c[A6]Overseer\c-"
Obituary "%o was shown no mercy from the Overseer."
var int user_summon;
var int user_wait;
States
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,8)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OverseerFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Overseer/Loop",7,1,1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	OV3R AB 2 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,8)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Strong Monster Phase Setter",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OverseerFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Overseer/Loop",7,1,1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
	OV3R AB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(30,"Evade")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLos(2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Strafing")	
	TNT1 A 0
	Loop
  Strafing:
	OV3R A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
	OV3R A 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	OV3R B 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
	OV3R B 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLos(2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,"See")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"See")
	Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"EvadeAlt")
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,35,0,0)
	OV3R ABABABAB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  EvadeAlt:
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,35,0,0)
	OV3R ABABABAB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetShootable
	TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImStillAliveSomehow")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"ThunderCannon","EradicationBFGAlt","WaitAttack")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,"BFG9K","BFG10K","DTBFG10K","BFG12K","SuperLazer")
  Normal:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("FocusedPlasma/Spin")
	OV3R CCCCCCCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
  NormalGo:
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DFocusedPlasma",21,-13,random(-6,6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DFocusedPlasma",21,13,random(-6,6))
	OV3R CD 1
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DFocusedPlasma",21,-13,random(-6,6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DFocusedPlasma",21,13,random(-6,6))
	OV3R CD 1
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"NormalEnd")
	TNT1 A 0 A_MonsterRefire(36,"NormalEnd")
	Loop
  NormalEnd:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("FocusedPlasma/Down")
	OV3R CCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	Goto See
  BFG9K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfgf") 
	OV3R CCCCCCCCCCCCDDDD 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ZBFG9500Ball",32,6,frandom(-6,6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ZBFG9500Ball",32,-6,frandom(-6,6))
	OV3R DDDCCC 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfgf")    
	OV3R CCCCCCCCCCCCDDDD 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ZBFG9500Ball",32,6,frandom(-6,6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ZBFG9500Ball",32,-6,frandom(-6,6))
	OV3R DDDCCC 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfgf") 
	OV3R CCCCCCCCCCCCDDDD 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ZBFG9500Ball",32,6,frandom(-6,6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ZBFG9500Ball",32,-6,frandom(-6,6))
	OV3R DDDCCC 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Evade","BFG10K","BFG10K")
	Goto See
  BFG10K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_wait",0)
	OV3R CCCCCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
  BFG10KGo:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_wait >= 24,"BFG10KEnd")	 
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_wait",user_wait+1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kfire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",24,-18,random(-400,400)/100.00)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Demon10KProjectile",24,18,random(-400,400)/100.00)
	OV3R CD 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(12,1)
	Loop
  BFG10KEnd:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
	OV3R CCCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Evade","DTBFG10K","DTBFG10K")
	Goto See
  DTBFG10K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Cardinal/9k")      
	OV3R KKKKKKKKKKLLLL 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	OV3R L 2 A_CustomMissile("DarkAnniDTBFGBall",28,0,0)
	OV3R KKKK 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Cardinal/9k")
	OV3R KKKKKKKKKKLLLL 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	OV3R L 2 A_CustomMissile("DarkAnniDTBFGBall",28,0,0)
	OV3R KKKK 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Evade","BFG12K","BFG12K")
	Goto See
  BFG12K:
	OV3R KKKKK 5 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG12000/Fire")
	OV3R KKKKKKK 5 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DemonBFG12000Ball",28,0,0)
	OV3R LLL 5 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG12000/Fire")
	OV3R KKKKKKK 5 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DemonBFG12000Ball",28,0,random(-3,3))
	OV3R LLL 5 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	OV3R KKK 6 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Evade","SuperLazer","SuperLazer")
	Goto See
  SuperLazer:
	OV3R KKKK 5 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("SuperLazer/Charge")
	OV3R KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK 4 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)	
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("SuperLazer/Fire")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_wait",0)
  SuperLazerLoop:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_wait >= 30,"SuperLazerEnd")	 
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_wait",user_wait+1)
	OV3R LLL 1 A_GiveInventory("OverseerLazer",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget(0.75,180)
	Loop
  SuperLazerEnd:
	OV3R KKKKKK 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Evade","ThunderCannon","ThunderCannon")
	Goto See
  ThunderCannon:
    OV3R KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/laugh",5)
    OV3R KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK 3 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX2",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_wait",0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("ThunderCannon/Fire")
  ThunderCannonGo:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_wait >= 48,"ThunderCannonEnd")	 
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_wait",user_wait+1)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomRailgun(random(2,4),0,NONE,NONE,RGF_SILENT|RGF_NOPIERCING,1,30,"DarkBruiserRailgunPuff",0,0,0,0,0.45,0,"SacrosanctOverseerRailParticle",-25)
	OV3R L 2 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX2",1)
	Loop
  ThunderCannonEnd:
	OV3R KKKLLLLLL 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Evade","EradicationBFGAlt","EradicationBFGAlt")
	Goto See
  EradicationBFGAlt:
    OV3R KKKK 4 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/laugh",5)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("obelisk/fire")
	OV3R KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK 1 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX3",1)
	OV3R KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK 1 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX3",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkEradicationBFGFocusProj",48,0,0)      
	OV3R KKKKLLLLLLLLLL 1 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX3",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("obelisk/fire")
	OV3R KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK 1 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX3",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkEradicationBFGFocusProj",48,0,0) 
	OV3R KKKKLLLLLLLLLL 1 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX3",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("obelisk/fire")
	OV3R KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK 1 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX3",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("DarkEradicationBFGFocusProj",48,0,0) 
	OV3R KKKKLLLLLLLLLL 1 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX3",1)
	OV3R NNNNN 2 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Evade","WaitAttack","WaitAttack")
	Loop
  WaitAttack:
    OV3R CCCC 4 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("sentient/laugh",5)
    OV3R CCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX",1)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OverseerWaitBall",0,0,90,frandom(-40,40),frandom(-40,40),frandom(10,40),0,SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	OV3R CCCCCCCCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX",1)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OverseerWaitBall",0,0,90,frandom(-40,40),frandom(-40,40),frandom(10,40),0,SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	OV3R CCCCCCCCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX",1)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OverseerWaitBall",0,0,90,frandom(-40,40),frandom(-40,40),frandom(10,40),0,SXF_TRANSFERPOINTERS)
	OV3R CCCCCCCCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX",1)
	Goto See
  Summon:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetInvulnerable
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SentientToken",3,"See")	
    OV3R CCCCCCCCCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SentientToken",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("Health",750)
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(50,150,0,24,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("SacrosanctOverseer/Summon",7)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SacrosanctOverseerSummonEffectFX1",1) 
    OV3R CC 3 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SacrosanctOverseerSummonEffectFX2",1) 
    OV3R CC 3 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SacrosanctOverseerSummonEffectFX1",1) 
    OV3R CC 3 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SacrosanctOverseerSummonEffectFX2",1) 
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OverseerSpawners",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,32)
    OV3R CC 3 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SacrosanctOverseerSummonEffectFX1",1) 
    OV3R CC 3 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SacrosanctOverseerSummonEffectFX2",1)
    OV3R CCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("OverseerStrafeFX",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetInvulnerable
    OV3R CCCCCCCCCCCC 3 A_GiveInventory("LegFlyingBossStrafe",1)
	Goto See
  Pain:
	OV3R A 3
	OV3R A 3 A_Pain	
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"Summon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(192,"Missile")
	Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stopsound(7)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
	OV3R E 20 A_Fall
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("EpicCrateStrongGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("BossCrateGiver",1)
 	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)	
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigGreenBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))	
	OV3R FFFFF 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom5", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)	
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigGreenBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))	
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenBossExplosionEffect",random(-64,64),random(-64,64),random(-16,16))
    OV3R GGGGG 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom5", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)	
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigGreenBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenBossExplosionEffect",random(-64,64),random(-64,64),random(-16,16))
    OV3R HHHHH 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom5", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)	
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigGreenBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenBossExplosionEffect",random(-64,64),random(-64,64),random(-16,16))
    OV3R IIIII 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom5", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GreenGibbedGenerator",Random(10,-10),Random(10,-10),Random(20,60),0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("BigGreenBloodCloud", random(10,80), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAAAAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX3", random(10,60), random(30,-30), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))	
	OV3R IJ 5
	Stop	
}

Actor DemonTechCore
{
Monster
Radius 80
Height 48
+NOGRAVITY
+FLOAT
+FLOATBOB
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE 
+DONTHARMSPECIES
+LOOKALLAROUND
+NORADIUSDMG
+NOPAIN
+NOBLOOD
+BRIGHT
Health 5500
Mass 999999
Species "Hell"
DamageFactor "Hell", 0.0 
DamageFactor "Legendary", 0.5
DamageFactor "BFGSplash", 0.25
DamageFactor "PDTBFG", 0.2
DamageFactor "PDTBFGTracer", 0.2
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
DamageFactor 0.45
RadiusDamageFactor 0.66
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
RenderStyle Add
Speed 0
FloatSpeed 0
Scale 2.0
Alpha 0.9
Obituary "%o was exploded by a demon tech core."
Tag "\c[l2]Demon Tech Core\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
	LORG ABCDEFG 2 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	LORG ABCDEFGABCDEFG 2 A_Chase("","",CHF_DONTMOVE)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLos(2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("ChaosSuperLightningProj",48,0,random(-2,2))
	LORG ABCDEFGABCDEFG 2 A_Chase("","",CHF_DONTMOVE)
    Loop
  Missile:
	LORG A 2
    Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BFG12000ExplosionEffect",0,0,48)
	TNT1 A 0 Radius_Quake(20,8,0,12,0)
	BFE3 AB 4 Bright A_ScreamAndUnblock
	BFE3 CDEF 5 Bright
	Stop
}
}

ACTOR PhaseMonolithOfSin : DarkMonolithOfSin
{
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Monolith Of Sin\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	PCSV A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	PCSV A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	PCSV B 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	PCSV B 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	PCSV C 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	PCSV C 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	PCSV D 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Look
	PCSV D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(156,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_minions >= 100,"SeeChase")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("MonolithOfSin/Fire")
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeSummon",0,0,60,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_minions",user_minions+2)
  SeeChase:
	PCSV A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	PCSV A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	PCSV B 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLos("Missile")
	PCSV B 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	PCSV C 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	PCSV C 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	PCSV D 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Chase
	PCSV D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(20,"Teleport")
    Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_minions >= 100,"MissileWander")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("MonolithOfSin/Fire")
    TNT1 AAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseArchdukeSummon",0,0,60,random(2,8),0,0,0,32)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_minions",user_minions+6)
  MissileWander:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV B 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV B 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV C 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV C 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV D 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV A 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV B 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV B 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV C 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV C 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV D 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Wander
	PCSV D 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("PhaseMonolithOfSinTrail",0,0,0,2,90)
    TNT1 A 0 A_CposRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"Pause")
    Goto Missile
  Pause:
    TNT1 A 0 
	PCSV AABBCCDD 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
	PCSV AABBCCDD 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Teleport")
	PCSV A 4 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram",0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Teleport:
    PCSV A 1 Bright A_UnSetShootable
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("TeleportFog")
	PCSV AAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_FadeOut(0.1,0)
	PCSV AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
	PCSV A 105 
	PCSV AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("TeleportFog")
	PCSV AAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_FadeIn(0.1)
    PCSV A 4 Bright A_SetShootable
    Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOATBOB",FALSE)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ScreamAndUnblock
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	PCSV AAAAABBBBBCCCCCDDDDDAAAAABBBBBCCCCCDDDDD 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("NewPurpleKaboom2",random(16,76),random(32,-32),random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	PCSV AAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Debris",random(-32,32),random(-32,32),random(0,48),random(4,-4),random(4,-4),random(4,8),0,128)
	PCSV A 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleBossExplosionEffect")
	Stop
}
}

ACTOR PhaseMonolithOfSinPentagram : MonolithOfSinPentagram
{
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
	ARJ9 ABCDEFEDCBA 1 Bright A_FadeOut
	Stop
}
}

	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(304) == 1, "Toaster")
	PCSV AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_FadeOut
	Stop
}

ACTOR PhaseShotgunCommando : ShotgunCommando1
{
Health 250
Alpha 0.8
BloodColor "51 07 94"
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Shotgun Commando\c-"
Obituary "%o was blown to bloody pieces by a Phase Shotgun Commando."
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,4)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    PSGC A 10 A_Look
	PSGC Z 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,4)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    PSGC AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
    PSGC CCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(62,"Phase")
    Loop
  Phase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")   
	PSGC E 2 A_FaceTarget
	PSGC E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	PSGC E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PSGC E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PSGC E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	Goto Phased
  Phased:
	PSGC AABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
  PhaseChase:
	PSGC AABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"UnPhase")
	Loop
  UnPhase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")		
	PSGC E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	PSGC E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PSGC E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PSGC E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PSGC E 2 A_FaceTarget		
	Goto See
  Chase:
	PSGC AA 1 A_FastChase
	PSGC A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(130,"Dodge")
	PSGC AA 1 A_Chase
	PSGC A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(130,"Dodge")
	PSGC BB 1 A_Chase
	PSGC A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(130,"Dodge")
	PSGC BB 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FootStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
	PSGC A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(150,"Dodge")
	PSGC CC 1 A_Chase
	PSGC A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(150,"Dodge")
	PSGC CC 1 A_FastChase
	PSGC A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(130,"Dodge")
	PSGC DD 1 A_FastChase
	PSGC A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(130,"Dodge")
	PSGC DD 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FootStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
	PSGC A 0 A_Jump(64,"Dodge")
	Loop
  Strafing:
	PSGC A 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
	PSGC AABB 3 A_GiveInventory("CommandoStrafing",1)
	PSGC C 0 A_SpawnItem("FootStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Chase("","Missile",CHF_DONTMOVE)
    PSGC CCDD 3 A_GiveInventory("CommandoStrafing",1)
	Goto See	
  Pause:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("csgun/windup")
	PSGC AAAAA 3
	Goto See	
  SeeNoDodge:
	PSGC AABB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FootStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
	PSGC CCDD 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FootStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
	PSGC AABB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FootStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
	PSGC CCDD 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FootStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
	PSGC AABB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FootStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
	PSGC CCDD 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FootStep",0,0,2,0,0,-20)
	Goto Chase
  Dodge:
	PSGC A 1 A_FaceTarget
	PSGC E 0 ThrustThingZ(0, 20, 0, 0)
	PSGC A 0 A_Jump(256, "DodgeRight", "DodgeLeft")
  DodgeLeft:
	PSGC E 0 ThrustThing(angle*256/360+192, 15, 0, 0)
	Goto SeeNoDodge
  DodgeRight:
	PSGC E 0 ThrustThing(angle*256/360+64, 15, 0, 0)
	Goto SeeNoDodge
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)	
    PSGC E 10 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",Random(28,34),0,Random(6,-6),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", 12, -6, 36, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	PSGC F 0 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,18.3,4,Random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
	PSGC E 1 A_GiveInventory("CommandoStrafing",1)
    PSGC E 5 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(15.4,0,1,Random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer2",Random(28,34),0,Random(6,-6),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ShellCasing", 12, -6, 36, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
	PSGC F 0 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(22.5,18.3,4,Random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
	PSGC E 1 A_GiveInventory("CommandoStrafing",1)
    PSGC F 4 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(15.4,0,1,Random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
    TNT1 A 0 A_CPosRefire
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(20,"Pause")
    Goto Missile+2
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)	
    PSGC G 6 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)	
    PSGC H 5 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
    PSGC I 5 A_Scream
    PSGC J 5 A_Fall
    PSGC K 5 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    PSGC L 5
	PSGC M 5
	PSGC N 5
	PSGC O 5
	PSGC P 5
	PSGC P -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    PSGC PONMLKJIH 5
    Goto See
}
}

ACTOR PhaseBabyDemolisher : BabyDarkDemolisher
{
Health 1400
Alpha 0.8
BloodColor "51 07 94"
Obituary "%o was annihilated by a Dark Phase Demolisher."
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Baby Demolisher\c-"
States
{
  Spawn:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    PBD0 A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    PBD0 A 2 A_BabyMetal
    PBD0 ABBCC 2 A_Chase
    PBD0 D 2 A_BabyMetal
    PBD0 DEEFF 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(62,"Phase")
    Loop
    Loop
  Phase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")   
	PBD0 A 2 A_FaceTarget
	PBD0 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	PBD0 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PBD0 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PBD0 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	Goto Phased
  Phased:
	PBD0 AABBCCDDEEFFAABBCCDDEEFFAABBCCDDEEFF 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
  PhaseChase:
	PBD0 AABBCCDDAABBCCDDEEFF 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"UnPhase")
	Loop
  UnPhase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")		
	PBD0 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	PBD0 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PBD0 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PBD0 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PBD0 A 2 A_FaceTarget		
	Goto See
  Pause:
    PBD0 A 10
    Goto See
  Pause2:
	PBD0 G 15 A_PlaySound("weapons/demontechsteam")
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)	
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(148,"BFG10K","PhaseRifle")
  Normal:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(2000,1)
    Goto BFG10K
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/darkmasterwind")
    PBD0 A 13 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/darkmasterwind2")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/minigunfire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(26,30),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 8, 8, 18, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
    PBD0 Q 3 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(20.0, 0, 1, Random(1,5)*3, "HellBulletPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/minigunfire","Weapon")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 8, -8, 18, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)
    PBD0 R 2 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(20.0, 0, 1, Random(1,5)*3, "HellBulletPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"PhaseRifle","BFG10K")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(3,"Pause","Missile")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
    Goto Normal+3
  BFG10K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
    PBD0 G 16 Bright A_FaceTarget
	PBD0 G 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    PBD0 H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Phase15KBall",20,0,Random(4,-4))
    PBD0 G 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    PBD0 H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Phase15KBall",20,0,Random(4,-4))
    PBD0 G 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    PBD0 H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Phase15KBall",20,0,Random(4,-4))
	PBD0 G 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    PBD0 H 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Phase15KBall",20,0,Random(4,-4))
    PBD0 G 20 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(110,"PhaseRifle")
    Goto See
  PhaseRifle:
	PBD0 A 5 A_FaceTarget
	PBD0 Q 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhaseRifleProjectile",16,8,Random(150,-150)/100.00,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhaseRifleProjectile",16,-8,Random(150,-150)/100.00,0)
	PBD0 R 2 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("PhaseRifle/Fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(8,"Normal","BFG10K")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(3,"Pause","Missile")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
	Goto PhaseRifle+1
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
    PBD0 I 10 A_Pain
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)	
    PBD0 I 20 A_Scream
	PBD0 J 6 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	DMS2 KKKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PurpleKaboom5",random(20,40),random(10,-10),random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",random(20,40),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
    PBD0 L 6 A_NoBlocking
    PBD0 MNO 6
    PBD0 P -1
    Stop
  Raise:
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    PBD0 PONMLKJ 5
    Goto See+1
}
}

Actor PhaseRifleProjectile
{
Projectile
Height 4
Radius 4
Speed 50
Damage 8
Scale 0.06
+FORCERADIUSDMG
Damagetype "Hell"
DeathSound "PhaseRifle/Explode"
Decal PhaseRifleProjectileScorch
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Spawn2")
  Normal:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"NormalFX")
	PTPR A 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseRifleProjectileTrail",Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-20,20),128)
	Loop
  NormalFX:
	TNT1 A 0
	PTPR A 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseRifleProjectileTrail",Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-20,20),128)
	TNT1 A 0
	PTPR A 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseRifleProjectileTrail",Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-20,20),128)
	Goto Normal
  Spawn2:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Spawn2FX")
	PTPR A 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseRifleProjectileTrail2",Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-20,20),128)
	Loop
  Spawn2FX:
	TNT1 A 0
	PTPR A 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseRifleProjectileTrail",Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-20,20),128)
	TNT1 A 0
	PTPR A 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseRifleProjectileTrail",Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-1,1),Random(-20,20),128)
	Goto Spawn2
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseTechEx",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom8",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX4",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 A 1 A_Explode(20,64,0,0)
	Stop
}
}

ACTOR PhaseTechEx
{
RenderStyle Add
Alpha 0.75
Scale 0.5
Projectile
+NOCLIP
+CLIENTSIDEONLY
States
{
  Spawn:

Actor PhaseCybruiser : Cybruiser1
{ 
Health 1600
Alpha 0.8
BloodColor "51 07 94"
Obituary "%o was blown away by a Phase Cybruiser."
HitObituary "%o was smashed by a Phase Cybruiser."
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Cybruiser\c-"
States 
{ 
  Spawn: 
    PBRS A 7 A_Look
	PBRS A 7 A_Look
    PBRI A 7 A_Look
	PBRI A 7 A_Look	
    Loop 
  See:
    PBRS AABB 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
    PBRS CCDD 3 A_Chase
    TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("monster/bruwlk")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(62,"Phase")
    Loop
  Phase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")   
	PBRS E 2 A_FaceTarget
	PBRS E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	PBRS E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PBRS E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PBRS E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	Goto Phased
  Phased:
	PBRS AABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
  PhaseChase:
	PBRS AABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"UnPhase")
	Loop
  UnPhase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")		
	PBRS E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	PBRS E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PBRS E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PBRS E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PBRS E 2 A_FaceTarget		
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Rockets","HomingRockets","BFG15K")
  Normal:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/rgcharge")
    PBRS EE 10 A_FaceTarget
	PBRS E 2 A_FaceTarget
	PBRS E 1
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/railgf")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("RailgunImpactPurple",30)
    PBRS F 5 Bright A_CustomRailgun(Random(40,60),20,"Purple",None,1,1,0,"HellBulletPuff",0,0,0,0,0.45,0,"NewRailgunTrailPurple")
    PBRS E 20
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Rockets","HomingRockets","BFG15K")
	Goto See
  Rockets:
    PBRS E 10 A_FaceTarget 
    PBRS F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("CybruiserPhaseRocket",40,20,0,0)
    PBRS E 10 A_FaceTarget
    PBRS F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("CybruiserPhaseRocket",40,20,0,0)
    PBRS E 10 A_FaceTarget
    PBRS F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("CybruiserPhaseRocket",40,20,0,0)
    PBRS E 10
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"HomingRockets","BFG15K")
    Goto See
  HomingRockets:
    PBRS E 10 A_FaceTarget 
    PBRS F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("CybruiserPhaseHomer",40,20,0)
    PBRS E 10 A_FaceTarget
    PBRS F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("CybruiserPhaseHomer",40,20,0)
    PBRS E 10 A_FaceTarget
    PBRS F 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("CybruiserPhaseHomer",40,20,0)
    PBRS E 10
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"BFG15K")
    Goto See	
  BFG15K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
    PBRS E 18 A_FaceTarget
	PBRS E 6 A_FaceTarget
    PBRS F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Phase15KBall",40,20,random(4,-4))	
	PBRS E 6 A_FaceTarget
    PBRS F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Phase15KBall",40,20,random(4,-4))	
	PBRS E 6 A_FaceTarget
    PBRS F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Phase15KBall",40,20,random(4,-4))	
	PBRS E 4 A_FaceTarget
    PBRS F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Phase15KBall",40,20,random(4,-4))
	PBRS E 4 A_FaceTarget
    PBRS F 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Phase15KBall",40,20,random(4,-4))
	PBRS E 20 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
	Goto See
  Melee:
    PBRS GH 7 A_FaceTarget
    PBRS I 7 A_MeleeAttack
    Goto See
  Pain: 
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
    PBRS J 4 A_Pain
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
    PBRD K 20 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	PBRD KKKLLL 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PurpleKaboom5", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	PBRD MMMNNN 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PurpleKaboom5", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	PBRD OOOPPP 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("PurpleKaboom5", Random(10,50), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", 0, 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    PBRD Q 4 Bright A_NoBlocking
    PBRD R 3 Bright
	PBRS S 3
    PBRS T -1 
    Stop
  Raise:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    PBRS S 4

	Goto See

Actor PhaseTechFiend : DTechFiend1
{
Health 350
Alpha 0.8
BloodColor "51 07 94"
Obituary "%o was mown down by a Phase Tech Fiend." 
HitObituary "%o was bulldozed by a Phase Tech Fiend." 
Tag "\c[q0]Phase Tech Fiend\c-"
States
{
  Spawn: 
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,4)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	PPNK A 12 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,4)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk")
	PPNK AABB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk")
	PPNK CCDD 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Phase")
	Loop
  Phase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")   
	PPNK E 2 A_FaceTarget
	PPNK E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	PPNK E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PPNK E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PPNK E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	Goto Phased
  Phased:
	PPNK AABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
  PhaseChase:
	PPNK AABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"UnPhase")
	Loop
  UnPhase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")		
	PPNK E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	PPNK E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PPNK E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PPNK E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PPNK E 2 A_FaceTarget		
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(168,"PhaseTech")
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(250,"Lunge")
	Goto See
	Melee:	   
  Lunge:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("cyberfiend/melee")
	PPNK AA 7 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,20,0,1)
	PPNK B 2 A_Recoil(-28)
	PPNK B 3 A_CustomMissile("PinkyLunge",18,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	PPNK B 6
	PPNK B 2 A_ScaleVelocity(0.2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	PPNK B 1 A_ScaleVelocity(0)
	Goto See
  PhaseTech:
	PPNK E 15 A_FaceTarget
	PPNK E 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("PhaseRifleProjectile",36,0,Random(150,-150)/100.00,0)
	PPNK F 3 Bright A_PlaySoundEx("PhaseRifle/Fire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(62,"Pause")
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
	Goto PhaseTech+1
  Pause:
	PPNK E 15 A_PlaySound("weapons/demontechsteam")
	Goto See	   
  Pain: 
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	PPNK H 4 A_Pain
	Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PPNK I 5
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	PPNK J 5 A_Scream
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("PurpleBloodCloud",random(30,60),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	PPNK K 4 A_SpawnItemEx("PhaseTechFiendArm",10,0,32,0,Random(6,8),0,0,128)
	PPNK L 4 A_NoBlocking
	PPNK M 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	PPNK N -1
	Stop
  XDeath:
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PPNK I 3
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	PPNX A 3 A_XScream
	PPNX B 3 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	PPNX C 3 A_NoBlocking
	PPNX D 3 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	PPNX EF 3
	PPNX G -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	PPNK NMLKJI 5 
	Goto See 
}
}

{

{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,4)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	PF0D A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	PF0D AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	PF0D CCDD 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("HumanishStep",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(87,"Phase")		
	Loop
  Phase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")   
	PF0D E 2 A_FaceTarget
	PF0D E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.75)
	PF0D E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)
	PF0D E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PF0D E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	Goto Phased
  Phased:
	PF0D AABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_ExtChase(0,0)
  PhaseChase:
	PF0D AABBCCDDAABBCCDD 1 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"UnPhase")
	Loop
  UnPhase:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("phaseimp/teleport")		
	PF0D E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.15)
	PF0D E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.35)
	PF0D E 1 A_SetTranslucent(0.55)

	PF0D FE 5 A_FaceTarget		
	Goto See
  Pain:
	PF0D H 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)

	Goto See

	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	PF0D J 8 A_Scream
	PF0D K 6
	PF0D L 6 A_Fall
	PF0D M -1
	Stop
  XDeath:
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.8)
	PF0D N 3
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	PF0D O 3 A_XScream
	PF0D P 3 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	PF0D Q 3 A_Fall
	PF0D R 3
	PF0D S -1
	Stop

	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	PF0D MLKJI 5
	Goto See
}

	Loop
  See:

	Goto See

	IPPG N 3 
	IPPG O 3 A_XScream
	IPPG P 3 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	IPPG Q 3 A_Fall
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	IPPG RST 3
	IPPG U -1
	Stop
  Raise:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	IPPG TSRQPON 5
	Goto See
}
}

Actor HellforgeCyberFiend : MagmaFiend1
{ 
Health 500
Speed 15

+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE

{

	Loop
  See:

	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk")

	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk")
	Loop 
  Melee: 
	CYF3 EF 3 A_FaceTarget
	CYF3 G 4 A_MeleeAttack
	CYF3 E 3 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,"Lunge","FlameBreath","Tracer","Comet")
  Normal:

	CYF3 PPP 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MagmaBall",32,0,random(-3,3))
	CYF3 O 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Tracer")
	Goto See

	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireTracer",32,5,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("AvatarFireTracer2",32,-5,0)
	CYF3 PO 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Comet")
	Goto See
  Comet:
	CYF3 O 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	CYF3 P 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("Comet",32,0,0)
	CYF3 O 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Lunge:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(250,1)
	Goto See
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("magma/attack")
	CYF3 EF 7 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,1)
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThingZ(0,20,0,1)
	CYF3 F 2 A_Recoil(-28)
	CYF3 F 3 A_CustomMissile("PinkyLunge",18,0,0,CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	CYF3 G 6
	CYF3 G 2 A_ScaleVelocity(0.2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	CYF3 G 1 A_ScaleVelocity(0)
	Goto See
  FlameBreath:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(300,1)
	Goto Normal
	CYF3 O 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("magma/firebreath")
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	CYF3 PPP 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MagmaBreath",32,0,random(6,-6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	CYF3 PPP 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MagmaBreath",32,0,random(6,-6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	CYF3 PPP 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MagmaBreath",32,0,random(6,-6))
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget		
	CYF3 PPP 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("MagmaBreath",32,0,random(6,-6))
	CYF3 O 5
	Goto See
  Pain: 
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	CYF3 H 4 A_Pain
	Goto See
  XDeath:
  Death: 
	TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SLIDESONWALLS,0)
	CYF3 I 5 A_GiveToTarget("MediumCrateGiver",1)
	CYF3 J 5 A_Scream
	CYF3 K 4 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	CYF3 L 4 A_NoBlocking     
	CYF3 M 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	CYF3 N -1 
	Stop
  Raise: 
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
	CYF3 NMLKJI 5 
	Goto See 
}
