Actor AugmentedArachnotron : Dualachnotron1
{
Health 2000
Mass 1500
PainChance 20
Scale 1.2
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
BloodColor "Blue"
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
Tag "\c[m6]Augmented Arachnotron\c-"
Obituary "%o was vaporized by an Augmented Arachnotron."
var int user_script;
States
{
  Spawn:
   	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    SCRP A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
   	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/dualachwalk")
    SCRP AABBCC 2 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Erasus","BFG4700","BFG4700Alt")
  Normal:
    SCRP DDD 5 A_FaceTarget
  NormalGo:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("lrball3/shot")
    SCRP E 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("AugmentedArachnotronProj",76,0,0)
    SCRP D 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(52,"See","Missile")
    TNT1 A 0 A_CposRefire
    Goto NormalGo
  Erasus:
	SCRP DDD 3 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/load")  
	SCRP DDDDDDDDDDD 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	SCRP E 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",85,0,random(-1,1))
	SCRP DDDD 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	SCRP E 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",85,0,random(-1,1))
	SCRP DDDD 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("erasus/fire")
	SCRP E 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("DErasusProj",85,0,random(-1,1))
	SCRP DDDD 3 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"BFG4700")
	Goto See
  BFG4700:
	SCRP DD 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG47000/Beep2")
	SCRP DD 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG47000/Beep2")
	SCRP DD 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG47000/Beep3")
	SCRP DD 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG4700/Fire")
	SCRP E 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("DBFG4700Ball",76,0,0)
	SCRP D 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG4700/Fire")
	SCRP E 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("DBFG4700Ball",76,0,0)
	SCRP D 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG4700/Fire")
	SCRP E 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("DBFG4700Ball",76,0,0)
	SCRP DDD 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"BFG4700Alt")
	Goto See
  BFG4700Alt:
	SCRP DD 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG47000/Beep2")
	SCRP DD 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG47000/Beep2")
	SCRP DD 5 A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG47000/Beep3")
	SCRP DD 5 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG4700/Fire")
	SCRP E 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("DBFG4700FastShot",76,0,0)
	SCRP DDD 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("BFG4700/Fire")
	SCRP E 6 Bright A_CustomMissile("DBFG4700FastShot",76,0,0)
	SCRP DDD 4 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
    SCRP F 12 A_Pain
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
    SCRP G 20 A_Scream
	SCRP H 6 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BlueGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	SCRP IIIII 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom2", random(20,40), random(10,-10), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    SCRP J 6 A_NoBlocking
    SCRP K 6
    SCRP L -1 
    Stop
}

Actor TripleMinigunArachnotron : AugmentedArachnotron
{
Health 2250
BloodColor "Red"
Tag "\ccTriple Minigun Arachnotron\c-"
Obituary "%o was filled full of lead by a Triple Minigun Arachnotron."
States
{
  Spawn:
   	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_WEAPON)
    CSP3 A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
   	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_WEAPON)
    CSP3 A 2 A_BabyMetal
    CSP3 ABBCC 2 A_Chase
    CSP3 D 2 A_BabyMetal
    CSP3 DEEFF 2 A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("TripleMinigun/Motor",CHAN_WEAPON,1,1)
    CSP3 UUUUU 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("TripleMinigun/FireLoop",CHAN_WEAPON,1,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfCloser(1250,1)
	Goto ExplosiveMinigun
  MissileGo:
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",random(20,24),0,random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing",8,8,18,random(2,6),0,random(1,3),random(80,90),128)
    CSP3 T 1 Bright A_CustomBulletAttack(20.0,0,3,random(1,5)*3,"HellBulletPuff")
    CSP3 S 1 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(6,"Pause")
	TNT1 A 0 A_MonsterRefire(40,"Pause") 
	Loop
  ExplosiveMinigun:
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SentientExplosiveTracer",28,0,Random(-800,800)/100.00,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SentientExplosiveTracer",10,-10,Random(-800,800)/100.00,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SentientExplosiveTracer",10,10,Random(-800,800)/100.00,0)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeShellCasing",8,8,18,random(2,6),0,random(1,3),random(80,90),128)
    CSP3 T 2 Bright A_PlaySound("sentient/fire",CHAN_WEAPON)
    CSP3 S 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(24,"Pause")
	TNT1 A 0 A_MonsterRefire(40,"Pause") 
	Loop
  Pause:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("TripleMinigun/FireDecay",CHAN_WEAPON,1,0)
    CSP3 UUUU 4 A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
  Pain:
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_WEAPON)
    CSP3 I 12 A_Pain
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
	TNT1 A 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_WEAPON)
    CSP3 I 20 A_Scream
	CSP3 J 6 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	CSP3 KKKKK 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("Kaboom2", random(20,40), random(10,-10), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    CSP3 L 6 A_NoBlocking
    CSP3 MNO 6
    CSP3 P -1
    Stop
}
}

Tag "\c[z4]Elemental Carrier\c-"
Scale 1.3
var int user_script;
States 
{
  Spawn:
   	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	ELCR A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
   	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	ELCR AABB 3 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(36,"Spam","Evade","Evade")
	Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"EvadeAlt")
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,20,0,0)
	ELCR ABABABAB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  EvadeAlt:
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,20,0,0)
	ELCR ABABABAB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Spam:
	ELCR C 12 Bright A_FaceTarget
	ELCR D 5 Bright A_DualPainAttack("TerrorSoulMinion")
	ELCR C 12 Bright A_FaceTarget
	ELCR D 5 Bright A_DualPainAttack("ForgottenOneMinion")
	ELCR C 12 Bright A_FaceTarget
	ELCR D 5 Bright A_DualPainAttack("RictusMinion")
	ELCR AAA 4 A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Missile: 
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Proj","Comet")
  Normal:
	ELCR CCC 4 Bright A_FaceTarget 
	ELCR D 5 Bright A_DualPainAttack("TerrorSoulMinion")
	ELCR CCC 4 Bright A_FaceTarget 
	ELCR D 5 Bright A_DualPainAttack("ForgottenOneMinion")
	ELCR CCC 4 Bright A_FaceTarget 
	ELCR D 5 Bright A_DualPainAttack("RictusMinion")
	ELCR AAA 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Proj","Evade","Evade")
	Goto See
  Proj:
	ELCR AAA 4 A_FaceTarget 
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",30,-36,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",30,36,0)
	ELCR E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	ELCR AAA 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",30,-36,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",30,36,0)
	ELCR E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	ELCR AAA 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",30,-36,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("InfernalEmperorProj",30,36,0)
	ELCR E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	ELCR AAA 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Comet","Evade","Evade")
	Goto See
  Melee:
  Comet:
	ELCR AAA 4 A_FaceTarget 
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",30,-36,random(-4,4))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",30,36,random(-4,4))
	ELCR E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",30,-36,random(-4,4))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",30,36,random(-4,4))
	ELCR E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",30,-36,random(-4,4))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",30,36,random(-4,4))
	ELCR E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",30,-36,random(-4,4))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",30,36,random(-4,4))
	ELCR E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",30,-36,random(-4,4))
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("Comet",30,36,random(-4,4))
	ELCR E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	ELCR AAA 4 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Evade")
	Goto See
  Pain:
	ELCR F 8 A_Pain
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile","Evade")
	Goto See
  Death: 
	ELCR G 5 Bright
	ELCR H 5 Bright A_Scream
	ELCR I 5 Bright A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.75,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SoulKeeperGoreGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("OrangeParticleSpawner", 0, 0, random(20,40), 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)  
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom3", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))	 
	ELCR J 5 Bright A_PainDie("TerrorSoulMinion")
	ELCR L 5 Bright A_PainDie("ForgottenOneMinion")
	ELCR M 5 Bright A_PainDie("RictusMinion")
	ELCR LM 5 Bright 
	Stop
} 
}

{ 
Health 2500
PainChance 16
DamageFactor "MechStep", 0.0
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE

HitObituary "%o got chomped on by a Cacolord."
Tag "\c[J6]Cacolord\c-"
SeeSound "Cracko/See"
ActiveSound "Caco/Active"
PainSound "Cracko/Pain"
DeathSound "monsters/cacomdet"
Scale 1.3
States
{
  Spawn:
   	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	CCLD A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
   	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,5)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)

    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)

	Loop

	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,20,0,0)
	CCLD AAAAAAAA 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  EvadeAlt:

	CCLD AAAAAAAA 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Melee:
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Seeker","Comet")
  Normal:
	CCLD CCCC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordBall",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))

	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordBall",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordBall",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordBall",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordBall",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordBall",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	CCLD DD 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Seeker")
	Goto See
  Seeker:

	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordTracer",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))

	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordTracer",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordTracer",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))

	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordTracer",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordTracer",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordTracer",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	CCLD DD 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(100,"Comet")
	Goto See
  Comet:
	CCLD CCCC 2 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordComet",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordComet",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget

	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordComet",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordComet",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	CCLD D 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("CacoLordComet",32,0,random(-4,4),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_OFFSETPITCH,frandom(-2.0,2.0))
	CCLD DD 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
	Goto See
  Pain:
    CCLD E 3 
	CCLD E 3 A_Pain
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
  XDeath:
    CCLD G 5 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    CCLD H 5 A_NoBlocking	
	CCLD I -1
	Stop
  Crash:
	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	CCLD J 4 A_PlaySound("Gore/Splat")
	CCLD K 4 A_NoBlocking
	CCLD L -1 A_SetFloorClip
	Stop	
  Raise: 
  	TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("VileHealEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    CCLD LKJIHG 5
	Goto See
}
}

Actor SynthElemental : SoulKeeper1
{ 
Health 2000
MeleeDamage 12
+DONTFALL
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+QUICKTORETALIATE
+FASTMELEE
+NOPAIN
Scale 1.1
SeeSound "SynthEle/Sight"
PainSound "SynthEle/Pain"
DeathSound "SynthEle/Death"
ActiveSound "SynthEle/Active"
MeleeSound "caco/melee"
Obituary "%o was mutilated by a Synth Elemental."
HitObituary "%o was chewed on by a Synth Elemental."
BloodColor "cf 00 b0"
Tag "\c[c0]Synth \cmElemental\c-"
States 
{
  Spawn:
	SYNE A 10 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	SYNE AAAAAA 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLos(2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Avoid")
	TNT1 A 0	
	Loop
  Avoid:
	SYNE A 0
	SYNE A 0 A_SetAngle(angle+random(0,359))
	SYNE A 0 A_Recoil(-35)
	SYNE A 0 A_FaceTarget
	SYNE AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("SynthElementalGhost")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(145,"See")
	SYNE A 1 A_Stop
	Goto Avoid
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(144,"Spread","Spirit","Souls")
  Normal:
	SYNE BBBBBBBBCCCCCCCC 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SYNE A 0 A_CustomMissile("SynthElementalProj1",54,0,0)
	SYNE A 0 A_CustomMissile("SynthElementalProj2",54,0,0)
	SYNE A 0 A_CustomMissile("SynthElementalProj3",54,0,0)
	SYNE D 7 Bright A_CustomMissile("SynthElementalProj4",54,0,0)
	SYNE DDCBB 5
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Normal","Spread","Spirit","Avoid")
	Goto See	
  Melee:
  Spread:
	SYNE BC 5 A_FaceTarget 
	SYNE D 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SynSmallFireBall",40,0,0)
	SYNE A 0 A_CustomMissile("SynSmallFireBall",40,0,-3)
	SYNE D 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SynSmallFireBall",40,0,3)
	SYNE A 0 A_CustomMissile("SynSmallFireBall",40,0,-6)
	SYNE D 2 Bright A_CustomMissile("SynSmallFireBall",40,0,6)
	SYNE CB 3
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Spirit","Avoid","Avoid")
	Goto See
  Spirit:
	SYNE BC 16 A_FaceTarget 
	SYNE D 8 Bright A_CustomMissile("SynthSpiritBall",40,0,6)
	SYNE CB 8
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"Souls","Avoid","Avoid")
	Goto See
  Souls:
	SYNE BC 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SYNE D 5 Bright A_PainAttack("SynthSoul")
	SYNE CB 4
	SYNE BC 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
	SYNE D 5 Bright A_PainAttack("SynthSoul")
	SYNE CB 4
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(99,"Avoid")
	Goto See
  Death: 
	SYNE F 5 Bright
	SYNE G 5 Bright A_Scream
	SYNE H 5 Bright A_NoBlocking
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.75,1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("SynthSpiritExplosion",24,0,0,CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MutantGibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleParticleSpawner",0,0,random(20,40),0,0,0,0,128)  
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX",random(20,40),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("PurpleKaboomBig",random(20,40),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
 	TNT1 A 0 A_PainDie("SynthSoul")
	SYNE IJK 5 Bright 
	TNT1 A 10
	Stop
} 
}

Actor SynthSoul : PoisonSoul1
{
Health 200
Speed 8
Damage 8
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
+NOBLOOD
+NOBLOODDECALS
+NOPAIN
+BRIGHT
Tag "\c[c0]Synth \cmSoul\c-"
Scale 0.6
SeeSound "SynthSoul/Sight"
AttackSound "devil/scream"
PainSound "SynthSoul/Pain"
DeathSound "SynthSoul/Death"
ActiveSound "SynthSoul/Active"
DropItem "BonusCrateDrop" 1
Obituary "%o underestimated a Synth Soul."
var int user_script;
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SynthSoulFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	SNSL ABC 2 A_Look
	Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SynthSoulFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	SNSL ABC 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfTargetInLos(2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Avoid")
	TNT1 A 0	
	Loop
  Avoid:
	SNSL A 0
	SNSL A 0 A_SetAngle(angle+random(0,359))
	SNSL A 0 A_Recoil(-20)
	SNSL A 0 A_FaceTarget
	SNSL AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 A_SpawnItemEx("SynthSoulGhost")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(145,"See")
	SNSL A 1 A_Stop
	Goto Avoid
  Missile:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Charge")
  Normal:
	SNSL AA 2 A_FaceTarget
	SNSL D 2 A_CustomMissile("SynthSoulBall",10,0,0,1)
	SNSL BB 2 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(48,"Avoid")
	Goto See
  Charge:
	SNSL ABCABC 2 A_FaceTarget
  Charging:
	TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	SNSL D 2 A_SkullAttack(15)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CposRefire
    SNSL DDDD 2
    Loop
  Pain:
	SNSL C 3 A_Pain
	SNSL C 3
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(120,"Missile","Avoid")
	Goto See
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetTranslucent(0.75,1)
	SNSL F 4 A_NoGravity
	SNSL G 4 A_Scream
 	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SoulPart1",0,0,Random(10,20),Random(8,-8),Random(8,-8),Random(6,8))
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SoulPart2",0,0,Random(10,20),Random(8,-8),Random(8,-8),Random(6,8))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SoulPart3",0,0,Random(10,20),Random(8,-8),Random(8,-8),Random(6,8))	
	TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SynthLostSpirit",0,0,0,random(-10,10),random(-10,10),random(0,16),random(0,359))
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("SynthAttackSpirit",random(4,8),random(-9,9),random(0,359),CMF_TRACKOWNER|CMF_AIMDIRECTION)
	TNT1 AA 0 A_CustomMissile("PurpleKaboomBig",random(4,8),0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))	 
	SNSL H 4 A_GiveToTarget("WeakCrateGiver",1)
	SNSL I 4 A_Fall
    TNT1 AA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PurpleParticleSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128) 
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2",0,0,random(0,360),2,random(0,360))
	SNSL JK 4
    Stop
}
}

Actor Djinn : Exile1
{
Health 2500
Speed 15
PainChance 5
+FLOAT
+NOGRAVITY
+MISSILEMORE
+MISSILEEVENMORE
SeeSound "Djinn/Sight"
ActiveSound "Djinn/Active"
PainSound "Djinn/Pain"
DeathSound "Djinn/Death"
Obituary "%o was mesmermized by a Djinn."
Tag "\cgD\c[L8]jinn\c-"
var int user_count;
var int user_script;
States
{
  Spawn:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DjinnEffectFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
    DJIN A 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,3)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DjinnEffectFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(90,"Rush")
    DJIN AABBCC 2 A_VileChase
    DJIN DDEEFF 2 A_VileChase
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Avoid")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(16,"Heal")
    Loop
  Rush:
    DJIN AAA 0 A_VileChase
	DJIN A 0 A_SpawnItem("DjinnFX",0,0)
    DJIN A 1 A_VileChase
	DJIN AAA 0 A_VileChase
	DJIN A 0 A_SpawnItem("DjinnFX",0,0)
    DJIN B 1 A_VileChase
	DJIN AAA 0 A_VileChase
	DJIN A 0 A_SpawnItem("DjinnFX",0,0)
    DJIN C 1 A_VileChase
	DJIN AAA 0 A_VileChase
	DJIN A 0 A_SpawnItem("DjinnFX",0,0)
    DJIN D 1 A_VileChase
	DJIN AAA 0 A_VileChase
	DJIN A 0 A_SpawnItem("DjinnFX",0,0)
    DJIN E 1 A_VileChase
	DJIN AAA 0 A_VileChase
	DJIN A 0 A_SpawnItem("DjinnFX",0,0)
    DJIN F 1 A_VileChase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(32,"Avoid")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(16,"Heal")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(90,"See")
    Loop
  Avoid:
    DJIN A 0
    DJIN A 0 A_SetAngle(angle+random(0,359))
    DJIN A 0 A_Recoil(-35)
    DJIN A 0 A_FaceTarget
	DJIN ABCDEFABCDEFABC 1 A_SpawnItemEx("DjinnFX")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(127,"See")
	DJIN A 1 A_Stop
	Goto Avoid
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"Summon")
  Normal:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
    TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
    DJIN G 10 A_PlaySound("Djinn/Attack")
    DJIN H 8 Bright A_VileTarget("DjinnMagicAttack")
    DJIN IJKLMN 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("exile/voidend")
    DJIN O 8 Bright A_VileAttack
    DJIN P 20 Bright
    Goto See
  Summon:
    TNT1 A 0 
	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_count >= 5,"See")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
    TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
	DJIN G 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DjinnPortalFX",0,0,0)
    DJIN G 0 A_PlaySound("Djinn/Sight")
	DJIN G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("Djinn/Raise")
	DJIN GGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("DjinnFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    DJIN HIJK 8 Bright A_FaceTarget
	DJIN G 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("brain/spit")
	DJIN LLLLLLLLMMMMMMMMNNNNNNNNN 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("MaledictSummon",0,0,40,random(1,18),random(-4,4),random(0,8))
    DJIN O 8 Bright A_SetUserVar("user_count",user_count+1)
    DJIN P 20 Bright
    Goto See
  Heal:
    DJNR BBBBB 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("DjinnFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("Djinn/Raise")
	//TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TeleportFog",14,14,0)
	//TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TeleportFog",14,-14,0)
	//TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TeleportFog",-14,14,0)
	//TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TeleportFog",-14,-14,0)
	//TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DjinnGhost",14,14,0)
	//TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DjinnGhost",14,-14,0)
	//TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DjinnGhost",-14,14,0)
	//TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DjinnGhost",-14,-14,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,0,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,20,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,40,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,60,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,80,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,100,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,120,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,140,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,160,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,180,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,200,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,220,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,240,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,260,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,280,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,300,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,320,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,340,0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("VelociratorResRadius",10,0,360,0)
	DJNR BBBBBCCCCC 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("DjinnFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	DJNR BBBBBCCCCC 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("DjinnFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	DJNR BBBBBCCCCC 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("DjinnFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
	DJNR BBBBBCCCCC 2 Bright A_SpawnItem("DjinnFlameSpawner",0,0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain:
    DJIN Q 10 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    DJIN Q 6
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
    DJIN R 5 A_Scream
    DJIN S 5 A_Fall
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
    DJIN TUV 5
	DJIN W 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
    DJIN XY 4
    DJIN Z -1
    Stop
  XDeath:
	XDJN A 4
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("DjinnTorso",0,0,48)
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	XDJN B 4 A_XScream
	XDJN C 4 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	XDJN D 4 A_Fall
	XDJN E 4 A_SpawnItem("BodyCrash",0,0,0,0)
	XDJN E -1
	Stop
}
}

Actor DjinnGhost : Djinn
{
Health 1
DropItem ""
Alpha 0.5
RenderStyle OptFuzzy
-SOLID
-COUNTKILL
+NOPAIN
+NEVERTARGET
+NOTARGET
+NORADIUSDMG
+NOBLOOD
RadiusDamageFactor 0.0
SeeSound "Djinn/Sight"
ActiveSound "Djinn/Active"
PainSound ""
DeathSound ""
Tag "\cmDjinn Ghost\c-"
var int user_timer;
States
{
  Spawn:
    DJIN A 0
    DJIN A 5 A_PlaySound("Djinn/Sight")
    Goto See
  See:
  	TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_timer >= 15,"Death")	 
	TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_timer",user_timer+1)
    DJIN A 0 A_Wander
    DJIN A 2 A_Chase("","",CHF_RESURRECT|CHF_DONTMOVE)
	DJIN A 0 A_Wander
    DJIN A 2 A_Chase("","",CHF_RESURRECT|CHF_DONTMOVE)
	DJIN A 0 A_Wander
    DJIN B 2 A_Chase("","",CHF_RESURRECT|CHF_DONTMOVE)
	DJIN A 0 A_Wander
    DJIN B 2 A_Chase("","",CHF_RESURRECT|CHF_DONTMOVE)
	DJIN A 0 A_Wander
    DJIN C 2 A_Chase("","",CHF_RESURRECT|CHF_DONTMOVE)
	DJIN A 0 A_Wander
    DJIN C 2 A_Chase("","",CHF_RESURRECT|CHF_DONTMOVE)
	DJIN A 0 A_Wander
    DJIN D 2 A_Chase("","",CHF_RESURRECT|CHF_DONTMOVE)
	DJIN A 0 A_Wander
    DJIN D 2 A_Chase("","",CHF_RESURRECT|CHF_DONTMOVE)
	DJIN A 0 A_Wander
    DJIN E 2 A_Chase("","",CHF_RESURRECT|CHF_DONTMOVE)
	DJIN A 0 A_Wander
    DJIN E 2 A_Chase("","",CHF_RESURRECT|CHF_DONTMOVE)
	DJIN A 0 A_Wander
    DJIN F 2 A_Chase("","",CHF_RESURRECT|CHF_DONTMOVE)	
	DJIN A 0 A_Wander
    DJIN F 2 A_Chase("","",CHF_RESURRECT|CHF_DONTMOVE)	
    Loop
  Missile:
    Goto See
  Heal:
    DJNR ABC 5 Bright
    Goto See
  XDeath:
  Death:
	DJIN Q 5 A_Fall
    DJIN RSTUVWXY 5
    DJIN Z 35
    DJIN ZZZZZZZZZ 8 A_FadeOut(0.08)
	Stop
}
}

Actor BabyDemolisherMKII : BabySentient1
{
Health 1100
SeeSound "minidemo/sight"
ActiveSound "minidemo/active"
PainSound "monsters/fusionitepain"
DeathSound "minidemo/death"
Tag "\ccBaby Demolisher MKII\c-"
Obituary "%o got %p ass beat by a Baby Demolisher MKII."
Decal BulletChip
States
{
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_script == 1,6)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(3708,0,0,0) == TRUE,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256,2)
	TNT1 A 0 A_Changeflag("NOPAIN",1)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BabySentientFireFollower",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_script",1)
	BD3M AB 2 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
	BD3M AB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(12,"Evade")
    Loop
  Evade:
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,"EvadeAlt")
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+64,20,0,0)
	BD3M ABABABAB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  EvadeAlt:
	TNT1 A 0 ThrustThing(Angle*256/360+192,20,0,0)
	BD3M ABABABAB 2 A_Chase
	TNT1 A 0 A_Stop
	Goto See
  Missile:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(62,"BFG15K")
  Normal:
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/darkmasterwind")
    BD3M A 15 A_FaceTarget
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monsters/darkmasterwind2")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/minigunfire","Weapon")
	TNT1 A 0 A_CustomMissile("MonsterTracer",Random(26,30),0,Random(5,-5),0)
	TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 8, 8, 18, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(80, 90), 128)
    BD3M K 2 A_CustomBulletAttack(20.0, 0, 1, Random(1,5)*3, "HellBulletPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("weapons/minigunfire","Weapon")	
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RifleCasing", 8, -8, 18, Random(2, 6), 0, Random(1, 3), Random(-80, -90), 128)	
    BD3M L 2 A_CustomBulletAttack(20.0, 0, 1, Random(1,5)*3, "HellBulletPuff")
	TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(3,"Pause","BFG15K")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpidRefire
    Goto Normal+2
  BFG15K:
	TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("weapons/charge15k")
    BD3M C 18 A_FaceTarget
	BD3M C 6 A_FaceTarget
    BD3M D 4 A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",20,0,Random(4,-4)) 
    BD3M C 6 A_FaceTarget
    BD3M D 4 A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",20,0,Random(4,-4)) 
    BD3M C 6 A_FaceTarget	
    BD3M D 4 A_CustomMissile("BabyDemo15K",20,0,Random(4,-4)) 	
    BD3M C 20 A_PlaySound("weapons/bfg15kcooldown",CHAN_AUTO)
    Goto See
  Pause:
	BD3M ABAB 2
	Goto See
  Pain:
    BD3M A 3 A_Pain
	BD3M A 3
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(104,"Missile")
    Goto See
  Death:
    BD3M A 20 A_Scream
	TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImDead",1)
    BD3M E 6 A_Fall
	BD3M F 6 A_GiveToTarget("StrongCrateGiver",1)
	TNT1 AAA 0 A_SpawnItemEx("GibbedGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128,0)
	BD3M GGGGG 2 A_CustomMissile("Kaboom2", random(20,40), random(10,-10), random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
	TNT1 AAAA 0 A_CustomMissile("SmokeFX2", random(20,40), 0, random(0,360), 2, random(0,360))
    BD3M H 6
    BD3M I 4
	BD3M J 2
    TNT1 A -1 
    Stop
}
}
